Mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police akaparura chirongwa chakanangana nekudzivirira mhirizhonga kumadzimai nevanasikana, zvikuru munguva dzesarudzo.
Mapurisa akaparura chirongwa ichi neChitatu achitsigirwa nemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, zvikuru dzemadzimai, muzinda weCanada muZimbabwe, pamwe neNational Prosecuting Authority of Zimbabwe.
Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, mukuru wemapurisa, Commissioner-General Godwin Matanga, vakati mapurisa haasi kuzopeta maoko panyaya dzekushungurudzwa kwemadzimai munguva dzesarudzo.
Vakakurudzirawo madzimai kuti vamhang’are nyaya dzemhirizhonga kana kumbunyikidzwa vasingatyi.
Mukuru anoona nezvezvirongwa musangano reWomen’s Coalition of Zimbabwe, Amai Sally Ncube, vakatiwo vafadzwa zvikuru nechido chiri kuratidzwa nemapurisa rwendo rwuno mukudzivirira mhirizhonga kumadzimai munguva dzesarudzo.

Vamwe vanachiremba munyika kuzvipatara zvakaita seWest End neParirenyatwa vari kuramba kubatsira vanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vane chirwere checoronavirus vachiti havana zvikanisiro nehunyanzvi hwacho.
Nemusi weMuvhuro vamwe vanamukoti vakaratidzirawo vachiti kuchipatara cheMpilo vachitiwo havana zvikwanisiro zvekuzvidzivirira mukutapurirwa chirwere ichi.
Vanoona nezvezvirwere zvekutapuriranwa mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Portia Manangazira, vakaudzawo Studio7 kuti mumwe mudzimai ari chizvarwa cheZimbabwe ainge abva kunyika yeChina akatadza kurapwa kuParirenyatwa nenyaya iyi.
Chipatara cheParirenyatwa chakazoita ongororo yenyaya iyi chikabuda nechisungo chekuti hachisi kuzotora murwere wezvirwere zvakaita secoronavirus chichiti vanhu vakadai vanofanira kuendeswa kuWilkins Hospital neBeatrice Infectious Hospital sezviri pamutemo senzira yekuyedza kudzivirira kuti vamwe varwere navanachiremba pachipatara ichi vasatapurirwe coronavirus.
Chipatara ichi chinotiwo chichagadzira tende panze pechipatara kuongorora vanenge vachifungidzirwa kuti vane chirwere ichi vobva vaendeswa kune zvipatara zvinonzi zvine hunyanzvi izvi.
Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Dr Prosper Chonzi, vanotiwo chipatara cheWest End chakaramba kubatsirawo mumwe mudzimai wekuChina akazoguma ashaya chichifunga kuti ane chirwere checoronavirus asi iye asina.

Patafonera chipatara ichi chati titumire mibvunzo asi tange tisati tawana mhinduro pataenda kumhepo.
Vanhu vanosvika zviuru zvina nemazana matatu nemakumi masere nevaviri vafa nechirwere ichi pasi rose.
China ndiyo ine vanhu vakawanda vafa ichiteverwa neItaly neIran. MuAfrica mafa vanhu vaviri kuEgypt neMorocco.
Asi nyika dzabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica dzinosvika gumi neimwe dzinoti Algeria, Burkina Faso, South Africa, Senegal, Tunisia, Togo, Egypt, Cameroon, DRC, Nigeria ne Morocco. South Africa ine vanhu gumi nevatatu vabatwa nechirwere ichi.
Kanzuru yeHarare iri kuyambira vagari vemumisha inogara veruzhinji yeBudiriro neGlen Norah kuti vasashandise mvura yemumighodhi kana matsime avari kuchera sezvo mvura iyi iine hutachiona.
Nekuda kwekushaikwa kwemvura yemupombi nguva zhinji, vagari vemunzvimbo dzakaita seGlen Norah neBudiriro, vari kushandisa mvura yemutsime.
Asi mutauriri wekanzuru, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti ongororo yavakaita kumusha weBudiriro neGlen Norah yakaratidza kuti migodhi mizhinji ine hutachionahuinokonzera zvirwere zvemanyoka zvakadai seTyphoid nemudumbu.
VaChideme vati migodhi mizhinji iri kushandiswa kunzvimbo idzi haina kudzika izvo zvinoita kuti mvura inoshandiswa iyi isangane nemvura dzetsvina dzemaseweji.
VaChideme vati kanzuru iri kuwanisa nzvimbo idzi mvura nguva yese.
Mukuru we Community Water Alliance, VaHardlife Mudzingwa, vashora kanzuru vakati kushaikwa kwemvura yekanzuru ndokuri kukonzera kuti vagari vacheremigodhi padzimba.
VaMudzingwa vatiwo dzimwe nzvimbo hadzisi kuwana mvura nguva dzese.
Vagari vazhinji muguta reHarare havawani mvura yekanzuru nguva dzese izvo zvoita kuti kumisha inogara vazhinji vanhu vachere migodhi kunyange hazvo zvisingabvumirwi nemitemo yekanzuru.
Vagari vanotiwo kunyange mvura yacho yekanzuru ine tsvina zvakanyanya vakati vanototyirawo hutano hwavo.
Zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara zvehurumende sezvo vana mukoti vasiri kuita basa ravo.
Vanorwarirwa nevanorwara pachipatara cheParirenyatwa vaudza Studio7 kuti vanoshamiswa nekuunganidza vanhu kwaitwa nehurumende munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana munyika kuchiitwa mabiko asi varwere vachinhonga svosve nemuromo muzvipatara.
Amai Shupikai Gachitawa vane mwana akatyoka gumbo ari muchipatara cheParirenyatwa. Amai Gachitawa vanoti mwana wavo haasi kupiwa mapiritsi kana kugezwa nekuiswa mabhandiji matsva nekuda kwekushaikwa kwanamukoti.

Mumwe murume asina kuda kudomwa nezita audza Studio7 kuti mumawadhi hamusisina kushambidzika sezvo pasina vanogeza varwere kana kubvisa vanozviitira. Atiwo varwere vari kurasikirwa nehupenyu nekuda kwekushaiwa vapi vemapiritsi nemishonga nevabatsiri.

Munyori musangano reZimbabwe Association of Doctor’s for Human Rights, VaEvans Masitara, vati zvaitwa nehurumende zvekudzinga vanamukoti zvinoshoresa, sezvo vanotambura nedanho ratorwa iri, vari varwere.
Mugwaro ravanyorera nhengo dzavo, sangano reZimbabwe Nurses Association rati vasavhundutsirwe nematanho ari kutorwa nehurumende. Gwaro iri ratiwo kuramwa mabasa kuri kuenderera mberi.

Pane vana mukoti vanodarika zviuru gumi nezvitanhatu vari kuramwa mabasa muzvipatara zvehurumende.
Sangano re Zimbabwe Election Support Network, Zesn, rinoti ratumira vaongorori ku Hwedza neku Tsholotsho uko kwange kuine sarudzo dzema by election dzemakanzura emawadhi matatu.
Zesn inoti sarudzo idzi dzaitirwa mumawadhi anoti Tsholotsho Ward 16; Tsholotsho Ward 20 neHwedza District Rural Council Ward 4.
Sarudzo yemu Tsholotsho Ward 16 yaitwa mushure mekudzingwa kwaVa Ngwenya Patrick Hlakaza ve Zanu PF, vachipomerwa mhosva yekusashandisa zvakanaka mari dze Campfire, ukuwo Va Gideon Ndlovu veTsholotsho Ward 20, vakadzingwawo vachipomerwawo mhosva imwe cheteyo.
Sarudzo yemu Ward 4 ku Hwedza yaitwa mushure mekushaya kwenhengo yeZanu PF, Alderman Samson Makamba.
Mapato makuru maviri e Zanu PF neMDC Alliance ndiwo akwikwidza muma by – election matatu aya.
Mukuru anoona nezvezvirongwa zveZimbabwe Election Support Network, Amai Ellen Dingani, vanoti sarudzo idzi dzaitwa murunyararo, uye Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, yanga ichitevedza zvinodiwa nemitemo yesarudzo.

Nhengo inomirira Norton yakazvimirira, VaTemba Mliswa, vaudza VaNcube kuti hurumende yakatanga ichiti bhondi noti raive nehuremu hwakafanana nedhora rekuAmerica, asi ikazoshandura izvi izvo zvakaita kuti vanhu varasikirwe nemari dzavo.
Vatiwo pari zvino vemabhizimisi vari kutara mitengo inoenderana nemutengo wemari pamukoto izvo zvinoita kuti mitengo yezvinhu ive pamusoro zvakanyanya.
VaMliswa vati kuita kwakadai ndiko kwaita kuti vanhu vasavimbe navo VaNcube pamwe nehurumende.
Asi VaNcube vati nhengo dzeparamende dzinofanira kuvimba navo nehurumende sezvo vari kuvandudza mashandiro emabhanga nekushandiswa kwemari munyika kuitira kuti zvinhu zvinakire veruzhinji.
Vati pane matanho akawanda avari kutora achaita kuti zvinhu zvinake munyika.
Mumiriri weKwekwe Central, VaMasango Matambanadzo, vaudzawo VaNcube kuti nyaya yekusiyanisa huremu hwemabhondi nedhora rekuAmerica yaomesera vanhu vakawanda munyika.
Vati zvakakosha kuti hurumende ione zvaingaite kuitira kuti mari dzevashandi vayo nevemakambani akazvimirira dzawedzerwe kuitira kuti dzienderane nekudhura kwave kuita zvinhu.
Asi VaNcube vati hurumende yakatogadzirisa mihoro yevashandi vayo ndosaka iri kuvapa mari dzekubatsirikana.
Vatiwo vanoziva kuti vashandi mumakambani akazvimirira vari kuwedzerwawo mari dzavanotambira.
Asi VaMatambanadzo vati mari yakawedzerwa vashandi haina zvainobatsira nekuti mitengo yezvinhu yakakwirawo zvakanyanya.
Asi VaNcube vati havasi kuzowedzera mihoro yevashandi kuti ienderane nehuremu hwemari yekuAmerica vachiti kunyange hazvo mitengo iri kuita chamurambamhuru, mitengo yezvimwe zvinhu yave kudzikiri nekuti zvave kutengwa nevanhu vashoma.
Vati izvi zviri pachena kuti vemabhizimisi vari kutenga mari yekunze pamukoto asi ivo vachifanira kutenga mari iyi mumabhanga.
Vati pari zvino mabhanga ane mari yekunze mamiriyoni mazana masere emadhora ekuAmerica uye iyi ndiyo mari inofanira kushandiswa nemaindasitiri nemakambani.
Mune imwewo nyaya mumiriri weChipinge East, VaMatthew Mlambo, vati havasi kufara kuti vanhu vakagariswa patsva nehurumende kuma 2000 vave kudzingwa munzvimbo idzi zvisina chikonzero.
Vati izvi zviri kuitika munzvimbo dzakawanda munyika.
Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekurima, VaDouglas Karoro, vati vanhu vari kudzingwa ndevaya vagere munzvimbo dzisingakodzeri dzakaita semafuro emombe kana matoro.
Pane mhuri dzakawanda dzakadzingwa mumapurazi adzakapihwa nehurumende makore akawanda pafuura kuChemagora kuMidlands nekuMashonaland West uye vakarwira hondo yerusununguko vari kunyunyutawo pamusoro nenyaya iyi.
Bato reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa rinoti harina kuenda kumusangano wakasheedzerwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nekuti VaMnangagwa pachavo, ndivo chikonzero chebopoto riri munyika.
MDC inoti VaMnangagwa havafainiri kudaidzira musangano wekuyananisa vanhu vari kupikisana kana ivo vari mumwe wevanhu vari mudariro.
Vachipindura tsamba yekukokwa kuhurukuro nehofisi yemutungamiri wenyika, mukuru anoona nezvevashandi muMDC, VaSessel Zvizvai, vati mutungamiri wavo haakwanisi kupinda mumusangano uyu, sezvo paine zvinhu zvizhinji zvinofanira kutanga zvagadziriswa.
VaZvizvai vati zvakabuda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika ndicho chimwe chezvinhu zvinofanirwa kutanga zvatariswa.
Vatiwo nyaya yenhaurirano inofanirwa kunge ichokokerwa nevanhu vanhu vasinei nezvematongerwo enyika kuitira kuti kuyananiswa kwegakava riripo kuitwe nezira inofadza munhu wese.
VaZvizvai vatiwo hurukuro idzi dzinofanirwa kunge dzichitsigirwa nemasangano anosanganisira Souther African Development Community, African Union neUnited Nations.
MDC yadoma zvinhu gumi zvinofanirwa kuitwa naVaMnangagwa pasati paitwa hurukuro naVaChamisa.
Izvi zvinosanganisira kumisa kushungurudza vanopikisa; kuona kuti hapana munhu anobatwa chibharo; kubudiswa mumajeri kwevese vakasungirwa nyaya dzematongerwo enyika; kusapindira kwezvematongerwo enyika mumashandiro ematare edzimhosva pamwe nekuremekedza kodzero dzemunhu wese.
Mutauriri webato iri, VaJacob Mafume, vaudza Studio7 kuti pasati paitwa musangano wekuyananisa vanhu, VaMnangagwa vanofanira kubvisa masoja mumigwagwa uye vanofanira kurega dzimwe nhengo dzemapato anopikisa dzakatizira kunze kwenyika kuti dzidzoke kumusha kubva kunyika kwadzakatizira.
VaChamisa vagara vachiti havacherechedzi VaMNangagwa semutungamiri wenyika kunyange hazvo dare reConstitutional Court rakati VaMnangagwa ndivo vakakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika.
Mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa achitungamirirwa naAmai Joyce Mujuru, wePeople’s Rainbow Coalition, haunawo kupinda mumusangano uyu, Amai Mujuru vachiti musangano uyu ndewekungotorwa mifananidzo pasina chine musoro chiri kuitwa.
Shasha yetsiva munyika Charles Manyuchi anoti Muhammad Ali, uyo akashaya nemusi weChishanu kuArizona muAamerica igamba rake munyaya dzemutambo wetsiva.
Mutumbi waAli wakasvika munzvimbo yaakaberekerwa yeLouisville, Kentucky nemusi weSvondo. Ali akashaya ave nemakore makumi manomwe nemana uye ari kutarisirwa kuvigwa kuCave Hill, Louisville kwekare nemusi weChishanu.
Ali ange arwara kwenguva yakareba nechirwere cheParkinson’s disease. Mufi akarwa tsiva kubva muna 1960 kusvika muna 1981 uye pamitambo makumi mashanu nemitanhatu akakundwa mishanu chete.
Panguva iyi, Ali akatora bhande reHeavyweight katatu.
Manyuchi uyo ane bhande reWBO Silver akaudza Studio 7 kuti kushaya kwaAli kwasiya gwanza risingakwanise kuvharika sezvo akaita kuti ruzhinji rwevanhu rwufarire mutambo wetsviva. "Murume ange ane hunyanzvi uyu, baba vangu vaitambawo tsiva vaimufarira ini ndaimuremekedza sezvo ariiye akaita kuti ndisimbe mumutambo uyu." akadaro Manyuchi.
Akaenderera mberi achiti, "Muhammad Ali aizivikanwa nekutaura kuti - float like a butterfly and sting like a bee," ini ndinozivikanwa sa busy bee sezita rangu manyuchi saka ndinonzwa kufara kuti mbande rangu iri rakamborwirwawo naMuhammad Ali nekuti rinemufanikiso wake uye ndiyo category yaiirirwa, ndarwadziwa asi ndicharamba ndichishandisa hunyanzvi hwandakawana mukuburikidza naMuhammed Ali,"
Vatungamiri venyika dzakawanda kusanganisawo vaimbove mutungamiri weAmerica VaBill Clinton nevamwe vatungamiri vedzimwe nyika vari kutarisirwa kunge vari parufu urwu. Vanhu vakawanda vari kuendesa vari kutarisirwa kuti vange vachionekana naAli nemusi weChishanu uyu. Migwagwa iri kutarisirwa kunge yakazara zvakanyanya.
Mhuri yaAli yati panozopedza vanhu vose kuchema nekuonekana nemufi vachazoenda voga semhuri kuenda kunoradzika mufi. Mutauriri wemhuri, VaBob Gunnell vanoti kuradzikwa kwaAli kwainge kwakarongwa makore apfuurta zvichienderana nezvido zvemufi. Anonzi aida kuti kuchemwa kwake kunge kuchifanira kuuyiwa nemunhu wose hake anoda.
Ali akaberekwa achinzi Cassius Marcellus Clay Jr. muna 1942 asi akazochinja zuva iri mushure mekutendeuka kubva kuve muKristo achiita muMoslem. Akakwanisawo kuhwina menduru yegoridhe muchikamu che light heavy weight mushure mekukunda Zbigniew Pietrkowski weku Poland.
Makambani akawanda emuAmerica ari kutora dambudziko rechirwere che COVID-19 (Coronavirus) sechinhu chakakosha zvikuru zvaita kuti vashandi vakawanda vashandire kudzimba dzavo, senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi.
Mamwewo makambani ane mabasa asingakwanisi kushandirwa kudzimba kusanganisirawo vezvitoro zvinobika zvekudya, anonzi ave kutombomisa vamwe vashandi mabasa sezvo vasingakwanise kuenda kumahofisi.
Matunhu akawanda emuno muAmerica ave kurambidza kuungana kwevanhu munzvimbo dzinosanganisira dzekudyira pamwe nekunoonekwa mabhaisikopo, izvo zvave kuita kuti vashandi vakawanda vari mumapoka emabasa aya vambomiswa mabasa kusvika zvinhu zvanaka.
Hurumende yeAmerica yakazivisawo kuti ine hurongwa hwekuisa parutivi mari inosvika trillion yemadhora, iyo inonzi ichazoshandiswa mukumutsiridza hupfumi hwenyika kuburikidza nekubatsira makambani pamwe nevanhu vachakanganiswa nechirwere ichi.
Vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitanhatu vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAmerica uye vamwe vanodarika zana vafa.
Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri mudunhu reMaryland muno muAmerica, Muzvare Shingie Mangwiro, avo vave kushandirawo kumba nekuda kwechirwere ichi, vanoti vanoona sekunge pfungwa yekuti vanhu vambogara kudzimba yakanaka chose sezvo zvichibatsira kuderedza kusangana kwevanhu.
Muzvare Mangwiro, avo vanomboshandira kumba kana paita mamwe matambudziko, vanoti havana dambudziko rezvekushandisa sezvo michina yavo yekumba yagara yakabatanidzwa neyekubasa.
Vanotiwo matanho ari kutorwa nemutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, pamwe nemapazi ehurumende yavo akakodzera zvikuru mukurwisana nedambudziko iri.
Asi Muzvare Mangwiro vari kukurudzirawo vari kumusha kuti vatungamidze utsanana mberi, vachiti kunyange hazvo chirwere ichi chisati chapinda munyika, zvakakosha kuti vanhu vatore matanho ekuchidzivirira.

Mumwe wevanhu ava, Amai Kundiso Tevera, vanoti vanzwa nekungotamiswa tamiswa nehurumende. Vati pavakagariswa kuNuanetsi padiki zvikuru zvekuti mhuri dzose dzakakanganiswa nemafashamu aya hadzina chadzinokwanisa kuita.
Amai Tevera vati chimwe chave kunetsa kupararira kuri kuita zvirwere zvemanyoka zvavanoti zviri kukonzerwa nemvura isina kuchena yavanoti vari kuwana muzvibhorani zvavati zviri chinhambwe kubva pa Nuanetsi Ranch pavakapihwa twuminda twekuti vagare.

Amai Muzenda vanoti munhu anorarama nehutachiwana, nokudaro kushayikwa kwechikafu kunzvimbo yavakagariswa patsva iyi kwava kuvatadzisa kunwa mapiritsi avo uye vanoti vave kutoshuvira rufu.

Zvichakadai, vakaita ongororo yemamiriro akaita kwakagariswa vanhu vakabviswa ku Tokwe Murkosi ava uye vachishanda nesangano re Human Rights Watch, Va Dewa Mavhinga, vakurudzira komisheni inowona nezvekodzero dzevanhu kuti iferefete mabvisirwo akaitwa vanhu ku Tokwe Murkosi pamwe nekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu ava kuri kuramba kuchienderera mberi.

Va Mavhinga vakurudzira kuti vari kushungurudzwa ava vakwidze nyaya dzavo kumatare edzimhosva. Va Mavhinga vataura izvi pakuparura kwaita sangano ravo gwaro rinotarisa maramiro evanhu vakabviswa kuTokwe Murkosi zvichitevera mafashamu emvura egore rapera riri kudaidzwa kuti “Homeless, Landless and Destitute – The Plight of Zimbabwe’s Tokwe Mukorsi Flood Victims”

VaBush vachavigwa mudunhu reTexas.
VaBush vakaita mutungamiri weAmerica kubva muna 1989 kusvika 1993, mushure mekunge vamboita mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika panguva iyo VaRonald Reagan vaive mutungamiri weAmerica.

Izvi zvinopikisana nemashoko akubiritswa nenhepfenyuro ye ZBC mukupera kwesvondo ekuti kunetsana kwaive pakati pavana chiremba ava nehurumende kwakanga kwagadziriswa uye vaifanirwa kuchidzokera mabasa nekukasika.
Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, VaAldrin Musiiwa, vanonzi vakaudza nhepfenyuro iyi kuti mativi maviri aya akanga asangana akawirirana, vakati vana chiremba vakanga vasati vadzokera pamabasa vaifanirwa kunge vadzokera kusvika pari nhasi.
Asi Dr. Martin Mlilo vanove mumwe chiremba vari kuziva zviri kuitika, vanoti hapana chakabuda pamusangano wakaitwa nevamiriri vavana chiremba nevehurumende neChishanu chapfuura sezvo hurumende isati yapindura vanachiremba pazvichemo zvavo.
“Isu takangoitawo zvekunzwa muzvitivhitivhi, saka handioni vanachiremba vachidzokera kumabasa. Vane zvichemo zvakawanda zvisati zvagadziriswa,” Dr. Mlilo vanodaro.
Zvichemo izvi zvinonzi zvinosanganisira kuti vanachiremba vabvumidzwe kuve nhengo dzemasangano anomirira vashandi pamwe nekuti vapiwe marezinesi anozovabvumidza kushanda muzvipatara zvisiri zvehurumende kanawo kui vazovhura masejari avo kana vapedza makore maviri ekushandira hurumende.
Pane mashokowo ekuti hurumende inenge yotora pfungwa yekurasa danho rekuti vanachiremba vatsva ava vasaine magwaro ekupinda mabasa avari kuramba kusaina aya senzira yekupedza nayo kusawirirana uku.
Zvipatara zvikuru zviviri zvemunyika zvinoti Harare Central neMpilo Central iri kuBualwayo zvakatozvisa kuti vzvekuvhara mativi anosvikira varwere nekuda kwekushomeka kwavanachiremba.
Studio 7 yakundikana kubata divi rehurumende panyaya iyi.
Asi Dr. Mlilo vanoti kusvika vaziviswa zviri pamutemo nehurumende paimire panyaya iyi vacharamba vachiramwa mabasa.
Vaimbi vane mukurumbira muZimbabwe vanosanganisira Jah Prayzah, Tocky Vibes naFreeman, vari kutarisirwa kufadza zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa nemimhanzi pazoro reEaster.
Kuchange kusingadanwi anonzwa neMugovera manheru muJohannesburg apo vaimbi vemuZimbabwe ava vachange vachipakurira mhuri yeZimbabwe pamwe nezvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika zvinogara munyika iyi, nhapitapi yemimhanzi yavo.
Muimbi ane mukurumbira, Jah Preyzah, uyo anozivikanwa nedzimbo dzake dzinosanganisira, 'Mudhara Achauya', 'Kutonga Kwaro', nedzimwewo, acharidza akabatana nevamwe vaimbi, vanosanganisira Tocky, Freeman naDarlington Tonderai Tanganyika, pamwe nevaimbi vemuSouth Africa.
Tanganyika, uyo anozivikanwa nezita rekuti Mofela, akaimba kambo kaita mukurumbira kanonzi 'Chindangundega' kakabva padambarefu rinonzi 'Nhiyo'. Chikwata chake chinonzi Journey Band.
Tanganyika anoti dambudziko guru rakatarisana nechikwata chake, nderekushaya rubatsiro rwemari yekufambisa pamwe nekutenga midziyo yekushandisa.
Tanganyika ari kuvimbisa vatsigiri vake kuti pazuva iri, achange achiimba dzimbo dzake itsva, pamwewo neidzo dzichiri kuita mukurumbira, dzakaita sa'Muka', 'Nzanga', 'Paruzevha', 'Mufaro Wangu', na'Gorekore'.
Mumwe anoimba naTanganyika ndiNicolas Musonza, uyo anoridza nechikwata cheJourney Band.
Chikwata che Journey Band chine muimbi mumwe chete wechidzimai anonzi Monica Chitongo. Chitongo anoti ari kukurudzira mamwe madzimai kuti vapindewo muchikwata chake kuzoimba naye.
Vaimbi vakawanda vekuZimbabwe vari kufarira kuimbira mimhanzi yavo muSouth Africa, sezvo vachiwana mari yakati wandeyi.
Mwedzi unouya, muimbi ane mukurumbira kuchamhembe kweAfrica, Alick Macheso anotarisirwa kunge ari muSouth Africa achitandadza vatsigiri vake.
Caps United yashevedza Oscar Machapa uyo yaive yamboramba kuti atsive Hardlife Zvirekwi uyo akakuvara munjodzi yemotokari.
Machapa apinzwa pavatambi makumi matatu avo vachange vachitambira maGreen Machine mushure mekunge ambonzi aive asingakodzere kupfeka nhumbi dzemaGreen Machine apo Caps United yakaita sarudzo yevatambi vayo vemwaka uno.
Asi kukuvara kwakaita Zvirekwi munjodzi yemotokari neMuvhuro kwavhurira mutambi uyu musuwo mushure mekudzoka kumaGreen Machine ambosiya chikwata ichi achienda kuDemocratic Republic of Congo uko anga achitambira chikwata cheAS Vita.
Asi mumwe mutungamiri weCaps United, VaAbraham Kawadza, vanoti havasi kukanda mapfumo pasi munyaya dzaZvirekwi vachiti ivo vane tarisiro yekuti kaputeni wavo achadzoka munhandare apo mitambo ichasvika munharaunda yechipiri.
Kana akanaya, Zvirekwi anokwanisa kunyoreswa neCaps United nevePSL panovhurwa nguva yekunyoresa vamwe vatambi zvinoitwa gore rega rega kubva musi wa 1 kusvika musi wa 31 Chikunguru.
VaKawadza vanoti nzvimbo yekunyoresa Zvirekwi nevePSL munharaunda inotevera yakachengetedzwa, uye vachange vachiongorora mafambiro ekunaya kwake kuti vaone kuti anokwanisa here kubatsira chikwata ichi kutora mukombe weligi zvekare.
Asi aimbotambira chikwata cheChegutu Pirates, Peter Matore, anoti achitarisa mifananidzo yaZvirekwi mazuva mashoma kwaitika tsaona iyi, hapana chinomutadzisa kudzoka munhandare zvekare sezvo ruoko rwake rwusina kudamburwa nhengo refu.
Zvirekwi akadimburwa chanza mushure menjodzi iyi aibva kumabiko aive aitirwa kuMotor Action Sports Club.
Mutambi uyu ndiye akasarudzwa kuve Soccer Star of the Year muna 2016 apo maGreen Machine akatora mukombe weCastle Lager Premier Soccer League.
Pakasarudzwa Rodwell Chinyengere kuve Soccer Star of the Year wa 2017, Zvirekwi akaudza Studio7 nezvenguva yake ari Soccer Star of the Year.
Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Football Association, VaPhillip Chiyangwa, vazivisa kuti vari kuzvipira kubatsira Caps United kuona kuti Zvirekwi arapwa zvakakwana.
Zvichakadaro, vanoronga mitambo yetsiva VaBoris Zneider varonga machikichori emitambo ayo achaitirwa muMagamba Hall mumusha weWarren Park muHarare neMugovera.
VaZneider vanoti pachange pane mitambo gumi nemina yekurwira mabhande eZimbabwe achasanganisa vatambi vane mukurumbira vakaita sa Tinashe Madziwane, Patiance Masitara, Colin Mavhundutse, Simon Madangure, Monalisa Sibanda, Tapiwa Tembo, Enock Msambudzi, Thembani Mhlanga,
VaZneider vanoti vari kuitira mitambo iyi munzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji uyezve ichionekwa pasina muripo sezvo vari kuedza kusimudzira mukurumbira waimbove nemutambo uyu mazuva ekare.
VaZneider vanoti vachibva muWarren Park, mitambo inotevera ichaitirwa kuBudiriro.

Mutungamiri weZanu PF uye vari mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vavhura zviri pamutemo musangano wepagore webato ravo uri kuitirwa kuGoromonzi vachishora kuratidzira nekuramwa mabasa kwakaitwanevashandi mukati megore rino.
Vari kupinda musangano uyu vaudzwawo kuti ruzhinji rweZimbabwe rwuri kutambura zvakanyaanya nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi hwenyika.
Vachivhura musangano wechigumi nesere wepagore webato ravo, VaMnangagwa vashora kuratidzira kwakaitwa munyika muna Ndira uko kwakasiya vamwe vanhu vafa uye vamwe vakuvara.
VaMnangagwa vatora mukana uyu kukurudzira mapato asiri munhaurirano dzezvematongerwo enyika dziri kuitwa pasi pechorongwa chavari kudaidza kuti Political Actors Dialogue, kana kuti Polad, kuti vapinde munhaurirano idzi vachiti havasi kuzoshaya hope nekusapinda kwemamwe mapato munhauriro idzi.
Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemutevedzeri wavo, VaConstantino Chiwenga.
Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri weMDC, VaDaniel Molokele, kuti tinzwe divi rebato ravo panyaya idzi.
Asi mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti vanoda kuti nhaurirano idzi dzinge dzichitungamirwa nemuyananisi anobva kunze kwenyika uye anove kana akambove mutungamiri weimwe nyika izvo zvatsinhirwa nemutauriri weboka revechidiki muMDC, VaStephen Chuma, avo vati nhaurirano dziri kuitwa naVaMnangagwa nemamwe mapato dzisina MDC mukati, idambe.
Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaArnold Gumbo, vati hapana chinotadzisa mapato ari muPolad aya kuenderera mberi nenhaurirano kana MDC yaVaChamisa isina kupinda munhaurirano idzi.
Zvichakadai, VaMnangagwa vati chirongwa chekugovera vanhu vatema minda hachisi kuzodzoserwa shure chero nani zvake vachiti vaimbova varimi vechichena vanofanira kujaira kugarisana nevarimi vatsva.
Mashoko aVaMnangagwa aya atsinhirwa neimwe nhengo yeZanu PF iri kupinda musangano uyu, VaEmmson Mapiye.
Sachigaro weZanu PF, Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri, vaudza VaMnangagwa pamusangano uyu kuti ruzhinji rweZimbabwe rwuri kunhonga svosve nemuromo kubudikidza nekusamaira zvakanaka kwakaita hupfumi hwenyika.
Asi VaMnangagwa vati zvinhu zvichanaka chete kana veruzhinji vakashanda nesimba vachiti mutambirwi gwinyawo.
VaMnangagwa vatorawo mukana uyu kushora nyaya yehuori munyika vakatiwo zvakare nyika haisi kuzodzokera pakushandisa mari yedzimwe nyika.
Vatiwo hurumende yavo iri kushanda zvakasimba kugadzirisa nyaya dzehupfumi vakakurudzirawo nhengo dzebato ravo kuti dzishande zvakasimba kuitira kuti bato ravo rigokunda musarudzo dzemuna 2023.
Vakurudzirawo kuti zvichazeyewa pamusangano uyu zvive zvinhu zvinogadzirisa raramo yeveruzhinji.
Panyaya yekusabatana kunonzi kuri mubato ravo, VaMnangagwa vati vavengi vavo vari kuedza kutsvaga vamwe pakati pavo kuti vashande navo asi izvi hazvisi kuzobudirira.
Zvinonzi pane kusawirirana pakati paVaMnangagwa naVaChiwenga asi nhasi vanga vachitaura nezwi rimwe chete pamusangano uyu.
Musangano wegore rino, uyo uri kupindwa nevanhu vanodarika zviuru zvishanu, uri kuitwa pasi pedingindira rinoti: Modernize, merchanize and grow the economy towards Vision 2030.
Musangano wecongress weMDC uri kuenderera mberi kuAscot Stadium kuGweru nhasi vakawanda vakatarisira zvichabuda musarudzo dzehutungamiri zvikuru pavatevedzeri vemutungamiri webato VaNelson Chamisa uye achaita munyori mukuru webato, mubati wehomwe uye sachigaro webato.
Pane vari kukwikwidza kuva vatevedzeri vaVaChamisa kumadzimai kuna Amai Tracy Mutimhiri, Amai Lynette Karenyi-Kore uye Amai Lilian Timveos.

Bhanga reStandard Chartered rinoti riri kuzogumura vamwe vashandi sezvo rave kuendesa mamwe mapazi aro zvikuru anoda humhizha kuChina, India neMalaysia.
Vanhu makumi maviri vakatomiswa basa pavashandi mazana matatu nemakumi masere nemana vari muZimbabwe. Bhanga iri rakatonyorera vashandi varo chiziviso richitaura nezvenyaya iyi.
Mumwe mukuru muStandard Chartered Amai Lillian Hapanyengwi vaudza nhepfenyuro yeBloomberg kuti vamwe vashandi vachatatsvagirwa kumwe kwekuenda. Vanotiwo zvavari kuita zvakanangana nekuderedza mari dzavari kushandisa.
Mutungamiri wesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Union VaPeter Mutasa vanoti vashandi vakatotanga kumiswa basa gore rapera. Vanoti vanhu ava havasi kunyatsopihwa mari yavo yemudyandigere sezvo hurumende isiri kuvapawo rutsigiro.
Vati zvinhu zvinovashungurudza kuti vashandi vemuZimbabwe vari kusiiwa vachinonga svosve nemuromo nevemakambani.
Vanachiremba vakuru varatidzira muHarare vachiti vari kuda kuti mari dzavo dzemihoro dziwedzerwe pamwe nekupihwa zvikwanisiro zvekuti vaite basa ravo nemazvo.
Madhokotera aya atiwo nhuna dzavavanachiremba vadiki dzinofanirwa kugadziriswa nekukasika kuitira kuti vakwanisewo kuita basa ravo nemazvo.
Vanachiremba vakuru vabatana navanachiremba vadiki vachiratidzira vakachengetedzwa nemapurisa kubva pachipatara cheParirenyatwa kusvika kudare reparamende vachiimba zvakaomarara vakatakura zvinyorwa zvakasiyana-siyana zvanga zvichitsoropodza hurumende pamwe negurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, nekutadza kugadzirisa nhuna dzavanachiremba avo vari kuramwa mabasa.
Vasvika paparamende, madhokotera mana ndiwo aenda kunosiya gwaro renyunyuto muparamende.
Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, zvichitevera kuratidzira kwaita anachiremba ava sezvo vanga vachiti vakabatikana mune mumwe musangano.
Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wesangano ravanachiremba vakuru reZimbabwe Senior Hospital Doctors Association, VaRaphael Makota, vati vana chiremba vakuru havasi kufara nemari dzemihoro dzavari kutambiriswa nehurumende, kusawanikwa kwezvikwanisiro zvinoita kuti vaite basa ravo nemazvo pamwe nekutadza kuri kuita VaMoyo kugadzirisa zviri kuita kuti vanachiremba vatsutsumwe.
VaMakota vati zvinovarwadza kuti varwere vari kufa nepamusana pekutadza kuri kuita hurumende kugadzirisa nhuna dzavanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa.
VaMakota vati mugwaro ravasvitsa kudare reparamende vari kudawo kuti bhodhi rezvehutano reHealth Service Board ripwanywe paumbwe komisheni yeHealth Services Commission.
Vakafanobata chigaro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wesangano ravanachiremba vadiki reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr. Masimba Ndoro, vaudza Studio7 kuti dare reparamende rinofanira kutora nyaya yanachiremba roikoshesa kuitira kuti nhuna dzanachiremba dzigadziriswe kuitira kuti varwere vasarambe vachifa muzvipatara.
VaNdoro vatiwo nhengo dzesangano ravo hadzisi kuzodzokera kubasa kudzamara nhuna dzavo dzagadziriswa kunyange hazvo dare remakurukota nezuro rakabvumirana kuti hurumende haisi kuzowedzera nguva yakatarwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti vana chiremba vari kuramwa mabasa ava vadzoke pabasa pasina mibvunzo.
Gurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, vakaudza vatori venhau nezuro kuti hurumende ichaita nhaurirano dzemari yemihoro nezvimwe zvakadaro nanachiremba vanenge vadzoka kubasa chete kwete avo vari kuramwa mabasa.
VaMoyo vanoti hurumende iri kuedza kugadzirisa nhuna dzavanachiremba dzinosanganisira nyaya dzekushomeka kwemichini yavanoshandisa mukurapa varwere, asi vanoti zvimwe zvezvichemo zvavanachiremba hazvikwanise kugadziriswa nezuva rimwe chete.

Vanotevera Dynamos vari kufara zvikuru nematambiro arikuita chikwata chavo icho chakazvambura How Mine 6-0 chichitevera nekurova Yadah 2-0 kechipiri mwaka uno kuti chikwire muhutungamiri hwemakundano aya kusvika pachave parizvino. Mumwe wevanofarira Dynamos ndi muzvare Felistas Musapenda.

Makundano aya ave kumboenda kuzororo svondo rino kupa nguva kumitambo ye 2018 World Cup qualifiers.
Zimbabwe yakadzingwa neveFifa mumakundano eWorld Cup aya mushure mekunge veZifa vatadza kubhadhara aimbove murairidzi wemaWarriors Valinhos mari yake yemuhoro.
Vamwe vanhu vanorwara nechirwere cheshuga kana kuti diabetes vanoti vari kufara zvikuru nekushandisa kwavari kuita nharembozha dzavo kana kuti app inonzi D-nurse manage mukuzvivheneka kuti shuga inenge yakamira sei mumuviri mavo.
Gurukota rinoona nezvehutano Dr. David Parirenyatwa vanoti vanhu vanodarika miriyoni inwe chete nezviuru mazana mashanu munyika vane chirwere cheshuga uye vamwe vacho havatozive kuti vanascho nenyaya yekusaenda kunovhenekwa navanachiremba.
Vanhu vasingazive kuti vane chirwereichi vanenge vaine inonzi type two diabetes inokonzerwa nezvinhu zvekudya zvinhu zvakaita sesadza kunyanya munhu asingazvigwinyise muviri uye kuva nemuviri wakakura.
Vana chiremba vanoti munhu abogona kuona kuti ave nechirwere ichi kuburikidza nekuonda zvakanyanya munguva pfupi, kurutsa, kusaona zvakanaka, kusafema zvakanaka uye kungonzwa kuneta nguva zhinji.
Asi vamwe vevanhu ava vave kubatsirikana nekushandisa muchina wechizvino zvino wakaparurwa munyika gore rapera inonzi D-nurse technology.
Muchina uyu unoshandiswa kuveneka shuga inenge iri mumuviri wemunhu kana kuti D-nurse Glucose Meter uye D-nurse app panharembozha.
Nyika yeChina ndiyo yakaparura muchina uyu muna 2015.
Kambani yeVivid Health ndiyo yakaparura hurongwa hwekushandiswa kwe app iyi muZimbabwe mukupera kwegore rapera.
App iyi yauyawo panguva yakanaka munyika sezvo vanhu vane chirwere cheshuga vange vari kuchema chema kuti kuenda kuna chiremba kunodhura. Mumwe anoti abatsirikana neap iyi ndiVaCourage Chombo.
Izvi zvatsigirwa naVaSimba Mapfumo avo vave nemakore gumi vachirarama nechirwere cheshuga.
VaMapfumo vatiwo mushure mekuwana mamiriro eshuga yavo vave kukwanisa kutumira zvinenge zvabuda kuna chiremba wavo sezvo ane app iyi panharembozha yake.
Mumwe wevakuru veVivid Health, VaBlessed Musisinyani vati kambani yavo iri kupa vanhu pachena kamushina kadiki-diki kanonzi Mobile Glucose Meter kanoiswa panharembozha kubatsira kuverenga mamiriro eshuga. Vati tarisiro yavo ndeyekurerutsira varwere hupenyu hwavo.
VaMusisinyani vaudza Studio 7 kuti nekuda kwekuti vanhu vazhinji vave nenharembozha kusanganisira vanogara kure nezvipatara vakaona zviri nyore kuti vanhu vashandise nharembozha mukuchengetedza hutano hwavo.

VaMangwiro vatiwo munguva shoma yapfuura munhu anorarama neshuga aida mari inodarika mazana matatu emadhora pamwedzi. Vatiwo tarisiro yavo ndeyekuti zvinoshandiswa nevane shuga zvirambe zvichiderera mutengo sezvo ruzhinji rwuri kunetsekana kuwana mari.

VaGutu vabvuma kuti vatevedzeri vaVaTsvangirai vaviri vanoti VaElias Mudzuri naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe havana kupinda musangano weStanding Committee uyu uyo washevedzerwa naVaNelson Chamisa avo vari kuzviti ndivo vakazodzwa naVaTsvangirai kuti vafanobata matomhu avo uku VaMudzuri vachiti ndivo vakabatiswa chimuti.
VaGutu vati musangano weChina wakatarisirwa kufambiswa nasachigaro webato, VaLovemore Moyo, avo vave nenguva yakati kuti vasiri kutsika pamuzinda weMDC-T kubudikidza nemakakatanwa ari mubato iri.
Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMudzuri, Muzvare Khupe, naVaMoyo kuti tinzwe kuti sei vasina kuenda kumusangano washevedzerwa naVaChamisa uyu uye vachapinda here misangano yanzi ichaitwa neChina.

Asi mhuri yekwaTsvangirai inoti hapana munhu ari kutaura naVaTsvangirai sezvo munhu wese anoda kutaura navo achifanirwa kutanga ataura nemwanakomana waVaTsvangirai, VaEdwin Tsvangirai.
VaChidziva vatorawo mukana uyu kushoropodza VaGutu vachivapomera mhosva dzakawanda dzinosanganisira kutsigira rimwe bato risiri reMDC-T uye kutaura mashoko asina kunangana negwara rebato.

Makomiti mana aya anoti yekutanga inoona nezvekuumbwa kwehwaro hwenhaurirano, yepiri iri yedingindira rezvichazeyiwa munhaurirano idzi.

Asi pamusangano wepiri, vatungamiri vemapato matatu vanoti VaNoah Manyika veBuild Zimbabwe Alliance, VaDaniel Shumba veUnited Democratic Party, pamwe naVaTimothy Chiguvare vePeople's Progressive Party, havana kupinda.

Chikwata chenyika chemutambo weNetball chemaGems chakadzoka kumusha chichibva kumakwikwi e 2019 Vitality World Cup chiine zvidzidzo zvakawanda kuhurumende pamwe nekuvateveri vemitambo munyika.
Chikwata ichi chakasvika muHarare neChitatu manheru chakamirirwa nechaunga chinotyisa icho chaive chauya kuzopemberera mashiripiti achakaita kuLiverpool, England, uko kwaive kwaungana zvikwata gumi nezvitanhatu zvinorura mumutambo wenetball pasi rese.
MaGems, ayo aive kumakwikwi aya kekutanga, akasvika munharaunda yechipiri ye World Cup uyezve nekupedza ari pachinhanho chechisere mumakwikwi aya izvo zvaive zvisingafungirwe nevakawanda kwete muZimbabwe chete, asi pasi rese.
Izvi zvakauya mushure mekunge MeGems, ayo aive asina kuita gadziriro yakasimba, mushure mekutora nguva yakawanda ari muZimbabwe apo zvimwe zvikwata zvaienda kumakundano aya zvaitamba nevekune dzimwe nyika zvichizvisimbisa.
Izvi zvakakonzerwa nekushaikwa kwemari sezvo hurumende nemakambani akazvimirira asina kucheuka kuchichemo chechikwata ichi paine nguva.
Chakanyanyoshamisa ndechekuti hurumende yakatora nguva iyi kuumba komiti yekutsvagira mari chikwata chenhabvu chemaWarriors, icho chaienda kumakundano e 2019 Africa Cup of Nations kuEgypt, uko chakanonyadzisa.
Zvakaitwa nemaGems , panguva iyo maWarriors akanonyadzisa, chidzidzo kuhurumende kuti inofanira kubata zvikwata zvese zvenyika zvakafanana kunyange chiri chevanhukadzi kana vanhurume.
Muongorori wezvemitambo, VaFarai Kambamura, vanoti hurumende yeZimbabwe inofanira kuyananisa zvikwata zvenyika kunyanya pakugovanisa mari yemakundano.
Murongi wemitambo yetsiva, VaStalin Mau Mau, vari kushushikana zvekare nemamiriro akaita mitambo munyaya dzeruyamuro rwemari vachiti mitambo yese inofanira kubatwa zvakaenzana.
Gurukota rezvemitambo, Muzvare Kirsty Coventry, vakavimbisa kuti vachagara pasi nevezvemitambo kuti vaone kuti zviri kuvanetsa zvinogadziriswa sei.
Pamusoro pezvo, vaongorori vezvemitambo vanoti hurumende inofanira kusandura maitiro ayo, yotanga kupawo ruyamuro kuzvikwata zvese zvenyika zvinenge zvabudirira kuenda kumakundano akaita seWorld Cup, World Championship, Olympic Games, nemimwe mitambo yakakosha pasi rose.
Kunze kwemaWarriors ayo akabudirira kuenda kuma 2004, 2006, 2017 na
2019 Africa Cup of Nations, asi pasina chaibuda, hurumende haina nhoroondo yakasimba yekubatsira mitambo nemari.
Mutambi wetsiva, Charles Manyuchi, akapedzisira ave kunorwira mitambo yake yese kuZambia nemhaka yekushaya rutsigiro kubva kuhurumende nekumakambani emuno.
Chimwe chakabuda pachena murwendo rwemaGems ndechekuti zvikwata zvevanhukadzi zviri kuenderera mberi nekusimudzira mureza weZimbabwe panguva iyo zvimwe zvikwata zviri kutatarika zvinotyisa.
Pamusoro pezvakaitwa kuLiverpool, chikwata chenhabvu chevanhukadzi, chemaMighty Warriors, chakabudirira kuenda kumaOlympic Games muna 2012, izvo zvatadza kuitwa nezvikwata zvakawanda kwete muZimbabwe nemuAfrica chete, asi pasi rese.
Izvi zvakauya mushure mekunge mutuhwini Kirsty Coventry atora menduru nomwe kumakwikwi e 2004 ne 2008 Olympic Games achitevera chikwata chemutambo wehockey chemaGolden Girls icho chakatora menduru yegoridhe kuma Olympic Games a 1980 kuMoscow uko Zimbabwe yaikwikwidza kekutanga nedzimwe nyika.
Muteveri wemutambo, VaLawrence Hwekwete, vanoti zviri kuitwa nezvikwata zvevanhukadzi izvi, zvinofanira kuyemurwa.
VaKambamura vanoti zvikwata zvevanhukadzi zvinofanira kupihwa ruremekedzo rwunokodzera kwete zviri kuitwa ikozvino.
Vasikana vemaGems vasimudzira mutambo wenetball zvakasimba muZimbabwe sezvo kwese kwese ikozvino nyaya iri kungotaurwa nezvayo mumitambo ndeye zvavakaita zvichifananidzwa nezvimwe zvikwata zvenyika.
Mutambi wevolleyball, VaGodrey Jejeje, vanoti kunyange hazvo netball yanga ichitambwa muzvikoro, yaive isina mbiri yayave nayo iko zvino.
Mutsigiri wemaGems, VaTatenda Feremango, vanotiwo vechidiki vakawanda vave kufarira mutambo uyu vachiwedzera ivo kuti vakawanda vavo vave kuzoda kuita meGames emakore anotevera.
MaGems akarova Sri Lanka neNorthern Ireland ndokukwanisa kupinda munharaunda yechipiri mumakwikwi aya.
Kunyanga hazvo vakazorohwa neNew Zealand, Malawi, Jamaica ne Uganda, Zimbabwe yakadambura Barbados ndokupedza iri pachinhanho chechisere mumakwikwi ezvikwata gumi nezvitanhatu aya.
VaMuseti vanoti vatambi ava vanofanira kutendwa zvine mutsindo nezvavakaitira nyika.
Asi kaputeni wechikwata ichi, Perpertual Siachitema, anoti nzira yavo haisati yasvika kumagumo achiti iye vave kutarisira World Cup ya 2023 iyo ichaitirwa kuCape Town, South Africa.
Vasikana vakawanda vari muchikwata ichi vari pasi pemakore makumi maviri nemashanu zvekuti kuenda kuWorld Cup inotevera zvinokwanisa kuitika.
European Union (EU) neZimbabwe dzaparura chirongwa chinokosha mamiriyoni gumi nerimwe emadhora eku America (US$11) chekuvanduza kutengeserana pakati peZimbabwe neEU.
Vachiparura chirongwa ichi, munyori mubazi rezvekudyidzana nekutengeserana nedzimwe nyika, VaJames Manzou, vati chinangwa chechirongwa ichi, icho chinonzi Zimbabwe European Partnership Support, ndechekuti Zimbabwe iwedzere huwandu hwezvinhu zvainotengesa kuEU.
VaManzou vati mari yabviswa neEU ichabatsira kudzidzisa makambani madiki neari pakati nepakati kutevedzera zvinodiwa nemisika nemakambani ekuEU kuti zvinhu zvisadzorwe kuEU.
Vatiwo mari iyi ichashandiswa kuvandudza mitemo yekutengeserana munyika pamwe nekuona kuti Zimbabwe Revenue Authority inorerutsa mitemo yekutengeserana nedzimwe nyika.
Mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaDavid Musabayana, vati chirongwa ichi chichabatsira nyika kuwana mari yekunze nekutengesa zvinhu zvakawanda kuEU.
Vati kuti chirongwa ichi chibudurire, vanhu vave kufanira kurima zvinhu zvinodiwa kuEU nedzimwe nyika dzepasi rese.
Vachitaura pachiitiko ichi, mumiriri weEU muZimbabwe, VaTimo Olkkonen, vatiwo chirongwa chavaparura nhasi chinoita kuti Zimbabwenedzimwe nyika dzemumatunhu eAfrica, Caribbean nePacific dzitengese zvinhu zvadzo kuEU pasina kupihwa miganhu kuti yogumira papi uye EU inofanirawo kuita zvimwezvo munyika idzi.
Vati kunyange hazvo huwandu zvezvinhu zvinotengeswa neZimbabwe kuEU hwawedzera, pane mukana wekuwedzera zvekare, sezvo pazvinhu zvese zvinotengeswa kunze neZimbabwe, zvikamu zvishanu chete kubva muzana, zvichienda kuEU.
VaOlkkonen vatiwo chirongwa ichi chakanangana nekusimbisa makambani madiki neari pakati nepakati kuti ikwanise kutengesa zvinhu zvawo kuEU.
Vatiwo chirongwa ichi chinotsigira masangano anoshanda nemakambani madiki munyaya dzenyama, miriwo, mhiripiri, michero, mhiripiri nePaprika.
Asi kunyange hazvo chirongwa ichi chiri kunzi chakanangana nemakambani madiki, mukuru werimwe sangano rinomirira makambani aya, VaFarai Mutambanengwe, vati hapana kana kambani diki iri kuwana mari pasi pechirongwa ichi sezvo paidiwa makambani anodyidzana nemakambani ekunze.
VaMutambanengwe vati vakashanda nebazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika pakuronga hwaro hwechirongwa ichi, asi havana kuzopihwa mari pasi pechirongwa ichi.
Asi vati zvisinei nezvakaitika, vanotsigira chirongwa ichi sezvo chichibatsira nyika.
VaOlkkonen vati EU haina kumbogara yavhara misika kana makambani ayo kuti asatenge kubva kuZimbabwe asi kuti makambani emuZimbabwe ari kutadza kutevedza gwara rinodiwa kuti munhu akwanise kutengesa kunze kwenyika kana kuti Phytosanitary Certification.
Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe itevedze zvinodiwa nedzimwe nyika kuti ikwanise kutengeserana nenyika idzi.
Muimbi ane mukurumbira zvikuru munyika Cde Chinx akashaya nezuro manheru kuchipatara cheWest End muHarare. Chinx ange ave nenguva yakareba achirwara nechirwere chegomarara.
Muimbi uyu akaberekwa kwaRusape musi wa 27 Gunyana 1955 achinzi Dickson Chingaira. Chinx akadzidza paChigora Primary School kuMakoni District kwaRusape asati aenda kuBulawayo. Achitaura neStudio 7 muna 2015, Chinx akati akatanga kuimba achiri mudiki muchechi yeAnglican nevabereki vake.
Hondo yeChimurenga
Muna 1975 Chinx akaenda kuMozambique kunorwara hondo yeChimurenga. Nekuda kwechipo chake chekuimba Chinx anoti akaimba neZanu-PF People’s Choir. Choir iyi yakazopihwawo zita rekuti Takawira Choir mukurangarira muchakabvu Leopold Takawira. Nziyo dzaiimbwa naChinx dzaisimudzira Chimurenga. Cde Chinx vanotiwo nziyo dzaiimbwa mukukunda nemurufu munguva yehondo iyi.
Rusununguko
Muna Kubvumbi 1980 apo Zimbabwe yainge yopemberera zuva rekuwana kuzvitonga kuzere, Cde Chinx vakaudza Studio 7 kuti: “Ini ndini ndakatotanga kunamura fogo”, zvichireva kuti ndivo vakaparura chirongwa chekuimba vamwe vaimbi vakaita saBob Marley naThomas Mapfumo vasati vauya kuzofadza vanhu.
Chinx anoti akaimba kambo, “Prince Charles” akanangana naPrince Charles kuti vaendese shoko kuna Mambokadzi Elizabeth kuti Zimbabwe yainge yawana kuzvitonga kuzere.
Hondo yeMinda
Cde Chinx vaigara vachiti nyaya yeminda yainge yakakosha zvikuru uye ndicho chikonzero chikuru chainge chafirwa nevarwi verusununguko. Pakatangwa nyaya yekutorera vachena ivhu muna 2000, Cde Chinx vakaimba nzimbo dzakaita sa”Hondo yeMinda” kukurudzira vatema kuti vatore minda.
Asi sevamwe varwiri vehondo yerusununguko Cde Chinx vaitiwo vainge voomerwa zvikuru nehupenyu uye vainge vokundikana kuzviriritira nemhuri yavo. Nekuda kwemabasa avakabata munguva yehondo uye nyika yawana kuzvitonga kuzere, vamwe vange vachikumbira kuti Cde Chinx vaitwe gamba renyika.
Nhoroondo yekuimba
Chinx akaimba nevaimbi vakawanda zvikuru kusanganisa Bennie Miller na Keith Farquharson apo vakatsikisa nzimbo dzakaita sa”Ngorimba”, “Nerudo” uye “Zvikomborero”.
Vamwe vakazouya kuzobatana navo vanosanganisa muchakabvu Don Gumbo vakaumba Ilanga vakatsikisa mimanzi pakati pemakore a1982 kusvika 1987.
Vakaimbawo namuchakabvu Andy Brown uye Busi Ncube. Chinx akabva kuIlanga ndokumboimba oga asati aumba chikwata cheMazana Movement chakazonzi Mazana Black Movement. Chinx aimboitawo zvemitambo zvakapa kuti avewo mutambi mufirimu rinonzi “Flame” muna 1996.
Dzimwe nziyo dzaChinx dzakaita mukurumbira dzinosanganisa “Roger Confirm” uye “Vanhu Vose vemuAfrica”.
Muhupenyu hwavo nemurufu, vaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe, vanokonzera mutauro muvanhu vakasiyanasiyana.
Vamwe vanovaona segamba guru asi vamwe vachivaona semunhu aiva nemoyo wakaipa.
Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika dzinoti VaMugabe vaifanirwa kugadzirisa nyaya yeGukurahundi vasati vafa nekuti inyaya yakapesanisa marudzi naizvozvo vaifanirwa kuigadzirisa. Vanoti parizvino vanhu havana kunyatso garisana pamusoro penyaya iyi.
Kunonzi vanhu vanopfuura makumi maviri ezviuru vakaurawa munguva yeGukurahundi, vazhinji vavo vari verudzi rweNdebele.
Vanodzidzisa zvematongerwo enyika paWellesley College kuMassachusetts, Doctor Chipo Dendere, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane zvizhinji zvakasiyiwa zvisina kugadziriswa naVaMugabe, zvinosanganisa nyaya ye Gukurahundi nenyaya yevhu, vachiti izvi zvasara mumaoko emutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti vazvigadzirise.
Doctor Dendere vanoti VaMugabe nebato ravo vakarasika pavakatanga kusakudza vanhu, vave kuda zvemari nekudzika mutemo wekuti muZimbabwe muite bato rezvematongerwo enyika rimwe chete.
Nzvimbo dzakatarisana nekushaya mvura dzinosanganisira Sakubva, Dangamvura, Chikanga, Hobhouse1-2-3, Dreamhouse, Zimta Park, Natview Park, Musha Mukadzi, Gimboki, neFederation.
Mumwe mugari wekuHobhouse Two, Amai Agnes Musabayana, vanoti nekushaikwa kwemvura munzvimbo yavanogara, madzimai ndiwo ari kuremerwa nemutoro sezvo vari ivo nguva zhinji vanonochera mvura kunzvimbo dziri kure dzinenge dzichiwanikwa mvura.
"Isu madzimai hapana chinoshandika kana pasina mvura saka zvakatiomera. Ndamuka mangwanani na3 asi ndashaya mvura yacho yekuti vana vageze vaende kuchikoro, handizivi todii. Dai kanzuru yaita kuti mvura ikurumidze kudzoka zviendeke nekuti tarwadziwa," vadaro Amai Musabayana.
Mumwe mudzimai wemumusha weGarikai/Hlalani Khuhle, Amai Lina Maunganidze, vanotiwo vave kutyira hutano hwevanhu sezvo mvura yave kushandiswa ichibva muzvikova nematsime.
"Ini ndave kutotyira hurwere. Honaiwo matiri kuchera mvura yacho murukova umo, zvinoitawo here izvi? Kanzuru ngaitiwanire mabauza ekuti tiwane mvura yakachena yekushandisa nekuti yava vhiki yose pasina mvura muno," vadaro Amai Maunganidze
Mumwe mugari wemuHobhouse, Amai Mary Marange, vanoti vari kumukira kuenda kutsime sezvo mvura iri kuuyiswa nekanzuru yeguta nemotokari dzinotakura mvura isiri kukwanira vagari vose.
"Nyaya yemvura yakutonetsa inini nhasi uye kwese kumashure uku ndange ndichimuka kuma 3 kuti pamwe ndoiwana asi yaipera paBhauza racho rekanzuru. Dai vaiwuyisa akawanda mabhauza acho nekuti tanetseka nekuti mvurra toiwana kupi," vadaro Amai Marange.
VaPassmore Chiropa, avo vane chibhorani munharaunda iyi, vanoti chibhorani chavo chawandirwa nevanhu vanoda mvura izvo zvopa kuti vamwe vashaye vopedzisira vochera mvura murwizi. VaChiropa vanoti kanzuru inosungirwa kuona kuti yawanira vanhu mvura yakachena nekuchimbidza.
Kanzura weguta reMutare uye vari sachigaro vekomiti inoona nezvemvura, VaJohn Nyamhoka, vanoti dambudziko remvura riri kukonzerwa nekutsemuka kwakaita imwe pombi inobva kutengi rinopa mvura guta reMutare.
VaNyamhoka vanoti kanzuru yavo iri kuita zvose zvainogona kugadzirisa dambudziko iri nekuchimbidza.
VaNyamhoka vanoti guta harina mabhauza anokwanira vanhu munguva dzakadai dzekunetsa kwemvura senguva ino.
Munyori weguta reMutare, VaJoshua Maligwa, vakaudza mumwe musangano kuti pombi zhinji dzinotakura mvura dzavakuda kuchinjwa poiswa itsva dzinokwanisa kutakura mvura inokwanira vagari vanopfuura zviuru mazana mana vari muguta iri.
Mumiriri weHarare West mudare reparamende Muzvare Joana Mamombe, mutevedzeri wasachigaro weMDC Youth Alliance Muzvare Cecilia Chimbiri uye mutevedzeri wemurongo wemabasa Muzvare Netsai Marowa vari kutarisirwa kumiswa pamberi pedare repamusoro nhasi.
Gweta revatatu ava, VaJeremiah Bamu vanoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vanoti dare riri kunzwa chikumbiro chavo chekuti vapihwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso here kana kuti kwete nhasi. Vatatu ava vakasungwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekuti avainge vapambwa vakanosiiwa kuBindura.
Asi ivo vanoti vakapambwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori sezvo vakatorwa mumaoko emapurisa. Masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu nenyika dzakabudirira ari kushora zvikuru hurumende yeZimbabwe nekusunga vatatu ava.
Nezuro dare iri rakatadza kunzwa nyaya iyi sezvo vachuchusi vange vasina kugadzirira. Hatina kukwanisa kubata muchuchusi mukuru wehurumende VaKumbirai Rwodzi kuti tinzwe kuti sei hofisi yavo yange isati yagadzisa mapepa ari kudiwa aya sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa.

Vachitaura mushure mekuenda kuchipatara cheBeatrice Infecttious Hospital muHarare uko kuri kurapwa vanhu vanfungidzirwa kuti vanetyphoid, gurukota rinoona nezvehutano Dr David Parirenyatwa vakati kanzuru yeHarare pamwe nebazi ravo vakamisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi.
Vakati pavanhu makumi mashanu vanofungidzirwa kuti vane typhoid kuchipatara ichi vazhinji vacho vaibva kuMbare uko kwashaya mwana ane makore gumi nematatu nechirwere ichi musi weKimusi.
Asi munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights Dr Evans Masitara vati pane vanhu vakawanda zvikuru vari kubatwa neTyphoid muHarare nedzimwe nzvimbo munyika.
VaMasitara vati vanhu vakawanda vari kuenda kuzvipatara zvakazvimirira uye vane humbowo hwekuti nyaya yetyphoid haizi kutaurwa nemazvo nebazi rezvehutano.
Vanotiwo zvinosuwisa kuti vanhu vari kurwara nechirwere chinokwanisa kudzivirirwa uyewo vati vese vari kubata nezvirwere zvemanyoka vanofanira kuendesa kanzuru yeHarare nedzimwe dziri munzvimbo dzavanogara kumatare kuti varapwe pachena vachiti makunzuru ndiwo anebasa rekuona kuti vanhu vawana mvura yakachena uyewo kuti marara atakurwa.
Asi mutauririri we kanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme vanoti kanzuru yavo iri kurapa vanhu vese vane zvirwere zvemayoka pachena.
Humbowo kubva kubazi rezvehutano hunoratidzawo kuti mwedzi uno chete pane vanhu vanodarika zviuru gumi vakabatwa nezvirwere zvemanyoka munyika yese uye pane vanhu vana vakatofa nekuda kwezvirwere izvi munyika yese.

Chirwere chekorera chaura vanhu vanosvika makumi mana nevashanu, makumi mana nevatatu vari vemuHarare chete.
Vamwe vaviri vakashaika ku masvingo nekuManicaland kunyange hazvo vakange vabva kuguta guru reharare kwavakatangira kurwara.
Nyanzvi muzvirwere zvinotapurirana mubaza rehutano, Dr Portia Manhangazira, vanoti vari kufara nehuwandu hwemasangano emunyika nekunze ari kubatana nehurumende mukurwisa dambudziko iri.
Chirwere chekorera chinonzi chakatekeshera kuGlen View neBudiriro pari zvino.
Dr Manhangazira vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vaite zvehutsanana panguva ino kuita kuti vasatapurirana chirwere ichi kana vachinge vachibata. Vanoti pane makambani mazhinji ari kubatana nebazi rezvehutano mukuyedza kurwisa chirwere ichi.
"Tiri kufadzwa nerubatsiro rwatiri kupihwa nemakambani emunyika nekunze mukuyedza kurwisa dambudziko rekorera," Dr Manhangazira vaudza Studio7.
Bazi rezvehutano rinoti mumwe mudzimai wemuHararare ane makore makumi maviri nerimwe okuberekwa akashaya nemusi weMugovera nechirwere cheCovid19.
Mudzimai uyu anonzi ainge asina nhoroondo yekuenda kunze kwenyika zvinonzi navanachiremba zvinogona kureva kuti chirwere cheCovid19 chiri kutenderera munharaunda vanhu vasingazvizive.
Pave nevanhu vasere vashaya munyika nekuda kwechirwere ichi. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hwakwirawo kusvika pamazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemasere kana kuti 698. Izvi zvinotevera kubatwa kwevamwe vanhu makumi manomwe nevatatu nechirwere ichi neMugovera.
Pavanhu ava, makumi mashanu nevashanu kana kuti 55 vakabva kuSouth Africa, vatatu kuBotwana, vamwe vatatu kuMozambique, vaviri kuAmerica mumwe chete kubva kuZambia uye vamwe vasere vakachitapurirwa munyika. Pavanhu vakabatwa nechirwere munyika vaviri ndivo chete vanozivikanwa kuti vakachiwana sei asi patotanga chipatapata chekutsvaga kuti vamwe vatnhatu vakachiwana sei.
Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi munyika izana nemakumi masere nemumwe kana kuti 181. Vanhu vavhenekewa chirwere ichi munyika vadarika zviuru makumi manomwe nemasere kana kuti 78 000.
Kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kuri kuuya apo vashandi vakawanda vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vanachiremba nevakoti vari kuramwa mabasa vachiti mari yavari kutambiriswa ishoma zvikuru.
Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kugurukota rezvehutano Doctor Obadiah Moyo sezvo vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatakavatumira.
Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Edgar Munatsi vanoti kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kuSouth Africa avo vanodarika zviuru zana zvine makumi masere nemasere kana kuti 188 000, zvinhu zvinogona kuipirawo Zimbabwe. Vafa muSouth Africa vadarika zviuru zvitatu.
Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana mana ane makumi matanhatu nevatatu kana kuti 463, 000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muAfrica uye vashaya vadarika zviuru gumi nerimwe zvine makumi masere nematanhatu kana kuti 11, 086.
Vapora vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri ane makumi maviri kana kuti 222,000.
Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni gumi nerimwe ane zviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 11,2 million.
Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi ichiteverwa neBrazil.
Vanhu vafa muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana zvine makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 129, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana masere kana kuti 2,8 million.
Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nerimwe kana kuti 531,000. Vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni matanhatu kana kuti 6 million.
Bato reMDC rinoti kuratidzira kwarakaronga kuti kuitwe neChishanu kuri kuenderera mberi zvisinei nemashoko ari kutenderera ekuti kuratidzira uku kwakanzurwa.
Vachitaura nevatori venhau pamuzinda webato ravo paMorgan Tsvangirai House, mutauriri weMDC, VaFortune Daniel Molokele, vati kuratidzira kwavakaronga sebato kuri kuenderera mberi neChishanu kunyange hazvo pane vari kutenderedza mashoko paWhatsapp, Facebook neTwitter ekuti kuratidzira uku kwakanzurwa.
VaMolokele vati kuratidzira uku kuchaparurwa muHarare neChishanu kozoenda kuBulawayo neMuvhuro, kuGweru nemusi weChipiri, kuKwekwe nemusi weChitatu uye Mutare nemusi weChina.
Vatizve kuratidzira uku hakusi kuzomira kudzamara zvavari kuda sebato zvazadziswa nehurumende. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemurongi wemisangano muMDC, VaAmos Chibaya.
MDC inoti pane runyerekupe rwekuti Zanu PF irikudhinda mbatya dzakafanana nedzinowanzopfekwa nevatsigiri vebato rayo kuti vagozokonzeresa mhirizhonga.
VaChibaya vati vatora matanho akasimba kuti varatidziri vasaite zvemhirizhonga uye vakurudzira vatsigiri vavo kuti vasapfeke mbatya dzebato sezvo vachiti kuratidzira uku ndekwezvizvarwa zvese zveZimbabwe zvakaomerwa nehupenyu parizvino.
Vatiwo kuratidzira uku kuchapera chete kana nyaya yekusamira zvakanaka mune zvehupfumi hwenyika yagadziriswa pamwe nenyaya yegakava rine chekuita nezvakabuda musarudzo dzegore rapera.
Mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti ndivo vakakunda musarudzo dzegore rapera kunyange hazvo komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission ichiti VaEmmerson Mnangagwa ndivo vakakunda musarudzo idzi izvo zvakatsinhirwa nedare reConstitutional Court.
Kuratidzira kwakaronga neMDC uku hakusati kwabvumirwa nemapurisa asi MDC inoti yakaita zvese zvinodiwa pasi pebumbiro remitemo yenyika pamwe nemimwe mirawu yemunyika inobata nyaya dzekuratidzira.
Zvichakadaro, nhengo yesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reCitizens Manifesto, VaTatenda Mombeyarara, vanonzi vakapambwa neChipiri husiku pamba nevanofungidzirwa kuti vakasiya vakandwa kuHatfield mushure mekuzvindikitwa zvakaomarara.
Mashoko aburitswa nesangano iri anoti VaMombeyarara vaendeswa kuchipatara sezvo vakakuvara zvakaipisisa.
Sangano iri ratiwo VaMombeyarara vaibvunzurudzwa nevakavapamba nezvekuratidzira kurikuda kuitwa neMDC uku.
Mune imwe nyaya yakadai, sachigaro weMDC kuMufakose, VaBlessing Kanotunga, vanotiwo vakapambwa pamba pavo husiku hwanezuro nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori vakavazvindikita zvakaomarara vasati vavasiya kuChitungwiza.
VaKanotunga vati kurohwa kwavaitwa kwatovasimbisa kuti vaenderere mberi nekuratidzira.
Vachitaura padandemutande ravo reTwitter, munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vati havazive kuti ndiyani ari kupamba vanhu nekuvarova asi vakati vari kuita izvi havasi kudivi remutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa sezvo vasingadi mhirizhonga.
Gurukota rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti kuratidzira kunobvumirwa nemutemo asi kunofanira kuitwa murunyararo.
Vati mapazi anoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwemutemo achange achishanda zvakasimba kuona kuti mutemo hausi kutyorwa here uye zvivakwa zve hurumende pamwe nemidziyo yeveruzhinji hazvisi kuputswa. Mapurisa aswera achimisa nekusecha motokari dzose dzange dzichipinda mudhorobha.
Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, kuti tinzwe divi remapurisa pakupambwa nekurohwa zvakaipisisa kwakaitwa vaviri ava, pamire mapurisa nezvekuratidzira kuri kuda kuitwa neMDC uku pamwe nekusechwa kwanga kuchiitwa motokari nemabhazi.
VaNyathi vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo.
Nemusi weChishanu, nyika dzemuSADC dziri kutarisirwa kubatana neZimbabwe kuti dzikurudzire nyika dzakabudirira dzakaita seAmerica, gungano reEuropean Union nedzimwe kuti dzibvise zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru venyika vachipoemerwa mhosva yekutonga nedemo.
Izvi zvakabuda muchisungo cheSADC kuTanzania munaNyamavhuvhu wegore rino.
Vhiki rino, Studio 7 ichange ichitarisa nyaya yezvirango iyi kuti ndiyo here yapa kuti nyika iende kumawere kana kuti kutadza kutungamira nyika nehuwori.
Kwemakore akawanda nyika yeZimbabwe neAmerica, nyika dziri musangano reEuropean Union nedzimwe zvagara zviri makara asionane nenyaya yezvirango. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakaudza musangano weUnited Nations General Assembly muna Gumiguru kuti zvirango izvi zvinofanira kubviswa.
Asi America inoti Zimbabwe inoziva zvinoda kuitwa nekudaro haifanire kungorova bembera sekutaura kwemutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nenyika dzemuAfrica VaMathew Harrington.
Ko zvirango zvinotemerwa zvaita sei chaizvo uye pane mhando dzakaita sei? Zvirango zviri paviri, zvimwe zvinogona kutemerwa nenyika kune imwe nyika uye zvimwe zvichitemerwa nesangano remubatanidzwa wenyika dzepasi rino, weUnited Nations.
Zimbabwe imwe yenyika shoma pasi rino ine vanhu vasangana nezvirango kutanga muna 1966 panguva yeRhodesia uye makore ekuma 2000 nyika yawana kuzvitonga kuzere. Southern Rhodesia ndiyo nyika yakatanga kutemerwa zvirango neUnited Nations.
Zvirango pasi peUnited Nations zvinoiswa nebazi reSecurity Council. Kanzuru iyi ine nyika gumi, asi shanu chete dzinoti China, Russia, France, Britain neAmerica ndidzo dzisingabude mukanzuru iyi. Zvirango zviri muUnited Nations Charter muchikamu chechinomwe kana kuti Chapter VII uye zvinoshandiswa kana United Nations isingadi kutumira mauto.
Kubva muna 1966, Security Council yaita zvirango kudzihurumende nemamwe masangano kanokwana makumi makumi matatu.
Izvi zvinosanganisira, Southern Rhodesia, South Africa, Yugoslavia kaviri, Haiti, Iraq kaviri, Angola, Rwanda, Sierra Leone, Somalia neEritrea kaviri, Ethiopia, Liberia katatu , DRC, Côte d’Ivoire, Sudan, Lebanon, DPRK, Iran, Libya kaviri, Guinea-Bissau, CAR, Yemen, South Sudan neMali. Zvikwata zvinopfurikidza mwero zveISIL kana kuti ISIS kana (Da'esh), Al-Qaida ne Taliban zvakatemerwawo zvirango.
Zvirango zveSecurity Council zvinoiswa zvichienderena nezvinangwa zvakasiyana siyana. Zvimwe zvinoiswa panyaya dzehupfumi nekutengeserana, zvimwe pakuti nhubu dzisatengeserwe zvombo, kurambidza vamwe vatungamiri kufamba nezvimwe.
Zvirango hazvingoiswe kuranga chete asi dzimwe nguva zvinoiswa kubatsira kuunza runyararo, kumisa nyaya dzekupidigura hurumende, kurwisa vanopfurikifdza mwero, uye kuchengeta kodzero dzevanhu.
Zvirango zveUnited Nations hazvingoiswe nje, asi kuti pane komiti inoona kuti zviri mugwara here kana kuti kwete uye kuti vanhu vanobviswa sei pazvirango izvi.
Rhodesia muna 1966, iri pasi pevaive mutungamiri wehurumende VaIan Douglas Smith yakatemerwa zvirango neUnited Nations. Ko zvirango izvi zvakauya sei? Muzvinafundo Munyaradzi Munochivei vanotsanangura.
Ko zvirango izvi zvainge zvakanangana nei? Muzvinafundo Munochivei vanotsanangura
Muna 1966, vaive mutungamiri wenyika yeBritain VaHarold Wilson vakapika kumusangano weCommonwealth kuNigeria kuti hurumende yaVaSmith yaizodonha mukati memavhiki kwete mwedzi. Asi izvi zvakava zviroto? Tabvunza VaMunochivei kuti sei zvakafamba kudaro.
Vanokokera sangano reCitizens Manifesto VaBrigs Bomba vanoti Rhodesia yakakwanisawo kugadzira zvimwe zvinhu kuti ipunyuke mukanwa mamupere.
VaMunochivei vanoti zvirango zvine zvazvakabatsira.
Kunze kwezvirango zveUnited Nations, nyika inogonawo kungotemerwa zvirango neimwe. America ine nyika dzakawanda dzayakatemra zvirango dzinosanganisira Zimbabwe, North Korea, Cuba, Iran nedzimwe. Zimbabwe yakatemerwao zvirango nenyika dzinodyidzana neAmerica dzinosanganisa Canada, New Zealand nedziri mugungano reEU.
Muna 2003, vaive mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaGeorge Bush vakatemera vamwe vatungamiri venyika yeZimbabwe zvirango nenyaya yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Asi vakuru vehurumende vanoti izvi zvakaitwa nekuti vainge vatora minda kubva kuvachena kuendesa kuvatema.
Parizvino pane vatungamiri muhurumende nemubato reZanu-PF makumi masere nemana uye makambani kunyanya mapurazi makore makumi mashanu nematanhatu. Izvi zvakatevera kudzikwa kwemutemo we Zimbabwe Democracy and Economy Recovery Act kana kuti ZIDERA neAmerica muna 2001.
Muna 2018, America yakavandudzawo mutemo weZIDERA uyu. VaHarrington vanoti mutemo wakawandudzwa uyu unonyatsoburitsa pachena zvinoda kuitwa neZimbabwe uye zviri kwairi kufuka kana kuwarira.
America inoti iri kudawo kuti ose mauto anofungidzirwa kuti akapfura vanhu musi wa 1 Nyamavhuvhu gore rapera asungwe. Kuratidza kuti haisi kudzora tsvimbo, yakabva yatemerawo zvirango vaitungamira mauto aya uye vave mumiriri weZimbabwe kuTanzania VaBrigadier General Anselem Sanyatwe.
Asi munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vanoshora zvirango izvi.
Vaive munyori mukuru weUnited Nations VaBan Ki Moon vakati sangano ravo haripindire panyaya dzezvirango zvakatemerwa nenyika kunyika vachiti zviri kunyika mbiri idzi kuti dziite sungawirirano.
Muna 2002, sangano reEuropean Union rakatemerawo vamwe vatungamiri vehurumende yeZimbabwe mazana maviri zvirango richivapomera mhosva yekutonga nedemo uye tsvimbo mugotsi kune vanopikisa nekushungurudza vatori venhau.
Zvirango izvi zvinosanganisira kuti Zimbabwe isatengeserwe zvombo zvehondo uye kurambidza vamwe vatungamiri kushanyira nyika dzemuEU pamwe nekutora hupfumi hwavo huri kunze.
Mumiriri weEU muZimbabwe VaTimo Olkkonen vanoti parizvino pazvirango pasara vaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vanotarisira kubviswa chero nguva, mudzimai wavo, Amai Grace Mugabe, kambani yeZimbabwe Defence Industries uye Zimbabwe haibvumidzwe kutenga zvombo kunyika idzi.
Vamwe vari pazvirango havo asi vachiongororwa kwemakore mashanu mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaConstantino Chiwenga, gurukota rezvekurima VaPerrence Shiri uye mukuru wemauto VaPhilip Valerio Sibanda.
Vatsigiri venhabvu vari kufara nemakwikwi e2019 Africa Cup of Nations zvichitevera kuiswa kwechikwata che Zimbabwe Warriors mugungano rine nyika ina dzinoti Egypt, Democratic Republic of Congo, neUganda, vachiti gungano iri rakapfava pane remakore apfuura.
Mumubatanidzwa yezvikwata yakaitwa neveConfederation of Zimbabwe nezvikwata izvi iri muGroup A, umo vatsigiri venhabvu munyika vanoti chikwata chavo chinobudamo zvisina kutamburira.
Zvikwata zviviri zvichapedza zviri pamusoro-soro mugungano iri, nezvikwata zvina zvichapedza zviri pachinhanho chechitatu zviri nani pamagungo ese matanhatu, ndizvo zvinoenderera mberi nemakwikwi aya.
Aimbove mubati wepembe muPremier Soccer League, VaSam Hamandawana, vanoti Zimbabwe ichabudirira muGroup A.
VaShabani Muswera avo vaimbotambira Black Rhinos muSuper League vanotiwo vari kufara negungano raiswa Zimbabwe.
Mutambi wekarati ane mukurumbira asi achitevera mutambo wenhabvu, Afonso Mukuche, anoti Egypt inonetsa kurova nenyaya yevabati vepembe asi vachiyambira maWarriors kuti asadherere Uganda.
Zimbabwe yaenda kumafainari eAfrica Cup of Nations katatu muna 2004, 2006, na 2017 asi panguva yese iyi maWarriors anga achingobuditswa munharaunda yekutanga.
Asi VaHamandawana vanoti iko zvino maWarriors anobudirira asi vachiti ivo kuti izvi zviitike, panoda gadziriro yakasimba.
Makundano aya ari kutanga musi wa 21 Chikumi, Egypt neZimbabwe dzichivhura musangano wezvikwata makumi maviri nezvina aya.
Varairidzi vemuZimbabwe vakabatana neMugovera nevamwe vashandi mukucherechedza zuva revarairidzi pasi rose, reWorld Teachers Day.
Hurongwa hwecherechedza zuva iri hwakarongwa nesangano reZimbabwe Labor Center.
Mutungamiri wesangano revarairidzi vekumaruwa, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti vapinda muhurukuro dzaitwa panguva iyo pasi rose ranga richicherechedza mabasa akanaka ari kuitwa pasi rose nevarairidzi.
VaMasaraure vanoti vacherechedza zuva iri panguva iyo hupenyu hwavarairidzi huri parumananzombe sezvo varairidzi vari kutadza kurarama zvakanaka nepamusana pemari shoma dzavari kutambiriswa semihoro nehurumende.
VaMasaraure vanoti sangano ravo riri kupinda mukuratidzira nemusi wa 14 Gumiguru senzira yekuudza hurumende kuti itora matanho anooneka mukugadzirisa mihoro yevashandi.
Bazi reUnited Nations, reUNESCO, rakatanga kucherechedza World Teachers Day zviri pamutemo musi wa 5 Gumiguru, 1994.

VaSithole vashora kudzingwa kwaitwa vatapi venhau nemapurisa uye vachiti izvi izvi zvinoratidza kuti mapurisa ari kunyara nezvakaitika.

VaMuchehiwa vari muchipatara kubvira musi weSvondo.
Vane mavanga mumuviri wese uye zvinonzi itsvo dzavo dzakakuvara sezvo zvichifungidzirwa kuti vakapiwa chikafu chine muchetura.
Gwaro ranyorwa nhasi nachiremba rinotsanangura kukuvara kwakaita VaMuchehiwa raiswa padandemutende reTwitter, rinotsinhira kuti itsvo dzake dzakakuvadzwa, uye murwere haafanirwi kuburitswa muchipatara uye munhu ave kutoradzidza kuti akavhiringika pfungwa dzake kuburikidza nekukuvadzwa kwaakaitwa, kana kuti Post Traumatic Stress Disorder.  VaSithole vati havasati vaudzwa zvekuita nemhuri yaVaMuchehiwa asi vati pane mukana wekuti vakwire kudare reHigh Court kuitira kuti VaMucheiwa vabhadharwe, uye vakavakuvadza vamiswe pamberi pematare edzimhosva.

Dr Chiripanyanga panguva yezororo rekisimusi negore idzva, tsaona dzinowanda nokuti dzimwe nguva migwagwa inenge ichitsvedza kuburikidza nekunaya, uye mimwe migwagwa inenge iine makomba anogona kukonzeresa tsaona.
Vanotiwo vatyairi vedzimotokari vanofanirwawo kuona kuti mavhiri emotokari dzavo anokodzera kushandiswa, uye kuti vasanwe zvinodhaka, pamwe nekusashandisa nharembozha apo vanenge vachityaira motokari dzavo.

Vanotiwo mimwe mishonga inopihwa vanhu zvechimbi chimbi kana vabatwa nechirwere chekorera haisisina simba rekumisa chirwere ichi.

Naizvozvo, VaChari vanoti vari kuunganidza mari yekuti vanhu vabatsirike mukurwisa chirwere ichi.
“Takangofunga kuti isusu nevamwe vedu tiri kuno kuAmerica, chii chatingakwanisa kuita kuitira kuti tibatsire vari kumusha. Takaona kuti chekutanga vanhu vanoda mvura tikatanga kufona fona kuZimbabwe tichitaura nemakambani akasiyana siyana anogadzira mvura,” VaChari vaudza Studio7.
“Vamwe vaititi vanokwanisa kutipa mvura asi zvekutakurisa ndipo pasina. Saka takaedza kutsvaka mabhauza kuti patinopiwa mvura yamahara tonoisa kuvanhu, tichivapavo mapiritsi anochenesa mvura.”

Izvi zvinotevera kunonoka kuburitsa gwaro rehuori hunonzi hwakaitika kuNational Social Security Authority kana kuti NSSA kwakaitwa nebazi rinotungamirwa naAmai Nznenza. Kunonoka kuburitsa gwaro iri kwaunza mutauro munyika.
Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare nhasi, sachigaro webhodhi reNational Social Security Authority VaCuthbert Chidoori vatiwo gwaro reongororo yakaitwa kuNSSA richabuditswa munguva pfupi iri kutevera
Pambenge paitawo ropa rakaipa pakati pedare reparamande naAmai Nzenza avo vange vachitsika madziro kuti gwaro iri riburitswe sezvo vaiti magweta avo achiri kuripenengura uye vanoda nguva.
Vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika kuNSSA vanoti gwaro iri rinobuditsa pachena kusafambiswa zvakanaka kwemari dzeNSSA.
Zvichakadaro, munyori mukuru weZCTU VaJaphet Moyo vanoti sangano ravo harisi kufara nekunonoka kuri kuitwa kuburitswa kwegwaro reongororo yakaitwa kuNSSA vachiti vave kutoronga zvekukwidza Amai Nzenza kumatare.
