Vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika kuZacc vanoti VaMpofu vari kuferefetwa nekomisheni iyi nenyaya dzine chekuita nemangoda ekwaChiyadzwa.
Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wekambani ye US Africa Cybersecurity, Amai Priscilla Mutembwa, vari kukurudzira vabereki kuti vakoshese uye kukurudzira vana vachiri vadiki, zvikuru vanasikana kuti vafarire zvidzidzo zve Science, Technology ne Mathematics (STEM) sezvo kune madzimai mashoma ari kuita mabasa ane chekuita nezvidzidzo izvi.
Amai Mutembwa vakapa kurudziro iyi pamusangano wakarongwa nameya weguta reWashington DC, Amai Muriel Bowser, Muvhuro manheru mugata iri. Vamwe vanyarikani vange vakamirira Amai Bowser vakaudza musangano uyu kuti guta reWashington DC riri mushishi mekuyedza kuwedzera huwandu hweavo vanoita mabasa anoita neSTEM nyaya madzimai uye vari kuda kuwedzera zvirongwa zvinokurudzira zvidzidzo izvi.
Amai Mutembwa vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu varemekedze kuchengetedzwa kwezvavano buritsa padandemutanda izvo zvinoitwa pasi pechirongwa che Cyber security sezvo vanhu vazhinji vavekugara vari pamafoni nemacomputer izvo zvinozokwanisa kuti vabirwe zvinechekuita nehupenyu hwavo kana zvisina kuchengetedzwa.
"Vazhinji vanoshandisa nhare mbozha kutumira mari nekuwana mari nezvimwewo vachishandisa technology iyo inofanirwa kunge yakachengetedzwa kuitira kuti makoronyera asazoba zvinechekuita nevanenge vachishandisa nhare kana macomputers kana akadzivirirwa necyber security," Amai Mutembwa vakaudza Marvellous Mhlanga-Nyahuye weVOA.
Zvime zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zviri kukurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise nekukasika matambudziko akatarisana nenyika mune zveupfumi, zvichiti matambudziko aya ave kuzviita kuti zviwedzere kuremerwa nemutoro wekuchengeta hama neshamwari kumusha.
Mumwe wevana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika vari kuti kusagadzikana kwezvinyu kumusha kwave kuvaomera, ndaAmai Chenaimwoyo Mutambasere, avo vari kuBritain.
Amai Mutambasere vanoti chave kuremedza vakawanda vari kunze inyaya yekuti havachatarisirwa kungobatsira hama neshamwari dzavo chete, asiwo kubatsira veruzhinji kuburikidza nekubatsira mukutsvagwa kwezvinhu zvakawanda zvinosanganisira mishonga yekushandisa muzvipatara zvinorapa veruzhinji.
Vanotiwo vana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika vagara vaine bandiko guru kwazvo mune zveupfumi hwenyika kuburikidza nemari dzavanotumira.
Matambudziko ari kutarisana nenyika pari zvino anosanganisira kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu, kushaikwa kwemafuta edzimotokari, pamwe nekushaikwa kwemari yekunze.
Amai Mutambasere vanoti chave kudiwa munyika iye zvino kuvandudzwa kwenyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika kuitira kuti vari kunze vave nechivimbo chekudyara mari dzavo munyika.
Vanoti chikuru chave kudiwa ndechekuti vana veZimbabwe vese vabatane vatsvage nzira dzekugadzirisa nadzo matambudziko aya kuitira kuti nyika ifambire mberi.
Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nezuro nemusi weChitatu vakatumira gurukota rinoona nezvemukati menyika VaZiyambi Ziyambi kuti ritsanangurure dare kuti sei vakatumira mauto kunodzivirira mhirizhonga muna Ndira.
Bumbiro remutemo rinosungira mutungamiri wenyika kuti asume dare reparamende nechimbi chimbi nezvedanho rekushandisa mauto sezvakaitwa izvi.
VaMnangagwa vange vave nemavhiki matanhatu vasina kuita izvi zvakapa kuti gweta, vari nhengo yeMDC VaInnocent Gonese vanomirira Mutare Central vakumbire dare kuti VaMnangagwa vauye kuzotsanangura kudare kuti sei vakatuma mauto kunomisa kuratidzira.
VaGoneso vati VaMnangagwa havasi pamusoro pemutemo nedaro vanofanira kutsanangurira dare kana vaita zvinhu zvakadai.
Izvi ndizvo zvapa kuti VaZiyambi vauye kudare vachipa zvikonzero zvekuti zvainge zviri pachena kuti mapurisa ainge akurirwa nevanhu vairatidzira ndokusaka vakakumbira kuti mauto apindire.
Masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu ari kupomera mauto nemapurisa mhosva yekupfuura vanhu gumi nevanomwe uye kubata mamwe madzimai chibharo. Asi hurumende iri kuramba nyaya iyi ichipomera bato reMDC nevanopikisa mhosva yekuda kuipidigura.
Dare repamusorosoro reSupreme Court neChipiri rapa mutongo wekuti VaNelson Chamisa havasi mutungamiri webato reMDC ari pamutemo.
Mutongo uyu wave kureva kuti Muzvare Thokozane Khupe ndivo vanofanirwa kutungamira bato reMDC iri zvichitevera kushaya kwevaimbove mutungamiri uye vakavamba bato iri, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, kusvika pasarudzwa mumwe mutungamiri.
Mutongo uyu waitwa zvichitevera kupikiswa kwakaitwa naVaChamisa mutongo wakanga wapiwa nedare reHigh Court gore rapera waiti Muzvare Khupe ndivo mutungamiri ari pamutemo.
Dare repamusorosoro iri ratiwo bato reMDC rinofanirwa kuita musangano waro wekongiresi mukati mwemwedzi mitatu wekusarudza mutungamiri ari pamutemo.
Gweta raMuzvare Khupe, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku, vanoti vatambira nemufaro mutongo wedare uyu.
“Mutongo uyu tautambira zvakanaka nekuti zvataurwa neSupreme Court ndozvatagara tichitaura ku court ikoku. Isu tanga tichitaura tichiti VaKhupe ndivo chete vakaita president pakafa VaTsvangirai nekuti ndivo vakanga vari Vice President vaVaTsvangirai zvichienderana nebumbiro reMDC,” VaMadhuku vanodaro.
Vanoti zvave kureva kuti Muzvare Khupe vanofanirwa kuchitotanga kushandira kumuzinda webato weHarvest House vachironga gadziriro yekuita extra-ordinary congress yebato ravo mukati memwedzi mitatu sezvatarwa nedare.
Vachipawo mashoko avo kuvatori venhau mushure memutongo uyu, vaive sachigaro vebato munguva yaVaTsvangirai, VaMorgen Komichi, vati vachatambira nekutevedzera mutongo uyu zvizere.
VaKomichi vatiwo mutongo uyu unoreva kuti vave kudzorera bato paraive riri muna 2018, zvichireva kuti vese kanga vaine zvigaro panguva iyi vanenge vadzokera pazvigaro zvavo, uye vese vakange vadzingwa mubato kana kumbomiswa kushanda, vadzoserwa mubato zvizere.
Asi mumwe wevatevedzeri vaVaChamisa, VaTendai Biti, vanoti mutongo uyu hauna zvauri kushandura mubato ravo reMDC-Alliance, sezvo VaChamisa vakasarudzwa nevanhu kukongiresi yakaitwa nebato ravo.
“Hatineyi nemutongo iwoyo uyu. Isu tiri vanhu veMDC Alliance inotungamirirwa naVaChamisa, inove party yakafomwa naVaTsvangirai vadaidza mapati six iyo MDC ichizoita yechi seven.
"MDC Alliance yakazozviita bato ndokuenda ku Congress muna May 2019 ndokusarudza vatungamiri vanoti VaChamisa as president, Amai Karenyi-Kore, Vice President; Professor Welshman Ncube, Vice President; Tendai Biti, Vice President; Tabitha Khumalo, chairperson, pamwe nevamwe vatungamiri,” VaBiti vanodaro.
Vanoti Muzvare Khupe vakapinda musarudzo ya2018 semutungamiri webato reMDC-T mushure mekuitawo kongiresi yebato ravo kwavasarudzwa semutungamiri webato pamwe nevamwe vabati vezvigaro.
Panyaya yemidziyo yebato, VaBiti vanoti ivo ndeve MDC Alliance, uye mutongo uyu unongoratidza chete kuti kune vamwe vavanga vachishanda navo nevamwe vari kuda kuona kuti bato ravo raparara, asi vanoti izvo hazvigoneki nekuti ndezvevanuu, uye ndezvaMwari.
VaBiti vanotiwo muzinda webato weMorgan Richard Tsvangirai House kana kuti Harvest House hausi webato reMDC nekudaro haukwanise kutorwa naMuzvare Khupe.
Vakaremara vakawanda munyika vanoti havasi kufara nekuwedzerwa kwakaitwa nehurumende nguva yekuti vanhu varambe vari mudzimba dzavo senzira yekudzivirira chirwere cheCoronavirus icho chauraya vanhu vakwanda pasi rose pamwe nekuparadza hupfumi hwenyika dzakawanda.
Kunyange hazvo vakawanda vevanhu vakaremara vachitsigira danho rakaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, rekuwedzera nguva yekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba dzavo senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCoronavirus, kugara vanhu vakazvivharira mudzimba uku kuri kuita kuti vakaremara, avo vanorarama nenzira dzakasiyana siyana, vatadze kuzviriritira.
Mutungamiri wesangano reNational Council of Disabled Persons of Zimbabwe, Amai Farai Cherera, vanoti kumanikidzwa kuri kuitwa vanhu kuti vagare mudzimba dzavo kuri kusiya nhengo dzesangano ravo dziri parumananzombe, kuburikidza nekushaya cheuviri.
Amai Cherera vanoti kunyange hazvo paine rubatsiro rwuri kupihwa vanhu munguva ino, chokwadi chiripo ndechekuti vakaremara vazhinji havasi kuwana zvinhu zvekuzvidzivirira kuti vasabatwe nechirwere cheCoronavirus, sezvo paine zvipingaidzo zviri kupa kuti vatadze kuwana rubatsiro urwu.
Mumwe wevanhu vasiri kuwana rubatsiro, VaGeorge Mangwiro vekuHatcliff, avo vakaremara uye vachishandisa madondoro, vanotiwo mari dziri kupihwa vanotambura serubatsiro nehurumende kuitira kuti vanhu ava vabatsirike panguva ino,hadzisi kusvika kune vakaremara vakawanda.
Dambudziko riri kusangana naVaMangwiro, idambudziko riri kusanganawo naAmai Pauline Mpotaringwa vekuGlen View, avo vanoshandisa wheelchair pamwe nekupfeka ma pampers.
Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubazi rezvekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu kuti seyi vakaremara ava vasiri kuwana rubatsiro kubva kuhomwe yemari inoita mazana matanhatu emamiriyoni emadhora, iyo yakaparurwa nehurumende ichinzi ichashandiswa kwemwedzi mitatu, mukubatsira vanhu vanoshaya.
Va Ceedy Chitsiwah, avo vanoshandisa wheelchair, vanoti vakaremara vakawanda vari kushaya pekubata nekuda kwemaomero akaita zvinhu munguva ino.
"Kumunhu akaremara mabhindauko mashoma, kunyanya usina mari yekuti utange kana kusimudzira projekiti. Ndanga ndichitofunga kuti ma secretarial services ndiwo angaite semunhu asingakwanise kushandisa nhengo dzake dzese dzemuviri. Asi makambani acho nezvikoro zvakavhara," vanodaro VaChitsiwah.
Imwe nhengo yeTracy Nyakupinda Albino Foundation, VaShingirai Nyakupinda, vanoti kunyange hazvo zvakaoma kudai, vakaremara vakawanda vari kuitawo mabhindauko avanokwanisa, kuitira kuti vararame.
Kushayikwa kwe transport kuri kukanganisa vakaremara vakawanda, asi vamwe vari kungoenda kunohodha zvinhu zvavo pamwechete nevamwe. Mapurisa haasi kuzonyanya kuvashungurudza.
Kudzamara mari yerubatsiro iyi vaibata mumaoko avo, vakaremara vakaita saVaNyakupinda, VaMangwiro nevamwe vavo, vacharamba vachitambura vasina rubatsiro rwavari kuwana panguva iyo hurumende iri kuzvirova dundundu ichiti iri kubatsira vose vanotambura munguva ino yeLockdown.
Nemusi weSvondo Zimbabwe yakabatana nedzimwe nyika pasi rose kucherechedza zuva rekutorwa kwenhau zvakasungunuka kana kuti World Press Freedom Day. Zuva iri rakatanga kucherechedzwa gore roga roga musi wa 3 Chivabvu kutanga muna 1993 neUnited Nations kuburikidza nebazi reUNESCO.
Asi gore rino munyori mukuru weUnited Nations VaAntonio Guterres vanoti basa revatori venhau rakanyanya kukosha pasi rino sezvo nyika dzakawanda dziri kurwisa chirwere checoronavirus. VaGutterres vanoti kurwisa chirwere ichi kunoda mashoko echokwadi sezvo vamwe vave kuparidza manyepo.
Dingindira regore rino rakanangana nekuti vatori venhau vashande vasingatye kana kurerekera divi
Mukuru wesangano reUNESCO Muzvare Audrey Azoulay vanoti zvakakosha kuti basa renhau riitwe pasina kupindira kwevezvematongerwo enyika kana vezvemabhizimisi sezvo kuchikanganisa basa iri.
Mukuru weMedia Institute of Southern Africa Zimbabwe VaTabani Moyo vanoti sangano ravo rinofara nedingindira iri vachiti rinotaura zvinhu zvavanogara vachitaura kuti hurumende inofanirwa kukoshesa. Asi vanoti maonero avo ndeekuti hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa haisi kuzadzikisa zvainotaura pakusimudzira mabasa enhau kana kufambiswa kwemashoko pasina kumbunyikidzwa.
Chipangamazano musangano reHuman Rights Watch uye vari gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu VaDewa Mavhinga vanoti makore makumi mana nyika yawana kuzvitonga, hurumende ichine basa guru mukusimudzira kodzero dzine chekuita nekutapwa kwenhau kana kufambiswa kwemashoko.
Vanoti kana kuchitariswa Media Freedom Index iyo inotarisa kusununguka kwakaita nyika dzepasi rose munyaya idzi hazvifadzi kuti Zimbabwe inoramba iri pachinzvimbo chiri pasi.
Gweta VaChris Mhike avo vanozikanwa zvikuru mukurwira kodzero dzevatapi venhau vanoti kuvimbisa kwehurumende kuvandudza mitemo ine chekuita nenhau chinhu chakanaka zvikuru asi hurumende iri kunonoka kuita izvi.  Vanoti vanoshushikanawo nenyaya yekuti vatapi venhau vanoramba vachishungurudzwa nemapurisa pamwe nevechiuto kunyanya pakatanga kurudziro yekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba vachiti izvi hazvifanirwe kuitika munyika ine hutongi hwejekerere.
Mumashoko avo ekucherechedza zuva reWorld Press Freedom, gurukota rezvekufambiswa kwemashoko munyika, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vanoti hurumende yakazvipira kuzadzikisa zviga zveUnited Nations zvekuti vatori venhau vashande vakasungunuka. Vanoti hurumende iri kutora matanho ekuona kuti vatori venhau vashanda vakasungunuka vachivandudza mitemo yakaita seAIPPA nePOSA. Asi vanoti vatori venhau vacho vanofanirawo kuita basa nemazvo vasingawedzereredze. Vatiwo basa revatori venhau rakakosha zvikuru munguva ino yekurwisa coronavirus sezvo pachidiwa nhau dzechokwadi dzinobatsira vanhu.
Asi mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Association of Community Radios, ZACRAS, Muzvare Vivienne Marara, vanoti pose panoshungurudzwa vatapi venhau vachiita basa ravo hurumende inofanirwa kubuda pachena ichishora izvi uye kutora matanho akasimba.
Muzvare Marara vanotiwo kunyange hazvo izvi zvakatora nguva chinhu chinofadza kuti munyika mave kuzova nenhepfenyuro dzemunharaunda, vachitiwo nhepfenyuro dzakadai dzakakosha kunyanyanya panguva ino yechirwere checoronavirus.

Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato rinopikisa reMDC VaLuke Tamborinyoka vanoti vatori venhau muZimbabwe vachiri kumbunyikidzwa zvakanyanya.
Mukuru wesangano reGender and Media Connect Amai Abigail Gamanya vanoti nyaya yekuchengetedzeka kwevatapi venhau kunyanya panguva ino yechirwere checoronavirus chinhu chakakosha zvikuru.
Amai Gamanya vanoti pachine rwendo rwurefu panyaya dzekuenzaniswa kwemikana pakati pevanhukadzi nevanhurume mumabasa ekutapwa kwenhu asi vanoti vari kufara kuti zvinhu zviri kushanduka sezvo makambani ane chekuita nekutapa nhau akawanda munyika ave nemitemo inokurudzira kuenzaniswa kwemikana uku.

VaMbofana vanotiwo havaone chinganodzidzwa nevechidiki veZanu PF kuChitepo School of Ideology, sezvo zviri kuratidza pachena kuti zvaifumurwa nevechidiki ava, zvinova zvehuori hwauraya nyika, zviri izvo zvakapa kuti vambomiswa mabasa avo muZanu PF.

Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa zvakaumba sangano idzva rakanangana nekubatsira vanhu vanobva kuZimbabwe vari kuvhiringwa nedambudziko reCovid-19, muSouth Africa asi pasina rubatsiro rwavari kuwana kubva kuhurumende yaVaCyril Ramaphosa.
Sangano reZimbabwe United for Progress, iro rakaumbwa mwedzi wapera, rinoti rakaumbwa mushure mekunge hurumende yeSouth Africa yaumba homwe yemari inobatsira zvizvarwa zveSouth Africa chete zviri kuvhiringwa neCovid-19.
Sachigaro wesangano iri, Amai Martha Chasi, vanoti sangano ravo rine vanhu vakasiyana siyana vakaunganidzwakuti vayamure zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe, nekuzvitsvagira mari, chekudya, pekugara nezvimwe zvinokosha muhupenyu.
Amai Chasi vanoti basa guru rekutanga ndere kuyamuri mhuri yeZimbabwe yose iri muSouth Africa, iyo yakatarisana nematambudziko ari kukonzerwa nechirwere cheCovid-19.
Sachigaro wesangano revemabhizimisi ekuZimbabwe achiri kusimukira, VaStan Makwara, vari kukumbira mhuri yeZimbabwe iri muSouth Africa, kuti ibatsire nepose painogona napo kupa sangano ravo chikafu, mari kana rubatsiro rwavanokwanisa kuitira kuti sangano iri rikwanise kubatsira vari kutambura munyika iyi.
VaMakwara vanoti vose vanogona kubatsira nemari, vanokwanisa kuisa rubatsiro rwavo, mubhanga resangano iri, reFirst National Bank.
Mutauriri weZanuPF mudunhu reSouth Africa, uye vachiona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko muZimbabwe United for Progress, VaKennedy Mandaza, varumbidza kubatana kwemhuri yeZimbabwe, kunyanya mapato ezvematongerwo enyika.
Imwe nhengo yesangano iri, uye vari munyori weMDC mudunhu reSouth Africa, VaNhamo Chikowore, vanoti vakaona zvakakosha kuti vaise zvematongerwe enyika parutivi, kuitira kuti vabatsire mhuri yeZimbabwe panguva yakaona iyi.
South Africa yave nevanhu vanosvika mazana maviri nevatanhatu vafa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19, uye vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika zviuru gumi nechimwe chete nemazana matatu nemakumi mashanu, kana kuti 11, 350.
Svondo rino, zvikwata zviri kutungamira makundano eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League, Dynamos, Ngezi Platinum Stars neFC Platinum zvatarisana nenjodzi yekudonhedza mapoinzi akakosha panguva ino apo zvine mitambo yakaoma zvikuru, kunze kwemusha.
Dynamos, iyo iri pamusoro peMadamburo neKugona Kunenge Kudada nemapoinzi matatu, yakananga kuNyamhunga Stadium kunosangana ne ZPC Kariba iyo inorairidzwa naSunday Chidzambwa uyo aimbove kaputeni pamwe nemurairidzi wavo.
Chidzambwa ari kuda kuripa vanoisa mari muchikwata cheZPC Kariba avo vakaratidza chivimbo chavo maari nekumupamhidzira mamwe makore maviri ari pabasa semurairidzi wechikwata chekuMashonaland West ichi.

Vabereki vemudhorobha reMasvingo vari kuchema chema zvikuru vachiti vanasikana vavo vari kubatwa batwa zvisiri pamwero apo vanenge vari kuzvibhorani vachichera mvura munguva dzemanheru.
Izvi zvakabuda nemusi weChina pamusangano wekuongorora dambudziko remvura wakarongwa nesangano re Masvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance, MURRA, mumusha weRunayararo West.
Vabereki vakawanda vakaratidza kushushikana zvikuru nekushaikwa kwemvura mudzimba dzavo, izvo zvava kupa kuti vanasikana vamirire mvura yemuzvibhorani munguva dzemanheru.
Vabereki ava vakati pane varume vasiri kuzvibata avo vari kubata vanasikana ava nhengo dzavo dzepamuviri vachivambunyikidza.
Dambudziko remvura mudhorobha reMasvingo rave nemwedzi yakawanda kubva pakatangwa kudzimwa magetsi kunopombwa mvura ku Bushmead kudhamu reMutirikwi, uye rakawedzerwa masvondo matatu apfuura apo muchina unopomba mvura wakafa.
Mumwe mubereki, Amai Sungano Zvarebwanashe, vanoti vana vavo vanoswera muraini remvura kuzvibhorani uko vanosangana nevakomana pamwe nevarume vanovabata zvisiri pamwero.
Mumwe mubereki vasiri kufara nezviri kuitika kuzvibhorani izvi, Amai Tracy Musakanda, vanoti vamwe vanasikana vari kusvika pakuita nhumbu uye vamwe vachizosangana nezvirwere zvepabonde nenyaya iyi.
Nyaya idzi dzinonzi dziri kuitika zvikuru munzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji dzakakita seRunyararo West, Sisk, Mucheke D, Majange pamwe chete nekuVictoria Range uko kune dambudziko remvura guru.
Mukuru wemabasa kuMURRA, VaAnoziva Muguti, vari kukurudzira vabereki kuti vaperekedze vanasikana kumvura nguva dzemanheru uye kuti kanzuru igadzirise dambudziko remvura nekukasika.
Kanzera weWard 3 vaiva pamusangano uyu, VaTarusenga Vhembo, vakati vane urombo nenyaya dzakadai, vakatiwo vari mubishi rekugadzirisa dambudziko remvura mudhorobha.
Nhengo inomirira Masvingo Urban muNational Assembly, VaJacob Nyokanhete, vakakurudzira vabereki kuti vamhang'are nyaya dzine chekuita nekumbunyikidzwa kwevanasikana kuitira kuti vanenge vachityora mitemo yenyika, vasungwe nemapurisa.
Studio7 haina kukwanisa kuziva huwandu hwevanasikana vanonzi vari kumbunyikidzwa kuzvibhorani.
Mapurisa emuMasvingo anoti ari kunzwawo nyaya idzi nerunyerekupe, asi hadzisati dzamhang'arwa zviri pamutemo.

Izvi mumwe muteveri wemutambo uyu VaInnocent Mutena vanoti zviri kukanda rima muchinagwa cheZimbabwe chekuenda kuma fainari e2019 Africa Cup of Nations ayo achaitirwa kuEgypt muna Chikumi.

Asi mutsigiri wema Warriors VaHebert Mushuje vanoti izvi zvine ngozi. Munyori wezvemutambo wenhabvu VaLeopold Munhende vanoti havasi kuona maWarriors achinyanyonetseka mumutambo nema Red Devils ekuCongo uyu.

Congo Brazzaville neLiberia dzakabatana pamapoinzi mashanu. Zvikwata zviviri kubva mugungano iri ndizvo zvinoenderera mberi nemakundano aya.
Vekumajeri vapa humbowo pachikumbiro chemutori wenhau, Hopewell Chin’ono, chekuti apihwe mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso.
Vashandi vekumajeri vapa humbowo uhwu mudare pachikumbiro chaChin’ono uyo akaudza dare kubudikidza nemagweta ake kuti vekumajeri havasi kutevedzera zvakatarwa nehurumende pamwe nesangano reWorld Health Organization kuti zvitevedzerwe mukudzivirira mukana wekutapuriranwa kwechirwere cheCovid19.
Chin’ono ati mafambisirwo ari kuitwa zvinhu kumajeri anowedzera mukana wekuti abatwe nechirwere ichi.
Nyaya iyi, iyo yanga ichinzwikwa mudare muine magweta nemutongi chete zvichitevera mutongo wakaturwa nedare wekuti Chin’ono ape hufakazi hwake mudare musingabvumidzwe vatori venhau pamwe neveruzhinji sezvo mutongi wedare akati hufakazi hwaizopihwa naChin’ono hwaizogona kukanganisa kuchegetedzeka kwenyika, majeri, vashandi vemumajeri nevasungwa, yanzi ichaenderera mberi neChishanu.
Rimwe remagweta aChin’ono, VaGift Mtisi vati mutongi wedare, VaNgoni Nduna, vachatura mutongo neMuvhuro pachikumbiro chaChin’ono chekuti atongwe achibva kumba.
Pasvika Chin’ono padare, anga akaiswa chete chemumakumbo nemumaoko, asi azopinda mukati medare abviswa cheni idzi.
Mune rimwe dare, VaJacob Ngarivhume, avo vanga vari mudare zvakare nhasi, vaunzwa mudare vakasungwa maoko nengetani zvashorwa nemutongi panyaya yavo, VaTranmore Utahwashe.
Gweta raVaNgarivhume, VaMoses Nkomo, varatidzawo kusafara nekusungwa kwanga kwakaitwa VaNgarivhume nengetani vekumajeri vachiti vatadza kudzibvisa.
VaNgarivhume, avo vari kupomerwa mhosva yakafanana neyaChin’ono yekunzi vakakurudzira kuti veruzhinji varatidzire zvine mhirizhonga mukati musi wa31 Chikunguru, vari kutarisirwa kudzoka mudare mangwana apo pakatarisirwa kuturwa mutongo pachukumbiro chavo chekuti vatongwe vachibva kumba.
VaNkomo vati vari kufara kuti vave kukwanisa kupa VaNgarivhume chikafu zvichitevera mutongo wakaturwa nedare repamusoro svondo rapera wekuti vekumajeri vabvumidze magweta nehama dzaVaNgarivhume naChin’ono kuti vavape chikafu.
Chin’ono naVaNgarivhume vakadzoka kudare ramejasitiriti vachiti vanoda kupihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso vachiti pane zvashanduka kubva pavakambonyimwa mukana uyu.
Kusungwa kwaChin’ono naVaNgarivhume kuri kushorwa nevakawanda pasi rose kusanganisira vedzisvondo avo vanoti hurumende yeZimbabwe haisi kukoshesa kodzero dzevanhu.
Asi mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakaudza Politburo yebato ravo nezuro kuti vedzisvondo vari kutsoropodza hurumende yavo vari kudyidzana nevavengi vavo avo vanoda kuti muZimbabwe muchinjwe hurumende.
Vanhu vasingaone nevamwe vane hurema hwakasiyana siyana vakawanda vanoti havasi kufara nekusiiwa kwavanoitwa munyaya dzkakosha sezvo zvinyorwa zviri kuburitswa munyika zvinenge zvisiri zve braille kana mune mimwe mitauro inoshandiswa munyika.
VaTafadzwa Chidewu, avo vasingaoni, vanoti nguva zhinji panoitwa hurongwa hwekugadziriswa mitemo, paramende haisi kuwanisa vanhu vakaisa saivo magwaro akanyorwa neBraille kuitira kuti vazviverengerewo vonzwisisisa mitemo inenge ichiumbwa.
VaChidewu vakaudza Studio 7 kuti: “Zvinhu zvakaita seBraille izvi tinofanirwa kuzvipuwa paine nguva uye zviri in braille tigowerengawo tega tigonzwisisa kuti zviri kuendepi kana kuti zviri kubvepi, nekuti apa chimwe chingezi chacho hatizochinzwisisi asi kana zviri kwedu tinozvinzwisisa. Saka munoziya kuti vazhinji vanorarama nehurema mikana yekuenda kuchikoro yange iri mishoma saka hatina kunyanya kudzidza.”
Amai Cathrine Sithole, avo vanogara mumusha weSakubva, vanoti zvakakosha kuti magwaro enyika ange achikwanisa kuverengwa nemunhu wese kuitira kuti munhu wese akwanisewo kupa pfungwa dzake.
Mugari wekuHobhouse kwaMutare, VaJames Gweta, vanotiwo hurumende inosungirwa kukoshesa kushandisa mitauro yose iri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika kuitira kuti vanhu vanzwisise mabhiri emitemo yenyika nezvimwe zvine chekuita nenyika.
“Panyaya yatiri kuona iyi kune ma-citizens zvikuru kunesu vane ma-disabiliities tinoona pane nyaya ye exclusion pakuti hazvisi muma-local languages edu zvose zvinenge zvichiitwa munyika uyezve kana braille haipo,” vanodaro VaGweta.
Pfungwa idzi dzakabudawo pamusangano wakaitirwa maMutare apo paizeyiwa mabhiri emitemo mitsva, uye vanhu vachinzi vapewo pfungwa dzavo.
Pamusangano uyu painge pasina zvinyorwa zveBraille, izvo zvisina kufadza vasingaoni.
Nhengo yedare reSeneti, VaDavid Parirenyatwa veZanu PF, vakaudza musangano uyu kuti chinangwa chavo chekupinda muvanhu chaive chekunzwa zvinodiwa neveruzhinji, kusanganisira vasingaoni nevamwe vane hurema hwakasiyana siyana.
Masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu anotiwo zvakakosha kuti zvose zvinenge zvichiiswa muvanhu zvinge zviri mumitauro inonzwisiswa neveruzvinji sezvo bumbiro remitemo yenyika richiremekedza mitauro yose iri gumi nemitanhatu, kwete kuti mitauro mishoma inge ichishandiswa munyika.
Hurumende inoti yava kubvumidza vanhu kuti varime mbanje zviri pamutemo, mbanje iyi ichishandiswa semushonga unorapa unenge wapihwa munhu nachiremba.
Pasi pemutemo we Statutory Instrument 62 of 2018, "Dangerous Drugs – Production of Cannabis for Medicinal and Scientific Use Regulations", gurukota rezveutano ndiro rine masimba ekubvumidza vanoda kurima mbanje zviri pamutemo.
Izvi zvinoreva kuti vanhu vanenge vopihwa rezenisi rekuti varime mbanje, vachiita zvinodiwa nemutemo.
Mbanje iyi ienge ichitengeserwa kuzvitoro zvinogadzira mishonga zvinenge zvakapihwa mvumo nehurumende.
Chiremba vanoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe Doctors for Human Rights, VaNicholas Wazadza, varumbidza zvikuru danho ratorwa nehurumende vachiti izvi zvichabatsira vanogadzira mushonga.
Dr Wazadza vatiwo zvirwere zvakaita segomarara zvinodawo mishonga ine mbanje mukati.
Dr Wazadza vatiwo kushandiswa zvakaipa kwembanje kune njodzi nekudaro zvakakoshawo kuti hurumende inyatsoongorora kuti mbanje iyi haizoshandiswi zvisiri pamutemo.
Asi Amai Dorcas Chihwa, avo vanogara kuMufakose, vati senyika ine huori, vanotyira kubvumidzwa kurimwa kwembanje uku.
Amai Chihwa vati zvinenge zvichida kunyatsoongororwa zvakadzama kuona kuti vanhu vanongorima mbanje kuti ishandiswe mukurapa netsvagiridzo chete, kwete kuti vazopedzisira votengeserana munzvimbo dzavanogara.
Izvi zvatsigirwawo naAmai Pretty Gambiza avo vatiwo vanotyira kuti vanhu vanozotadza kutevedzera zvinangwa chaizvo zvapa kuti kurimwa kwembanje munyika kubvumidzwe.
Zimbabwe inyika yechipiri mudunhu reAfrica kubvumidza kurimwa kwembanje zviri pamutemo mushure meLesotho.
Mbanje hachisi chinhu chitsva muZimbabwe sezvo ichirimwa kumaruwa, uye nzvimbo dzakaita seBinga, Mutoko neMt Darwin, dzichizivikanwa zvikuru nekurima mhando iyi yefodya.
Dzimwe nyanzvi dzinoti Zimbabwe inogona kurima mbanje yekutengesera dzimwe nyika, izvo zvinogona kuunza mari yakawanda.
Nyika dzakabudirira dzinotengesa mishonga inenge iine tetrahydrocannabinol, kana THC, iyo inobva mumbanje.
Asi munhu anofanirwa kunyorerwa prescription nachiremba kuti atengeserwe.
Matunhu anobvumidza kurimwa kwembanje muAmerica, akaita seMichigan, Oregon, California, Colorado nemamwe, akawana mari inoita mabhiriyoni manomwe emadhora kubva mumbanje yakatengeswa mugore ra 2016.
Huwandu hwemari iyi hwakakwira nezvikamu makumi matatu nezvina kubva muzana pamari yakawanikwa muna 2015.
Dunhu reOregon, iro rinogara muimbi wemuZimbabwe ane mukurumbira, Thomas Mapfumo, uye riine vanhu mamiriyoni mana, rakawana mari inodarika mazana matatu emamiriyoni emadhora mukutengeswa kwembanje.
Bhizinesi rembanje rinowanisa vanhu vemuOregon zviuru gumi nezviri nechidimbu mabasa, vanhu vachibhadharwa madhora gumi nemaviri pa awa yega yega.
Dunhu reMichigan riri kukurudzirwa nesangano re Coalition to Regulate Marijuana Like Alcohol, kuti ribvumidza kuputwa kwembanje zviri pamutemo nemunhu anenge aine makore makumi maviri nerimwe zvichikwira.
Nyaya iyi iri kutarisirwa kuvhoterwa mudare remuMichigan muna Mbudzi.
Kunyange hazvo mamwe matunhu emuAmerica achibvumidza kurimwa kwembanje zviri pamutemo, hurumende yaVaDonald Trump inoti pasi pemitemo yenyika yose, mbanje haibvumidzwe, izvo zviri kupa kuti mitemo iyi ipesane pakati pezvinodiwa nematunhu nezvinodiwa nehurumende yose.

Amai Muranda vanoti zvakakosha kuti munhu anenge abatwa chibharo kuti vawane rubatsiro nechimbi chimbi, kusati kwapfuura mazuva matatu, nokuti vakasadaro, vanozoona vave kurwara nematenda akasiyana siyana anosanganisira zviwere zvepabonde uye kana kutobata pamuviri pasina kurongwa.

Mutungamiriri wesangano rinomirira vashandi munyika reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti pavakatora matomu, VaMnangagwa vakataura kuti vachaparadza huwori, izvo zvavari kutadza kuita sezvo huwori hwacho huri kutoenderera mberi.
Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Manyanya, vanoti vanoona sekuti zvinonetsa kuti hurumende irwise huwori nekuti vazhinji vanoita huwori vari pedyo nemutungamiri wenyika nevamwe vakuru vakuru muhurumende.
Imwewo nyanzvi munya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti VaMnangagwa vakavimbisa kurwisa huwori pavakapinda panyanga muna 2017 vakatodzinga nhengo dzebhodhi reZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission dzaivepo asi kusvika pari zvino hapana chiri kunatsoitwa kupedza hurowi munyika.
Vanoongorora nyaya dzematongerwo enyika vakarerekera kubato riri kutonga reZanu PF, VaPeter Matange, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mashoko aVaMnangagwa anoratidza kuti havasi kufara nemabatirwo ari kuitwa nyaya dzehuwori munyika.
Vaenderera mberi vachiti mutungamiriri wenyika haakwanisi kupindira munyaya dzinenge dzave kumatare edzimhosva vachiti nyaya dzehuwori dzinoda nyanzvi mukudziongorora uye zvinotora nguva kuita izvi.
Asi VaMnangagwa vanoti hurumende yavo iri kuedza napose painogona napo kurwisa huwori.
Mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vanoti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa iri kurwisa huori ndosaka vamwe vakuru vakuru muhurumende vaine nyaya dzehuori dziri kumatare.
Kubvira pavakapinda muhofisi, pane makurukota ehurumende anoti Amai Priscah Mupfumira, VaObadiah Moyo nevamwe vaive makurukota ehurumende, vakaita saVaIgnatius Chombo, naVaSamuel Undenge vakasungirwa nyaya dzehuwori.

VaAmos Zhou vane chirwere cheshuga. VaZhou vanoti chiri kunyanya kuvarwadza ndechekuti apo mishonga iri kunetsa, vatungamiriri vehurumende vanonorapwa kunze kwenyika nokudaro nhamo iyi iri kungobata varombo chete.

Mutsamba yavakanyora neChishanu chapfuura, VaVuragu vakati Parirenyatwa yainge yasarirwa nemishonga inoshandiswa kubvisa marwadzo kana munhu aoparetwa ichashandiswa kwemasvondo maviri.
Vakatiwo kushaikwa kwemishonga iyi kwaikonzerwa nekubuda kwakaita kambani ye GSK, iyo yaiwanisa nyika mishonga iyi.
Nepamusana pedambudziko iri, VaVuragu vakakumbira kuti Parirenyatwa itenge mishonga iyi kunze kwenyika, vachishandisa kambani ye Aspen, kuitira kuti nyika isawirwe nedambudziko iri.
VaVuragu vakaudzawo Aspen kuti dambudziko iri rakatarisana nezvipatara zvose zviri munyika.

Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus munyika hwasvika pavanhu gumi nemumwe chete zvichitevera kubatwa kwemumwe mudzimai nechirwere ichi uyo akanga ashanyira kuBritain masvondo maviri apfuura, pamwe nemurume akashaya kuBulawayo mukupera kwesvondo.
Gwaro raburitswa nebazi rezvehutano rinoti mudzimai wemuHarare ane makore makumi maviri nemana akawanikwa ayine chirwere cheCoronavirus mushure mekunge ashanyira Britain, ukuwo murume ane makore makumi manomwe nemapfumbamwe achigara muBulawayo, akashaya neMugovera muchipatara kwakare kuBulawayo.

Bazi rezvehutano rinoti riri kuita zvose zvarinogona kuramba richiongorora hutano hwevarwere ava uyezve neavo vese vangadai vakasangana navo.
Chirwere cheCoronavirus chavhiringa pasi rose, uye kukonzeresa kuti vanhu vanodarika mabhiriyoni mana, vagare mudzimba dzavo senzira yekuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira.
Pasi rose vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nemazana matatu ane makumi matanhatu ezviuru, vabatwa nechirwere ichi, icho chaurayawo vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi manomwe nezvishanu, kusanganirisa Zororo Makamba wemuZimbabwe, uyo akashaya gore rapera.
Nyika yanyanya kuvhiringwa neCoronavirus iAmerica, iyo ine vanhu vanodarika nazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu ezviuru, uye vanhu vafa munyika iyi vava kudarika zviuru gumi nemazana mapfambumwe.
Italy ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vafa, avo vadarika zviuru gumi nezvitanhatu nemazana mashanu, ichiteverwa neSpain, iyo ine vanhu vafa vanodarika zviuru gumi nezvitanhatu nemazana mashanu.
Kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe iri kuita ongororo yayo pavanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vane chirwere cheCoronavirus, mukuru mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMashonaland West, VaWensilus Nyamayaro, vanoti vanoendesawo masamples avanenge vaongorora kuSouth Africa senzira yekusimbisa wongororo yavanenge vaita munyika.
VaNyamayaro vanoti izvi hazvireve kuti nyika haigone kunyatsoongorora kuti munhu ane chirwere cheCoronavirus here kana kuti kwete, asi vanoti zvavari kuita ndizvo zvinokurudzirwa neWorld Health Organisation.
Dr Nyamayaro vakurudzira hurumende kuti iongorore vanhu vose vanopinda nendege munyika kusanganisira nhandare diki dzevanhuwo zvavo dzakaita seKariba nePrince Charles airdrone.
Dr Nyamayaro vanoti dunhu ravo rinoda mari inosvika miriyoni imwechete yemadhora yekuti vawane zvikwanisiro zvekurwisa cherwere cheCoronavirus uye vanoti dunhu ravo rakasarudza nzvimbogumi dzichachengeterwa vanhu vanenge varwara nechirwere cheCoronavirus.
Mune imwewo nyaya sangano rakazvimiririra reNGO Forum razivisa mugwaro raro raraburitsa kuti ratambira nyaya dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu dzinosanganisira nyaya zana negumi nesere dzekusungwa kwevanhu munzvimbo dzinoti Masvingo, Gweru, Bulawayo, Hwange, Harare neChinhoyi, nyaya dzekurohwa kwevanhu makumi mashanu nevatanhatu munzvimbo dzinoti Zvishavane, Wedza, Harare, Masvingo, Bulawayo neChinhoyi uye nyaya ina dzekushungurudzwa kwevatori venhau munzvimbo dzinoti Mutare, Harare, Gweru neChinhoyi.
Vanhu vakawanda munyika vanoti vari kusungwa pamwe nekurohwa nemapurisa nemasoja apo vanenge vabuda mudzimba vachitsvaga zvekudya.

Sangano rinomirira vashandi, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions (ZCTU), rinoti hurukuro dzarakaita nemapazi aro dzakabuda nechisungo chekuti paitwe kuratidzira pamwe chete nekumbomira kuenda kumabasa kana hurumende ikatadza kugadzirisa nyaya yemihoro yevanhu. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pakatenderanwa kupa hurumende nevamabhizimisi nguva yekugadzirisa nyaya dzemihoro nekumira kwakaita zvehupfumi munyika pasati paitwa kuratidzira. VaMoyo havana kukwanisa kutiudza kuti kuratidzira uku kungaitwa rini uye kuti vanopa hurumende nguva yakadini kuti igadzirise zvinhu munyika.
Varwere vakawanda vanonzi vachafira mudzimba vachitadza kuwana mari dzekuenda kunorapwa kuzvipatara zvehurumende zvichitevera danho rakatorwa nehurumende kutanga kwegore rino rekukwidza mari dzinobhadharwa nevarwere muzvipatara zvavo zvese zvemunyika.
Bazi rezvehutano nekuchengetwa kwanaka kwevana rakazivisa neChipiri nezvekukwidzwa kwemari dzinoripirwa pakurapwa muzvipatara zvehurumende kutanga musi wa 01 Ndira.
Vachinyora mugwaro rakaendeswa kuvakuru vezvipatara zvese, munyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano, Doctor Agnes Mahovha vakati bazi ravo rakanga rasvika padanho iri richitarisawo kushupika kuri kuitwa neveruzhinji.
Mari itsva idzi dzinenge dzave kureva kuti murwere wechikuru achanoonekwa pachipatara cheParirenyatwa ave kufanirwa kubhadhara madhora mazana maviri emari yemunyika, kuchitiwo mwana ane makore ari pamusoro pemashanu ave kubhadhara madhora zana.
Varwere vachaenda kuzvipatara zvikuru zvemunyika zvakaita seHarare Central Hospital neChitungwiza Central Hospital vave kutarisirwa kubhadhara madhora zana nemakumi matanhatu, mwana ane makore ari pamusoro pemashanu achibhadharawo madhora makumi masere.
Zvipatara zvematunhu makuru, kana kuti provincial hospitals, zvave kubhadharisa madhora zana nemakumi maviri kumurwere wechikuru, kuchitiwo mwana achibhadhara madhora makumi matanhatu.
Zvipatara zvehurumende zvematunhu madiki, kana kuti district general hospitals, murwere anenge obhadhariswa madhora makumi masere, mwana ane makore ari pamusoro pemashanu achibhadhariswa madhora makumi mana.
Vakazvitakura vanosununguka vachiita zvekuvhiyiwa vanonzi vave kubhadhara madhora zviuru zviviri nemazana mashanu, kuchitiwo vanosununguka zvakanaka vachitarisirwa kubhadhara madhora mazana matanhatu muzvipatara zvepamusoro pamwe nekuParirenyatwa.
Studio 7 yakundikana kubata Doctor Mahovha kuti tinzwe zvizhinji.
Asi mukuru wesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike vanoti kukwidzwa kwemari dzemuzvipatara uku kuchaomesera vakawanda sezvo ruzhinji rwusingawani mari dzacho.
VaRusike vanoti verizhinji havasi kuhora kana kutambira mari dziri kurehwa idzi kuitira kuti vanenge vachikwanisa kubhadhara kuzvipatara izvi.
"Chiremba chaiye nemari yaari kutambira, kana kuti mukoti, ma nurses nemari dzavari kutambira, havatombokwanise kubhadhara ma fees arehwa iwayo.
Zvoreva kuti vanhu vacho vari kupa service vakaita savanamukoti vari kushanda muzvipatara izvozvo vakava nedambudziko rekurwarirwa kana kurwara iye pachezvake, haatombokwanisa kubhadhara ma fees iwayo," VaRusike vanodaro.
Malawi yave nemutungamiri mutsva akagadzwa zviri pamutemo mushure memwedzi gumi nemitatu.
Musi wa Chikumi 23, mutungamiri webato rinopikisa, VaLazarus Chakwera, vakakunda mutungamiri weMalawai, VaPeter Mutharika, musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika yakadzokororwa mushure mekuwana zvikamu makumi mashanu nezvisere kubva muzana.
Sarudzo yemutungamiri weMalawi yekutanga yakaitwa muna Chivabvu 2019, VaMutharika vakati vakanga vakunda zvisina kunyanya. Asi VaChakwera, avo vaitevera mushure maVaMutharika musarudzo iyi, vakati sarudzo iyi yakanga yabiridzirwa ndokubva vapikisa izvi mudare reConstitutional Court.
Dare iri rakawana paine humbowo hwekusatevedzerwa kwemitemo inobata sarudzo rikatonga muna Kukadzi 2020 kuti sarudzo itsva iitwe.
Malawi inyika yechipiri muAfrica kuramba kutambira zvinenge zvabuda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika ichitevera Kenya yakaita izvi muna 2017.
Gurukota rezvekudyidzana kweAmerica nedzimwe nyika, VaMike Pompeo, vakaratidza kufara zvikuru nekuchengetedzwa kwemitemo yejechetere munguva yesarudzo muMalawi.
“Vanhu vemuMalawi vakasarudza VaLazarus Chakwera semutungamiri wavo. Aka ndeke chipiri matare emuAfrica achiramba kutambira zvinenge zvabuda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika uye kekutanga kuti zvabuda musarudzo inenge yadzokororwa zvichiunza mumwe wevakwikwidzi mumasimba ekutonga. Iyi inguva ine nhoroondo kuvanhu vemuMalawi," vanodaro VaPompeo.
VaChakwera vanoti kukunda kwavo “kukunda kwehutongo hwejekerere nekuyananiswa kwemitemo inotonga vanhu.” Vachitora mhiko, VaChakwera vakavimbisa kuti vachashanda vari pasi pemitemo yenyika.
“Izvi zvinoreva kuti ndichazivisa veruzhinji hupfumi hwangu gore rega rega sezvinodiwa nemutemo; ndichaenda kuparamende kunobvunzwa nevanhu mabatiro andinenge ndichiita basa rngu; ndichakumbira kuti mitemo ivandudzwe, zvikuru kuderedza masimba emutungamiri wenyika uye kusimbaradza mapazi ose kuitira kuti ashande akazvimirira, kusanganisira paramende nebazi rinorwisa huori.
“Uyu mukana mukuru munhoroondo yeMalawi kuti ishande zvakasimba kuitira kuti ive neremangwana rakabudirira, iine hurumende inoshanda zviri pamutemo, uye munhu wese akasununguka.”
Vaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaPhelekezela Mphoko, vasungwa ndokumiswa pamberi pedare redzimhosva vachibva vapihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso kuitira kuti mhosva yavasungirwa, itongwe vachibva kumba kwavo.
VaMphoko vapihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso pavamiswa mudare muguta reBulawayo.
VaMphoko vabvisiswa mari yechibatiso inoita chiuru chemadhora emaRTGS kuitira kuti nyaya yavari kupomerwa yekushandisa zvisiri pamwero chinzvimbo chavo apo vaive mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika.
VaMphoko vanonzi vakaita kuti vamwe vakuru vakuru vainge vasungwa, vaburitswe muchitokisi chemapurisa.
VaMphoko vasungwa zviri pamutemo neZimbabwe Anti Corruption Commission, ZACC.
Kunyange hazvo pange pane mashoko ekuti VaMphoko vari kutiza kusungwa, VaMphoko vauya kudare vaine mudzimai wavo, Amai Letitia Mphoko, pamwe nemwanakomana wavo Siqokoqela Mphoko.
Gweta raVaMphoko, VaZibusiso Ncube, vaudza dare kuti havasi kufara nemabatirwo akaitwa VaMphoko nemapurisa akauya pamba pavo achiti aida kuvasunga nemusi weChishanu svondo rapera.
Vati maitiro akadai anotyora kodzero dzavo pamwe nekuda kuvanyadzisa mumaziso everuzhinji, vakakumbira kuti nyaya iyi iongororwe.
VaNcube vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaMphoko vanzi vasiye gwaro ravo rekufambisa mumaoko edare, vamhang’are kumapurisa eCriminal Investigation Department muBulawayo kamwe pasvondo uye kuti vasataure nevafakazi.
Vati vafarawo kuti mutongi wedare abvumirana navo kuti zviri pachena kuti VaMphoko havana kunge vari kutiza kusungwa sezvaitaurwa nemapepanhau ehurumende, uye vanzi vadzoke mudare musi 4 Gunyana.
Muchuchisi wenyaya iyi, VaThompson Hove, havana kupikisana nekubhadhariswa chibatiso kwaitwa VaMphoko uye vabvumawo kuti vachaita ongororo yakumbirwa negweta ravo.
VaMphoko vari kupomerwa mhosva yekushandisa masimba ehofisi yavo zvisiri izvo panguva yavaive mumwe wevatevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika vachinzi vakaita kuti vamwe vakuru vakuru veZimbabwe National Roads Authority vakange vasungwa vabudiswe muhusungwa.
VaMphoko, avo vakasiyiswa basa zvichitevera kubviswa kwakaitwa VaRobert Mugabe pachigaro chemutungamiri wenyika muna Mbudzi 2017, munhu wechipiri ane chiremera kusungwa neZACC zvichitevera kusungwa kwevaimbove gurukota rezvekushanyirwa kwenyika, Amai Priscah Mupfumira, avo vari kupomerwa mhosva yehuori kuNational Social Security Authority, uhwo hunobata mari inodarika mamiriyoni makumi mapfumbamwe emadhora ekuAmerica.
Mune imwewo nyaya, mutauriri webato reMDC muBulawayo, VaSwithern Chiroodza, vanoti bato ravo riri kushushikana nekwavati kushungurudzwa nekupambwa kwedzimwe nhengo dzavo.
VaChiroodza vati nezuro manheru chete pane nhengo dzavo nhatu dzakada kupambwa kusanganisira mutauriri weveboka rechidiki, VaBen Hlatshwayo, uye vamwe vaviri vakapambwa vakarohwa ndokusiiwa vakandwa panzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana kunze kwedhorobha reBulawayo.
VaChiroodza vati vari kumhang’ara kumapurisa asi havazi kugutsikana nebatairwo ari kuitwa nyaya idzi.
Taedza kubata mutauriri wemapurisa muBulawayo, Assistant Inspector Abednico Ncube, asi nharembozha yavo yange isingabatiki.
Mutauriri weboka revechidiki muMDC, VaStephen Chuma, vati zviri kuitika izvi zvinogona kukonzera kusagadzikana munyika.

Mutevedzeri wasachigaro musangano reZimbabwe Exemption Permits, Muzvare Gladys Mangwende, vanoti sangano ravo rinofarira hurongwe hwekucherechedza vapoteri asi vano shungurudzika nekusatevedzwa kwekodzero dzavo.
Sachigaro we sangano re Human Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti zuva revapoteri rinokosha munyika yeSouth Africa sezvo mune zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zviri muhupoteri.
VaMavhinga vaenderera mberi nekukurudzira hurumende yeSouth Africa kuti irerutse mitemo kunyanya munyaya dzemabatirwo evanobva kunze kwenyika.
Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaGeorge Manyika, vatsigirawo mashoko aVaMavhinga.
VaGabriel Shumba, mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum vakurudzira masangano akaita seUN, AU, neSADC kuti avheneke zvakadzama kubatwa kunoitwa vapoteri nenyika yeSA, kunyanya zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe.
VaShumba vapawo chikumbiro kugurukota remuSouth Africa, rinoona nezvemukati menyika, VaAron Motseledi kuti varerutse mitemo yemubazi ravo kuitira kuti vapoteri vasatambure mukuwana magwaro.
Vakurudzira masangano anorwira kodzero dzavanhu kuti vashande nesangano ravo mukurwira kodzero dzavapoteri vose vanobva kunze kwenyika.
Mumwe ari muhupoteri VaFrancis Mukono vati havaone kukosha kwezuva revapoteri sezvo zvinhu zvakavaomera muSouth Africa.
Mumwe ari muhopoteri VaSteven Chiweshe vatiwo havachazive pfumo rovobaya.
Mukuru anoona nezvevapoteri mubazi rinoona nezvemukati menyika muSouth Africa VaMandela Madumise, vanoti bazi ravo, rakakumbira rubatsiro kusangano re United Nations Human Rights Council kuti ribatsiro kugadzirisa matambudziko avari kutarisana nawo mubazi ravo.
VaMadumise vati mukupera kwemwedzi unotevera, bazi ravo richange rave kuziva kuti chii chinosungirwa kuitwa mukugadzirisa matambudziko aya.
Kune zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe, zvinofungidzirwa kuti zvinosvika kana kupfuura mamirioni matatu zvakapotera muSouth Africa zvichipomera hurumende mhosva yekuzvishungurudzwa.
Asi hurumende yeZimbabwe inoti vamwe vakaenda muhupoteri vachida havo kunotsvaga mafuro manyoro.
Vashandi vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba vasvika mazuva makumi matatu nematatu vakanda mapadza pasi vachiti mari yavari kutambiriswa haichakwani kuti vaende kumabasa pasina kana tarisiro yekuti dambudziko iri richagadziriswa.
Zvinhu muzvipatara zvehurumende zvabva zvaita manyama amire nerongo zvopa kuti vamwe varwere vadzoserwe kumba vasina kurapwa.
Zvinhu muzvipatara zviri kutarisirwa kutonyanyoipa sezvo sangano ravanachiremba vakuru reSenior Health Doctors Association vakatozivisa kuti kana nyaya dzemari nekuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba vadiki nevakati dzikasagadziriswa naivo vachapindawo mukuramwa mabasa. Mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vakuru iri Dr Aaron Musara vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara.
Dr Musara vanoti kunyangwe hazvo vakazivisa hurumende nezvedanho ravo rekuda kukanda mapadza pasi kuburikidza nemagwaro avakanyorera mapazi akasiyana siyana hapana mhinduro yavati vawana.
Vanamukoti muzvipatara zvehurumende havasi kuenda kumabasa uye vari kuda kuti hurumende ivape mihoro yavo nemari yekuAmerica yavaitambira muna Gumiguru 2018 pamwe nekuvapa zvekushandisa kuzvidzivirira kubva kuzvirwere kana vari pamabasa.
Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vanamukoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association, ZINA VaEnock Dongo vanoti hurukuro nehurumende kutungana kwembudzi.
Mutauriri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association kana kuti ZHDA Dr Tapiwa Mungofa vatiwo kusagadziriswa kwenyaya dzevashandi vezvehutano nehurumende kwave kusiya varwere vasina anovarapa.
VaMungofa vatiwo panguva iyo vana mukoti vakaramwa mabasa dzimwe nhengo dzavo dzakawanda dzave kumba senzira yekudzivirira kutapurirwa chirwere cheCOVID-19 inonzi pachirungu Self quarantine.
Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya yekugadzirisa zvichemo zvevashandi vezvehutano sezvo vakafanobata chigaro chagurukota rezvehutano Muzvinafundo Amon Murwira vanga vasingadaviri nharembozha yavo.
Asi vhiki rapera, VaMurwira vakazivisa kuti vanga vatanga hurukuro nana mukoti. Mutevedzeri wavo VaJohn Mangwiro vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti vanga vakabatikana nekudaro vange vasingakwanise kutaura.
Sachigaro weHealth Services Board, Dr. Paulinus Sikosana, vatiwo vange vari mumusangano unechekuita nedenda reCOVID-19 nekudaro vanga vasingakwanisi kutaura nesu.
Nyanzvi dzezvehutano dzinotiwo kana hurumende ikasagadzirisa nyaya yevakoti kuti vadzokere kumabasa uyewo kudzivirira vana chiremba kuti vasaenderera mberi kuzvigokera moto muziso kunyanya panguva ino nyika yakatarisana nedenda reCOVID-19 iro rauraya vanhu makumi maviri nevashanu kusvika parizvino.
Kanzuru yeChinhoyi inoti yakagadzirira kutevedzera zvakaturwa nedare repamusoro reHigh Court nemusi weMuvhuro zvekuti kanzuru iyi ivake zvivakwa zvayakaputsira vanhu vanotengesa zvinhu zvavo muguta iri.
Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevanotengesa vakapwanyirwa zvivakwa zvavo nekanzuru yeChinhoyi, munyori wekanzuru iyi, VaAbel Gotora, vati vachatevedzera mutongo wedare wekuti kanzuru ivake zvivakwa zvekutengesera zvayakapwanyira vamwe vatengesi vakaiendesa kumatare.
Asi VaGotora vati kanzuru haisi kuvaka zvivakwa zvose zvayakapwanya, asi ichavaka chete zvivakwa zvayakanzi nedare repamusoro zvivakwe zvevanhu vatanhatu vakaendesa kanzuru kumatare edzimhosva.
Vanhu vakaendesa kanzuru yeChinhoyi kumatare ndiVaTafadzwa Marimo, VaEmmanuel Ngwaru, VaRichard Svosve, VaPepukayi Marega pamwe naVaDevis Shopo.
Mumwe wevatanhatu ava, VaEmmanuel Gwaru, vati vakatambira mutongo wedare nemufaro mukuru sezvo hurumende yakanga yaudza makanzuru kuti ichenese nzvimbo chete, kwete kupwanya zvivakwa.
VaGwaru vati chimwe chakanyanya kuvarwadza ndechekuti vaibhadhara mari yekuti kanzuru ivake zvavakwa zvakanaka zvekutengesera.  Kanzura wenzvimbo ine misika yakaputswa yeGadzema, Muzvare Patricia Chibaya, vati vari kufarira mutongo wedare uyu sezvo ivo vanga vari panguva yakaoma nekuti kune rumwe rutivi, sekanzuru, vaifanirwa kutevedzera zvainge zviri mutsamba yakabva kugurukota rezvematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, kuti vachenese maguta, asi panguva imwecheteyo, vachinzwirawo tsitsi vanhu vanorarama nekutengesa vakaputsirwa misika yavo.
VaGotora vazivisa kuti kanzuru ichavaka nzvimbo itsva inotengesera vanhu vanosvika makumi mashanu vaitengesa pamusika weGadzema.
Mutauriri wesangano remagweta ari kumirira vakaputsirwa zvivakwa zvavo ava, re Zimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaKumbirai Mafunda, vati vanotengesa munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana vari kuuya kumahofisi avo vachida rubatsiro rwekumirirwa mumatare.
Makanzuru akawanda munyika ari kuputsa zvivakwa zvaanoti zvakavakwa zvisiri pamutemo.
Asi vanotengesa munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana munyika yose vari kupikisa mumatare zviri kuitwa nemakanzuru avo.
Zvichitevera mutongo wedare repamusoro soro reSupreme Court nemusi weChipiri wekuti ndiyani anofanira kumbotungamira bato reMDC kubva zvakashaya VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vanhu vakawanda vari kuda kuziva kuti ndiyani chaiye muridzi weRichard Morgan Tsvangirai House kana kuti Harvest House.
Dare rakati Muzvare Thokozani Khupe ndivo vanofanira kubata matomu muMDC T kusvika paitwa sarudzo mukati memwedzi mitatu.
Asi nyaya yekuti ndiyani anopinda mumuzinda webato ndiyani inenge yakati omei sezvo paine vanhu vaviri vanochengetedza chivakwa ichi vanove VaIan Makone naReverend Tim Neil vaimbotungamira Church of the Province of Central Africa kana kuti CPCA.
Munyori mukuru weMDC Alliance, VaCharlton Hwende vatenda kuti muzinda uri mumaoko evaviri ava uye ivo ndivo vari kubvumidzwa kuushandisa parizvino.
Vari kuzvitiwo vave munyori mukuru webato iri sezvo vachiti radzokera kuhutungamiri hwaro hwa2014 VaDouglas Mwonzora vatendawo kuti muzinda uyu uri mumaoko aVaMakone naVaNeil.
Asi vati vanofunga kuti vachabvumidzwa kushanda mauri. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaMakone naVaNiel kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi.
Mutevedzeri wasachigaro weMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaJob Sikhala, vanoti munzvimbo yeSt Marys kuChitungwiza maberekera ingwe zviri kupa kuti vatsigiri vebato ravo vatize misha vachienda kunohwanda.
VaSikhala, avo vanova mumiriri weZengeza West mudare reparamende, vanoti vatsigiri vebato ravo vari kutsvagwa nemumwe mukuru wemapurisa vangonzi vanonzi VaJabangwe munharaunda iyi vachida kusungwa.
Tayedza kubata VaJabangwe asi havana kuda kupindura mibvunzo yedu.
Studio7 haina kukwanisawo kunzwa kumutauriri wemapurisa,. Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, kuti seyi vatsigiri ava vari kuda kusungwa nemapurisa.
Asi zvinonzi nyaya yekuda kusungwa kwevatsigiri veMDC yakanangana nekuda kuratidzira kuri kuda kuitwa nebato iri munyika yose.
VaSikhala, avo vakasungwa mwedzi wapera vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kupidigura hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanhu vakawanda vari kutiza dzimba dzavo vachitya kusungwa.
Vanhu vanopfuura makumi mapfumbamwe vakasungwa muHarare Chishanu chapfuura vachisungirwa zvine chekuita nekuratidzira kwainge kwarongwa neMDC musi uyu.
Bato reMDC riri kuda kuratidzira mumaguta makuru munyika asi mapurisa ari kushandisa chikamu chemutemo wePublic Order and Security Act kurambidza bato iri kuenderera mberi nekuratidzira kwaro.
Kusvika pari zvino mapurisa arambidza MDC kuti isaratidzire muHarare, Bulawayo, Gweru neMasvingo.
Nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika dzinoti izvi zvinogona zvakare kuitika kwaMutare uko MDC ine hurongwa hwekuratidzira nemusi weChina.
Dare repamusoro rambomisa gurukota rezvemitemo,VaZiyambi Ziyambi, pamwe negurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, kupa MDC inotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe mari pasi pemutemo unobata mari dzinopihwa mapato ari muparamende.
Mutongi wedare repamusoro, Amai Priscilla Munangati Manongwa, vakatura neChina mutongo wekumisa VaZiyambi naVaNcube kuti vape chikwata cheMDC-T chiri kuzviti ndicho bato riri pamutemo mari inopihwa mapato anenge akamiririrwa muparamende pasi pemutemo unoona nezvemari dzemapato kana kuti Political Parties (Finance) Act.
Bato reMDC riri kufanira kupihwa mari inoita mamiriyoni manomwe nezviuru mazana mashanu zvemadhora ari maRTGS.
Vari kuziva zviri kuitika vanoti MDC yaVaNelson Chamisa yakamhanyira kumatare mushure mekunge chikwata chaMuzvare Khupe changa chanyora matsamba kumabhanga chichida kubvisa nhengo dzaVaChamisa pamazita evanhu vanofanirwa kusaina magwaro ekutora mari mubhanga mebato iri re Steward Bank.
Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC inotungamirwa naVaChamisa, VaLuke Tamborinyoka, vati vafara zvikuru nemutongo wedare.
Asi VaMorgen Komichi, avo vave kuzviti ndivo sachigaro webato zvichitevera mutongo wedare reSupreme Court uyo wakati VaChamisa havana kutevedzera mutemo webato ravo kuti vave mutungamiri weMDC, vati vachatora matanho ekuti vapihwe mari iyi sezvo vari ivo vatungamiri vebato vari pamutemo.
Asi VaTamborinyoka vati ndivo vane kodzero yekupihwa mari iyi sezvo nhengo dzeparamende dzeMDC idzi dzakapinda muparamende dzichishandisa zita ravo.
Asi VaKomichi vati VaChamisa nevamwe vavo vanofanira kutevedzera mutemo.
Zvichakadai, rimwe gweta remuHarare, VaKudzai Kadzere, vati mutongo wedare uyu unogona kupikiswa mukati memazuva gumi.
VaZiyambi vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti vanogona kuisawo mapepa avo kudare mukati memazuva gumi kana vachida kupikisa mutongo uyu sezvaturwa nedare.
Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri weparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, pamwe negurukota rezvemari kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo vakadomwawo mumapepa ari pamberi pedare.
Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo dzinoti provisional order yakapihwa nedare redzimhosva chizivo kuvanhu vakadomwa kuti kana vasina kupikisa nyaya yakaunzwa mudare iri neMDC yaVaChamisa, dare iri rinogona kuzadzisa mutongo waro wekuti mari iyi ipihwe MDC yaVaChamisa.
Aka hakasi kekutanga MDC ichirwira mari idzi.
Muna 2006, mushure mekunge vaive munyori mukuru weMDC, VaWelshman Ncube, vapesana naVaMorgan Tsvangirai muna Gumiguru 2005 ndokuumba MDC yavowo, vakaenderera mberi vakapihwa mari yeMDC yose inopihwa mapato, chikwata chakasara naVaTsvangirai, icho chaive nenhengo dzakawanda muparamende, chikasawana kana kobiri zvaro.
Chimwe chizvarwe cheZimbabwe, Dr Rita Nyampinga, vesangano re Female Prisoners Support Trust, iro rinorwira kodzero dzemadzimai vari mumajeri, vanoti vari kufara nekuwana ruremekedzo rwe 2020 International Women of Courage Award.
Mubayiro uyu unocherechedza mabasa ehushingi anoitwa nemadzimai pasi rose, uye unopihwa nebazi reAmerica rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika.
Dr Nyampinga vanoti havana kumbofunga kuti vangawana ruremekedzo rwakadai, vachiti vakafadzwa zvikuru nekucherechedzwa pamwe nemamwe madzimai gumi nemumwe vanobva kunyika dzakasiyana siyana pasi rose.
Dr Nyampinga vanoti vachange vachienda kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana muAmerica kuitira kuti vanodzidza mamiriro akaita zvinhu mumajeri kuitira kuti vazokwanisa kusimbaradza mabasa avanoita kumusha.
Dr Nyampinga vanoti mabasa avo anoda kushinga uye vari kufara kuti kune vamwewo vange vachiwona mabasa avari kuita kumusha.
Vachitaura pachiitiko ichi, munyori mubazi rezvekudyidzana kweAmerica nedzimwe nyika, VaMichael Pompeo, vakati mabasa akabatwa nemadzimai gumi nemaviri ava anoyemurika uye anoda kushinga.
Chirongwa ichi chakatangwa makore gumi nemana apfuura.
Mamwe madzimai akawana ruremekedzo urwu vanobva ku Afganistan, Armenia, Azerbaijan, Bolivia, Burkino Faso, Kazakhstan, Malaysia, Nicaragua, Pakistan, Syria, Yemen ne Zimbabwe.
VaPompey vakati zvirongwa zvakadayi zvakakosha sezvo zvichipa madzimai mukana wekuti aite mabasa ekurwira kodzero dzevamwe pasi rose.
Vachitaurawo pachiitiko ichi, mudzimai wemutungamiri weAmerica, Amai Melania Trump, vakati vanofadzwa nemabasa ekurwira kodzero dzevanhu ari kuitwa nemadzimai pasi rose.
Vakati kubvira pavakatanga kusangana nemadzimai anenge asarudzwa kuti acherechedzwe kwemakore mana apfuura, vanoramba vachisangana nemadzimai ari kuita mabasa anoyemurika pasi rose kunyangwe hazvo vamwe vacho vanoita mabasa aya vachisangana nekushungurudzwa asi vachiramba vachiita mabasa aya.
Dr Nyampinga vanoti vakatanga kuita mabasa ekurwira kodzero dzevanhu makore makumi matatu apfuura.
Kunze kwesangano ravo, Amai Nyampinga vari mubhodhi emasangano anoti Women’s Coalition Of Zimbabwe, Crisis In Zimbabwe Coalition, Women Academy on Political Leadership Excellence ne Women And Aids Support Network.
Mamwe madzimai ekuZimbabwe akambowana mubairo uyu anosanganisira Amai Jenni Willaims, Amai Magodonga Mahlangu, Muzvare Jestina Mukoko na Amai Beatrice Mtetwa.
Bazi rezvehutano rinoti rakumbira South Africa kuti iongororewo kuti chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chechidzimai chakabva kuChina chikasvika munyika neChipiri chine hutachiona wecoronavirus here kana kuti kwete.
Ongororo yakaitwa muZimbabwe neChina inoratidza kuti hachina. National Institute of Communicable Diseases yekuSouth Africa ndiyo ine humhizha kuchamhembe kweSouth Africa kuti ikwanise kuona kuti munhu abatwa nechirwere checoronavirus here.
Mudzimai uyu ari kuchipatara cheWilkins muHarare. Vanoona nezvezvirwere zvekutapurina mubazi rezvehutano Dr Portia Manangazira vanoti vari kutarisira kuti mukati memazuva mashanu vanenge vave kuziva kuti zvakamira sei.
Kurambidzwa kushanda kwemakombi nemabhazi asiri pasi pekambani yemabhazi yeZUPCO kwokonzera matambudziko ekushaikwa kwechekufambisa, izvo zvave kuita kuti vanhu vaungane munzvimbo dzinokwirirwa michovha panguva iyo nyika iri kurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika.
Vanhu vakawanda vanonzi vari kutambura kushaya chekufambisa, zvikuru munguva dzemanheru, izvo zviri kuita kuti vatsikirirane kana vopinda mumabhazi mashoma anenge awanikwa.
Hurumende yakadzika mutemo unorambidza vemakombi kutakura vanhu munguva ino yechirwere cheCovid-19 senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere, ichi, ichiti mabhazi anenge ari pasi peZUPCO ndiwo chete anobvumidzwa kutakura vanhu.
Asi vamwe vemabhazi nemakombi vanonzi havasi kuzvipira kuenda pasi pehurongwa uhwu nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakasiyanasiyana zvinosanganisira kunonoka kubhadharwa neZUPCO.
NeMuvhuro, vemabhazi vakazvimirira ava vanonzi vakaita musangano nevakuru vekambani yeZUPCO kuti vaedze kuwirirana panyunyuto dzavanadzo, dzinosanganisira dzekunonoka kubhadharwa kana mabhazi avo ashanda.
NeChipiri vemabhazi ava vanga vachitarisirwa kusanganawo nevehurumende kuti vagadzirisane.
Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuZUPCO kuti pane hurongwa hupi hwekugadzirisa dambudziko rekushaikwa kwechekufambisa iri.
Asi mukuru werimwe sangano revagari vemuHarare, reHarare Residents Trust, VaPrecious Shumba, vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa dambudziko rezvekufambisa iri nekukasika zvinhu zvisati zvaita manyama amire nerongo.
VaShumba vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuisa mapurisa, mauto kana mapurisa ekanzuru panzvimbo dzinokwirirwa mabhazi idzi kuitira kuti vasimbise mutemo wekuti vanhu vachengetedze nhanho dzekuti vasatapurirane zvirwere.
Vanotiwo vezvehutano vanofanirwa kunge vachitendererawo munzvimbo dzinokwirirwa mabhazi vachivhenekawo vanhu kuona kuti havana hutachiwana kana chirwere cheCovid-19.
Vemabhizimusi muguta reBulawayo vakabatana nemamwe masangano akasiyanasiyana emuguta iri vasangana nevakuru vekanzuru yeguta iri kuti vazeye nezvematambudziko avanoti ari kukonzerwa nekuvharwa kwemvura, uko kunonzi kwatora nguva yakareba.
Mukuru wesangano rinomirira vemabhizimusi, reAssociation for Business in Zimbabwe, (ABUZ), VaVictor Nyoni, vanoti kuvharwa kwevhura uku kwave kukanganisa mafambisirwo emabhizimusi akawanda sezvo nhengo dzavo dzichida mvura mukuita mabasa adzo zuva nezuva.
VaNyoni vanoti vavimbiswa nevakuru vekanzuru vavasangana navo kuti vatarisire kuwana mvura kutanga kwesvondo rinouya, sezvo kanzuru iri kutarisira kupedza basa rairi kuita mukupera kwesvondo.

Izvi zvinonzi zvasanganawo nekuderera kwemvura mumadhamu anowanisa guta iri mvura eCriterion neMagwegwe pamwechete nekunetsa kwemagetsi ekuti mvura ikwanise kupombwa.
VaNyoni vanoti zvinozivikanwa kuti guta reBulawayo rave nemakore anodarika zana nemakumi maviri, zvekuti michina nepombi dzemvura zvachembera.
Vanoti hurumende nekanzuru zvinofanirwa kutora matanho ekugadzirisa dambudziko iri kuti ripere zvachose.
Studio7 yakundikana kunzwa divi rekanzuru panyaya iyi.
Sangano rinomirira vanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, rinoti ramirira kunzwa kubva kumutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa mushure mekunge raita musangano nenhumwa dzavo neChitatu.
Mubati wehomwe musangano iri Doctor Prince Butau vati vari kutarisira kunzwa kubva kuna VaMnangagwa chero nguva China kana Chishanu.
VaMnangagwa, avo vambenge vaenda pazororo, vakadzoka nechimbi-chimbi kuti vaedze kugadzirisa dambudziko rekuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba iri.
Zvinhu muzvipatara zvose zvehurumende zvinonzi hazvichina kumira zvakanaka kubva vanachiremba zvavatanga kuramwa musi wa 1 Zvita gore rapera.
Asi mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa dambudziko iri nechimbi-chimbi uye kupa vanachiremba mari inoita kuti vasanhonge svosve nemuromo.
Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa zvaratidzira pachipatara cheGroote Schuur, chiri muCape Town, apo panofungidzirwa kuti ndipo pari kurapwa mutevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, zvichiti VaChiwenga vanofanirwa kudzokera vonorapwa kuzvipatara zvekumusha sevamwe vese.
VaChiwenga vanonzi vakabuda munyika zvechimbichimbi mukupera kwesvondo vachiendeswa kuSouth Africa kunorapwa, kunyange hazvo Studio 7 isina kukwanisa kuwana humbowo hwekuti vari pachipatara chikuru chemuSouth Africa ichi.

Sarudzo dzekutsvaga achamirira bato reDemocratic Party musarudzo yemutungamiri weAmerica muna Mbudzi, dzava kutsviriridza zvichitevera kupinda musarudzo idzi, kwevaimbove meya weguta reNew York, VaMichael Bloomberg.
VaBloomberg, avo vanove shoroma inotyisa, havana kumhanyira kupinda musarudzo yekutsvaga achamirira bato ravo musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, uyo achakweshana zvine mutsindo nemumiriri webato reRepublican Party, Va Donald Trump.
VaBloomberg vakazivisa muna Mbudzi gore rapera kuti vari kupinda mudariro, ndokushandisa mari inodarika mazana mana emamiriyoni emadhora, vachizvishambadza. Mari iyi ndeyavo.
Shoroma iyi haina kupinda musarudzo dzakaitwa kuIowa neNew Hampshire, uye haisiwo kupinda musarudzo dzichaitwa kuNavada neSouth Carolina, ichimirira sarudzo dzichaitwa muna Kurume, apo matunhu gumi nemana achasarudza munhu waanoda kuti amirire bato reDemocratic Party musarudzo yemutungamiri weAmerica.
Pakangoisa VaBloomerg gumbo ravo mudaririo rekukwikwidza mubato ravo, vamwe vanga varimo kare vakaita saVaBernie Sanders, avo vanomirira Vermont mudare re Senate, pamwe naAmai Elizabeth Warren, avo vanomirira Massachusetts mudare reSenate, vakabva vatanga kubvarura bvarura nhoroondo yaVaBloomberg.
Vachitaura pamberi pehurongwa hwekuedzana pfungwa munyaya dzematongerwo enyika muNevada, VaSanders vakati kuti bato ravo rikunde VaTrump, rinoda munhu anokwanisa kuunganidza vanhu vakawanda zvisati zvamboitika munhoroondo yeAmerica.
VaSanders vakati VaBloomberg munhu anozivikanwa pavaive meya weNew York nekudzika mitemo yekumisa nekusecha vanhu vatema, pamwe nemaLatino vachiita izvi nenzira isina kunaka. Vakati kuita kwakadai hakukwanisi kunza vanhu vakawanda kuti vanovhota kuitira kuti VaTrump vabviswe pachigaro muna Mbudzi.
Asi VaBloomerg vakavhika zvibhakera zvemashoko aVaSanders vachiti VaSanders, avo vari kutungamira mutsagiridzo dzevavhoti dzakaitwa, vakasarudzwa semumiriri weDemocratic Party musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, America ichange iina VaTrump kwemamwe makore mana anotevera.
Mumwe muongorori wezvematongerwo enyika, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaFrenk Guni, vanoti zviri pachena kuti mutambo mukuru uri pakati paVaSanders naVaBloomberg, kunyange hazvo zviri kuratidza kuti pari zvino VaSanders vane vatsigiri vakawandisa.
VaGuni vanoti, semaonero avo, VaSanders naVaBloomberg vanofanirwa kupinda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika vakabatana kuitira kuti vakunde VaTrump.
Vamwe vari kukwikwidza musarudzo yeDemocratic Party vanoti; vaimbove mutevedzeri waVaBarack Obama, VaJoe Biden; seneta weMinnesota, Amy Klobuchar, pamwe nevaimbove meya weSouth Bend ku Indiana, uye ari ngochani, Pete Buttigieg.
Bato reDemocratic Party rine ma delegates 3,979, uye kuti munhu atambirwe semunhu anofanirwa kumirira bato musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, anofanirwa kuwana ma delegates chiuru nemazana mapfaumbamwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe (1,990).
Pamusoro pema delegates, kunewo ma super delegates zvokuti panozoitwa musangano mukuru wekutsvaga mumiriri webato we Democratic Convention muna Chikunguru kuWisconsin, panofanirwa kunge paine ma delegates nema super delegates anosvika zviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nemakumi mashanu, uye munhu anosarudzwa pamusangano uyu, anofanirwa kuwana mavhoti zviuru zviviri nemazana matatu ane makumi manomwe nematanhatu (2,376 votes).

"Ini ndiri muimbi asi pakuratidzira kuchange kuchiitika kuNewYork ndinenge ndisiri kuita zvekuimba ndichange ndakabatana nevamwe tichiratidzira nekushora huwori nekumbunyikidzwa kurikuitwa zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe nehurumende yaVaMugabe iyo isisadiwe neveruzhinji," VaMapfumo vaudza Studio 7.

Vamwe vari kutarisirwa kunge vari pakuratidzira uku vanosanganisira VaPatson Dzamara munin'ina wemurwi wekodzero dzevanhu VaItai Dzamara avo vakatsakatika gore rapera.
Sangano rinomirira varairidzi vekumaruwa, re Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, rinoti hapana hurukuro dziri kuitwa pakati pehurumende nevarairidzi panyaya yekugadzirisa zvichemo zvevarairidzi.
Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, vaudza Studio7 kuti sangano ravo harisi kufara richiona vana vechikoro vachishaya mari yedzidzo, ukuwo varairidzi vachishaya mari yekuenda kubasa.
VaMasaraure vati nhengo zhinji dzesangano ravo dziri kunyora matsamba ekuzivisa kusiya kwadzo basa dzichititi dzave kunotsvaka mamwe mabasa ekuita sezvo mihoro yavari kupiwa nehurumende isingakwani kuchengeta mhuri dzavo.
Tatadza kubata gurukota rezvedzidzo, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavhima, kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi.
Apo pasi rose riri kucherechedza mwedzi waGumiguru semwedzi wedzidziso yechirwere chegomarara repazamu, sangano reCancer Association of Zimbabwe rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru kusanyatsonzwisisa nezvechirwere ichi kunoitwa nevamwe vanhu munyika.
Sangano iri rinoti kune vanhu vakawanda vanoti vakabatwa nechirwere chegomarara, vanotanga vamboenda kumaporofita kana kun’anga, vozopedzisira vaenda kunana mazvikokota chirwere ichi chakomba, izvo zvinozoita kuti kurapika kwacho kunetse.
Chipangamazano musangano reCancer Association of Zimbabwe, Muzvare Priscilla Mangwiro, vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vaende kunana chiremba vane hunyanzvi kana vachinge vawirwa nedambudziko iri.
Muzvare Mangwiro vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vagare vakaongororwa chirwere chegomarara, zvikuru repazamu.
Muzvare Mangwiro vanoti gomarara repamazamu ndiro rechipiri pamagomarara ese ari kuuraya vakadzi muZimbabwe.
Muzvare Mangwiro vanoti kubva musi waGumiguru 1 apo pakatanga chirongwa chavo chekucherechedza mwedzi waGumiguru semwedzi wekuti vanhu vazivisane nezvechirwere chegomarara, sangano ravo raongorora madzimai anodarika makumi mashanu, uye huwandu hucharamba huchikwira kusvika panopera mwedzi uno.
Mushure mekunzwa nezvechirongwa cheCancer Association of Zimbabwe, mumwe mudzimai, Amai Gertrude Magwaniza, vanoti vakaenda nemwanasikana wavo kuti aongororwe zibundu raiva muzamu rake.
Muzvare Mangwiro vanoti pane zvinhu zvakawanda zvinoisa madzimai panjodzi yekuva nechirwere chegomarara yepamazamu.
Muzvare Mangwiro vanoti vakadzi vanofanirwa kuongorora shanduko inoitika pamazamu avo, uye vakaona paita shanduko, vanofanirwa kukurumidza kuongororwa.
Muzvare Mangwiro vanoti vanhu vazhinji vanofunga kuti munhu akabatwa nechirwere chegomarara zvinoreva kuti ava kutofa asi pane zvakawanda zvinoitwa kuti vakadzi vabatsirwe vachizorarama kwemakore akatowandisa.
Muzvare Mangwiro vanoti zvimwe zvezvinhu zvinokonzera chirwere chegomarara kudya chikafu chine mafuta netsvigiri yakawandisa.
Muzvare Mangwiro vari kukurudzira madzimai kuti vashandise mukana wemwedzi waGumiguru kuti vaongororwe chirwere chegomarara, pamwe nekudzidziswa nezvechirwere ichi.
Vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvishanu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi pagore rega rega uye vazhinji vavo vanozoona vana chiremba chirwere chakomba.
Kambani yehurumende inotengesa mafuta edzimotokari yePetrotrade inoti kana hurumende ikaramba ichitara mitengo yekutenga nekutengeswa kwemafuta edzimotokari dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemafuta aya hariperi.
Vachipindura kukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemhando dzemoto kuti dambudziko rekushomeka kwemafuta edzimotokari munyika ringapedzwe sei, vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru wePetrotrade, VaGodfrey Ncube, vati izvi zvinogoneka chete kana vemabhizimusi vakapiwa mukana wekunotenga mafuta vouya votengesa nemari yavanotara pachavo.
VaNcube vabvuma kuti kuita izvi kunokwidza mitengo zvakanyanya asi vati ndiyo chete nzira ingabudise nyika mudambudziko remafuta rave nemakore ane chitsama richinetsa munyika.
VaNcube vati kumirira mafuta anobva kuhurumende kuri kuita kuti mafuta ave mashoma munyika sezvo vari kuwaniswa mafuta aya nenguva iri kure.
VaNcube varatidza kushomeka kwemafuta ari kutengwa nerubatsiro rwunobva kuhurumende nemuenzaniso wavapa vachiti pamwedzi mitanhatu yekutanga gore rapera, vakatengesa mamiriyoni makumi mashanu emarita, asi munguva yakafanana iyi gore rino vakatengesa marita mamiriyoni makumi matatu ane matanhatu chete.
Vachibvunzwa kuti bazi ravo rinotarisira kupedza dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemafuta edzimotokari iri rinhi, munyori mubazi rezvemhando dzemoto, Amai Gloria Magombo, vati dambudziko iri haringaperi kana mari yekunze ichiri shoma munyika.
Vatiwo kugadzirisa dambudziko iri kunoda nyika yese kwete bazi ravo chete.
Vachibvunza nenyaya yekuti hurongwa hwekushandisa Smart Card mukutenga mafuta hwakataurwa nagavhuna webhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, apo vaiti kadhi iri rinenge richiratidza huwandu hwemafuta anenge amwiwa nemotokari yega yega pagaraji rinenge rashandiswa kutenga mafuta aya, Amai Magombo vati hurongwa uhwu hwakadzorerwa shure nedenda reCOVID-19 vachiti pane zvaida kunotengwa kuChina.
Amai Magombo vati vanga vasingakwanisi kutaura kuti hurongwa uhwu hwuchabudirira rinhi kunyange hazvo VaMangudya vakaudza komiti iyi mwedzi wapera kuti vaitarisira kuti kupera kwemwedzi waChikumi vanenge vaedza kushandisa kadhi iri kuitira kti vaone kana richishanda sezvaitarisira.
Izvi zvatsamwisa zvakanyanya komiti yeparamende iyo yati inoona sekuti bazi rezvemhando dzemoto riri kutadza kuita basa rayo sezvo Amai Magombo vatiwo vatangawo kunzwa nenhengo dzekomiti iyi nhasi kuti magaraji mazhinji anotengesa mafuta munyika ari kutengesa nemari yemadhora ekuAmerica kana kuti makuponi anotengwa nemari yekunze .
Komiti iyi yati iru kushushikana zvikuru kuti mabasa akawanda ekuvandudza nyika ari kukanganiswa nekushaikwa kwemafuta edzimotokari.
Vana veZimbabwe neMugovera uno vari kucherechedza makore makumi mana nyika yawana kuzvitonga kubva kuhutongi hwevachena, avo vaive vakapakata muhapwa dzavo hupfumi hwese hwenyika, vatema vachikwangwaya nekunhonga svosve nemuromo.
Kuuya kwehutongo hwevatema kwakasimudza tariro yevakawanda vachiti vakanga vazowana hutongo hwejekerere, ruzhinji rwavo rwakanga rwakandwa murukangarabwe nevachena pavaitora ivhu ravo rose raive rakanaka.
Asi makore makumi mana nyika yawana kuzvitonga, vamwe vavo vave kuti zvinhu zvatonyanya kuvaipira zvichienzaniswa nenguva yehutongo hwevachena, sezvo vasisina mabasa ekuti vakwanise kuriritira mhuri dzavo.
Vanoti mamiriro ezvehupfumi aparara zvekuti munhu haachanise kuziva kuti remangwana rinobuda richimuigira chii.
Nyaya dzehutano dzinonzi dzatove matakadyakare sezvo zvipatara zvizhinji zvemunyika zvisisashande sezvinotarisirwa.
Vashoma vachiri mumabasa vacho vanoti nguva zhinji vave kuipedzera mumigwagwa vachiratidzira kuitira kut vapiwe mihoro inovararamisa.
Kupinda pachigaro kwevave mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa muna 2017, mushure mekubviswa nemauto kwevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe, kwakambopa veruzhinji tarisiro yeramangwana rakajeka.
Asi ruzhinji rwavo ndirwo rwave kuti rwakapemberera n’anga neyakabata Mai, sezvo vachiti zvinhu zvatonyanya kuenda kumawere.
Asi kuti hapanawo here chakanaka chakaitwa neZanu PF kwemakore makumi mana ose aya?
Sachigaro veZanu PF mudunhu reNorth America, VaRegis Charumbira, vanoti chikuru chaitwa nebato ravo kupa ivhu kuvatema, zvisineyi nekuti ndevebato ripi rezvematongerwo enyika.
VaCharumbira vanoti bato ravo pari zvino rave kutopedza kuongorora kuti ndivanaani vakawana mapurazi akawanda kudarika vamwe, uye kuti vakanga vasati vawana ivhu, kusanganisirawo zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika, vawaniswe.
Asi mutewedzeri wemunyori anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muMDC mudunhu reNorth America VaTimothy Muringai, vanoti Zanu PF yakundikana kwemakore akawanda kuzadzisa zvose zvakarwirwa hondo yerusununguko.
Vanoti zvinhu zvaparara kwemakore akawanda munyaya dzezvehupfumi, zvehutano pamwe nekuvharwa kwemakambani, izvo zviri kusiya vashandi vakawanda vave mumigwagwa vasisina mabasa.
Gweta raishe Ntabazinduna Nhlanhlayamangwe Ndiweni kana kuti Ishe Felix Ndiweni akwira kudare repamusoro reHigh Court nhasi kunopikisa mutongo nechirango chavakapihwa chekuti vagare mutirongo kwemwedzi gumi nemisere.
Ishe Ndiweni nevamwe vanhu vari pasi pavo makumi maviri nevatatu vakabatwa nemhosva yekuputsa ruzhowa rwaVaFetti Mbele avo vaida kudzinga mudunhu ravo reNtabazinduna.
Izvi zvinotevera kupomerwa mhosva yekuita zvehupfambi kwemudzimai waVaMbele, Amai Nonkangelo Mpengesi.

Kambani iyi iri kuEugene, Oregon muAmerica uye inonzi Tracktown Studios. Doctor Mapfumo vaudza Studio 7 kuti panziyo gumi neshanu dzavainge vatsikisa, pakasara nziyo nhatu chete.
Dare repamusoro rakabvuma kuti mukuru wesangano reHeal Zimbabwe, VaRashid Mahiya vabvise mari yechibatiso kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo.
VaMahiya, avo vange vari mujere reChikurubi vanotarisirwa kubudiswa nemusi weChishanu mushure mekunge mapurisa ati havakwanisi kupedza kugadzirisa mapepa avo paine nguva.
Gweta raVaMahiya uye vachishanda neZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaTonderayi Bhatasara, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pamusoro pekubvisiswa mari yechibatiso inoita chiuru chemadhora eku America, dare rakatora gwaro raVaMahiya rekufambisa uye panodiwa mapepa emba yavo pamwe chete nekuti vaende kumapurisa kaviri pasvondo.
“Tatambira zvataurwa nedare nekuti chakakosha ndechekuti munhu asunungurwe, ambobuda mukuvharirwa,” VaBhatasara vakaudza Studio 7. Vanotizve, “Tikati gare gare tichadzokerazve kudare redzimhosva kuti mirawo yechibatiso chavo inyevenutswe.”
VaMahiya ndemumwe wevanhu vazhinji vakasungwa masvondo mashoma apfuura vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kupidigura hurumende zvisiri pamutemo mushure mekunge vanhu varatidzira vachiti havasi kufara nekukwidzwa kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari.
Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare, munyori mukuru musangano reZimbabwe Medical Association, VaSacrifice Chirisa, vati vatambira tsamba kubva kuna vana chiremba vakuru kana kuti ma consultant doctors yekuti vave kuzokandawo mapadza pasi kana hurumende isina kugadzirisa zvichemo zvana chiremba vadiki avo vari kuramwa mabasa.
VaChirisa, avo vanove zvakare chiremba mukuru, vati basa rawandira vana chiremba vakuru sezvo vana chiremba vadiki vave nemwedzi vachiramwa basa.
VaChirisa vati kuti vakwanise kuita basa ravo nemazvo, vanenge vachitoda vana chiremba vadiki vachishanda vari parutivi pavo.
VaChirisa vati chiri kunyanya kurwadza kutambudzika kuri kuita varwere muzvipatara zvehurumende sezvo vana chiremba vadiki vasiri kuenda kumabasa uye vana chiremba mazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu nevatatu vakambomiswawo basa zvichitevera danho rekuendesa vana chiremba ava kumatare rakatorwa nebhodhi rezvehutano reHealth Services Board.
Munyori mukuru musangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, VaMthabisi Anele Bhebhe, vatiwo havasi kufara nemashoko akataurwa nezuro nevakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, ekuti vana chiremba vadiki vachiri vana vechikoro.
VaChiwenga, avo vakadomwa nedare remakurukota ehurumende kuti vatungamire nhaurirano pakati pehurumende navana chiremba vari kuramwa mabasa ava, vakambodzinga vana mukoti mabasa mushure mekuramwa mabasa.
Zvavakaita izvi zvakashorwa nevakawanda avo vaiti VaChiwenga vaishandisa chisoja pazvinhu zvinoda nhaurirano.
Vana chiremba vadiki vanoti vari kuda kuti hurumende ivape michina yekushandisa muzvipatara, mishonga pamwe nembatya dzekuzvidzivirira kana vari pabasa pamwe nekuwedzerwa mari dzemihoro idzo dzavanoti dzakafanana nemutero wembwa.
Asi hurumende inotiwo homwe yayo yakabooka zvekuti haikwanise kuvawedzera mari.
Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi regurukora rezvehutano, VaObadiah Moyo, sezvo vabva vapinda mumusangano navana chiremba panguva yatanga toenda pamhepo.
Dare rinonzwa nyaya dzevashandi, re Labor Court, raramba kutambira chikumbiro chehurumende sezvo hurumende yanga isina kuunza magwaro akakwana panyaya yayo yairi kunetsana navanachiremba vasiri kuenda kubasa.
Gweta ranga rakamirira vanachiremba veZimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Association mudare reLabor Court, VaDoug Coltart, vati dare rati panga pasina mapepa akakwana kubva kuHealth Services Board, HSB, nokudaro nyaya iyi haikwanisi kunzwikwa zviri pamutemo.
Dare rati gweta reHSB riunze mapepa asipo aya mangwana, unova musi weChitatu.
Asi vana chiremba vatiwo kuendesana kumatare hazvisizvo zvinounza mari yekuti vakwanise kuenda kumabasa, nekudaro hazvigadzirisi dambudziko riripo.
Vakafanobata chigaro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Doctor Masimba Ndoro, vati basa ravo rinovasungira kuti vavepo mazuva ese nekudaro vanofanirwa kuwaniswa mari yekuti izvi zviitike.
Vana chiremba vadiki vakatanga kusaenda kumabasa musi wa3 Gunyana vachiti havana zvikwanisiro zvakakwana zvekuti vaende kumabasa.
Vana chiremba vakuru pasi peZimbabwe Senior Hospital Doctors' Association vakatangawo kusaenda kumabasa nemusi weChina chapfuura vachinyunyutawo nenyaya yemihoro pamwe nekushaya zvekushandisa zvakakwana muzvipatara.
Vana chiremba vakuru ava vanyorawo gwaro vachitsutsumwa nezvekutyityidzirwa kwavari kuita vakati hazvibatsiri kuti vana chiremba vave kuzvipatara kusina zvikwanisiro zvinoita kuti vachengetedze hupenyu hwevarwere.
Vana chiremba vashorawo hurumende vachiti mari yakawedzerwa nezvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana vachiti havana kubvumirana nazvo.
Zvichakadaro, mamwe madhokotera makuru maviri amiswa basa neUniversity of Zimbabwe pasina muhoro vachipomerwa mhosva yekubatana nevamwe kuramwa mabasa pamwe nekupesvedzera vamwe vavo kuti vasaende kubasa.
Vamiswa basa ava ndiDr. Bothwell Mbuvayesango, vanove nyanzvi mukuvhiya vana, pamwe naDr. David Chimuka, nyanzvi mukurapa chirwere chemoyo.
Dr. Mbuvayesangano vakaita mukurumbira munyika mushure mekubudirira kwavakaita kuopareta mapatya aive akaberekwa misoro yavo yakabatana muna 2014, ukuwo Dr. Chimuka vachizivikanwa nezvikuru munyaya dzekuopareta moyo.
Sangano reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights rashora zvikuru kumiswa basa kwaitwa basa Dr. Mbuvayesangano naDr. Chimuka.
Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuUniversity of Zimbabwe pamwe nekunzwa kudivi rehurumende nezviri kuitika izvi munyaya dzehutano.
