VaChitando vati Zimbabwe inofungidzirwa kuti ine marasha anosvika mabhiriyoni makumi maviri nemashanu ematani asi pagore kuri kucherwa matani ari pakati pemamiriyoni maviri nemamiriyoni matatu.
VaChitando vatiwo India ndiyo inotenga marasha akawanda pagore zvichienzaniswa nedzimwe nyika.
Vachitaura pamusangano mumweyo, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vati Zimbabwe inofanirwa kutora mukana wekudyidzana wakanaka uripo pakati payo neIndia.
Studio7 haina kukwanisa kuziva kuti kambani yeVictoria Consulting yakamboshanda nenyika dzipi, uye kuti vakuru vayo ndivanani.
Asi vaimbove mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvezvicherwa muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, VaGift Chimanikire, vati havaoni kuti zvakanaka kuti Zimbabwe itsvage misika yekutengesera marasha kunze kwenyika, ipo pari zvino kusiri kucherwa marasha anokwana munyika.
Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vatiwo havaoni zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe itsvake kambani yekunze inonotsvakira Zimbabwe misika yemarasha.
VaMuchichwa vatiwo zviri nani kuti kushandiswe hukama hwagara huripo nedzimwe nyika.
Dandemudande rebazi rezvezvicherwa rinoti Zimbabwe ine marasha akanaka, uye ine nzvimbo makumi maviri nepfumbamwe dzine marasha.
Makambani maviri chete munyika, Hwange Colliery neMakomo Resources, ndiwo ari kunyanyochera marasha.

Vapihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso nemutongi wedare remajisitireti, Amai Bianca Makwande, vatevedzeri vaviri vaVaChamisa; VaTendai Biti naAmai Lynett Karenyi Kore; munyori anoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, Muzvare Gladys Hlatywayo; mutevedzeri wemunyori wezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nenyika, VaLovemore Chinoputsa; nhengo yeNational Standing Committee, uye vari mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru webato, VaDavid Chimhini naAmai Vongai Tome.
Vanhu ava vanzi vabvise mari inoita chiuru chemadhora pamunhu zvichitevera kusungwa kwavakaitwa nezuro zvichitevera gakava riripo panyaya yemuzinda weMDC weMorgan Tsvangirai House.
Amai Makwande vati vasungwa ava vazodzoke kudare musi wa 24 Chikunguru uye kuti vagare pamakero avakanyoresa kumapurisa kudzamara nyaya yavari kupomerwa yapera kutongwa.
Vachitaura neStudio7 mushure memutongo uyu, rimwe regweta evatanhatu ava, VaAlec Muchadehama, vati dare ratiwo vanhu vavari kumirira vasakanganise kuferefetwa kwenyaya iyi.
VaMuchadehama vatiwo kunyangwe hazvo vatanhatu ava nezuro vaipomherwa mhosva yekukonzera musindo pasi pemutemo we Criminal Law (Codification and Reform) Act, vasungwa ava vange vambouya kumatare mangwanani vakadzorerwa kumapurisa uko kwazonowedzerwa mhosva yekutyora mutemo une chekuita nekudzivirirwa kwechirwere cheCOVID-19.
Magweta evatanhatu ava anyunyutawo kudare nemabatirwo avanoti akaitwa vasungwa.
VaMuchadehama vati vasungwa ava havana kuchengetedzwa zvakanaka zvaiita kuti vasabatirire kana kutapurira vamwe chirwere cheCOVID-19 pavaive muhusungwa.
Mutungamiri webato iri, VaNelson Chamisa, vati vacharamba vachirwira shanduko munyika zvisinei nekusungwa kuri kuitwa nhengo dzavo
Amai Makwande varamba kuti mutevedzeri wemutauriri wevechidiki mubato iri, VaWomberaishe Nhende, avo vari kurapwa mune chimwe chipatara, vasarambe vari muhusungwa.
VaNhende vanonzi vakakuvara nezuro apo vakasungwa ndokubva vaendeswa kuchipatara.
Mune imwe nyaya yanga iri mumatare, Zimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights inoti mupurisa akasungwa mushure mekufananidza mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nekondomu rakashandiswa, amiswawo mutare akabvisiswa mari yechibatiso inoita mazana matatu emadhora.
Mupurisa uyu, Shungudzemoyo Kache, achatongwawo achibva kumba kwake.
Mukuru weProphetic Healing and Deliverance (PHD) Ministries, VaWalter Magaya, vari kuramba vakaomesa musoro panyaya yavakasungirwa muZimbabwe vachiti vava kushanda nedzimwe nyika kuitira kuti vakwanise kuparura mushonga weAguma uyo wavanoti unorapa HIV/AIDS, gomarara nezvimwe.
Vachitaura neStudio7 kumucheto kwemunamato wavakaita mudhorobha reFrancistown muBotswana neChitatu manheru, VaMagaya vakati havazi kuzodzokera shure nehurongwa hwavo hwakavakasungisa nemapurisa muna Mbudzi 2018 mushure mekushambadza kuti vakanga wana mushonga unorapa HIV/AIDS.
Mushure mekubvuma mhosva yekushambadza zvisiri pamutemo kuti vawana mushonga unorapa HIV/AIDS, VaMagaya vakabhadhariswa faindi yemazana manomwe emadhora ekuAmerica muna Kukadzi gore rakapera.
Asi zvakaitika izvi hazvina kuodza VaMagaya moyo, avo vakaudza Studio7 kuti vari mubishi kushanda nedzimwe nyika dzavasina kuda kudoma idzo vakati dziri kuona mushonga weAguma uri mhinduro kudambudziko reHIV/AIDS.
VaMagaya vakati HIV/AIDS yanetsa muAfrica, nokudaro inoda kuti nyika dzose dziise misoro pamwe chete mukutsvaga mhinduro kudambudziko iri.
VaMagaya vakati vakaona zvakakodzera kuti vashande nedzimwe nyika nokuti Zimbabwe haina chivimbo chokuti mushonga uyu ungapedza matenda anetsa munyika.
Asi pamutongo wakapihwa VaMagaya muZimbabwe, kambani yavo yeAretha Medical Company, yakawanikwa isina kunyoresa neMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe, uye inonzi haina kupihwa mvumo neHealth Professions Authority kuti iite tsagiridzo dzekuona kuti mushonga weAguma unoshanda here kana kuti kwete.
Mumwe chiremba pachipatara chakazvimirira chega muFrancistown, VaSengaphi Khuzwayo, vashora VaMagaya vachiti munhu ari kutsvaga mari.
VaMagaya vakambokonzeresa mutauro munyika mushure mekunge vasungwa nemhosva yekubata mumwe mudzimai chibharo, asi nyaya iyi yakazoraswa nedare redzimhosva mushure mekunge mumhangari abvisa nyaya iyi zviri pamutemo.
Kushaikwa kwavana chiremba muzvipatara zvehurumende kwave kuisa hupenyu hwemadzimai akazvitakura panjodzi kana vakaita dambudziko sezviri kuitika pachipatara chikuru chemuChinhoyi.

Muzvare Sibanda vanoti mwana wavo, uyo anga,asati asvika nguva yekuzvarwa, akafira mudumbu pavakauya nemusiwe Chipiri, asi hapana chiremba akavayamura vachiti vakatozoyamurwawo nemumwe mukoti uyo akaita kuti mwana abude akafa.
Muzvare Sibanda vanoti dambudziko guru rave rekuti vasukwe chibereko chavo zvekuti vakanonokerwa sezvavari kuitwa, zvinogona kuvhiringa hutano hwavo.
Muzvare Sibanda vanoti vari kusangana nedambudzikowo rekushaya mvura zvekuti zvimbudzi zvepachipatara ichi hazvichapindika uye vave kutochingidzira mvura inenge ichinaya.

VaZindoga vanoti vakatohaya motokari kubva kuKariba kuuya kuChinhoyi mufambo une makiromita mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumirawo zvakanaka pachipatara chemuKariba.

Sangano re Cancer Association of Zimbabwe rinokurudzira veruzhinji kuti vawongororwe gomarara rezamhu pachine nguva uye chirwere ichi chisati chakomba.
Vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvishanu vari kubatwa nezvirwere zvakasiyana siyana zvegomarara pagore rega rega muZimbabwe, asi vazhinji vacho vanozoona vana chiremba chirwere ichi chakomba.

Chikwata chenyika chenhabvu chemaWarriors chasimuka chakananga kuSouth Africa kumakundano eCosafa.
Chikwata ichi chakatarisana nehondo mbiri mumakwikwi eCosafa Cup neye Africa Cup of Nations, ayo chinofanira kukunda zvine mutsindo kutanga neCosafa Cup neMugovera.
Pamusoro pekushandisa Cosafa Cup segadziriro yeAfcon, Zimbabwe inofanira zvekare kudzivivira mukombe uyu, uyo yakatora kechitanhatu gore rapera, ichitarisira kusimbisa zita rayo seshasha yenhabvu kuchamhembe kweAfrica zvekare gore rino.
Nemhaka yekushaikwa kwemari, Zimbabwe haina kukwanisa kuwana zvikwata zvekutamba nazvo mitambo yekuedzana masimba makundano eAfcon asati atanga zvekuti murairidzi wemaWarriors, Sunday Chidzambwa, ari kuti Cosafa ndiyo yatove nzira yekusimbisa chikwata chake.
Chidzambwa ari kudawo kuwedzera mbiri yake mumakwikwi eCosafa mushure mekuve murairidzi wekutanga kutora mukombe uyu kanokwana kana kubvira makundano aya avambwa muna 1997.
Chidzambwa akatora mukombe weCosafa Cup muna 2003, 2009, 2017 na 2018.

Hapana chimwe chiri kutarisirwa neveruzhinji kunze kwekukunda apo maMighty Warriors ari kupinda munhandare yeRufaro Stadium neSvondo mumutambo wavo mukuru kupinda yose kubvira muna 1980 apo Zimbabwe yakatanga kukwikwidza mune zvemitambo nedzimwe nyika.
Chikwata chenhabvu chevanhukadzi ichi chiri kusangana nemaIndomitable Lionesses ekuCameroon mumutambo ucharatidza kuti Zimbabwe iri kukwanisa kubudirira here kana kuti kwete kuenda kumakundano makuru ezvemitambo epasi rose emaOlympic Games ayo achaitirwa kuRio de Janeiro gore rinouya.
MaMighty Warriors akarohwa 2-1 apo zvikwata zviviri izvi zvakasangana muYaounde masvondo maviri apfuura asi vari kungoda kukunda 1-0 chete kuti vabudirire kuenda kumabiko emitambo epasi rose aya.

Asi maMighty Warriors anopinda munhoroondo sechikwata chekutanga kukwikwidza nekubudirira kuenda kumakundano aya sezvo mahockey girls akaenda kuMoscow mushure mekukokwa zvikwata zvashota kukwikwidza.

Panguva imwe cheteyo chikwata chemaWarriors chichange chiri muBabourfields Stadium umo chiri kusangana neLesotho mumutambo weAfrica Nations Championship uyo une huremu husingasvika pane mutambo wemaMighty Warriors.
Murairidzi wechikwata ichi, Kalisto Pasuwa, akadzinga vatambi vatatu Hardlife Zvirekwi na Justice Jangano veCaps United pamwe naRonald Chitiyo weDynamos nenyaya dzehunhubu asi VaMuroyiwa vanoti kunyange zvakadai maWarriors haamise tuzvikwata tudiki twakaita seLesotho.
MaWarrriors ari kutarisira kukunda mumitambo miviri iri kusangana zvikwata zviviri izvi kuti akwanise kuenda kumafainari eAfrica Nations Championships kechina kakateverana mushure mekuenda kumakundano a2009, 2012, na 2014.
Asi maziso nepfungwa dzeveruzhinji dziri pamutambo wemaMighty Warriors.

Masuku aive mwana wechina mumba maive nevana vanomwe.
Akaenda kuSouth Africa ave nemakore gumi nemaviri, uko akanotanga kuimba achiri mwana wechikoro.
Panguva iyi ndipo akatanga kufarira musambo weJazz.
Ava nemakore gumi nematanhatu, akasiya chikoro ndokunoimba nechikwata chaPhilemon Mogotsi che African Ink Sports, icho chairidza chiri muDurban.
Asi haana kugara kwenguva yakareba nechikwata ichi muDurban zvichitevera kusungwa kwaakaitwa ndokudzoserwa kuJohannesburg nehurumende yerusarura ganda yaitonga South Africa munguva iyi.
Nepamusana pekunetswa nehurumende yechichena mu South Africa, Masuka akatiza munyika iyi achidzokera kuBulawayo, uko akanoshanda nechikwata che Golden Rhythm Crooners.
Nekupindana kwemakore, Masuka akabatana naHugh Masekela naMiriam Makeba vachiimba musambo weJazz vari kunze kweSouth Africa.
Muna 1961, Masuka akakokwa kunoimbira VaPatrice Lumumba kuDemocratic Republic of Congo. Izvi hazvina kufadza hurumende yevachena muSouth Africa, izvo zvakaita kuti Masuka asatsike gumbo rake muSouth Africa kwemakore makumi matatu nerimwe.
Panguva iyi Masuku akashanda ari munyika dzinoti Malawi, Tanzania neZambia, asi nguva zhinji yake aive muZambia, akazodzokera kuSouth Africa muna 1992 zvichitevera kuburitswa mujeri kwaVaNelson Mandela.
Muna 1990 Masuka akaburitsa dambarefu rakanetsa zvikuru rinonzi Pata Pata.

Vanhu vatatu vakafa vari munharaunda dzakasiyana siyana vamwe vaviri vakafa vari munzvimbo dzinochengeterwa vanenge vabatwa nechirwere ichi.
Vanhu vaabatwa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino vanosvika mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi masere nevashanu kana kuti 985. Izvi zvinotevera kubatwa kwevamwe vanhu vatatu nechirwere ichi nezuro. Pavanhu ava, vaviri vakabva kuSouth Africa uye mumwe akachitapurirwa munyika.
Harare ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vanosvika mazana maviri nemakumi masere nemasere kana kuti 288 ichiteverwa neBulawayo ine vanhu zana nemakumi masere nevatatu 183, Mashonaland Central ndiyo ine vanhu vashoma vabatwa nechirwere ichi vanova gumi nemumwe.
Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vanosvika mazana matatu nemakumi maviri kana kuti 320. Vanhu vavhenekwa chirwere ichi munyika vadarika zviuru makumi masere nezvisere kana kuti 88 000.

Zvibodzwa zvakabva kuna Simba Nhivi naRonald Chitiyo zvakapa Makepekepe kuti akunde mushure mekunge Lioli yambotungamira mumutambo wakanakidza zvikuru kunyange hazvo usina kuunganidza vanhu vakawanda muNational Sports Stadium.
Mutevedzeri wemurairidzi weCaps United, Fungai Kwashi, anoti maGreen Machine aikodzera kukunda mumutambo uyu achitarisa iye mikana yakawandisa yavakabika.
Asi Kwashi anoti havana kufadzwa nemaitiro evatsigiri vezvimwe zvikwata kunyanya veDynamos avo vainyomba vatambi veCaps United apo vaitamba.

Zvakamira zvakadai, Ngezi Platinum Stars iri kuitawo mabiko mushure mekunge chikwata ichi chakarova Pamplemouses yekuMauritius 1-0 ndokuenderera mberi nemakundano eCaf Confederation Cup, 2-1 mumitambo miviri.
Ngezi Platinum Stars iyo iri kutamba muAfrica kekutanga yave kusangana ne CD Libolo yekuAngola munharaunda inotevera umo varikutarisira kukunda zvekare.
Murairidzi weNgezi Platinum Stars, Tonderayi Ndiraya, anoti anovimba kuti vatambi vake vacharamba vakadaro kusvika makundano aya asvika kwamvura yacheka makumbo.

Sangano reWomen of Dominion riinoti rine hurongwa hwekuti riwanire mushonga vanhu vanorarama nehusope muZimbabwe. Mishonga iyi yakanangana nekudzivirira kuti vanorarama nehusope vasaite chiwere chegomarara.
Women of Dominion inounza pamwe chete madzimai ari mumakereke akasiyana siyana muAmerica nemuZimbabwe uye rinoita misangano kamwe chete pagore. Gore rino musangano uyu wakaitirwa kuDelaware.
Vachitaura pamucheto wemusangano uyu, vanowona nezvekufambiswa kwezvirongwa mugungano remadzimai iri, Doctor Natsai Zhou vanoti sangano ravo riri kushanda nevamwe vanamazvikokota munyika kuitira kuti pawanikwe mishonga inobatsira vanorarama nehusope inoshanda uye ichitengeka nyore.
Mubatanidzwa uyu wakange uri wemazuva mana wakaipindwa nemadzimai emuZimbabwe anobva muAmerica, Canada, Britain nevashoma vakabva kuZimbabwe kwekare.
“Taimbo kurudzira kuti madzimai anouya kumisangano yedu vaunze mishonga, nguwani dzekupfeka nemagirazi ekudzivirira zuva. Asi parizvino tirikuona kuti mishonga iyi haisi kunyatso batsira vanorarama nehusope. Shuwiro yedu ndeyekuti titsvage vanogadzira mishonga iyi kumusha kuitira kuti mitengo idzike uye kuti tigadzirise zvinoenderana nemararamiro anoita vanorarama nehusope munyika,” Doctor Zhou vaudza Studio 7.
Mumwe mudzimai anorarama nehusope amai Spelile Machingamidze vanoti mishonga iriko parizvino iri kudhura. Vanoti danho iri rakanaka zvikuru sezvo richabatsira kuti nyanzvi dzemunyika dzikwanise kugadzira mafuta anoenderana navo asingadure asi zvizhinji zvinozoda kuti zviitwe kuti mafuta aya anyatsoshanda kwavari.
Amai Spelile Machingamidze vanorarama nehusope vanoti parizvino mishonga inonyatsokuvabatsira irikudhura uye inogadzirwa munyika ichirikuda kuti inyatsogadziriswa kuti ishande zvakanaka.
"Tinotambira danho ririkuda kutorwa nesangano reWomen Of Dominion International iri nekuti vakakwanisa kuwana vanogadzira mishonga iyi zvine hunyanzvi zvinokwanisa kuti batsira zvakanyanya." Amai Machingamidze vakaudza Studio 7.
Sangano rePremier Soccer League, PSL,rinoti riri kuda kushandura nguva inotanga mitambo yenhabvu munyika sezvinoitwa kune dzimwe nyika dzinotanga mutambo uyu muna Nyamavhuvhu.
Kwemakore makumi mana nhabvu yemuZimbabwe yanga ichiramba kuita shanduko ichitanga mitambo muna Kurume kusvika muna Mbudzi kwete kutanga muna Nyamavhuvhu kusvika muna Chivabvu sezvinongoitwawo kune dzimwe nyika pasi rese.
Asi vanoziva zviri kuitika muPSL vanoti chirwere cheCoronavirus ndicho chamanikidza shanduko mumaitiro aya zvekuti vanotungamira gungano iri vari kuda kuti mitambo yemuno itevere nzira yemitambo yepasi rese kutanga mwaka uno.
Zvikwata zvakatopedza kunyoresa vatambi vazvo vemwaka uno nePSL neChipiri kugadzirira kuzotanga kwemitambo.
Mukuru wekumahofisi ePSL, VaKennedy Ndebele, vanoti vari kutarisa nzira dzese dzinokwanisa kuti mitambo itambwe kusanganisira kutanga muna Nyamavhuvhu.
Asi VaNdebele vabuda pachena kuti pari zvino havakwanise kubuda nechisungo chakasimba chekutanga kwemitambo iyi sezvo pasina anoziva kuti Coronavirus iyi ichatisvitsa kupi.
Muna 1997 vePSL vakamboda kuita kuti mitambo iyi itange muna Nyamavhuvhu ichipera muna Chivabvu, asi zvakakona nekuti dzinhandare dzemuno dzaive dzisina zvekudhonzesa mvura zvakakwana kana kuchinge kwanaya.
Asi dzinhandare dziri kugadziriswa dzichitarisirwa kuve dzapera muna Nyamavhuvhu.
VaNdebele vanoti vachaita musangano sekanzuru yePSL kana zvinhu zvichinge zvajeka nezvechirwere ichi kuona kuti mitambo vanoifambisa sei.
Nhabvu pamwe nemimwe mitambo yese yakambomiswa nemhaka yeCoronavirus izvo zviri kunzi nemuteveri wemutambo uyu, VaJustice Muzanenhamo, zvinobatsira kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire.
Vachitarisa matengerwo anga achiitwa vatambi nezvikwata, muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu, VaKelvin Mushonga, vanoti mitambo ichanakidza zvikuru apo ichatanga.
PSL yakamirira kunzwa kune vanoipa mari veDelta Beverages kuti makwikwi emwaka uno achange aine mari yakawanda zvakadii.
Chikwata cheFC Platinum chirikuvhura makundano enhabvu egore rino asi paine mibvunzo.
Vanotevera mutambo wenhabvu havasi kugutsikana nematambiro arikuita FC Platinum pamusha payo mumitambo yeCaf Champions League vakatarisana nemutambo mukuru neOrlando Pirates yekuSouth Africa iyo yakatora mukombe uyu muna 1995.
Nhoroondo yenhabvu muAfrica inotaura kuti zvikwata zvinokunda nemutsindo pamusha ndizvo zvinowanzoenderera mberi nemakundano asi matambiro eKugona Kunenge Kudada muMandava Stadium asimudza mibvunzo mumukana wavo wekusvika kuma kota fainari.
FC Platinum yakatatarika zvinotyisa neCnaps yekuMadagascar ndokuzokunda 1-0 mumutambo uyo vaitarisirwa kukanda zvibodzwa pamadiro, ndokuzoita zvekare mangange 0-0 ne Otoyo Oho yekuCongo.
Muteveri wenhabvu VaFrancis Mwendamberi vanoti Kugona Kunenge Kudada inofanira kuwedzera mwando pamatambiro ayo pamusha kana ichida kubudirira mumakwikwi aya.
Pamusoro peOrlando Pirates, FC Platinum iri mugungano rimwechete ne Esperance yekuTunisia iyo ine mukombe uyu pamwe ne Horoya yeku Guinea.
Zvikwata zviviri zvinopedza zviri pamusoro mugungano iri ndizvo zvinoenderera mberi nemakwikwi aya.
Muteveri wechikwata cheDynamos VaObert Masvotore vanoti FC Platinum isatarise mazita kana mukurumbira une zvikwata zvavari kusangana nazvo.
Mumwe muteveri wemutambo uyu VaTatenda Makazhu ndivo vanofunga kuti Kugona Kunenge Kudada inokwanisa kusvika mufainari yemakundano aya.
Asi murairidzi wePirates Milutin Sredojevic audza mapepanhau ekuSouth Africa kuti ari kutya kutamba nechikwata cheFC Platinum nenyaya yekuti chikwata chitsva mumakundano aya uye ati anoremekedza murairidzi wacho Norman Mapeza zvakanyanya.
Ati sezvo Pirates iri kutamba neFC Platinum mumutambo wekutanga kuMandava Stadium kuZvishavane, zvinonetsa zvikuru kuenda iko nemugwagwa.
Asi Pirates iri kubheja kuti inosimudza mukomb weChampions League kechipiri munhoroondo yayo.
Asi FC Platinum ichange isina mutambi akatamba zvinonwisa mvura mwaka uno kana kuti Soccer Star of the Year, Rodwell Chinyengetere, uyo ave kuenda kunotambira Baroka FC ku South Africa naWinston Mhango uyo arikuenda kuSouth Africa zvekare.
Kugona Kuenge Kudada irikutarisira kusvika kana kudarika chidanho chakasvikwa neDynamos iyo yakasvika mufainari yeCaf Champions League muna 1998 nemuma semi finari muna 2008.

Mutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaDonald Trump, vari kuNew York, uko kuri kuitwa mhemberero huru, uye vaisawo maruva muMadison Square kuremekedza vakarwa hondo ava.
Zuva remagamba iri rinocherechedzwa musi wa11 Mbudzi gore roga-roga zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi zvichitenda magamba anodarika mamiriyoni gumi nemapfumbamwe akarwa muhondo dzakasiyanasiyana nenzira dzakasiyanasiyana.
Pazuva iri vamwe vezvitoro vanoderedza mitengo yezvinhu zvavo kana vachitengesera vakarwa hondo kana vakamboshanda muchiuto, vamwewo vezvitoro vachicherechedza kusanganisira vachiri muchiuto.
Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muno muAmerica, Doctor Wangu Mazodze, avo vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, vanoti nyika yeAmerica inokoshesa magamba ayo zvakanyanya zvichienzaniswa neZimbabwe.
Doctor Mazodze vanoti musiyano mukuru uri pakuti kuZimbabwe vakarwa hondo yerusununguko vakaiswa muhapwa dzevezvematongerwo enyika zvekuti vave kushandiswa nevemapato ezvematongerwo enyika, asi ukatarisa muAmerica, vakarwa hondo vese vanomirira nyika, kwete mapato ezvematongerwo enyika.
Dzimba dzakavakwa nebazi reUnited States Centers for Disease Control and Prevention riri muZimbabwe, pachishandiswa homwe ye United States President's Emergency Plan for AIDS and Relief (PEPFAR), dziri kupa mukana wekuti vanhu vaongororwe zvine chiremera ropa ravo kana riine hutachiona hweHIV.
Bazi re Centers for Disease Control riri kuita chirongwa ichi rakabatana nebazi rezvehutano. Dzimba idzi dzinonzi muchirungu Porta Cabins dzakavakirwa kuwanisa makirinika nzvimbo dzakasununguka dzekuvheneka ropa kuti rionekwe kuti rine HIV here kana kuti kwete.
Nhepfenyuro yeStudio7 yakashanyira chimwe chipatara chekanzuru cheAmaveni muKwekwe icho chinova chezvimwe zvezvipatara zvakavakirwa zvivakwa izvi.
Mumwe wevana mukoti vari pachipatara cheAmaveni apa, Amai PatriciaTendai Shumba, vanoti kubva pakavakwa ma cabin aya, huwandu hwevanhu vari kuoongororwa ropa hwawedzera.
Mumwe wevanamukoti pakirinika yeAmaveni iyi, avo vakaongorora ropa rameya weKwekwe, VaMatenda Madzoke, pamberi pevatori venhau senzira yekukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vaongororwe ropa ravo, Amai Loice Chikono, vanoti vanhu vasatya kuongororwa ropa ravo sezvo kwave nemapiritsi anoraramisa veruzhinji.
VaMadzoke vanoti kuvakwa kwema cabin uku kuri kubatsira zvikuru vagari vemuguta ravo. Vanotiwo kuvakwa kwezvivakwa izvi kunzvimbo yakavandika kunopawo mukana kune avo vanonyara kuonekwa neruzhinji vachivhenekwa ropa kana kutora mapiritsi.
VaMadzoke vanotiwo pamakirinika mashanu ekanzuru ari muguta reKwekwe, maviri ndiwo chete ane ma cabin aya. Vanotiwo shuviro yavo ndeyekuti makirinika eguta ravo ese awane pakasununguka pekuongororera vanhu ropa.
Padandemudande rayo, muzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe unoti pasi pechirongwa ichi kwakavakwa ma porta cabins zana nemakumi mana munzvimbo dzakasiyasiyana munyika.
Zimbabwe, sedzimwe nyika pasi rese, iri kurwisawo kupedza dambidziko reHIV/AIDS panosvika gore ra2030.
Magwaro akabudiswa neZIMSTAT muna 2015 anoratidza kuti huwandu hwevanhu vane neHIV/AIDS hwuri kudzikira munyika.
Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakadomwa nesangano reWorld Health Organisation, WHO, semunyarikani achange akamirira Africa munyaya dzezvirwere zvisingatapuriranwe, kana kuti non communicable diseases.
VaMugabe, avo vane makore makumi mapfumbamwe nematu, vakadomwa mazuva maviri apfuura pamusangano uri kuitirwa ku Uruguay.
VaMugabe vakaenda kumusangano uyu vachiperekedzwa negurukota nezvekunze, VaWalter Mzembi, gurukota rezvehutano, VaDavid Parirenyatwa, pamwe nemamwe makurokota ehurumende.
Vachitaura vari kuUruguay, VaMzembi vaudza Studio7 kuti ichokwadi kuti VaMugabe vadomwa semunyarikani izvo zviri kufadza nyika.
"Ichokwadi VaMugabe vawana ruremekedzo rwekuve, WHO Ambassador for NCD's, Africa," VaMzembi vaudza Studio7.
VaMugabe vachange vari pachinzvimbo ichi kwemakore maviri, uye basa iri haribhadharwe mari.
Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti dziri kushamiswa nezvaitwa neWHO zvekudoma mutungamiri ari kukundikana kugadzirisa nyaya dzehutano munyika make izvo zviri kupa kuti vakuru vakuru muZimbabwe varapwe kunze kwenyika.
VaMugabe pachavo vanogara vachibuda munyika vachinorapwa kuSingapore.
Mumwe mutongi wedare reHigh Court muBulawayo apa mutongo wekuti mapurisa anofanirwa kuunza kudare mukati memazuva matatu anotevera VaTawanda Muchehiwa avo vasingaziikanwe kuti varipi mushure mekunge vasungwa nemapurisa nemusi weChina.  Mutongi wedare reHigh Court, Justice Martin Makonese, vapa mutongo uyu zvichitevera chikumbiro chechimbi-chimbi chaitwa negweta, VaNqobani Sithole, chekuti mapurisa aunze VaMuchehiwa kudare.  VaMuchehiwa muzukuru wemutapi wenhau Mduduzi Mathuthu uyo ari kudiwa nemapurisa.

VaSithole vati dzimwe hama mbiri idzi dzave kumba mushure mekuregerwa nemapurisa.

Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vati pane nhengo dzavo dzine chitsama dzakasungwa munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana munyika mose nezuro iro raive zuva rakange rakarongwa kuratidzira munyika mose.  VaHlatywayo vatiwo vamwe vanhuwo zvavo vakashungurudzwa kana kurohwa nemapurisa nevechiuto munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana munyika.  Tabata mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, kuti tinwe kuti kune vanhu vangani vakasungwa munyika nezuro uye kuti kune vakamhang’ara here kuti vakarohwa nemapurisa nemasoja vakati tizovafonera mushure mekanguva.
Patazoedza kunzwa kwavari zvekare nharembozha yavo yange isingachabatike.
Mune imwewo nyaya kunyange hazvo vanhu vange vari vashoma pane mamwe mazuva, nhasi zvitoro, mabhangi, nemamwe mabhizimisi zvange zvakavhura vanhu vachiita mabasa avo semazuva ose uye mudhorobha mange muine masoja nemapurisa mashoma.  Mumwe mugari anotengesa mune chimwe chitoro chinotengesa zvekudya kusanganisira muriwo nezvimwe zvirimwa, uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Amai Tanaka, ati akwanisa kuuya kubasa pasina kunetseka.  Mumwewo mugari uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti James, uyo anotengesa muriwo nezvimwe pamusika wemuna Fifth Avenue ati akwanisawo kupinda mudhorobha pasina kunetseka kunyange hazvo kwange kuine maroadblock mumugwagwa waanoshandisa kupinda mudhorobha.
Sangano re 31st July Movement rakanga rakurudzira kuti vanhu vapinde mumigwagwa vachiratidzira nezuro, asi murongi wekuratidzira uku, VaJacob Ngarivhume, vakabva vasungwa ndokunyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso.
Chikumbiro chekuti vapihwe mukana uyu chava kuknzwikwa nedare repamusoro nemusi weMuvhuro.
Mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vari kukurudzira kuti munyika muitwe hurukuro dzekuyedza kugadzirisa nyaya yehupfumi nezvematongerwo enyika izvo zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyika.
Vachitaura neStudio7 neMuvhuru, VaTsvangirai vati rwendo rwuno vanoda kuti nhaurirano idzi dzive chete dzevana veZimbabwe pasina vavakidzani kana vamwe vekunze vanopindira.
VaTsvangirai vati vana veZimbabwe vanofanirwa kugara pasi vega pasina veSADC, African Union neUnited Nations vanenge vachipindira votaurirana chokwadi chinofanirwa kuitwa.
VaTsvangirai, avo vakanga vari muhurumende yemubatanidzwa neZanu PF kwemakore mashanu vanoti zviri pachena kuti Zanu PF yakundikana zvayakavimbisa musarudzo nokudaro zvizvarwa zvenyika zvinofanirwa kuchigara pasi zvozeya gwara rekutora.
VaTsvangirai, avo vaiva mutungamiri wehurumende asina masimba muhurumende yemubatanidzwa vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvinhu zvose munyika kubva kudzidzo kusvika kuhupfumi.
Asi mutauriri weZanu-PF, VaRugare Gumbo, vanoti hapana chiri kunetsa munyika chingape kuti hurumende ye Zanu-PF igare pasi nemapato anopikisa kuti vagadzirise.
Asi VaTsvangirai vanoti vanhu vose vavari kutaura navo vari kubvuma kuti vanoda kuti vatungamiri vezvematongerwo enyika vaite mubatira pamwe chuma chemuzukuru padambudziko rakatarisana nenyika.
Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti kunyange hazvo mitengo yezvinhu yadzikira munyika, vanhu havana mari yekuti vatenge zvinhu izvi.
Gavhuna vebhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe Doctor John Mangudya vanoti Zimbabwe haisi kuzobatabata mari dzinobva kunze kwenyika uye vari kurwisa kudzikisa kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu.
Vachitura hurongwa hwekufambiswa kwemari kana kuti Monetary Policy Statement, Doctor Mangudya vati hurumende haina chidokwadokwa chekubatabata mari dzinotumirwa kubva kunze kwenyika, uye vati vanenge vatumirwa mari idzi vakasununguka kuita zvavanoda nadzo.
VaMangudya vatiwo vari kushandawo kuona kuti mitengo yezvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana hairambi ichikwira, vachiti panozopera gore vari kutarisira kuti inflation inge yadzika kusvika pazvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana.
Gavhuna vebhanga guru ava vatiwo vari kufadzwa nerwendo rwatorwa nenyika mukuzvirumura kubva mukushandisa madhora ekuAmerica.
VaMangudya vati zvinotora makore kuti nyika ibude mukushandisa mari yekunze kwenyika uye hazvigoneki nenguva pfupi. Vati pari zvino zvikamu makumi matatu nezvinomwe kubva muzana zvemari iri mumabhanga imari yekunze asi zvikamu makumi matanhatu nezvitatu kubva muzana yave mari yemuno.
VaMangudya vati vanotarisira kuti mari dzekunze dziri mumabhanga dzirambe dzichiderera zvishoma nezvishoma.
Imwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, VaPersistance Gwanyanya, yaudza Studio 7 kuti panoda kushandwa zvakanyanya kuti zvishuviro zvebhanga guru zvekuona kuti mitengo yadzika zvazadzikiswa.
VaGwanyanya vabvumiranawo naVaMangudya kuti zvinoda makore kuti Zimbabwe izonyatsoti yabuda mukushandisa mari yekunze kwenyika.
Imwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vari nhengo yeMDC, VaTapiwa Mashakada, vatiwo kusabatwabatwa kwe mari dzevanhu dzinobva kunze ndizvo zvinototarisirwa, sezvo bumbiro remitemo yenyika risingazvibvumidzi kuita izvi. Vati RBZ inofanirwa kuramba ichiremekedza izvi.
Asi VaMashakada vati havaoni hurumende ichibudirira mukudzikisa mitengo yezvinhu nekuda kwekuchinjiwa kwemari mumigwagwa, vachiti maonero avo ndeekuti mitengo icharamba ichikwira.
Kunyangwe hazvo mabhanga nevanemarezinesi ekuita izvi vari ivo vanofanirwa kuchinja mari pamutemo, vanhu vazhinji vanonochinja mari dzavo dzekunze kwenyika mumigwagwa nekuti vanowana mari yakawanda kudarika yavanopiwa mumabhanga.
VaMangudya vati mitengo yezvinhu iri kunyanyokwidzwa nemafungiro everuzhinji, kunyanya vachitoredzera zvakamboitika, asi vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vachitarisa zvemberi kwete shure kwakabviwa.
Sechave chigariro musoro wetsuro kushaya nyanga, mutengo wemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari wakwidzwa zvakare kutanga munyika yose.
Boka rinoongorora pamwe nekutara mitengo yemafuta edzimotokari, reZimbabwe Energy Regulatory Authority, ZERA, rakazivisa neSvondo usiku kuti mutengo wemafuta uyu unenge uchizosiyana zvichienderana nemadhorobha nemaguta, uchidhurisisa kunzvimbo dziri kure.
Semuenzaniso, peturu muHarare yakwira kubva paRTGS$ 9.12 kuenda paRTGS$10.01 parita, dhiziri richikwirawo kubva paRTGS$9.36 kuenda paRTGS$10.32 parita.
Asi mitengo iyi yakasiyana nemitengo yekuBulawayo sezvo rita repeturu rave kutengeswa nemari inoita $RTGS10.39, kuchitiwo dhiziri richiita $RTGS10.69 parita.
Mitengo yekuVictoria Falls ndiyo inenge iri pamusorosoro munyika yose sezvo rita redhiziri rakwidzwa kuenda paRTGS$10.86 parita, kuchitiwo peturu yave kuita RTGS$10.56 parita.
ZERA yazivisa kuti mitengo iyi yasiyaniswa pachitariswa mutengo wekusvitsa mafuta aya kunzvimbo dzakasiyanasiyana idzi.
Vemichovha inotakura veruzhinji vanoti mitengo iyi ichavaomesera zvikuru sezvo ivo vachamanikidzwa kukwidzawo mari dzinoripirwa nevanhu vanenge vachifamba zvichienderana nekuti vanenge vachienda kunzvimbo dzipi.
Munyori anoona nezvemabasa musangano revemichovha reGreater Harare Association of Commuter Omnibus Operators, VaCaleb Dominic Bepeta, vanoti chiri kunetsa ndechekuti mitengo iri kungokwira asi mihoro yevanhu vavanotakura isina kwairi kuenda.
Zimbabwe yabatana nedzimwe nyika dzemu Africa mukucherechedza zuva re Africa Day vanhu vachiita zvirongwa zvakasiyana siyana.
Mukupembererera zuva reAfrica Day, mudzimai wemutungamiri weMDC, Amai Elizabeth Tsvangirai, vashanyira musha weBumhudzo Old People Home kuSt Mary’s Chitungwiza uko kwavanopa zvekudya, zvekupfeka nemachira kuvakweguri vanogara pamusha uyu.
Vachitenda Amai Tsvangirai nerubatsiro rwavapiwa, Gogo Betty Samombe, mumwe wevakweguri vanogara paBumhudzo, vati vane tarisiro yekuti nhamo yavo yezvekudya yombotapudzika.
Amai Tsvangirai, avo vakakurira mumusha we St Mary’s, vatiwo nekuda kwekuondomoka kuri kuita hupfumi hwenyika, vanhu vazhinji vari kutambura.
Amai Tsvangirai vatiwoshuviro yavo ndeyekuti vanhu vasaise zvematongerwo enyika mukati munyaya dzekubatsira vanoshaya.
Amai Tsvangirai vakurudzira kuti vanhu varangarire kwavakakurira vakati machechi ane mukurumbira abatsirewo veruzhinji vari kutambura.
Vanotungamirira Bumhudzo Old People’s Home, Major Cynthia Nyaruberu, vati vakatarisana nematambudziko akasiyana-siyana nekuda kwemamiriro ehupfumi.
Amai Nyaruberu vati pamusoro pedambudziko rezvekudya, Bumhudzo, iyo yakavakwa gore ra1974, yasakara zvikuru zvokuti vanotoda kubatsirwa kunatsurudza nzvimbo iyi.
Musha weBumhudzo une vakweguri makumi matatu nemumwe, uye mukurisa aripo ane makore zana nemashanu.
Bato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, rinoti zuva re Africa Day izuva rekucherechedza magamba akarwira kusunungura dunhu re Africa, iro rakatarisana nehudzvanyirira munguva iyo vanhu vachiti vakazvisunungura.
MDC inoti mukurangarira zuva ranhasi, pane mufaro pamwe nekusuwa kuri muvanhu vemuAfrica.
Bato iri rati Africa ine hupfumi hwakanyanyisa, asi zvinoshamisa ndezvekuti Africa ine vanhu varombo vakawanda, avo vanorarama nemari iri pasi pedhora pazuva.
Bato iri rapedzisira richiti Africa inofanirwa kubatsira Zimbabwe kuti iite sarudzo dzakachena gore rinouya.
Vashandi vekanzuru yeChitungwiza vanoti vatanga kushanda zvishoma nezvishoma kuitira kuti vakuru veguta vanzwe zvichemo zvavo uye kuti paitwe hurukuro nekanzuru.
Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vashandi vekanzuru, reChitungwiza Municipal Workers Union, VaEphraim Katsina, vaudza Studio7 kuti vashandi ava, avo vanosanganisira vana mukoti, havana kuramwa mabasa asi vachashanda zvishoma nezvishoma.
VaKatsina vati vashandi vanoda mbatya dzekuzvidzivirira kubva kuzvirwere kana vari pabasa, vachiti vamwe vashandi vari kufamba mamaira matanhatu kuenda kubasa sezvo makombi asiri kufamba zvakakwana pamusoro pekutevedzera kwawo mitemo yakadzikwa nehurumende yekurwisana nehutachiwona hweCoronavirus.
Vatizve vashandi havana mari yavari kutambiriswa.
VaKatsina vati vanokurudzira kanzuru kuti igare pasi nevashandi kuti vaite hurukuro dzinobatsira vanhu vese vemuguta, kwete kutyityidzira nekutuka vashandi kwavanoti kuri kuitwa nevamwe vakuru mukanzuru.
Asi vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori weguta, Dr Tonderai Kasu, vati havakwanisi kutaura nesu pamusoro penyaya iyi.
Asi vatumira gwaro rinoti zviri kuitwa nevashandi ava hazvisi pamutemo, vachiti hurumende yakagara yavimbisa kuti ichapa vashandi vezvehutano mbatya dzekuzvidzivirira vachiti vashandi vamhanyira kumbomira kushanda.
Chimwe chizvara chemuZimbabwe chakasarudzwa kuva kanzura mune rimwe dhorobha remunyika yeSweden chinoti, panofanirwa kuve nemafungiro matsva mune zvematongerwo enyika muZimbabwe kuitira kuti pasave nekupokana kunounza mhirizhonga kana kudeuka kweropa, zvisinei kuti vanhu vanotsigira mapato akasiyana-siyana.
VaTichaona Maphosa murume ane makore makumi mana nerimwe uye ndikanzura webato reSwedish Social Democratic Party, mudhorobha reUmea riri kumaodzanyemba kwakadziva kumabvazuva kwenyika yeSweden.
VaMaphosa vakatanga kuenda kunotsvaga mikana iri nani kunze kwenyika vachangopedza chikoro mugore ra1997 apo vakaenda kuAmerica asi vakadzoka kumusha mushure megore nekuda kwetsaona yaive yaitika mumhuri mavo.
Vagara munyika kwemakore ane chitsama VaMaphosa vakazowana mukana wekuenda kuSweden, asi sevamwe vanhu vakawanda vanotsvaga mafuro manyoro kunze kwenyika, vakashanda kubva pasi kuti vasvike pavari iko zvino.
Kunze kwekuita basa ravo rekutonga maguta kana kuti city planner VaMaphosa vanoratidza chido chikuru chekuita mabasa anobatsira vamwe vanhu.
Vanoti vakawana mukana wekupinda mune zvematongerwo enyika nekuti vaigara vachisangana nevamwe vebato reSwedish Social Democratic Party avo vakazovakumbira kuti vakwikwidze pachigaro chehukanzura muguta ravanogara gore rapera.
Pakuverengwa kwakaitwa vanhu munyika mugore ra2012, Zimbabwe ine vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nematatu asi gwaro reWorld Bank rakabudiswa muna 2016 rinoti nyika ine vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nematanhatu.
Hapana mafigiri akajeka ehurumende anoratidza kuti zvizvarwa zvingani zvemuZimbabwe zviri kune dzimwe nyika asi zvinofungidzirwa kuti vanhu vanopfuura mamiriyoni mana vari kugara kune dzimwe nyika.
Vakawanda vevanhu ava vanorarama nekuita mabasa ose ose kuti vakwanise kuriritira mhuri dzavo nehama dzavakasiya kumusha.
VaMaphosa vanoti vakabatsirwa zvikuru kuti vasvike pavari munyika yeSweden nekuti vanhu vakawanda vemunyika umu havana rusarura rudzi uye vanotambira pfungwa dzevamwe vane mafungiro akasiyana.
VaMaphosa vanoti maonero avo ndeekuti vanhu munyika vanofanirwa kuve nemafungiro matsva mune zvematongerwo enyika kuitira kuti vatambire pfungwa dzevamwe vane mafungiro akasiyana vachiti izvi zvinobatsira kudzivirira mhirizhonga mune zvematongerwo enyika uyewo kuti nyika ibudirire.
Vanotiwo vanofunga kuti Zimbabwe inogona kugadzirisa matambudziko ayakatarisana nawo pari zvino kana vanhu vakaita muonera pamwe.
Vanoti vakazvarirwa kuBulilima kuchamhembe kwakadziva kumavirira kwenyika yeZimbabwe mumhuri ine vamwe vana vana, kusanganisira vasikana vaviri. Vakaita zvidzidzo zveprimary nesecondary muzvikoro zviri muHarare vakazonopedzisira zvidzidzo zve”A” Level muguta reMasvingo.
VaMaphosa vanogara vachishanya munyika yavo yechizvarwa uye vaive munyika munguva shoma yapfuura vaine vamwe vakuru vakuru vesangano reSwedish Development Agency, SIDA, iro rinopa rubatsiro kune vanoshaya kunyanya madzimai nevana.
Pakaitika mafashamu emvura nedutumupengo remhepo kana kuti Cyclone Idai pakutanga kwegore munyika, VaMaphosa nevamwe vavanoshanda navo kuSweden vakakwanisa kuunza rubatsiro munyika.
Kunze kwekuve kanzura VaMaphosa vari mukomiti inoona nezvedzidzo uye mubato ravo reSwedish Social Democratic Party vari muchikwata chavana chipangamazano munyaya dzine chekuita nenyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica.
Pari zvino VaMaphosa vari kuita zvidzidzo zvepamusoro zvine chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika munyika dzemuEurope vachiti vari kuita izvi seznira yekuwedzera ruzivo rwavo rwenzvimbo.
Vanoti kana mukana ukavepo vangade chose kuwana chinzvimbo chepamusoro mune zvematongerwo enyika kusanganisira kuve nhengo yeparamende yeEuropean Union. VaMaphosa vane mudzimai nemwana mumwe chete.
Vanorwira kodzero dzevanorarama nechirwere cheshuga vacherechedza zuva re World Diabetes Day neMugovera muZimbabwe kunyange hazvo zuva iri rakacherechedzwa pasi rose nemusi weChina.
Musangano wanga wakarongwa nesangano re Blue Circle Voices Network rakabanatana nesangano re Zimbabwe Diabetes Association.
Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kusangano reZimbabwe Diabetes Association kuti tinzwe pamire sangano iri panyaya yechirwere cheshuga.
Asi imwe nhengo ye Blue Circle Voices Network mu Zimbabwe, Amai Heather Koga, vanoti musangano wafamba zvakanaka chose, uye vatora mukana uyu kucherechedza zuva reWorld Diabetes Day.
Amai Koga vanotiwo musangano wavo wapindwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzechirwere cheshuga, uye dzataura pamusoro pezvingaitwe nevanonetsekana nechirwere cheshuga ichi.
Kunyange hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vanonetsekana nechirwere cheshuga husiri kunyatsozivikanwa sezvo pachine vanhu vakawanda vane chirwere ichi asi vasingazivi kuti vanacho, Amai Koga vanoti ongororo yakamboitwa inoratidza kuti zvikamu zvinosvika gumi kubva muzana zvevanmhu vemuZimbabwe vane chirwere cheshuga.

Sechiratidzo chekuti hurumende yeAmerica yakazvipira kurwisa kumbunyikidzwa kwevanhu vachinoitiswa mabasa avasingade kune dzimwe nyika, bazi rezvekudyidzana kweAmerica nedzimwe nyika, rakaburitswa gwaro rechimakumi maviri rekumbunyikidzwa kwevanhu vanoendeswa kudzimwe nyika vachinoitiswa mabasa avasingade, kana kuti 20th Annual Trafficking in Persons Report, kana kuti TIP Report, musi wa 25 Chikumi.
Vachitaura pakuparurwa kwegwaro iri, gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaMike Pompeo, vakati kumbunyikidzwa kwevanhu vachiendeswa kune dzimwe nyika, kunosanganisira kuitiswa mabasa epabonde pamwe nekushanda mamwe mabasa munhu achimanikidzwa, uye izvi zviri kuramba zvichiitika pasi rose.
“Pane zvanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemashanu vari kumanikidzwa kuita mabasa avasingade uye kuitiswa mabasa epabonde pasi rose. Kudzikisira hunhu hwevanhu zvakadaro hazvitambirwe, tose takasikwa tiri mufananidzo yaMwari. Mabasa akadai ndeehutsinye.”
Gore rapera, mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vakamisa rumwe rubatsiro kudzihurumende gumi neshanu idzo dziri mugwaro re 2019 Tip Report.
Muna Ndira gore rino, VaTrump vakati America yakanga yadira mari inoita mazana mashanu emamiriyoni emadhora mukurwisa kumanikidzwa kwevanhu kuita mabasa epabonde pamwe nemamwe mabasa avanenge vasingadi kuita.
VaPompeo vakataura pamusoro pemabasa akaitwa neAmerica mukurwisa maitiro akaipa aya sezviri mugwaro re 2020 TIP Report.
“Nyika makumi maviri nembiri dzakasimudzirwa gore rino, gumi nenhatu dziri nyika dzemu Sub-Saharan Africa.”

Nyika dzakawanda dzinotambira madhokotera aya kuti ashande munyika idzi, kunyange hazvo zviri pachena kuti vashandi vezvehutano ava vanenge vamanikidzwa kunoshanda kunyika idzi, vachibatirwa magwaro avo ekufambisa, kusajekeswa kwezvibvumirano zvavo zvekushanda kunze kwenyika, uye kubhadharwa kwehurumende yeCuba nenyika idzi, madhokotera aya asingabhadharwe.

Sangano revarairidzi reProgressive Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, rinoti riri kunyunyuta zvikuru nekwarinoti kusarongeka kwechirongwa chehurumende chekuunganidza ruzivo pamusoro pevashandi vayo kana kuti biometric exercise, icho chiri kuitwa senzira yekuburitsa nayo pachena vanhu vangadai vari kutambira mari asi vasiri vashandi vehurumende, kana kuti ghost workers.
Mutungamiri wePTUZ, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti varairidzi vakawanda vakaedza kunonyoresa pasi pechirongwa ichi asi vari kusangana nezvimhingamipinyi zvakasiyanasiyana zviri kuvatadzisa kuti vange vachipa zvese zviri kudiwa nehurumende pamusoro pavo.
Doctor Zhou vanoti dambudziko guru riri kusangana nenhengo dzavo, nderekuti vanoenda kumahofisi kwacho vosvikoudzwa kuti hapana zvimwe zvinodiwa kuti vabatsirwe.
Vanoti chimwe chiri kunyanyovanetsa ndechekuti chirongwa ichi chiri kuita kusarudza varairidzi, zvikuru vaya vanenge vaine zvitupa zvesimbi vasina zvitsva zvemazuvano.
Vanotiwo vakanyorera hurumende tsamba semasangano evashandi vachida kuti vaite musangano wekutsanangurirwa pamusoro pemafambisirwo ari kuitwa chirongwa ichi, asi vanoti kusvika nanhasi havasati vapindurwa.
Chirongwa ichi chinonzi chiri kutarisirwa kupera neMuvhuro 30 Gunyana, hurumende ichiti mushandi anenge asina kunyoresa patsva zita rake haaizokwanisa kuwana muhoro wake wemwedzi waGumiguru.

Va Zvemhare, avo vanonyanyozivikanwa nezita remadunhururirwa rekuti Baba vaTennsen kuburikidza nenyambo dzavanoita, vakanowana basa rekushanda sagadheni bhoyi pane mumwe muchena pavakabatwa zvakanaka chose
Kubuda kwevamwe vakawanda munyika vachinotsvaga mafuro manyoro kunze kuri kuvavhurira mikana yakasiyanasiyana, mimwe yakanaka mimwe inochemedza.
Asi kuna VaPepukai Zvemhare, avo vakaberekerwa kuChibi, Maringire, mudunhu reMidlands, makore makumi matatu nemasere apfuura, kubuda kwavo munyika vachienda kuSouth Africa kwakavavhurira mukana mukuru kwazvo, wekuripwa kugara.
VaZvemhare, avo vanonyanyozivikanwa nezita remadunhururirwa rekuti Baba vaTennsen kuburikidza nenyambo dzavanoita, vakanowana basa rekushanda sagadheni bhoyi pane mumwe muchena pavakabatwa zvakanaka chose.
“Ndakanga ndiine zvose, mvura inodziya, cheya inotenderera, imba ine mhepo inodziya kana kutonhorera, chikafu ndichipiwa mahara, apa ndichiripwa ndakagara zvangu,” Va Zvemhare vanodaro.
Vanoti izvi zvakaita kuti vatore kavhidhiyo kadukuku vachiudza hama dzavo kusha nekugarika kwavakanga vaita pabasa ravo rekutanga muhupenyu hwavo, semunhu akanga asati amboshanda kunyange hazvo vaive vaine magwaro edzidzo ye Form 4.
Va Zvemhare, avo vane vana vaviri, Tennsen, ane makore gumi nemana, naTensley ane makore gumi ekuberekwa, vanoti kunyange hazvo pari zvino vasati vave kukwanisa kuita zvavanoshuvira kuita kumusha kwavo nekuda kwekushaiwa mari, vane hurongwa hwekuti remangwana vashande nezvikoro.
Asi pari zvino vanoti mavhidhiyo avari kuita ari kuita kuti vakwanise kuriritira mhuri yavo, zvekuti vakatosiya basa ravaiita vachingorarama nekuita nyambo dzavo kumichato nekumabhavhadhe kwavanokokiwa.

Mukoma wemushakabvu, VaMartin Tondhlana, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mhuri yavo yarasikirwa zvikuru sezvo Mr. CT aive munhu aifarira basa rake, kudzidzisa vamwe pamwe nekuriritira mhuri yake.
Mumwe akashanda semutori wenhau panguva iyo aTondhlana aive kuZBC, Ray Moyo, anoti aifarira zvirongwa zvaiitwa naTondhlana uye aive munhu aigona basa rake.
Tondhlana, uyo aive mukoma wemupepeti webepanhau reThe Observer, Banarbas Tondhlana, akazosiya basa rekushamarara ndokutanga mabhizimisi ake izvo akazoshaya achiita muJohannesburg, South Africa.

Kochii chiri kuitika kuDenamo Dembare?
Vamwe vatsigiri veDynamos vatove kusheedzera kuti Silva ngaasiiswe basa mushure mekuzvamburwa kwakaitwa chikwata ichi neChicken Inn svondo rapera.

Vatungamiri veDynamos vakapa Silva mitambo mina kuti akunde vachiti ivo akatadza anosiiswa basa.

Asi mumwe mutsigiri wechikwata ichi, VaSmart Nyaguse, vanoti Dembare inofanira kupa Silva nguva yekuita basa rake sezvo pari zvino mitambo ichangotanga.
VaNyaguse vanoti sezvo uyu uri mutambo wechipiri mwaka uno havasi kutarisira zvakawanda asi kungotora mapoinzi chete kunyange hazvo zvikasave nemutsindo.
Asi mutambo uri kunyanyotaurwa nezvawo ndeuyo uri kuBarbourfields Stadium pakati pezvikwata zviri kubhebha moto cheHighlanders neche FC Platinum.
Zvikwata zviviri izvi zvakakunda mumitambo yazvo yekutanga, Highlanders yakarakasha Hwange 3-0 panguva imwe cheteyo FC Platinum yakadambura Tsholotsho Pirates 2-1.
Mutsigiri weHighlanders, VaProsper Musiyazviriyo, vanoti Highlanders iri kutora mapoinzi matatu mumutambo uyu.

Chikwata chenyika chemaSevens chemaCheetahs chiri kuHong Kong uko chiri kurwira kupinda mugungano rakakosha neHSBC World Series umo mune zvikwata zviviri chete zvemuAfrica, South Africa neKenya.
Chikwata chemaCheetahs chirimugungano rimwechete neGermany, Hong Kong pamwe nemaCayman Islands, gungano iro murairidzi wechikwa ichiBrighton Chivandire anoti harina kunyanyooma.

Vanhu makumi mana nevashanu pavanhu makumi mapfumbamwe nevasere vakafa mutsaona yemvura yakakonzerwa nedutumupengo Cyclone Idai, vanonzi vavigwa kusvika pari zvino kuChimanimani, mudunhu reManicaland.
Mumiriri wedunhu reManicaland muparamende pasi pehurongwa hweProportional Representation, Amai Lynnette Karenyi veMDC, vanoti vanhu makumi mana vakavigwa neMuvhuro mumusha unogara veruzhinji weNgangu muChimanimani, uye vamwe vehukama vachiri kuedza kutakura mitumbi yehama dzavo kunoichengetedza kumisha yavo.
Amai Karenyi vanoti dunhu reChimanimani East ndiro rakanyanya kurasikirwa nevanhu, sezvo vakawanda vevakashaya vaive vagari vemo.
Vanoti huwandu hwevanhu vakashaya mutsaona iyi hunogona kudarika huri kuziviswa nehurumende sezvo mimwe mitumbi iri kunzi iri kuonekwa ichieredzwa nemvura munzizi.
Amai Karenyi vanotiwo vakaziviswawo nemumwe ishe wekuMozambique kuti kune mimwe mitumbi yakawanikwako inofungidzirwa kuti ndeye zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe.
Vanoti dunhu ravo riri kukumbira rubatsiro rwekuti vakwanise kuviga vakashaya vose, uye mishonga yekurapa vakakuwara, pamwe chete nechikafu chekupa vakaparadzirwa misha yavo.
Mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vashaya kuSouth Africa neChitatu mushure mekurwara kwenguva yakareba nechirwere chegomarara.
Mutevedzeri waVaTsvangirai, VaElias Mudzuri, vabvuma kuStudio7 kuti ichokwadi kuti mutangamiri webato ashaya.
VaMudzuri ndivo vakanzi vanotaura nezvehurwere hwaVaTsvangirai vakamirira bato.
Izvi zvatsinhirwawo nehama yepedyo yaVaTsvangirai iyo yati haikwanisi kutaura zvakawanda panguva ino.
VaMudzuri vati bato ravo rarasikirwa zvikuru nekushaya kwaVaTsvangirai.
VaTsvangirai, avo vakamboita mutungamiri wehurumende munguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa pamwe nebato reZanu PF, vange vave nemakore makumi matanhatu nematanhatu ekuberekwa.
VaTsvangirai vashaya panguva iyi mubato ravo muine makakatanwa ekuti ndiyani akafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri webato iri pakati paVaNelson Chamisa naVaElias Mudzuri.
MDC iri kuita musangano wechimbi chimbi neChina muHarare wekuzeya makakatanwa ari mubato iri.
Vachinyora munganonyorwa yehupenyu hwaVaTsvangirai inonzi “Morgan Tsvangirai: At the Deep End, vaimbova mutauriri wavo, muchakabvu William Bango vakati VaTsvangirai vakaberekwa musi wa 10 Kurume 1952 kuGutu.
Baba vavo, VaDzingirai Chibwe Tsvangirai, vainge vari mugari wekumaruwa uye vachiveza uye mai wavo vainzi Lydia Tsvangirai.
VaTsvangirai ndivo vainge vari dangwe pavana vapfumbamwe.
Kunyangwe hazvo vanhu vakawanda vasingadi kutaura nezvehurwere hwavo zvikuru zvirwere zvakaita segomarara, VaTsvangirai vakaudza Studio7 kuti vakabuda pachena nekuti vaida kuti mhuri yeZimbabwe inzwisise nezvechirwere chegomarara.
VaTsvangirai vakatanga nyaya dzekumirira vashandi kumugodhi weTrojan Nickel Mine uko vakaenda kunoshanda pamichina kana kuti plant operator mushure mekumboshanda pafekitari imwe vachiita basa rekutsvaira.
Panguva yavo kuTrojan Mine, Vatsvangirai vakatanga kufarira kodzero dzevashandi vakasarudzwa kuita mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weZimbabwe Associated Mine Workers Union.
Mushure memakore matatu vakabva vasarudzwa kuita munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions.
Mumakore anosvika gumi akatevera, VaTsvangirai nevamwe vakaita samuchakabvu Gibson Sibanda vakazoshanda zvakasimba kuti ZCTU iite mutsindo munyika yose ichipikisa zvimwe zvaiitwa nehurumende yaVaMugabe zvaitsikirira kodzero dzemushandi.
Vakatungamira kuratidzirwa kwakaitwa mumakore a1997 kusvika muna 1998, vakatungamira kuratidzira kunotyisa kwakaitwa nevashandi nyika yose vachiratidza kusafara nemamiriro ehupfumi munyika.
VaTsvangirai vakazosiya chigaro chekuva munyori mukuru muZCTU muna 1999 vopinda munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika.
Kuumbwa kweMDC muna 1999
Vakabatanawo nemamwe masangano munyika kuti varwire kodzero dzevanhu zvakapa kuti vazoguma vaumba bato rinopikisa reMovement for Democratic Change muna 1999 vachitsigirwa neZCTU nesangano revadzidzi reZINASU nemamwe akawanda munyika.
VaTsvangirai ndivo vange vachitungamira bato reMDC kubva zvarakaumbwa. Vakakwikwidza musarudzo dzemuna
VaTsvangirai vakamboitawo sachigaro weNational Constitutional Assembly sasachigaro weTaskforce yesangano iri. Vakashanda nevamwe musangano iri vakaita saMuzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku, Welshman Ncube, Everjoice Win, Brian Kagoro, Tendai Biti and Priscilla Misihairabwi.
NCA yakakunda hurumende yaVaMugabe musarudzo dzereferendum yebumbiro remutemo yakaitwa muna 2000.
VaTsvangirai vaigarawo vachisungwa nekupomerwa mhosva huru dzaigona kuti vatongerwe rufu kana kuti treason.
Muna 2001 vakasungwa vakapomerwa mhosva iyi pasi pemutemo weLaw and order Maitaninace Act vachinzi vaida kukurudzira vanhu kuti vapandukire nekupidigura hurumende yaVaMugabe nechisimba.
Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti vaipomerwa mhosva iyi nehurumende yaVaMugabe kuti vasakwikwidze musarudzo dzemuna 2002.
VaTsvangirai vakapinda musarudzo idzi asi havana kutambira zvakabuda vachiti dzakabirirwa uye dzaive nemhirizhonga inotyisa.
Nyika dzakaita seAmerica neBritain dzakabva dzatemera VaMugabe nevamwe vavo zvirango. VaTsvangirai vakasungwawo kakawanda vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kupidigura VaMugabe iyi asi vachingochenurwa nedare.
Muna 2005 mushure mekunetsana nevaive munyori mukuru webato ravo VaWelshman Ncube, bato reMDC rakapatsanuka kekutanga.
Muhurukuro dzakawanda VaTsvangirai vakati kupatsanuka kwebato uku kwakavarwadza zvikuru.
Musi wa11 Kurume muna 2007, Vatsvangirai nevamwe vatungamiri vebato ravo vakaita saVatendai Biti nasachigaro weNCA VaLovemore Madhuku vakarohwa zvakaipisisa vari muhusungwa apo vaienda kuhurongwa hwekunonamatira nyika kuHighfield.
Muna 2008 Zimbabwe yakaita sarudzo dzakaonekwa sedzakachena nenyika dzakawanda zvakapa kuti bato reMDC rikunde Zanu-PF musarudzo dzenhengo dzedare reparamende.
Asi musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika VaTsvangirai vakanzi vainge vatadza kusvika mavhoti aidiwa kunyange vainge vakunda VaMugabe.
Nekudaro pakanzi paitwe sarudzo yepiri yemutungamiri wenyika kana kuti election run-off. Sarudzo yepiri iri haina kuzoitwa nenyaya yemhirizhonga yakaona vatsigiri vakawanda vaVaTsvangirai vachirasikirwa nehupenyu zvakapa kuti vabude mukukwikwidza sarudzo yacho.
Hurumende yemubatanidzwa
Vaimbova mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaThabo Mbeki, ndivo vakave mutongi gava weSADC pagakava reZimbabwe kukazoguma kwaumbwa hurumende yemubatanidzwa muna 2009 VaTsvangirai vari mutungamiri wehurumende, VaMugabe vachiramba vari mutungamiri wenyika.
Hurumende yemubatanidzwa yakasvika kwamvura yacheka makumbo muna 2013.
VaTsvangirai vakashanyirawo nyika dzakawanda panguva iyi vachitambirwa segamba. Vakapihwawo mibayiro yakawanda kusanganisira kudomwa mumakwikwi eNobel Peace Prize. MaUniversity maviri ekuSouth Korea akavapawo ruremekedzo rwedoctorate.
VaTsvangirai vasiya vana vanomwe uye mudzimai, Elizabeth Macheka Tsvangirai, mudzimai wavo wekutanga, Amai Susan Tsvangirai kwemakore aidarika makumi matatu nerimwe, akashaya munjodzi yemumugwagwa muna 2009.
VaTsvangirai vakasara vakuvara mutsaona iyi.
Vagari vemumaguta nemadhorobha, pamwe nenyanzvi vanoti nyaya yekuti vanhu vanoramba vachibatwa nezvirwere zvemanyoka zvakaita setyphoid nekorera zvinoratidza kuti hurumende nemakunzuru hazvisi kushandisa mari zvine mwero kwenguva yakareba.
Hurumende ine mutemo unoti makanzuru anofanirwa kushandisa zvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana zvemabhajeti awo kuita mabasa akaita sekuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena nekutakura marara uye zvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana semari yemihoro.
Asi izvi handizvo zviri kuitika sezvo makanzuru mazhinji munyika ave kutotambirisa mari yakakwira kudarika makambani anoshanda akazvimirira.
Semuenzaniso, mukoti wemukanzuru yeHarare anotambira zviuru zviviri nemazana mashanu emadhora asi mukoti anoshandira hurumebde achitambira mazana mashanu emadhora.
Vaimbove meya VeHarare, VaBenard Manyenyeni, vanoti nyaya yemihoro yevashandi ndiyo yauraya kanzuru yeHarare.
VaManyenyeni vanoti kanzuru iyi haigoni kuita basa rayo nekuda kwenyaya iyi.
Mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira vagari vemuHarare, reHarare Resident Trust, VaPrecious Shumba, vaudza Studio7 kuti hurumende inofanira kumisa zvese izvi yowona kuti mari yemvura yashandiswa mabasa emvura.
Vanotiwo nyaya yehuwori mukanzuru ndiyo iri kuita makanzuru aya atadze kutakura marara nekupa vanhu mvura yakachena izvo zvinokonzera kuwanda kwetsvina nezvirwere zvemudumbu.
VaManyenyeni vanotiwo nyaya yekuti hurumende, vagari nemakambani havasi kubhadhara mitero inoomeserawo kunzuru nekuitadzisa kuita mabasa ayo zvinozopedzisira zvakonzera zvirwere zvakaita sekorera.
Mutauriri wekanzuru, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti havadi kuti vagari vabatwe nezvirwere, uye zvakakosha kuti vanhu vabhadhare mitero kuitira kuti kanzuru ikwanise kuivaitira zvese zvakaita sekuvapa mvura yakachena.
MuHarare nemamwe madhorobha vanhu vanogara vakabatwa nezvirwere zvinokonzerwa netsvina nekushaikwa kwemvura yakachena nekusatakurwa kwemarara.
Iko zvino pane vanhu makumi mana nemapfumbabwe vafana nechirwere korera uye hurumende yave kuita chipata pata chekutsvaga rubatsiro kuti ikwanise kurapa nekumisa kupararira kwechirwere.
Mukuru wezvirwere zvekutapurirana mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Portia Manangazira, vanoti zvirwere zvekorera netyphoid zvave kunetsa kurapika zvopa kuti vape vanhu nhomba kuti vasatapurirwe chirwere ichi.
VaManyenyeni nenyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Manyanya, vanoti mafambisirwe ari kuitwa hurumende handiwo vachiti nyika haingararame nekupemha.
Vanoti hurumende nemakanzuru vanofanira kugara vaine mari parutivi yekubatsira kana pachange paita dambudziko rakaita sekorera.
Tsvagiridzo ichangobva mukuitwa neUniversity of Zimbabwe, inoratidzawo kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe zvakakanganisawo zvikuru mabasa ezvehutano munyika.
Zvakabuda mutsvakiridzo iyi, iyo yakaitirwa bazi rezvedzidzo yepamusoro neUniversity of Zimbabwe, zvinoratidza kuti mari yerubatsiro kunyika nemakanzuru munyika yakadzikira nekuda kwezvirango uye kuti mitengo yezvinhu nemabasa yakakwirawo zvakanyanya.
Tsvagiridzo iyi inotiwo hurumende nemakanzuru vanofanira kutsvaga nzira dzekukunganidza mari muno kwete kumirira vekunze.
Nyika dzakawanda nemasangano ekunze nemakambani akazvimira ndivo vari kubatsira zvakanyanya mukurwisana nekokera pamwe nekubatsira makanzuru kuita mabasa ekuwanisa vanhu mvura pamwe nekutakura marara.
Bazi rezvedzidzo rinoti pane zvikoro zvakawanda zvehurumende nezvimwe zvakazvimirira zvoga zvaisa zvikumbiro zvekuti zvikwidze mari dzinobhadharwa nevana muzvikoro kutanga gore rinouya.
Zvikoro zvizhinji zvehurumende zviri kuda kuwedzera mari dzedzidzo nemitero nemadhora ari pakati pemakumi matatu nemakumi mashanu pamari iri kubvisa kare.
Gurukota rezvedzidzo, Va David Coltart, vanoti bazi ravo riri kutarisisa nyaya idzi.
Vatiwo panyaya yemari yechikoro, vanotarisira kuti zvikoro zvitange zvawirirana nevabereki vasati vakwidza zvikumbiro zvavo kubazi ravo.
Vakafanobata chinzvimbo chemunyori webazi redzidzo, Amai Elizabeth Marunda, vanoti bazi ravo richiri kuongorora kuti zvikumbiro izvi zvotambirwa here kana kuti kwete.
Bazi redzidzo riri kutizve zvikoro hazvifaniri kuti vana vari kutsvaga nzvimbo dze form one vabhadhriswe mari yakawanda yekunyora bvunzo yekutsvaga nzvimbo nekuti vari kubira vabereki.

Nhengo dzeparamende dzashatirwa mushure mekunge sangano reZimbabwe Football Association (ZIFA) nekanzuru yeBulawayo vatadza kunopa humbowo kudare mushure mekunge sangano rezvenhabvu muAfrica reConfederation of African Football (CAF) rati nhandare dzese dzemuZimbabwe hadzikodzeri kutambirwa nhabvu.
Nhengo dzekomiti inoona nezvevechidiki nemutambo dzaratidza kusafara nekuita kweZIFA dzichiti hazvishamisi kuti mutambo wenhabvu wasvika pauri munyika nekuti ZIFA haikoshesi basa rayo pamwe nedare reparamende.
Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, Muzvare Tatenda Mavetera veZanu PF, vati danho reCAF rakabata vakawanda nevatsigiri venhabvu munyika uye kana ZIFA isingakoshesi izvi, zvinoreva kuti haina hany’a nenhabvu.

Vati nhandare iyi yakapedzisira kugadziridzwa makore gumi apfuura nemari yakabva kuChina.
Vati gore rapfuura chairo vakaisa bhajeti remamiriyoni mazana maviri nemakumi mana emadhora rekusimudzira National Sports Stadium, asi hapana chakabuda.
Asi vakafanobata chinzvimbo chemunyori mubazi revechidiki nemitambo, VaBenson Martins Dube, vaudza paramende kuti hurumende yakataoudza ZIFA kuti inyorere kuCAF ichiikoka kuti izoongorora zvakare National Sports Stadium neBarbourfields sezvo nhandare idzi dziri kugadziriswa.
Vati hurumende iri kushandisa mamiriyoni makumi matatu nematatu ekugadzirisa nhandare idzi uye vati vanovimba kuti dzichange dzapera kugadziriswa mukati memazuva gumi nemana ari kuetevera.
Zvichakadai, CAF yanyorera ZIFA ichiramba chikumbiro chekuti iongorore zvakare nhandare idzi ikati inoda kuti Zimbabwe idome nhandare iri kunze kweZimbabwe yainoda kutambira mutambo weZimbabwe neAlgeria.

Bazi rinoona nezvemitemo muAmerica, reDepartment of Justice (DOJ), rinoti ongororo yarakaita inoratidza kuti chikoro chepamusoro, cheYale University, chinoita rusarura mukutambira kwacho vadzidzi.
DOJ inoti Yale University inonyima nzvimbo dzechikoro vamwe vadzidzi vechichena vemuAmerica nevamwe vadzidzi vemu America vari vechirudzi cheku Asia.
DOJ inoti ongororo yayo yakatora makore maviri.
Gore rapfuura, dare redzimhosva rakawana chimwe chikoro chepamusoro, Harvard University, chisina mhosva yerusarura mushure mekunge DOJ yaiendesa kumatare edzimhosva nenyaya yerusarura, ichiti vamwe vadzidzi vechichena nevechi Asia vemuAmerica vakange vachishaiswa nzvimbo pachikoro ichi kuchitorwa vemamwe marudzi.
Vanodzidzisa paDeVry University, Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha, vanoti DOJ iri kutambisa nguva sezvo zvikoro zvepamusoro zvizhinji zvichiita izvi.
Vanoti zvikoro zvepamusoro zvinoita izvi senzira yekuti vadzidzi vavo vazive pamusoro pevanhu nezvenyika dzakasiyanasiyana, kwete zverusarura.
Yale University yakaramba mashoko aya ichiti haina kupiwa nguva yakakwana yekupa DOJ ruzivo rwese pamusoro pemashandiro anoita chikoro ichi kana chichisarudza vadzidzi.

"Munhu anogona kupora nekuchimbidza kana aching abatwa nechirwere ichi, uye tiri kushanda nehurumende yeZimbabwe mukuwanira vanhu mushonga uyu. Tinovimba kuti vanhu vanodarika mazana matatu ezviuru vachawana mushonga," vakadaro.

Sangano reZimbabwe National Network of People Living with HIV, kana kuti ZNNP+, rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru kuti nhengo dzaro dzakawanda hadzisati dzava kushandisa mushonga unonzi unodzikisa hukasha pamwe nekupararira kweHIV/AIDS mumuviri wemunhu anorarama neHIV/AIDS.
Mumwe mukuru mukuru musangano reZNNP+, VaClarence Mademutsa, vanoti mushonga mutsva weDolutegravir, kana kuti DTG, uyo wakaparurwa muZimbabwe gore rakapfuura, hausati wava kupihwa vanhu vakawanda vanorarama neHIV/AIDS munyika.
VaMademutsa vanoti vanhu vanorarama neHIV/Aids vakawanda vaifanirwa kunge vakatanga kunwa mushonga weDTG gore ra 2019 risati rapera. VaMademutsa vanoti vanhu havafanirwi kuramba vakamirira mushonga weDTG, sezvo wakanakira kuvanhu vanorarama neHIV/AIDS.
VaMademutsa vanoti dzimwe nhengo dzesangano ravo dzanga dzichinetseka pakushandisa mushonga we Efavirenz, nokudaro chinhu chinenge chakanaka kuti vanhu vakawanda vashandise DTG sezvo mushonga uyu usina hukasha hunovhiringa hutano hwevanhu vanorarama neHIV/AIDS..
VaMademutsa vanoti havasati vave neruzivo rwekuti vanhu vangani vanofanirwa kunge vachipihwa DTG.
Asi mumwe mudzimai asina kuda kudomwa nezita rake anoti vanhu havafanire kumanikidzwa kuti vapinde muchirongwa cheDTG, sezvo vamwe vanhu, vakaita saivo, vasina dambudziko nemishonga yavari kunwa pari zvino.
Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kugurukota rezvehutano, Dr Obadiah Moyo, kuti zvii zvakanakira mushonga mutsva uyu, uye kuti seyi vanhu vakawanda vasati vava pahurongwa hweDTG sezviri kutaurwa naVaMademutsa.
Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvirwere mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Clorata Gwanzura, vanoti mushonga weDTG mushonga mutsva unobatsira kudzikisa hukasha hweHIV.
Dr Gwanzura vanoti bazi rehutano rinogara richiita ongororo dzekuona kuti ndeupi mushonga ungave nani pakubatsira vanorarama neHIV/AIDS.
Dr Gwanzura vanoti ongororo yakaitwa inoratidza kuti DTG inobatsira zvikuru mukudzikisa hukasha hweHIV munguva pfupi mushure mekunge munhu atanga kunwa mushonga uyu.

Nhepfenyuro yeStudio7 yasvitsa makore gumi nemana itipfenyura zviri kuitika muZimbabwe.
Vanhu vazhinji munyika vanoti vari kufarira zvikuru nhepfeunyuro iyi, vamwe vachiti Studio7 inofanira kuwedzera nguva dzekutepfemyura.
Asi vamwe vanoti Studio7 inofanira kutepfenyura iri munyika sezviri kuitwa nedzimwe nhepfenyuro vachiti pari zvino zvairi kuita zviri kunze kwemutemo.
Mutauriri weMDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, VaObert Gutu, vakorokotedza Studio7 nekusvitsa kwayaita makore gumi nemana iri pamhepo.
VaGutu nevamwe vakawanda munyika vanosanganisira vanhuwo zvavo, pamwe nemasangano akazvimirira, vanoti Studio7, inhepfenyuro inopa vanhu vese mukana wekutaura zvisinei nekuti vakarerekera divi ripi.
Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Amai Winnie Mambo, vanoti Studio7 inhepfenyuro inovapa nhau dzakasiyana nedzimwe nhau dzavanonzwa pane dzimwe nhepfenyuro dzemuZimbabwe.
Vanotiwo vanonzwa paStudio7 nhau dzezvinhu zvinotika munyika dzichipakurwa pachena.
Mutauriri weMDC inotungamirirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, VaKurauone Chihwai, vanoti Studio7 inhepfenyuro inowanzopa mukana kumapato ese ezvematongerwo enyika uye inosvikawo kunzvimbo zhinji munyika dzisingasvikwe nedzimwe nhepfenyuror dziri munyika.
VaGutu vanoti mukurumbira une Studio7 kumaruwa unoratidza kune inofarirwa neveruzhinji zvakanyanya.
Asi kunyange hazvo paine mufaro nemabasa eStudio7, vakawanda vanotiwo dai nhepfenyuro iyi yavandudzawo mashandiro ayo.
Asi Amai Mambo vanoti nhepfunyuro yeStudio 7 iri kuwanza nyaya dzemuHarare uye dai yatepfenyurawo nhau dzekumaruwa.
Ukuwo VaChihwai vanoti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti dai Studio7 yatepfenyurawo nemimwe mutauro inotaurwa munyika.
VaGutu vanoti kunyange hazvo pane nhepfenyuro dzakawanda dzakapihwa marezenisi makore mashonana apfuura, nhepfenyuro idzi dzinenge dzinotaura neizwi rimwe chete.
Chikumbiro chaVa Gutu nebato ravo ndechekuti dai yawedzera nguva yekutepfenyura uyewo kuti dai yatepfenyura nemimwe mitauro yakaita seVenda, Tonga nemimwe.
Mumwe wevechidiki muHarare, VaDenford Ngadziore, vanoti dai Studio7 yatotanga terevhizheni chaiyo.
Asi nhengo yeZanu PF zvakare vachimirira Makonde muparamende, VaKindness Paradza, vanoti ivo nebato ravo havafariri Studio7 nekuti inotepfenyura zvisiri pamutemo uye ichitepfenyura kubva kunyika inovengana neZimbabwe.
Vati Studio7 kana ichida kuwirirana nehurumende yeZanu PF, inofanira kunyoresa kuZimbabwe Media Commission yoshanda zviri pamutemo.
Vati semaonero avo nhepfenyuro yeStudio7 inotaura manyepo uye inotsigira mapato anopikisa.
Kunyange hazvo VaParadza vati bato ravo harifariri Studio7, vazhinji kusanganisira makurukota ehurumende, vatsigiri pamwe nenhengo dzeparamende, kusanganisira dzeZanu PF, dzinoteerera nhepfenyuro iyi, kana kutaura paStudio7.
Asi VaParadza vanoti havanganyarari kana vabvunzwa mubvunzo.
Asi veStudio7 vanoti vari kutepfenyura zviri pamutemo sezvinodiwa nemitemo yekutepfenyura pasi rose kunyange hazvo vamwe muhurumende yeZimbabwe vasingazvifarire.
Mukuru weMedia Centre, VaEnerst Mudzengi, vanoti Studio7 inhepfenyuro iri kuita basa guru munyika zvikurusei pakupakuranhau dzine mativi ese mungava munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, hupfumi nezvimwe.
Vanoti dai zvaibvira nguva inotepfenyura Studio7 yawedzerwa.
Mukuru weZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisai Ruhanya, avo vaive mutapi wenhau kuDaily News apo pakatanga Studio7 muna 2003, vanoti nhepfenyuro iyi yakaita basa guru panyaya yekuburitsa nyaya yeZimbabwe.
VaRuhanya vanobvumirana naVaMudzengi vachiti Studio7 iri kutorwadzisa vateereri vayo nekutepfenyura kwenguva pfupi.
Vanoti dai Studio7 yaitawo nhau dzemangwanani nemasikati kwete kutepfenyura manheru chete.
VeMedia Insitute of Southern Africa - Zimbabwe Chapter, vatenda zvikuru Studio7 nekuramba yakashinga nebasa ravo zvisinei nekuti hurumende yakamira mira zvikuru sei panguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa kuti nhepfenyuro iyi ivharwe.
Vanoona nezvekushambadzwa kwezvirongwa musangano iri, VaTabani Moyo, vanoti chimwe chasimbisa Studio7 inyaya yekuti nhepfunyuro iyi yaramba ichiburitsa nyaya dzinofarirwa neveruzhinji.
Vatsinhirawo mashoko evamwe ekuti Studio7 inofanirawo kupinda mumaruwa ichiburitsa nyaya dzevanhu vakawanda munzvimbo idzi avo vari kushaya kwekutaura nhunha dzavo.
Vatiwo kunyange hazvo munyika mave nenhepfenyuro dzakawanda, zhinji dzacho dzakarerekera divi rimwe izvo zvisingabatsire nyika neveruzhinji.
Studio7 yakaparurwa nechirongwa cheChirungu musi wa 27 Ndira, 2003 apo zvinhu zvakange zvakaoma munyika munyaya dzekutora nhau, kutepfenyura pamwe nekufambiswa kwemashoko munyika.
Zvirongwa zveNdebele neShona zvakazotanga kutepfenyurwa musi wa 7 Kubvumbi 2003.
Mumwe mukomana wechidiki ane makore makumi matatu nematanhatu VaTafadzwa Chiwaridzo vanoti vari kushandisa chipo chavo chekuimba mukuparidza vhangeri.
VaChiwaridzo vakaburitsa madambarefu maviri kusvika parizvino. Dambarefu rekutanga rinonzi Baba Ndadzoka.
VaChiwaridzo vanoti, “Ndakaimba nokuda kwekuti ndakamborarama zvakashata ndichitaridza Mwari asi ndakazoparidzirwa kudzoka kunashe. Saka ndinoda kuti ndiyedze nepose pandinogona kuti ndiite kuti vanhu vazive Mwari nokuti nguva yapera.”
VaChiwaridzo vanoti vari kunetsekawo nedambudziko rekushaya magitare nezvimwe zvinodiwa pakuimba.
Muimbi wechitendero uyu anoti akabura rimwe dambarefu idzva rinonzi Munondichengeta. VaChiwaridzo vari kukurudzira vechidiki kuti vararame munashe nekuti nyika yananga kumagumo. VaChiwaridzo vanogara kuChegutu kuMashonaland West.
Vanhu vakawanda vanoti boka reZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission rinofanirwa kuita ongororo pane zvakabuda mugwaro raAuditor General vachiti kana izvi zvikasaitwa, kurwisa huwori mumapazi ehurumende kuchanetsa.
Vachipa maonero avo pane zvakabuda mugwaro raAuditor General regore ra2018, vanhu vakasiyana siyana vataura neStudio7 vanoti zvakakosha Zimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission iongorore nyaya dzose dzinonongedza kuti pane huwori hunogona kuve hwakaitwa mungave mumakanzuru kana mumapazi ehurumende pamwe nemakambani ehurumende.
Vakanangana nemakanzuru akasiyana siyana emunyika, Auditor General, Amai Mildred Chiri, vakati makanzuru mazhinji haazi kubudisa nenguva yakafanira, magwaro anoratidza mashandisirwo emari.
Gwaro iri rinoratidzawo kuti pane kusabatwa kwemari zvakanaka kwakaitika mune mamwe makanzuru kusanganisira eBulawayo, Gweru neHarare.
Sachigaro wekomiti yekanzuru inoona nezvekushandiswa kwemari muguta reBulawayo, VaSilas Chigora, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanogutsikana nezvakabuda mugwaro raAuditor General vachiti kanzuru yavo ichaferefeta nyaya yekuti pane mumwe mushandi akazvipa chikwereti zvisiri pamutemo.
Gwaro raAuditor General rakabudisa kuti muguta reGweru pane kusawirirana pamari yemitero yakabhadharwa nevagari nemari iri kubhanga rekanzuru iyi uyewo kuti pane vashandi vanonzi vange vasina kutora mazuva ezororo kwemakore akawanda.
Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kukanzuru yeGweru kuti ichaita seyi negwaro raAmai Chiri.
Asi mukuru weGweru Residents Forum, VaCharles Mazorodze, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kusaitwa kwemagwaro emashandisirwo emari nenguva yakafanira uye kusabatwa kwemari zvakanaka, kunokanganisa zvikuru kuti makanzuru aite mabasa aanotarisirwa kuita nemazvo.
Vati Zimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission inofanirwa kuongorora zvizere gwaro raAuditor General kuitira kuti vakapara mhosva vabatwe nemutemo.
Amai Chiri vanoti vakaendesa gwaro ravo kuZACC.
Asi Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata sachigaro weZACC, Amai Loice Matanda Moyo, kuti tinzwe kuti vachafambisa seyi nyaya yakaiswa mumaoko ekomisheni yavo.
VaProctor Nyemba vesangano reAssociation of Certified Forensic Practitioners vabvuma kuti munguva yapfuura hapana chinobatika chiitwa kana pabudiswa ongororo dzinoratidza huwori mumapazi ehurumende.
Asi vati vane chokwadi kuti ZACC ichaita basa rayo sezvinotarisirwa.
VaNyemba vati zvakakoshawo kuti makanzuru, mapazi ehurumende pamwe nemakambani ehurumende, aite zvirongwa zvinobatsira kudzivirira huwori.

Gore rega rega hofisi yaAuditor General inobudisa gwaro rinoratidza mashandisirwo emari nemapazi ehurumende, makambani ehurumende pamwe nemakanzuru emunyika.
Magwaro aya anogara achibudisa nyaya dzehuwori dzinoitika asi pasina matanho anotorwa nehurumende.

Mumwe ane mwana ari pachikoro chakakwidza mari, VaOscar Makova, vanoti kuendesa mwana kubhodhing’i kwave kurwadza nekuwedzerwa kwaitwa mari idzi.
Muzvare Molly Murinye vanotiwo kunyange hazvo zvinhu zviri kukwira munyika, zvikoro zvinofanira kuziva kuti mari inotambirwa nevashandi, kunyanya vehurmende, haisi kukwira sezviri kuita mitengo yezvinhu muzvitoro.

Mukuru anoona nezvekugadzirwa kwemishonga mubazi rehutano, Amai Ropafadzai Hove, vanoti Zimbabwe haisati yaita tsagiridzo inoburitsa pachena kuti mbanje inoshanda semushonga wokurapa zvirwere zvakasiyana siyana, kunyange hazvo mbanje yava kubvumidzwa kurimwa zviri pamutemo nevanhu vanenge vapihwa marezenisi ekuita izvi.
Amai Hove vanoti mutemo uripo unoti mbanje iyi inotanga yaitwa mishonga yemafuta nemapiritsi yotengeserwa nyika dzine mitemo inobvumidza kushandisa mbanje semushonga, kwete kuitengesa muZimbabwe.
Amai Hove vanoti hurumende haisi kubvumidza munhu wese wese kuti arime mbanje sezvo ichityira kuti inoguma yoshandiswa zvisiri pamutemo.
Amai Hove vanoti kuti munhu apihwe rezenisi rekurima mbanje, anofanirwa kutanga aratidza humbowo hwekuti kune makambani ekunze kwenyika anoda kutenga mishonga inogadzirwa kubva mumbanje.
Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzembanje, Dr Zorodzai Maroveke, vanoti danho rehurumende rekupa vanhu marezenisi harisi kutambirwa nevakawanda vagara vachishandisa mbanje muchivanhu semushonga unorapa. Doctor Maroveke vanoti mbanje yagara ichishandiswa munyika chirungu chisati chauya.
Asi Dr Maroveke vanoti kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe iri kuomesa musoro panyaya yekuisa mitemo yembanje iyi, kune vamwe vari kutenga mishonga iyi zvisiri pamutemo kunze kwekunze izvo zviri kupa kuti nyika irasikirwe nemari yakawanda inofanirwa kuge ichivaka hupfumi hwenyika, dai Zimbabwe ichibvumidza kuti mishonga iyi itengeswe munyika.

Musangano mukuru weInternational Conference on AIDS and STI's In Africa, Icasa, wegumi nesere, watanga muHarare zvine mutsindo nyanzvi munyaya dze HIV/AIDS dzichizeya zviri kubuda muongororo dziri kuitwa pasi rose.
Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko musangano reIcasa, Amai Tariro Makanga-Chikumbirike, vanoti musangano uyu uri kufamba zvakanaka uye wakaparurwa zviri pamutemo neSvondo.
Zviri kubuda kumusangano uyu zvinoratidza kuti Zimbabwe pari zvino iri kuita zvirongwa zvakanaka sechirongwa chekutora chikamu chemari yemihoro, AIDS Levy, icho chiri kukokerwa nesangano re National AIDS Councll.
"Zimbabwe iri kuyemurwa nezvirongwa zvainazvo pakuunganidza mari yekutsvaga mishonga yehutachiwona hwe HIV, uye sangano re UNAIDS rakakorokotedza nyika nemabasa aiyiri kuita pasi pechirongwa che AIDS Levy," Amai Makanga Chikumbirike vaudza Studio7.
Dingindira regore rino rinoti “Aids In Post 2015: Linking Leadership, Science And Human Rights.”
Amai Makanga-Chikumbirike vanoti nzvimbo inokwanisa kusvikwa neveruzhinji, Community Village, yaparurwa uye avo vanoda kuenda kunozeya navana mazvikokota vakasununguka kuenda sezvo pasina mubhadharo unodikanwa panzvimbo iyi.

Vati vanhu vakadai vanofanira kumhan’arirwa kumapurisa.

Vapora vadarika zvuru makumi mana nemasere 48,000.
Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni mashanu nemazana manomwe ezviuru kana kuti hwadarika 5,7 million, uye vafa vadarika zviuru mazana matatu nemakaumi mashanu nezvishanu, kana kuti vadarika 355, 000.

Vanhu vafa muAmerica vadarika zvuru zana kana kuti vadarika 100,000.

Izvi zvinotevera danho rakatorwa nezvikoro zvizhinji zvemapamusoro izvo zvakatonyorera kubazi iri zvichida mvumo yekukwidza mari dzechikoro.
Mutungamiriri weZINASU, VaTakudzwa Ngadziore, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvikoro zvave pedyo nekuvhurwa uye vanoda kuti hurumende ibude pachena pamusoro pemari ichabhadharwa nevadzidzi vemuzvikoro zvepamusoro munyika.
VaNgadziore vati kunyange hazvo VaMurwira vari kuti mari iyi haizi kuzokwidza, pane humbowo hunoratidza kuti zvikoro zvema Polytechnic nezvikoro zvinodzidzisa varairidzi zvakatokwidza mari, uye vanoona sekuti mari iyi yakakwira zvakanyanya zvekuti vabereki vakawanda havakwanisi kuibhadhara.

Asi VaMurwira vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti zviri kutaurwa pamadandemutande manyepo sezvo pasina mubereki angakwanise kubhara mari dziri kutaurwa idzi.
VaMurwira vabvuma kuti mari dzemuzvikoro zvepamusoro dzichakwira uye mari idzi dzichaziviswa zvikoro zvisati zvavhurwa.
Vati mari idzi dzinokwidzwa pachitevedzwa matanho, ayo vati ndiwo avari kuita pari zvino.
VaMurwira vati gore rapfuura hurumende haina kukwidza mari idzi sezvo yaida kuti zvinhu zvigadzikane munyaya dzehupfumi.

Richipa mutongo waro, dare repamusoro iri rati haringarambidze kushanda kwemutemo, richiti kutonga richitsigira EcoCash kunotadzisa RBZ kuita mabasa ayo sezvinobvumidzwa nemutemo.
Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti zvanga zvagara zviri pachena kuti RBZ iri kunangana nevanofambisa dzimari kuEcoCash ava kwenguva ndefu.

Vabereki vakawanda vanoti kuongororwa kwevanhu vane hurema hwekusanzwa kunodhura zvokuti vazhinji vavo havakwanise kuendesa vana vavo kunaana chiremba kuti vanorapwa hurwere uhwu husati hwakomba.
Amai Tsitsi Nlabati vekuMasvingo vanoti mwana wavo, uyo anemakore mapfumbamwe, anonzwira kure mazwi anotaurwa zvokuti vakashaya mari yokutenga ma hearing aids izvo zviri kudzosera kumashure budiriro yehupenyu hwemwana wavo.
Amai Nlabati vanoti vakavimbiswa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano kuti mwana wavo aisafanira kuenda kuzvikoro zvinodzidza vana vanorarama nehurema nokuti vainge vaine chivimbo chekuti mwana aizokwanisa kuita zvakanaka kana akatengerwa ma hearing aids.

Baba Chirenje vanoti hama yavo yakadzoka kumusha nokudaro havachakwanisa kuwana mamwe ma hearing aid nokuti anonzi anotengwa nemari yekuAmerica iyo vasingakwanisi kuwana.

Dr Labode vanoti hurumende yakaomerwa panguva ino zvokuti iri kutoshayawo mari yokutenga mishonga ine mitengo iri pasi pasi inofanira kubatsira varwere muzvipatara.

Asi Dr Labode vanoti kunyangwe hazvo vana ivava kana vawanikwa vaine hurema hwakadaro, hapana zvakanyanya zvinokwanisika kuitwa kuvana ava nokuti mamiriro ehupfumi hwenyika haana kumira zvakanaka.
