Zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvakabviswa mumigwgwa nemapurisa ekanzuru asi vamwe vevanhu ava vari kuramba vachiita hwagonzo nakiti nemapurisa ekanzuruaya sezvo vari kuti havana mabasa.
Nyaya yekusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi hwenyika ndiyo yapa kuti vanhu vakawanda vagume vaita basa rekutengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa. Asi vemabhizimisi vanoti vanhu ava vari kuvakanganisa mabasa ravo vachiti vanotambira danho rekuvabvisa mumigwagwa
Chikwata chema Warriors chabudirira kuenderera mberi negadziriro yacho yemutambo wacho neDemocratic Republic of the Congo mugadziriro yachaita neMugovera manheru.
Chikwata ichi chinonzi chaitira gadziriro yacho munhandare yeNadi Sikha Al Hadid muCairo kuEgypt, uko kuri kuitirwa mitambo yeAfcon gore rino.
Vakomana ava vapinda munhandare iyi nenguva dzechinomwe manheru eMugovera, vachikusvidzirwa nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muCairo.
Kunyange hazvo pakamboita mitauro yekusabhadharwa kwevatambi ava vachiti vacharamwa kutamba kana vasina kupihwa mari dzavo, vari kuziva zviri kuitika vaudza Studio7 kuti chikwata chemaWarriors chiri munhaurirano nevakuru veZifa panguva iyo vanenge vachigadzirira mutambo wavo wakakosha neDemocratic Republic of the Congo.
Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutungamiri weZifa, VaFelton Kamambo, sezvo tatadza kuvabata parunhare rwavo kuCairo kwavari.
Asi chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinogara muCairo, Va Christopher Mahupa, vati ichokwadi kuti vakomana vemaWarriors vaita gadziriro yavo vari munhandare yeNadi Sikha Al Hadid muCairo makare.
VaMahupa vati vachaenda kunotsigira chikwata chavo apo chichatamba neDRC neSvondo.
VaMahupa vaudza Studio7 kuti maWarriors anofanirwa kukunda zvine mutsindo kuitira kuti awane mukana wekupinda pazvikwata zvachaenda pachinzvimbo chechitatu zvinobvumidzwa kuenderera mberi nemakwikwi aya kuAfcon.
Zimbabwe yakakundwa neEgypt 1-0 mumutambo wakaparura makwikwi e2019 Afcon. Mushure mezvo, yakaita mangange neUganda 1-1.
Ukuwo Uganda yakarova DRC 2-0, iyo yakakundwa zvakare neEgypt 2-0.
Pari zvino Egypt ndiyo iri pamusoro petafura yezvikwata zviri muGroup A iine mapoinzi matanhatu, ichiteverwa neUganda, iyo ine mapoinzi mana, Zimbabwe iri pachinhambo chetatu iine poindi imwe chete, kozoti DRC iyo iri pasi petafura isina kana poindi zvayo.
Mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato reMDC, Muzvinafundo Welshman Ncube, nemunyori anoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika mubato iri, Muzvare Gladys Hlatywayo, vari kuBotswana uko vari kuita misangano nevatungamiri vesangano reSADC nezvenyaya yemamiriro ezvinhu munyika.
Vaviri ava vasangana nemukuru wesangano reSADC, Doctor Stergomana Tax, vakakurukura pamusoro pezvemamiriro ezvinhu munyika.
Musangano uyu waitika panguva iyo mapurisa emuZimbabwe anga ari mubishi rekurova vatsigiri veMDC avo vanga vari pamuzinda wavo muHarare mapurisa achiti havafanirwe kuimba pamwe nekuungana panze.
Muzvare Hlatywayovanoti vakuru veSADC vanofanirwa kuyziva zviri kuitika muZimbabwe umo vati mava kuita kunge maberekera ingwe.
Bato iri rinoti kusamira zvakanaka kwenyaya yezvematongerwo ndiko kwapa kuti nyika iende kumawere.
Sezvo tichitema tisina divi ratinorerekera, tabatawo nhengo yeZanu PF inomirira Makonde mudare reparamende, uye vari sachigaro yekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaKindness Paradza,avo vanoti nyaya yanetsa muZimbabwe inyaya yevanhu vasiri kuda kutambira kukundwa sarudzo.
Vanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzehutano vari kushora hurumende nekushaikwa kwemushonga weNevirapine uyo unodzivirira kuti vana vanozvarwa nanaamai vane HIV/AIDS vasabatapurirwe hutachiona uhu.
Sangano reZimbabwe Doctor’s for Human Rights rinoti mushonga weNevirapine uyu wave nenguva uchishaikwa muzvipatara zvinoshandiswa neveruzhinji pamwe nezvimwe zvezvitoro zvinotengesa mushonga.
Munyori musangano iri, VaEvans Masitara, vanoti kushaikwa kwemushonga wakakosha kudai kunoisa hutano hwevana panjodzi.
VaMasitara vanoti zvinovashungurudza kuti mishonga yakawanda iri kuramba ichishaikwa kuzvipatara nezvitoro. VaMasitara vanoti vari kukurudzira zvikuru kuti bazi rehutano ripihwe mari yakawanda.
VaMasitara vanotiwo hurumende inofanirwa kuwanisawo mari yekunze vanotenga mishonga kunze kwenyika kuitira kuti mishonga iyi isashaikwe munyika.
Munyori mubazi rezveutano, Dr Gerald Gwinji, vanoti Nevirapine yanga isingachanyowanikwi asi vakatiwo dambudziko ranga riri rekufambisa mishonga iyi kubva kwavanoichengetera kuenda kuzvipatara.
VaGwinji vanoti nyika ine mushonga weNevirapine uyu unogona kushandiswa kwemwedzi mipfumbamwe kuzvipatara zvehurumende kwavanochengetera mishonga.
Kunyange hazvo VaGwinji vachiti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemushonga weNevirapine ragadzirwa, patendererwa neStudio7 kune zvimwe zvitoro zvinotengesa mushonga uyu wanga usingawanikwe.
Kuzvipatara zvehurumende mushonga uyu unopiwa pachena asi muzvitoro zvemishonga unowanikwa nemari inosvika madhora makumi maviri zvichiraudzira.
Mushonga uyu unofanirwa kupiwa kuvana vanenge vazvarwa nanaamai vane HIV maawa makumi manomwe nemaviri asati adarika.
Nyanzvi mune zveutano dzinoti matambudiko akadai anofanirwa kudzivirira kuitira kuti nyika ikwanise kudzikisa huwandu hwevanobatwa neHIV.
Vagari vekwaMutare vanoti havasi kufara nedanho rakatorwa nePremier Soccer League, PSL, rekuti nhandare yeSakubva haikodzeri kutambirwa nhabvu sezvo isina kumira zvakanaka.
Danho rakatorwa nePSL rinova kuti chikwata chenhabvu cheMutare City Rovers, hachikwanisi kushandisa nhandare iyi kudzamara yagadziriswa sezviri kudiwa nePSL.
Izvi zviri kukonzera kunyunyuta kwevatsigiri vechikwata ichi, icho chinozivikanwa nerekuti Magusha. Nhandare iyi inonzi ine makomba zvakare inofanirwa kunge iine chivakwa chakapoteredza nhandare yacho.
Kumbovharwa kweSakubva Stadium kwapa kuti Mutare City Rovers itambe mitambo yayo kuGwanzura Stadium muHarare kudzamara Sakubva Stadium yagadzirwa sezvinodiwa nePSL.
Mumwe wevatsigiri vechikwata cheMutare City Rovers, VaIsrael Zulu, vanoti PSL yavabata neseri kweruoko sezvo vange vofarira kudzokera kwechikwata chavo munhabvu yepamusoro munyika.
“VePSL vatotishaishira stereki isusu vanhu vekuSakubva, isu tange tave ne-2yearsz tisina premier league hino izvezvi zvange zvatinakira tozi Magusha haatambirimo otambira Harare, hutori hutsinye hwaari kutiitira anhu ekwaMutare. MuZimbabwe munoumu haazi ose maground akanaka mumaguta madiki kunze kwekuFC. Platinum kuMandava. Atishaishira maningi zvavaita izvi,” VaZulu vanodaro.
Mumwe mugari wemaMutare, VaErick Chaipa, vanoti havaoni chakaipa nenhandare yavo yeSakubva.
“Isisu takatambira munhandare yedu iyoyo yakadaro kusvikira promotion yacho asi zvakuzi izvezvi stadium hayiiti, this is unfair on the part yehutungamiriri hwebhora. Saka kuti isusu tichienda kuHarare kunoona timu yedu, tinoenda neyi manje , this is unfair,” VaChaipa vakatsinhira.
Mugari wemumusha weChikanga, VaPeter Khumbula, vanoti havaoni chakaipa nekuti nhandare itange yakadziriswa sezviri kuitwa sezvo izere makomba nemakomba uye isina durawall.
“Zvitori right ngavatange vagadzirisa ground iri nekuti hariitiba, because rakadhakwa ground racho kuzara makomba ngavarishande rouswa durawall, first risati rashandiswa kutorikondema ndizvo chaizvo kuitira kuti varigadzire, vaifanirwa kunge vakazviita kare futi,” VaKhumbula vakadaro.
Mushandi wekanzuru yeguta reMutare, Muzvare Elizabeth Sibanda, vanoti vanotarisira kuti mukupera kwemwedzi waKurume kana unotevera wacho, vanenge vapedza basa rekugadzirisa nhandare iyi.
“Izvezvi tave ready kuti tinge tichishanda paground iri tiri pedze kugadzira nenguva kwayo. By mid-March or April tinenge tapedza naro sezvinhu zviri muprocess kudai,”Muzvare Sibanda, mushandi wekanzuru yeMutare vakadaro.
Nhandare yeSakubva inoshandiswawo nezvimwe zvikwata zviri muDivision One Eastern Region zvinosanganisira Buffaloes, inova timu yemasoja, uye Tannex timu yevePrisons.
Nhandare iyi inopinda vanhu zviuru gumi nezvishanu kuti izare.
Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa zvakawanda zvinonzi zviri kutambira nemufaro danho rakatorwa nehurumende yeSouth Africa, rekurerutsa zvinodiwa pakufamba kuti mwana mudiki ange achibvumidzwa kupinda munyika iyi.
Asi vamwe vanoti danho rakatorwa neSouth Africa iri richawedzera kubiwa kwevana, kana kuona vabereki vanenge vachirwira vana vachipedzisira vatiza nevana vasina kupiwa mvumo nemumwe mubereki sezvanga zvichiitika.
Izvi zvinotevera danho rakatorwa negurukota rinoona nezvemukati meSouth Africa, VaAaron Motsoaledi svondo rapera, rekusaina mutemo mutsva unobvumidza kupinda nekubuda kwevana vasiri vemunyika iyi vasina mamwe magwaro pamusoro peekufambisa avanenge vainawo.
Mutemo uyu unonzi uchabatsira zvikuru vana vane vabereki vekune dzimwe nyika dzinosanganisira Zimbabwe, avo vanga vachimanikidzwa kuve nemagwaro akaita seekuberekwa, ma affidavit kana tsamba inobva kune mumwe wevabereki kana mwana achifamba nemubereki mumwechete, kana kufamba nemunhu anenge asiri mubereki wake.
Bazi rezvemukati meSouth Africa iri rinonzi rakatozivisa mamwe mapazi anosanganisira rekupinda nekubuda kwevanhu nezveshanduko iyi.
Mukuru wesangano re Immigration Advisory for Southern Africa, uye vari gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, Advocate Gabriel Shumba, vanoti sesangano vanozvitambira nemufaro sezvo zviri zvinhu zvavanga vagara vachitaura zvavo kuti magwaro akawanda anononotsa kufamba kwevanhu pamiganho.
Panyaya yekuti zvinogona kuwedzera nyaya dzekubiwa kana kufambiswa kwevana zvisina mvumo, Advocate Shumba vanoti kana mutemo wanga uripo wacho wanga usingambonyanyi kumisa kufambiswa kwevana zvisiri pamutemo nekuda kwehuwori hwaiitwa pamiganho.
Vaimbove murwiri werusununguko uye vakamboshandawo nevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe kwenguva yareba, Amai Margaret Dongo, vanoti hazvishamise kuti kusajeka kwekuti VaMugabe vacharadzikwa kupi inyaya yekuti bato reZanu PF rine mutemo wekuti anenge apanduka haaradzikwe kunovigwa magamba enyika, kuNational Heroes Acre muHarare.
Amai Dongo vanoti kana paine chokwadi pamashoko ari kubuda ekuti VaMugabe vakazivisa mhuri yavo kuti vaida kuradzikwa kumusha kwavo kwaZvimba pedyo naamai vavo VaBona, kwete kuNational Heroes Acre, zvinofanirwa kuremekedzwa.
"VaMugabe pavanga vachiri pachigaro nemakurukota avo ndivo vakadzika mutemo wekuti munhu anoshaya abuditswa mubato reZanu PF haaizofanira kuradzikwa kumarinda eHeroes Acre," Amai Dongo vanodaro.
Vanoti VaMugabe munhu aida kumira nezvaanenga atsidzira, izvo zvinoita kuti vagone kunge vakaudza mhuri yavo kuti vaizoda kuchengetedzwa zvavo kumusha kwavo kwaZvimba.
Pari zvino hurumende haisati yazivisa kuti hurongwa hwekuradzika VaMugabe hwakamira sei sezvo gurukota rekufambiswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vati basa iroro riri mumaoko ekomiti iri kutungamira hurongwa hwekuvigwa kwaVaMugabe.
Hurumende yazivisa kuti mhuri yekwaMugabe nevamwe vakuru muhurumende, vachitungamirwa nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaKembo Mohadi, vasimuka vakananga kuSingapore uko vari kunosangana naAmai Grace Mugabe nemhuri yavo vachigadzirira kudzosa mutumbi wamufi kumusha.
Mutumbi waVaMugabe uri kutarisirwa kusvika munyika neChitatu svondo rino.
Madzimai akawanda vari kuenda kuZambia kunoita basa rekurarama nekuita zvepabonde vachiti kuoma kwehupenyu munyika ndizvo zviri kuvatuma kuita zvepabonde vachibhadharisa.
Madzimai aya vakawanda vavo vanobva kunzvimbo dzakaita seKariba, Karoi, Chinhoyi, Chegutu, Kadoma pamwe nemaguta makuru akaita seHarare.
Vanoti kuita zvechipfambi kuZambia zviri kubhadhara sezvo vari kupihwa mari yekuAmerica.
Vazhinji vemadzimai aya vanoti vanozonochinja mari iyi voisa kuma bond notes zvinozoita kuti ive inowanda zvichienzaniswa nekupihwa ma bond notes.
Mumwe wemadzimai aya uyo anoti anoda kuzivikanwa saAmai Shupi vanobva kuKaroi vanoti zvinonzi muroyi royera kure kuti vepedyo vagokureverera nokudaro havadi kuzivikanwa zvavanoita munharaunda mavanogara.
Amai Shupikai vanoti chimwe chikonzero ndechekuti zvechipfambi zvinosungisa asi kuZambia hazvisungise nemapurisa sezvo vanenge vaine dzimba dzavanenge vachishandisa.
Chimwe chizvarwa chekuZambia, VaMaxwell Mwale, vanoti madzimai ekuZimbabwe vari kuita zvechipfambi vakawandisa zvakanyanya pamuganhu weZimbabwe neZambia.
Asi VaMwale vanoti havasi kuwana mari yakawanda sezvavanotaura sezvo vari kuva bhadhara mari inoita madhora matatu kusvika pamadhora mashanu panguva pfupi yavanenge vachitandadzana.
Asi mumwe mudzimai wekuDemocratic Republic of Congo anotyaira motokari dzinotakura zvinorema, Amai Elizabeth Lewis, vanoti kunyange madzimai ekuZimbabwe achiwanikwa kunyika yavo vachiita zvechipfambi vanoti hazvisi zvitsva sezvo madzimai edzimwe nyika achiwanikwa munyika dzisiri dzavo vachita basa rimwe chete rechipfambi.
Muzvari Sally Kanyakanyaka avo vanorwira kodzero dzevanorarama nehurema vanoti zvinhu zvinofanirwa kushanduka munyika munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika kuti zvehupfumi zvigadzikane izvo zvinozoita kuti madzimai awane zvinovapa pundutso muhupenyu kuti vararamise mhuri dzavo.
Muzvari Kanyakanyaka vanoti zvechipfambi zviri kuita madzimai aya zvinokonzera mamwe matambudziko akaita sekubata HIV zvinoisa hupenyu hwavo panjodzi.
Madzimai anoita zvechipfambi aya vanonyanya kuda kunofara nanamutyairi vemotokari dzinotakura zvinorema vanenge vakamirira kufambiswa kwemapepa avo emotokari kuti vapinde kana kubuda munyika.
Vanoti vanoshanda masikati pamwe nemanheru apo vanowana mari inodarika madhora makumi maviri pazuva.
Meya veguta reHarare, VaHerbert Gomba, vanoti kushomeka kwemvura muguta re Harare kwazosvika pasisina kunaka zvekuti vanhu vese vanofanirwa kuisa misoro pamwe chete kugadzirisa dambudziko iri.
VaGomba vayambira nhengo dzeparamende kuti dzimborega zvekutukana kwavanogara vachiita muparamende vashande pamwe chete kugadzirisa dambudziko remvura muHarare.
VaGomba vati nhengo dzeparamende dzinogona kugadzirisa zvinhu kana dzikabvumirana kuti hapana bhajeti rinofanirwa kutambirwa kana risina mari yekuvaka madhamu emvura kana mari yekuvakidzira aripo acho kuti abate mvura zhinji pane yaari kubata ikozvino.
VaGomba vanoti mukuedza kwavo kugadzirisa nyaya iyi, vari kuronga kuti vasheedze musangano mukuru pakati pehurumende, mainjiniya, nhengo dzeparamende neavo vese vangabatsira panyaya iyi, pamwe chete nemakurukota ehurumende kuti dambudziko iri rizeyewe zvakakwana uye kuti pawanikwe gwara nekuti vanhu veHarare vaita moyo murefu naizvozvo vanofanira kubatsirwa nekubviswa kwedambudziko iri.
Vakawanda muHarare vanoti kisimusi yegore rino yange isina mufaro wakanyanya nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi munyika.
Asi kunyangwe zvakaoma, vamwe vanoti mufaro wavo uri mukurangarira kuzvarwa kwaJesu Kristu.
Vakawanda munyika vari kuchema chema nekushaikwa kana kushomeka kwezvinhu zvakaita semafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari, magetsi, mvura yekunwa, mabasa nezvimwe.
Studio 7 yatenderera mumigwagwa yeHarare ichinzwa kubva kuvanhu nezvezuva rekisimusi. Amai Chenai Shiri vekuDzivarasekwa 2 vanoti kisimusi yegore rino yange yakaoma kudarika mamwe makore nekuti vange vasina kana huku zvayo ukuwo vari murima sezvo kusina magetsi.
Vanoti pfungwa dzavo dzatove mugore ra2020 kufunga kuti vachawanepi mari yekubhadhara kuchikoro chevana nokuti yakakwidzwa zvakanyanyisa.
Mashoko aya atsinhirwa naBaba Shepherd Savanhu vekuTynwald North
Amai Charity Mubaiwa vekuWestgate vaudza Studio 7 kuti vaswera vakarara nokuti vakashanda zvakanyanyisa gore rino zvokuti nyama dzomuviri wavo dziri kurwadza.
Mukomana wechidiki Tinotenda Mhundwa anoti akazvarwa musi wekisimusi saka atsvaga huku nenyama yokuti apembere bavhadhe rake aine shamwari yake yepamoyo Tinashe Kadende.
Amai Nyarai Chikwiri Chabika vanobva kuBuhera vanoti vachatora huku pane dzavanotengesa kuti vabikire mhuri yavo nhasi kupembera kisimusi.
Studio 7 yawanawo mukana wokutaura naMufundisi Sam Dube vekuTabernacle of FaithChurch iyo iripasi peApostolic Faith Mission kuHarare West. Mufundisi Dube avo vakurudzira vatendi kuti vasarasa hunhu pamhembero yekisimusi.
Vatiwo zuva ranhasi nderekupemberera munhu akasunungura mweya yevanhu vese kuti hupenyu hwavo huyendeke zvakanaka.
Mufundisi Dube vakurudzira zvakare vatendi kuti vasatsauka munzira yokutenda Jesu Kristu chero zvazvo nyika iri kuvava nemarwadzo.
Ichokwadi kuti kare haagare ari kare uye matakadya kare haanyaradze mwana.
Mumakore adarika, vanhu vaiburitsa maradio avo panze vachiridza nziyo dzakaita sedzaPaul Matavire, kusanganisa Dhindindi Full Time, asi nekushaikwa kwemagetsi izvi zvave zviroto.
Dare remakurukota nhasi rabuda nechisungo chekuti mauto nemapurisa vapihwe mukana wekutenga zvinhu nemutengo wakaderera muzvitoro zviri kumakamba avo.
Vamwe vanopikisa nevanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vanoti zviri pachena kuti hurumende iri kutya kupidigurwa nemauto zvakaitwa vaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe.
Gurukota rinoona rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vanoti kubatsira mauto hakunei nekutya kuti vanogona kupanduka hurumende vachiti pane zvirongwa zvekubatsira vanhu vose munyika.
Asi mutevedzeri wemunyori anoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika mubato reMDC Senator Douglas Mwonzora vanoti kuvhundika chati kwatara hunge uine katukwa nekudaro zviri pachena kuti hurumende iri kutya kupandukirwa nemauto.
VaMwonzora vati hurumende inofanira kubatsira vanhu vose vanoshupika munyika kwete vanodzivirira nyika chete.
Hurumende inoti yaumbawo homwe yekuti vashandi vayo vakwanise kukwereta mari nemutero uri pasi kune vanenge vachida kubatirwa mari.
Makundano eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League ambomiswa kumbopa mukana kuChibuku Super Cup.
Makundano emukombe weChibuku Super Cup aya akatanga neChishanu masikati apo chikwata cheHarare City chakarakasha Border Strikers 4-0.
Chikwata cheHarare City ndicho chine mukombe uyu mushure mekurova Dynamos 2-0 mufainari yegore rapera.
Dynamos yacho iri kutarisira kudarika zvayakaita gore rapera nekutora mukombe uyu gore rino apo varikusangana neHow Mine muRufaro Stadium.
Mubati wehomwe wechikwata ichi VaWebster Marechera vanoti chinangwa chavo kubuda munharaunda yekutanga iyo vanoti mutambo neHow Mine wakaoma zvikuru.
VaMarechera vanoti varikutarisira kutora mari yekukunda iri mumukombe uyu kuitira kuti vazvirerutsire munyaya dzemari idzo dzanetsa zvikuru munyika.
Mukombe weChibuku Super Cup ndiwo wega sirivha yasara kuDynamos sezvo zveligi zvakaramba svondo rapera apo yakarohwa 2-1 neHighlanders.
Asi Bosso irimowo mumukombe uyu, neMakepekepe zvekare. Dynamos inofanira kurova zvikwata zvikuru izvi kana ichida kutora mukombe uyu nezviuru makumi manomwe nemakumi mashanu emadhora.
Highlanders iri kusanganda ne Mutare City mu Babourfields Stadium apo Makepeke achadamburana neTsholotsho Pirates muNational Sports Stadium.
Anotaura akamirira maGreen Machine Joyce Kapota anoti varairidzi vavo vakagadzirira zvakakwana mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup.
Chikwata chiri kutungamira makwikwi ePSL, uyezve chiriicho chakatora mukombe weChibuku Super Cup muna 2014, cheFC Platinum chirimumuMandava Stadium umo chirikutatsurana masimba neChapungu.
Ngezi Platinum Stars iyo yakavaka nhandare yakanaka zvikuru iyi yeBaobab Stadium umo irikubandana neHwange panguva imwecheteyo ZPC Kariba iine Bulawayo City muNyamhunga.
Triangle neChicken Inn ndidzo dzichavhara musangano muGibbo Stadium neSvondo.
Makundano eChibuku Super Cup arikutarisirwa kupera musi wa 5 Mbudzi.
Chikwata chenyika cheRugby chevanhukadzi chemaLady Cheetahs chiri kutarisira kusimudzira mureza weZimbabwe mumakwikwi eAfrica Rugby Women’s Championships ayo ari kuitwa muHarare mukupera kwesvondo.
Izvi zvinotevera kukundwa kwakaita chikwata chemaSables muAfrica Cup umo chakarohwa mitambo yavo yese mitatu ndokubuda zvekare mumakwikwi e2019 World Cup.
MaLady Cheetahs arikurwira mukombe wemuAfrica muPolice Grounds neTunisia, Uganda, Zambia, Senegal, South Africa neNamibia.
Namibia neSouth Africa ndidzo nzingangoomesera Zimbabwe mumakundano aya.
Vamwe vatsigiri veZanu PF kuManicaland vanoti havazi kufara nedanho riri kuda kutorwa rekuita kongiresi yechimbi chimbi iyo vanoti yakanangana nekusimudzirwa kwemudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, kuti vaitwe mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri weZanu PF.
Mashoko aya anotevera chisungo chakaitwa nedunhu reZanu PF mukupera kwesvondo.
Asi dzimwe nhengo dzebato iri dzinoti Amai Mugabe havana kukodzera kuti vapihwe chinzvimbo chekuva mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato, izvo zvinozoita kuti vaitwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika.
Mumwe wevanhu ava, avo vanopikisa kukwiridzirwa kwaAmai Mugabe, ndiVaRueben Bote avo vanoti nyaya yekusarudza mudzimai kuti ave muPresidium haina kushata asi chakaipa inyaya yekuisa vanhu pazvinzvimbo zvisina kubva muvanhu.
Imwe nhengo yeZanu PF, uye vaimbove murwiri wehondo yerusununguko, VaIrwin Mbengo, vanoti zviri kuda kuitwa zviri kunze kwemutemo uye zvinofanirwa kurambwa zvachose.
Vanoti bumbiro remitemo yeZanu PF harifanirwi kungoshandurwa chero nguva apo vamwe vanhu vanenge vaine zvavanoda kuzadzikisa kana kubvisa vamwe pazvigaro.
Bumbiro reZanu PF rakashandurwa zvakare muna 2005 kuitira kuti mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri webato ange ari munhukadzi, izvo zvakapa kuti Amai Joice Mujuru vatore chigaro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiriri weZanu PF.
Bumbiro iri rakashandurwa zvakare muna 2014 rikapa masimba mutungamiri webato kuti asarudze vatevedzeri vake, kwete kuti vasarudzwe nevanhu pakongiresi.
Izvi zvakapa kuti Amai Mujuru vabviswe mushure mekupomerwa mhosva yekuda kubvisa VaMugabe pachigaro.
Mumwe mutsigiri weZanu PF kuManicaland, VaProsper Tendengu, vanoti vanoona hurongwa hwekuda kusimudzira Amai Mugabe huri hwekuda kufadza rimwe boka rinozivikanwa nekuti G40 iro vanonzi vanotsigira.
VaTendengu vanoti kongiresi iyi vanoiona senzira yekuda kudzinga vamwe mubato iri vavasingawirirani naAmai Mugabe.
Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kutaura nemunyori weZanu PF mudunhu reManicaland, VaKenneth Saruchera, pamusoro penyaya iyi kunyange hazvo pamusangano weSvondo vakatsigira pfungwa yekusimudzira Amai Mugabe.
Chikwata cheG40 chiri kukikiritsana nechimwe chinozivikanwa nekuti Lacoste icho chinonzi chinoda kuti mumwe wevatevedzeri vaVaMugabe, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaende panyanga kana VaMugabe vachinge vazosiya chigaro.

Asi munyori mukuru musangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions VaJaphet Moyo vanoti kuvhunduka chati kwatara hunge uine katurike.

Vanoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwezvirwere muAmerica, veCenter for Desease Control and Prevention, pamwe chete neve Food and Drug Administration, varikuyambira vanhu vanogara mumatunhu matanhatu ari kumaodzanyemba kwadziva kumabvazuva kweAmerica, anosanganisa Massachusetts, Connecticut, New Jersey, New York, Pennsylvania, neRhode Island kuti vambomira kudya mapopo anobva kuMexico kusvika vezvehutano vaongorora nyaya iyi.
Vayambiravo vanotenga zvekudya kunyika dzirikunze kweAmerica, pamwe chete nevanotengesa zvinhu izvi, vakaita sevemumahotera, ma’supermarkets’ nevamwe kuti vasabudisa mumabhokisi mapopo avakange vatenga kuti vezvehutano vakwanise kuferefeta michero iyi.

Sangano reZimbabwe Medical Association rinoti harisi kufara kuti makambani anobhadharwa nevarwere kuti agozovabhadharira mabhiri kana vachinge varwara, haasi kuvabhadhara zvinonzi nesangano iri zvave kukonzera kuti vanachiremba vazhinji vatadze kuita basa ravo zvakanaka.
Sangano reZimbabwe Medical Association, kana kuti Zima, rinoti makambani aya ane zvikwereti zvakawanda uye ave nenguva yakareba asiri kubhadhara vana chiremba kana vachinge varapa varwere vanenge vari pachirongwa chekubhadharirwa nemakambani aya kana kuti medical aid.
Munyori mukuru muZima. VaSacrifice Chirisa, vaudza vatori venhau kuti pamakambani ese aya, kambani yePublic Service Medical Aid Society, kana kuti PSMAS, ndiyo ine chikwereti chakakurisa chemari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu emadhora ekuAmerica kana mari yakaringana nemari iyi iri yema RTGS pachishandiswa huremu huri kushandiswa mumabhanga kana kuti interbank rate.
Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemukuru-mukuru wePSMAS, Farai Muchena, sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga isingadairwe uye vekuhofisi kwavo vanga vachiti havamo muhofisi pasvika Studio7 pamahofisi ePSMAS.
VaChirisa vati izvi zvave kupa kuti mamwe madhokotera atadze kuita basa rawo zvakanaka.
Tsvagiridzo yaitwa neStudio7 yaratidza kuti vamwe vana chiremba vave kuramba kutambira ma medical aid vachida kubhadharwa nemusvo kana mari dzepamafoni.
Zvataurwa naVaChirisa zvatsinhirwa nemumwe dhokotera, VaShingirirai Meki, avo vati vanachiremba vazhinji vave kunhonga svosve nemuromo sezvo vachiti mari yavari kutambiriswawo nehurumende yakafanana nemutero wembwa.
Zvichakadai, gurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti vachaongorora nyaya iyi vozoona sehurumende kuti nyaya iyi ingagdziriswe sei.
VaChirisa vati makambani aya haasi kubhadhara nenguva uye vati paanozobhadhara ari kubhadhara mari isina kukwana zvavati zvinotyora mutemo weHealth Services Act.
Zima yaratidzawo kushushikana zvikuru nevakuru vemakambani aya avo vainoti vari kurarama hupenyu hwepamusoro-soro vasingabhadhare mabhiri evarwere zvavati zvave kutoda kuti komisheni inorwisana nehuori yeZimbabwe Anti Corruption Commission, Zacc, iferefete makambani aya.
Vaimbove mukuru wePremier Service Medical Aid, VaCuthbert Dube, vakaferefetwa neZaac yaivepo muna 2014 mushure mekupomerwa mhosva yekushandisa mari zvisiri pamwero, asi vakawanikwa vasina mhosva.
VaDube, avo vakanga vari mukuru wekambani iyi kubva muna 1992 kusvika muna 2014, vaitambiriswa mari inodarika mazana maviri nemakumi matatu ezviuru zvemadhora ekuAmerica pamwedzi, vachiisa muhomwe mamiriyoni matanhatu nemazana mazana ezviuru zvemadhora pagore.
VaDube vaipomerwawo kuzvipa mari yechikwete inosvika mazana masere ezviuru zvemadhora, pamwe nekushandisa mari yekambani iyi apo vaiita basa reZifa pavaive mutungamiri wesangano renhabvu iri.
Asi Zaac yakati pakanga pasina humbowo hwakati tsvikiti hwairoverera VaDube nemhosva.

Komisheni inorwisana nehuwori munyika, yeZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission, ZACC, inoti iri kutarisira kunge yave nemahofisi anoshanda mumatunhu matanhatu emunyika mukupera kwegore rino senzira yekuedza kurerutsa mashandiro ayo.
Mashoko aya, ayo ataurwa nemumwe wemakomishina uye vari mutauriri weZACC, VaJohn Makamure, anotevera nyunyuto yabuda muvanhu vanga vari pamusangano waitwa maMutare wekuzeya mashandiro akanaka ekomisheni iyi, kana kuti Draft National Anti-Corruption Strategy.
VaTakashinga Mashayahanya mumwe wevagari vemaMutare vange vari pamusangano uyu.
VaMashayahanya vanoti sangano reZACC rinosungirwa kuwanzira mimwe yemisangano yaro kumaruwa kune vanhu vakawanda uye nekune mamwe maguta, kwete kungorambira vari kuguta guru reHarare.
"Tinoziva kuti ZACC iri kuedza kuita basa rakanaka asi inofanirwa kuonekwa kuti yambosungawo vamwe vanhu vachipika here kwete kungoti kune ZACC pasina asungwa. Tinoda kuti ZACC iwonekwe kwese kumisha, kumaruwa ichiita basa kuti vanambuya nevana vechikoro vazive nezvebasa rayo, kwete kuwandira mumaguta makuru chete."
Mumwe wevanga vari pamusangano, VaFarai Matebvu vanoti ZACC iri kuita basa rayo zvakanaka, asi kuti vanovimba kuti kumhan’arwa nekuferefetwa kwedzimhosva kuitwe kwaaawanda, kwete mumaguta makuru chete.
"Kumaruwa kunosungirwa kunge kuchisvikwawo nekuti kune nyaya dzehuwori dziri kuitwa ikoko vanhu vasingazivi kwekuenda, saka misangano yekuzivisa vagari zvekuita panenge paitwa huwori ikodzero yemunhu wose kuti ange aine zivo. Misangano yavo veZACC ngaiparadzirwe kwakawanda munyika yose."
Asi VaMakamure vanoti itarisiro yavo kuti panopera gore rino ZACC inge yave nemamwe mahofisi mumatunhu anoti Mutare, Masvingo uye Marondera kuwedzera pane mamwe ari MUHarare, Bulawayo nekuGweru.
"Tinofanirwa kunge tavhura ma-offices edu kumaprovinces ose emuZimbabwe, gore rino tinovhura anokwanisa kuita six, asi izvezvi tine three aripo, Harare, Gweru neBulawayo, saka ZACC inenge yave mamwe maregions six muZimbabwe kuti vanhu vakwanise kuzouya kurepota nyaya dzehuwolri, kana corruption nekunzwa mamwe maprogram edu atinoita ane chekuita necorruption," VaMakamure vanodaro.
VaMakamure vanoti chimwe chechiri kunonotsa kuvepo kwemahofisi aya ndechekushaikwa kwemari yakakwana uye zvishandisiro zvinosanganisira vashandi vakadzidzira mabasa sezvo vachida kubhadharwa zvakaringana nemabasa avo.
"Chatinoda kuti tiite ndechekuti mahofisi atiri kuzovhura aya munofanirwa kunge muine nayanzvi ma-officers arimo achikwanisa kupindura nekugadzirisa zvichemo zvekotapusheni; tinenge tichida kuti chinangwa chekuvhura mahofisi aya chinge chichozadzikiswa, by 2021 tinofanirwa kunge tatove kuna-districts akawanda emunyika kujti tipedze huwori."

Munyori mubazi rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika pamwe nevakarwa hondo yerusununguko, Ambassador Mark Grey Marongwe, vazivisa komiti yeparamende inoona nezvemukati nekudzivirirwa kwenyika kuti hurongwa uhwu huri mubhiri rekushandura mutemo weWar Veterans Act iro riri kunyorwa nebazi ravo.
VaMarongwe, avo vaonovewo munhu aive murwiri wehondo yerusunguko vachizivikanwa nerekuti Tichatonga, vati maWar Veterans ari kutambura uye anotarisirwa pasi neveruzhinji izvo zviri kupa kuti bazi ravo ritore matanho ekugadzirisa chimiro chevanhu ava kuitira kuti vakwanise kugarawo zvakanaka.
Vati hurumende iri kuronga kuwedzera mari yemudyandigere yemaWar Veterans kubva pamadhora mazana matatu negumi nemashanu emaRTGS - kusvika pamari inotambirwa nemusoja ane chinzvimbo chameja muchiuto.
Meja muchiuto anotambira mari iri pakati pemazana mashanu nemazana matanhatu emadhora zvichienderana nemakore aanawo ari pachinzvimbo ichi.
Vatiwo vari kuronga kuti maWar Vets avewo neMedical Aid kuti akwanise kurapwa kana achinge aburitsa kadhi rinoratidza kuti aive murwi wehondo yerusununguko.
Asi vati pari zvino vanhu ava vari kurapwa kusvika vapora kana vachinge vapinda muzvipatara zvehurumende.
VaMarongwe, avo vakamboshanda semumwe wevakuru vakuru vezvirongwa zveZBC, vaenderera mberi vachiti vanodawo kuti maWar Veterans achengetedzwe zvakanakwa kana achinge ashaya nekudaro vari kuronga neimwe kambani inoviga vanhu kuti pese panoshaya murwiri wehondo yehondo rerusunguko, achengetedzwa zvine chiremerera.
Vazivisawo kuti pane maWar Veterans ari pakati pemazana mashanu nemazana matanhatu anoshaya gore rega.
Vati pari zvino pane maWar Veterans zviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu munyika.
Vati vamwe vavo vakawanda munyika havana kunyoreswa uye chirongwa chekuita izvi chiri kuenderera mberi nechinangwa chekuti vese vanokodzera vawane mari yemudya ndigere pamwe nekubatsirwa kupinza vana zvikoro.
Vati bazi ravo richapinza basa maDistrict War Veterans Officers makumi matanhatu nematanhatu mumatunhu ese munyika kuti agadzirise nyaya dzavo mumatunhu ese munyika.
Dzimwe nhengo dzekomiti iyi dzakaita saAmai Angeline Chipato vati kunyange hazvo chiri chinhu chakanaka kuchetengedza maWar Veterans, zvakakoshawo kuti hurumende ione zvaingaite pamusoro pana chimbwido nana mujibha avo vavati vakaitawo basa guru.
Asi VaMarongwe vati mutemo uri kutosandurwa kuti vana chimbwido nana mujiba varemekedzewo pamwe nekupihwa mari dzemudyandigere sezviri kuitwa maWar Veterans.
Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Manyanya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo pasina chakaipa pakuchetenegedza varwi vehondo yerusununguko, vanoona sekuti danho iri riri kuda kutorwa richavhiringa hupfumi sezvakaitika muna 1997.
Vati vanhu havafaniri kuve nemweya wekuda kungomora chete vasingatarisi kuti remangwana renyika richange rakamira sei.
Kuma 80s hurumende yakadzika mitemo yeWar Veterans Act ne War Victims Compensation Fund iyo inosungira kuti vese vakarwira hondo yerusununguko vapihwe mari yemudyandigere pamwe nekubatsirwa panyaya dzehutano nedzidzo.
Muna 1997 sangano rinomirira varwi ava, reZimbabwe Liberation War Veterans Association, rakamanikdza hurumende kuti vapihwe zviuru makumi mashanu zvemadhora pamunhu mumwe izvo zvakadonhedza dhora remunyika nekukanganisa hupfumi wenyika.
Asi VaMarongwe vati rwendo runo havasi kuda kuti hurumende itore danho rinokanganisa hupfumi nekuda kwemaWar Veterans vachiti vachaumbawo Trust ichange ichiita mabhizimisi anotsvaga mari yekubatsira maWar Veterans.

Musangano wechitatu wekudyidzana pakati peZimbabwe neSouth Africa weBi-National Commission wapera nhasi muHarare, mutungamiriri weSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa, vachiti nyika yavo yakazvipira kubatsira Zimbabwe panyaya yekumutsiridza hupfumi hwayo pamwe nekuti zvirango zvayakatemerwa zvibviswe.
Kunyangwe hazvo South Africa ichiti yakazvipira kubatsira Zimbabwe, zvabuda pachena kuti nyika iyi haisi kuzopa Zimbabwe mari yechikwereti yairi kutsvaga inodarika bhiriyoni imwe chete. Zimbabwe yakatanga kukumbira mari iyi muna Zvita gore rapera. South Africa kubva nguva iyi yange ichingori haina mari yakadai.
VaRamaphosa vati nyika mbiri idzi dzatenderana kuvandudza hukama munyaya dzekutengeserana, nyaya dzemari nezvimwe uya vaudza makurukota avo kuti afambise mberi basa rekuona kuti zvirongwa makumi mana nezvishanu zvavakasainirana mukati memakore matatu apfuura zvatevedzwa.
Semuenzaniso vatiwo vanoda kuti nyaya yeOne Stop Border Post paBeitbridge ichigadziriswa nechimbi chimbi vachiti kana zvikagadziriswa zvinorerutsa kufamba kwevanhu nezvinhu pakati penyika mbiri idzi.
Vati vanoda kuona zvirango zvehupfumi zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nenyika dzekumadokero zvichibviswa vachiti zvinokanganisa hupfumi hweZimbabwe uye zviri kuomesera veruzhinji.
Vati pakutanga chaipo, Zimbabwe yainge isingakodzeri kutemerwa zvirango zvehupfumi nekudaro South Africa ichagara ichitaura kuti zvirango izvi zvibviswe kuti Zimbabwe ikwanise kuwana mari nerubatsiro sezvinongoitawo dzimwe nyika.
Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vatenda VaRamaphosa neSouth Africa nekutsigira Zimbabwe panguva yakaoma kwezvinhu vachiti izvi ndizvo zvinoita shamwari yepedyo.
Vatiwo Zimbabwe iri kuedza napose painogona napo kugadzirisa hupfumi hwayo, kukwezva vekunze pamwe nekugadzirisa mitemo yavo kuti inoenderane nebumbiro remutemo.
Zimbabwe neSouth Africa nhasi dzasainirana chibvumirano chekudyidzana panyaya dzezvekurima pamwe nekutambira gwaro pamusoro pekuti zvimwe zvibvumirano makumi mana nezvishanu zvakasainwa munguva yapfuura zviri kufamba sei.
VaMnangagwa vati zvirango zvehupfumi zviri kuvhiringa hupfumi hwenyika asi hurumende iri kushandisa zviwanikwa zvirimunyika kugadzirisa hupfumi apo iri kugadzirisa hukama hwayo nenyika dzepasi rese.
Nhengo yebhodhi yesangano rePlatform for Youth Development, VaOwen Dhliwayo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kuitwa neSouth Africa pakubatsira Zimbabwe zvakanaka chose.
Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaJames Johwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti South Africa iri kubatsira Zimbabwe semuvakidzani uyewo nekuti kunaka kwehupfumi hweZimbabwe kunoita kuti zvizvarwa zvemuno zviri munyika iyi zvidzoke kumusha.
Asi vati kunze kweSouth Africa, Zimbabwe inoramba ichida rubatsiro kubva kunyika dzepasi rese nemasangano akaita seInternational Monetary Fund neWorld Bank.
Mukuru weMedia Centre, VaEnerst Mudzengi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti havabvumirani naVaRamaphosa pazvirango zvehupfumi zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe vachiti VaRamaphosa vanofanira kutanga vanzwa kubva kuvanhu vese vemuZimbabwe kwete kutaura vanzwa divi rimwe chete.
Zimbabwe neSouth Africa dzave nenguva yekaraeba dzichidyidzana uye dzakakwidziridza hukama hwadzo kuenda pachinhanho chepamusoro cheBi-National Commission muna 2015.
Nhasi kuNational Heroes Acre, Zimbabwe inocherechedza zuva remagamba, vanhu vachipiwa mukana wekurangarira nekukudza avo vakazvipira kusunungura nyika uye neavo vakaishandira nemoyo wose.
Dangandira regore rinoti ndi ‘Lest We Forget’, kukurudzira vanhu kuti vasakanganwa zvakaitwa nemagamba. Mangwana kuNational Sports Stadium, pasi pedangandira rinoti ‘ZDF: Guaranteeing Peace and Security for National Development’, nyika ichapemberera zuva remauto.
Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, VaTapiwa Kapurura, vanoti kunyange hazvo bato reZanu-PF, pamwe chete nehurumende, rakasvibisa hugamba uye vachituma mauto kunetsana nevanhu pachinhambo chekuvabatsira, mazuva maviri aya mazuva anokosha zvikuru.
Chikwata cheDynamos chawana mukana wekuenda pamusoro pemakundano eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League kekutanga kubvira makundano emwaka uno atanga.
Chikwata ichi chiri kungoda kurova Caps United mumutambo unodaidzwa kunzi Harare Derby muRufaro Stadium neSvondo kuti chiende panhongonya pemakundano aya nepoindi imwe chete vachisvetuka Chicken Inn ne FC Platinum idzo dzine mapoinzi makumi mashanu nerimwechete.
Pari zvino, Dynamos ine mapoinzi makumi mana nemapfumbamwe zvekuti ikaita mangange inoramba iri pachinhanho chechitatu chairi pasi pemaGame Cocks neKugona Kunenge Kudada nepoinzi imwechete.
MaGame Cocks neKugona Kunenge Kudada havana mitambo svondo rino sezvo vePremier Soccer League vari kupa nguva ino kuzvikwata zvine mitambo yeligi yakasaririra neizvo zviri kutamba mitambo yepasi pasi muChibuku Super Cup.
Pakapedzisira kusangana Dembare nemaGreen Machine masvondo matatu apfuura Makepekepe akazvambaradzwa 2-0 asi mumwe muteveri mukuru wechikwata ichi, VaPeter Mugwagwa, avo vanobva mumusha weRimuka muKadoma vanoti ikozvino rave janha ravo
Asi Dynamos yacho haisi yekudherera sezvo isati yarohwa pamitambo yayo minomwe yapera yakateverana.
Kunyange hazvo vakaita mangange neHighlanders svondo rapera, sachigaro wevatsigiri vechikwata ichi muHarare, VaChristopher Mandizha, vanoti hapana chiri kuvatadzisa kutora mukombe weligi mwaka uno.
Zvikwata izvi zviri kupinda zvisina vamwe vatambi varambidzwa kutamba mutambo uyu nePremier Soccer League nemhaka yemakadhi avo awandisa.
Caps United ichange isina Valentine Musarurwa panguva iyo Dynamos ichange isina Lincoln Zvasiya na Tichaona Chipunza.
Murairidzi weDynamos, Lloyd Mutasa, azivisa zvekare kuti haasi kutambisa Christian Epoupa uyo ane nyaya iri kunetsa yekadhi raakapihwa svondo rapera kunyange hazvo veZifa vamupa mukana wekumushandisa.
Mutasa ari kukurudzira vatsigiri vechikwata chake kuti vauye muhuwandu hwavo kuzobatsira chikwata chavo kukunda.
Zvakamira zvakadai, vePremier Soccer League varonga zvekare mimwe mitambo miviri svondo rino, kwete yeleague asi yeChibuku Super Cup.
Mitambo iyi iriko yese mangwana, uyezve munhandare imwe chete yeMandava Stadium, kuchitanga mutambo pakati peHwange neYadah uyo uchazoteverwa neuyo uchasangana Tsholotsho Pirates neBantu Rovers.

Chikwata chenhabvu chemadzimai chemaMighty Warriors chabuda mumakwikwi eAfrica Cup of Nations yemadzimai mushure mekukundwa nechikwata cheZambia 2-1 kunhandare yeRufaro muHarare pamutambo wema qualifier.
Nyanzvi yezvemitambo VaMuziwethu Hadebe vanoti chikwata cheMighty Warriors hachina kuwana nguva yakanaka yekugadzirira mutambo uyu, uye kuzorora, mushure mekunge chaenda kuZambia nebhazi pakati pesvondo kumutambo wekutanga uyo chakakunda 1-0.
VaHadebe vanoti chikwata cheZambia chakapinda munyika nendege panguva iyo Zimbabwe yakanga ichidzoka munyika nebhazi zvakare.
Zvikwata zviviri izvi zvanga zvaita mangange 2-2, asi sezvo Zambia yakwanisa kunwisa zvibodzwa zviviri iri kunze, ukuwo Zimbabwe ikangonwisa chibodzwa chimwechete kuLusaka.
Mune mimwe mitambo yatambwawo munyika, Bulawayo Chiefs yarova Highlanders 1-0, kuchitiwo Dynamos yazokwanisawo kuwana mapoinzi matatu mushure mekurova Mutare City 1-0 mumutambo watambirwa kwaRusape. Yadah Stars yarova Chapungu 3-0, kuchitiwo Shabanie Mine neBlack Rhinos dzaitawo mangange 2-2.
Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinogara muSouth Africa, chakatanga chikoro chekudzidzisa vechidiki mutambo wenhabvu.
Cavin Muodzi anoti akatanga chikoro ichi achishandisa mari yake yaanotambira pamwedzi kubasa kwake.
Muodzi, uyo akatanga Harvest Soccer Academy muCape Town mugore ra2016, ane makore makumi maviri nemana ekuzvarwa.
Anoshanda muhotera achipa vanhu chikafu. Mari yaanotambira, pamwe neyemubhasera yaanopihwa, ndiyo yaakashandiswa mukuumba Harvest Soccer Academy.
Muodzi anoti ane vechidiki makumi mana nevatatu, uye chikoro chake chine zvikwata zvemazera zvitatu; chokutanga chine vana vane makore anotangira pagumi nemaviri, chechipiri chine vana vane makore gumi nemana, uye chechitatu chine vatambi vane makore gumi nematanhatuzvicikwira.
Muodzi anoti chinangwa cheHarvest Academy ndechekusimudzira nhabvu yevechidiki, kuderedza misikanzwa, uye kudzidzisa vechidiki kuremekedza vanhu vakuru.
Muodzi anoti pane matambudziko akawanda akatarisana nechikoro che Harvest Academy, ayo anosanganisira kushaikwa kwezvekushandisa.
Muodzi, uyo anotambawo nhabvu, anodzidziswa nechimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinotamba nhabvu uyewo chine ruziwo rwakadzama munyaya dzekudzidzisa nhabvu, Hilton Masunda.
Masunda anoti Harvest Academy izano rakabva kusvondo yavanopinda naMuodzi, yeNew Beginnings International Harvest Church, iyo inotungamirwa nechizvarwa cheZimbabwe, Pastor Irene Mapininga.
Masunda, uyo anodzidzisa vana vane makore ari pasi pegumi nemaviri pachikoro cheHarvest Academy, murairidziwo zvakare wenhabvu pachikoro cheSt Joseph’s Marist College makare muCape Town.
Mumwe ari kudzidziswa nhabvu pa Harvest Academy,Ricky Bongani Majimbo, anoti ari kudzidziswa zvinhu zvakawanda pachikoro ichi.
Mumwe wechidiki, Tinotenda Zvinounye, anoti matambiro ake bhora ashanduka, nekuda kweruzivo rwaari kuwana pa Harvest Academy.
Kunyange hazvo Muodzi achisangana nezvipingaidzo mushuviro yake, anoti izvi hazvisi kuzofa zvakaodza moyo wake.
Hurumende yeZimbabwe inonzi haisi kukoshesa varapi vechivanhu pamwe nemishonga yavo sezvo isiri kupa rutsigiro rwakasimba kubazi kuvarapi kunyange hazvo paine humbowo hunoratidza kuti zvikamu masere kubva muzana zvevanhu vemuZimbabwe zvinoenda kun’anga kana kushandisa mushonga yechivanhu pane dzimwe nguva.
Ongororo yakaitwa nesangano reWorld Health Organisation yakaratidzawo kuti zvikamu makumi masere kubva muzana zvevanhu vane hutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS pamwe nezvikamu makumi mashanu nezviviri zvemadzimai akazvitakura vanoshandisawo mishonga yechivanhu.
Vachipa humbowo nemaererano nemabasa ari kuitwa nehurumende kusimudzira mabasa evarapi vemuno pamwe nemishonga yavo, munyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano, Doctor Gerald Gwinji, vaudza komiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano kuti kunyange hazvo vanhu vakawanda vachishandisa mishonga iyi, hurumende hasi kuvapa mari yavanoda kusimudzira kushandiswa kwemishona iyi.
Doctor Gwinji vati bazi ravo rine chikamu chinoona nezvemishonga iyi asi chikamu ichi hachiwani mari yachinoda.
Semuenzaniso, Doctor Gwinji vati gore rega rega, chikamu ichi chinoda zviuru mazana matanhatu zvemadhora nechidumbu asi chinowanzo pihwa churu chemadhora chete izvo zvinoita kuti chitadze kuita basa racho.
Vanoti kunze kwekushaya mari vane zvakawanda zvavari kuita zvekuona kuti mabasa evarapi vemuno pamwe nemishonga yavo yasimudzirwa.
Vati mutemo we Traditional Medical Practitioners Act 11, Regulations on Complementary and the Traditional Medicine policy ndezvimwe zvavakaitwa kusimudzira mabasa evarapi vemuno.
Doctor Gwinji vati kunyange hazvo paine varapi vanodarika churu vakanyoreswa neTraditional Medical Practitioners Council, vanoziva kuti munyika mune n’anga nevarapi vakawanda kudarika apa uye mishonga yechivanhu iri kutengeswa pese pese kunyange munzvimbo dzisina kunyoreswa.
Vati zvingave zvakanaka chose kana varapi vese vakadzidziswa kubata mishonga yavo zvakanaka zvinoita kuti vanhu vasakanganiswa nemishonga iyi sezvinoitika pane dzimwe nguva.
Vati Zimbabwe inogona kudzidza zvakawanda kubva kune dzimwe nyika zvikuru sei kunyika dzakaita seIndia neChina idzo dzave kushandisa mishonga yechivanhu zvakanyanya.
Munyori anoona nezvedzidzo musangano reZimbabwe National Traditional Healers Association, VaPrince Mutandi Sibanda, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo vaine ruzivo rwekusimudzira mushonga yechivanhu, havasi kuwana rutsigirwo rwemari kuti vaite izvi.
VaSibanda vati ZINATHA ine nhengo dzakawanda chose zvekuti hazvivanetsi kugadzira mishonga yechivanhu nekubatsira vanhu vese munyika.
Muzvare Juliet Chirenje avo vari kudzidzira zvekurapa nemishonga yechivanhu pachikoro cheZINATHA vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende inofanira kuisa mari parutivi yekutsigira vanoshandisa mishonga yechivanhu.
Doctor Gwinji vati pari zvino pave nemasangano gumi nematatu anomiriria varapi vemuno akanyoreswa zviri pamutemo uyewo kune makirinika emishonga yemuno gumi nemana.
Asi vati mishonga iyi yave kutengeswa pese pese, mumigwagwa nedzimwe nzvimbo zvekuti bazi ravo rinoda kuti itengeswe zviri pamutemo pachitevedzwa hurongwa hweMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe pamwe ne Medical Research Council of Zimbabwe.

VaMbeki varikuedza kuuyisa mapato aya pamwe chete nemamwe masangano kuti vagare pasi vaite hurukuro pamusoro pemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika, izvo zvinonzi zvave kunyanya kukanganisa South Africa.
VaMbeki vakaitavo musangano nevemakereke.
Munyori weZimbabwe Council of Churches, Doctor Kenneth Mtata, vaudza Studio 7 kuti parizvino VaMbeki varikuedza kukurudzira kuti paitwe nhaurirano munyika, kwete kuti ndivo mutongi gava.
Mapurisa ekuMacheke asunga nhengo pfumbamwe dzesangano re Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, apo dzange dzichifora dzakananga kuHarare.
Sangano iri rinoti riri kufamba netsoka kubva kwaMutare richienda kuHarare kunosvitsa zvichemo zvinonganisira kuti varairidzi vatambiriswe mari yemadhora ekuAmerica, kwete kupihwa bond notes.
Vasungwa ava vanosanganisira mutungamiri wesangano iri, Va Obert Masaraure.
Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weARTUZ, Amai Gaudencia Mandiopera, vanoti mushure mekutorwa nemapurisa, vamwe vavo vazondeswa kukamba yemapurisa kuMarondera.
Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remapurisa, sezvo mutauriri wemapurisa, Amai Charity Charamba, vanga vasingadaire nhare mbozha yavo.
Amai Mandiopera vanoti vashamiswa nezvaitwa nemapurisa sezvo vakazivisa mapurisa nezvehurongwa hwekufora kwavo.
Varairidzi ava vakatanga rwendo rwavo kwaMutare musi wa 9 Zvita vaine chinangwa chekuratidza hurumende kuti havasi kufara nemabatirwo avari kuitwa nehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa.
Kufora uku kunonzi Salary Caravan, uye ARTUZ inoti ichaenderera mberi nekufamba netsoka kudzamara vapedza rwendo rwavo, uye kusvitsa nhuna dzavo kugurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube.
Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya yemihoro iyo ARTUZ inoti inoda kubhadharwa nemadhora ekuAmerica, kwete nema bond note.
Hurongwa hweARTUZ hunoitika panguva iyi vana chiremba vemuzvipatara zvehurumende vari kuratidzira vachiti vanodawo kuti hurumende igadzirise zvichemo zvavo pamwe nekugadzirisa zviri kunetsa muzvipatara zvehurumende kuitira kuti varwere varapwe nemazvo uye vachiwana mishonga inovakwanira muzvipatara izvi.

Hurumende yeZimbabwe iri kubhadhara mari inosvika zviuru mazana mashanu pagore kukambani yekuAmerica yeBallard Partners kuti iibatsire kuti ibvisirwe zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru vehurumende nemakambani ayo.
Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaDonald Trump vakawedzera zvirango izvi kwerimwe gore nemusi weMuvhuro vachiti Zimbabwe iri kuenderera mberi ichityora kodzero dzevanhu.
Kambani yeBallard inotungamirwa naVaBrian Ballard avo vakabatsira VaTrump kutsvaga mari yekuti vakwanise kutsvaga rutsigiro musarudzo muna 2016.
Vachange vachishanda kubatsira Zimbabwe mukambani iyi ndiVaJames Rubin avo vakamboshanda mubazi reState Department munguva yaitungamirwa nyika navaBill Clinton.
Aka hakasi kekutanga Zimbabwe ichibhadhara makambani mari kuti aibatsire. Vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakabhadhara imwe kambani yekuChicago mari inodarika mamiriyoni matatu asi vanhu vacho vakaguma vasungwa sezvo vaiita zvisiri pamutemo.
VaMangwana vanoti Zimbabwezvirango zvinofanira kubviswa nekuti hazvisi pamutemo.
Asi mutungamiri werimwe sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Yadzoka Mayibuye IZimbabwe vanoti zviri kuitwa neZimbabwe kungotambisa mari sezvo ichiziva zviri kudiwa neAmerica kuti zvirango zvibiswe.
Mumwe wevanhu anga ari mutsetse, VaRobert Ganyani, vanoti vasvikonzwa kuti vanhu vaviri varasikirwa nehupenyu vakamira mumutsetse.
Vanhu vanga vachida kurapwa vaswera vari mumutsetse murefu pachipatara cheParirenyatwa muHarare asi pasina chavabatsirwa nacho mukuvira kwezuva.
Sezvo vana chiremba nana mukoti vasiri kuenda kubasa vachiti havana mari dzekufambisa dzinovakwanira, kurapwa pachipatara ichi kuri kunetsa izvo zvava kukonzera kuti vamwe varwere varasikirwe nehupenyu.
Mumwe anga achiperekedza hama yake kunorapwa, VaItai Mundondo, vati kunyange vauya kuma 8 dzemangwanani, vanga vasati vabatsirwa apo zuva range rave kudoka.
Vamwewo vanoti kusaenda kubasa kwana chiremba nana mukoti kwapa mukana kuvamwe vana chiremba kuti vati vanorwarirwa vabvise mari vasati vavatarisa.
Nyaya yange iri imweyo kuHarare Hospital, uko vana mukoti vachiri kudzidzira basa vange vachishanda zvine chinono mukati.
Sangano rinomirira vana chiremba, reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, raburitsa gwaro richiti nhengo dzaro hadzisi kuzodzokera kumabasa kana hurumende isati yavapa mari yavo yemuhoro pamwe nemari yebhonasi.
Vanhu vazhinji vanoenda kuzvipatara zvehurumende vanhu vanotambura nekudaro kunyange kusina vana chiremba vanhu vakawanda vanongoramba vakagarira nechivimbo chekuti hurumende ichagadzirisa dambudiko iri mukuedza kuchengetedza hupenyu sezvo vasina mari dzekuenda kunoona vana chiremba kuzvipatara zvisiri zvehurumende.
Kuona chiremba kunoda mari inosvika madhora makumi matatu usati watanga kurapwa.
Hurumende iri kutora matanho akawanda anosanganisira kuvaka madhamu pamwe nekutenga mishonga inochenesa mvura senzira yekupedza dambudziko remvura mumadhora nemaguta munyika.
Vachizivisa zvazeyiwa nedare remakurukota nhasi, gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vati dare razeya nyaya yekunetsa kwemvura uye harina kufara nenyaya yekuti kanzuru yeHarare yakavhara michina inochenesa mvura yeMorton Jaffray isina kunzwa pfungwa dzehurumende.
Vatiwo dare raumba komiti inosanganisira mapazi ezvemari neremvura kuti ishande nekanzuru yeHarare mukugadzirisa dambudziko remvura.
Amai Mutsvangwa vatiwo hurumende iri kuronga kuti pave nehwaro hwekuti mishonga yekuchenura mvura yemakanzuru ese itengwe pamwechete.
Vatiwo hurumende yaita chisungo chekuti madhamu eKunzwi, Muda neNyatsime, avakwe nekukasika senzira yekupedza dambudziko remvura muHarare.
Gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncude, vatiwo hurumende yave kubatsira madhorobha nemaguta ese munyika kuti atenge mishonga yekuchenesa mvura vachiti pari zvino guta reKwekwe ndiro rega risati rabatsirwa nemvura.
VaNcube vatiwo hurumende ichabhadhara zvikwereti zvayo zvemvura uye vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vadhadhare zvikwereti zvavo kumakanzuru kuti akwanise kuvapa mvura yakachena.
Zvichakadai VaNcube vati hurumende ichaverenga vanhu zvakare muna 2022 uye chirongwa ichi chinokosha mamirioni makumi masere nemashanu emadhora.
Vati vanotarisira kuti zvichabuda muchirongwa ichi zvichaziviswa muna Kurume 2023.
Mune imwewo nyaya, Amai Mutsvangwa vati pane mabhanga matatu anoti, CBZ, Agribank neStanbic achashanda nehurumende pachirongwa cheCommanda Agriculture.
Amai Mutsvangwa vatiwo vanoda kupinda muchirongwa ichi vanoenda kumabhanga matatu aya uye vanotarisira kuti mamwe mabhanga achapinda muchirongwa ichi.
Mumakore apfuura, chirongwa ichi chakange chisina kujeka asi VaNcube vati chave kuitwa pachena uye mabhanga ndiwo ane hunyanzvi hwekuziva vanokodzera kana kusakodzera kupihwa zvikwereti zvekurimisa.
Bazi rezvehutano rinoti pane vanhu zana nemakumi maviri nemapfumbamwe vakabva kunyika dzakabatwa vanhu chirwere che coronavirus vari kumboongororwa munyika kusvika musi wa7 Kukadzi kuti vaonekwe kuti havana kutapurirwa chirwere ichi here.
Vanhu ava vakasvika munyika pakati pa25 na28 Ndira, unove mwedzi uno, vachibva kunyika dzakasiyanasiyana dzabatwa nedambudziko rechirwere ichi, kusanganisira China, uko kwachakatangira.
Chirwere ichi chauraya vanhu vanosvika zana nemakumi manomwe kuChina kwakare uye vamwe vanodarika zviuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana matanhatu vabatwa nacho kusvika pari nhasi munyika iyi.
Kunze kweChina, chirwere ichi chawanikwawo kunyika dzinosvika gumi nesere dzinosanganisira America, France, Germany, Japan neVietnam.
Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano Dr Henry Madzorera vanoti vanoona zviri zvinhu zvakanaka zvekudzivirira vanhu kuti chirwere ichi chisapararira.
Doctor Madzorera vanotiwo vanoona zvakakodzera kuti vanhu vari kutarisiswa ava vange vachimbogara vari kudzimba dzavo vachiongororwa sezvo pasati pave nemunhu abatwa nechirwere.
Vanoti nekuda kwekuoma kwezvinhu mune zveupfumi, Zimbabwe haizokwanise kuita sedzimwe nyika dzakabudirira dzinonzi dzakatovaka zvipatara zvekuchengetera vanhu vari kuongororwa kana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi.
Vagari vanosvika zviuru zviviri vemu ward 1 ne 2 mudhorobha reMasvingo vonyorera gurukota muhofisi yaVaKembo Mohadi mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiriri wenyika, VaDavis Marapira, tsamba yenyunyuto vachiti vabvise dhamu ravakavaka murwizi rweMucheke zvave kutadzisa mvura kuenda kudhamu rinopa guta mvura reMutirikwi.
Mugwaro iri vagari ava vanoti kuvharwa kwaita mvura kuri kukonzera kushomeka kwemvura mudhamu reMutirikwi izvo zvinozoita kuti vatarisane nedambudziko remvura asi VaMarapira vachidiridzira havo purazi ravo.

Mushure memusangano uyu, vechidiki veMDC mudunhu reHarare vakabva vapinda mumigwagwa vachiratidzira vachikurudzira kuti VaMnangagwa vasiye basa. Varatidzira ava vakazoparadzwa nemapurisa achishandisa utsi hunokachidza.
Zvichitevera mashoko aya, pave nemaonero akasiyana pamusoro pedanho riri kukurudzirwa navatsigiri veMDC iri, vamwe vachiti pane nzira dzakawanda kwazvo dzekugadzirisa nadzo matambudziko ari munyika dzisiri kupinda mumigwagwa.
Ukuwo, vamwe vari kuti mutauro unonzwisiswa nehurumende chete ndewekuti vanhu vapinde mumigwagwa, uye izvi zvinobvumirwa mubumbiro remitemo yenyika.
Mukuru weCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu ndemumwe wevari kukurudzira kuti vanhu varatidzire murunyararo, vachiti hapana chinobatika chati chaitwa nehurumende mukuratidza kuti ine zvairi kuita mukugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika.

Asi VaMaguwu vanoti chinhu chinozivikanwa nemunhu wese kuti kubva muna 2000 nyika haina kwairi kuenda, iri kungotenderera panzvimbo imwechete nekuti hurumende iri kungoramba ichipa pfungwa dzisina zvadzinobatsira nyika nazvo.

VaStanley Takaona vesangano re Zimbabwe HIV/AIDS Activist Union Community Trust, avo vanoraramawo neHIV, vanoti mapiritsi anorwadza zvikuru akanwiwa pasina chikafu.
Vanorarama neHIV/AIDS vari pamapiritsi emaAnti Retro Viral Drugs, ARVs, vanoti vari kukumbira kuhurumende nemasangano akazvimirira kuti vavawanire chikafu chakakwana sezvo mishonga yavari kunwa ichida kunwiwa nemunhu anenge adya chikafu chakakodzera.
Muzvare Eulidis Mapuranga vave nemakore mashanu vachirarama neHIV/AIDS, uye vari kunwa ma ARVs.
Muzvare Mapuranga vanorarama nekutenga zvinhu muHarare vachinochinjanisa nezvirimwa kana kutengesa nemari kumaruwa akatenderedza guta reHarare.
Asi vanoti bhizimusi ravo harisi kuchafamba semazuva ese gore rino nekuda kwenzara.
Vanoti izvi zvave kukanganisa hutano hwavo sezvo vasingachawani zvekudya zvakakwana zvinovaka muviri.
Muzvare Mapuranga vanoti mapiritsi avanomwa anoda chikafu chakakwana, asi nekuda kwenzara yegore rino, vanogona kuzotadza kuramba vachinwa mapiritsi aya.

Vanoti nenzara yakatarisana nenyika, vamwe vari kurarama nehutachiona vanogona kusazonwa mapiritsi aya kana kutourawa nawo nenyaya yekushaya zvekudya.
VaTakaona, avo vave pamapiritsi anonzi "Second Line Drugs" vanoti kunwa mapiritsi aya pasina chikafu zvine njodzi huru.
VaTakaona vanoti mapiritsi aya achangotanga kupiwa pachena, masangano akazvimirira aimbopawo vanorarama neHIV/AIDS zvinobatsira kuvaka muviri. Vanoti dai masangano aya akatanga zvakare kubatsira avo vari kushaya chikafu chakakwana.
Imwezve nyanzvi munyaya dzezveutano, kusanganisira HIV/Aids, Muzvare Muchaneta Mukamuri, vano ichokwadi kuti mapiritsi mazhinji anoda kunwiwa nemunhu anenge adya chikafu kuitira kuti anyatsoshanda zvakanaka nekusavhiringa hutano hwemunhu.

Muna 1981, Tinago ndiye akaita mutambi wekutanga kuita mukurumbira kunze kwenyika apo akatora mukombe wake wekutanga wemuAfrican mushure mekupunzira pasi Hogan Jimoh wekuNigeria.
Izvi hazvina kugumira ipapo sezvo Tinago akazoenderera mberi nekunotora mikombe mitatu yeCommonwealth muhuremu hwakasiyana-siyana.
Tinago akapinda mudariro achirwa kanokwa zana nemitambo minomwe, akakunda mitambo makumi masere nemitatu, gumi nemitanhatu achiita knock out vaairwa navo.
Mumitambo iyi, akakundwa mumitambo makumi maviri, mina achiitwa knock out.Muna 1999, Tinago akadomwa pavatambi vairwira mukombe weZimbabwe Sportsperson of the Century, mukombe wacho ukazotorwa naNick Price wemutambo wegorofu.
Tinago akaberekerwa kuShurugwi muna 1949. Vanhu vakaungana pamba paTinago panhamba 42 Kezani Road, muMambo, Gweru.Mashoko ekuradzikwa kwake haasati abuditswa.

“The day after, it was a Saturday, the day after Cyclone Idai, ndakakwira upstair pa first floor. Ndakaona vanhu vakawanda vachifamba, madzimai, vana, varume, vakatakura zvinhu zvavo just trying to find higher ground, pane shelter. So ndakangoti kune team yangu, haa, boys vhurai ma doors, vanhu ngavapinde,” VaMataure vanodaro.

Imwe nhengo yeSangano iri, Muzvare Chipo Mashingaidze, vanoti sangano ravo riri kubatsira vanamukoti, vanachiremba, mapurisa, mauto pamwe nevashandi vekanzuru vari kushanda mumabasa akasiyanasiyana ane chekuita nekudzivirira chirwere charura pasi rose ichi kuburikidza nekuvatsvagira zvikwanisiro zvekupfeka vachiita mabasa avo ekurwisana neCovid-19.
Muzvare Mashingaidze vanoti vari kuunganidzawo rubatsiro rwakasiyanasiyana rwunosanganisira mvura yekunwa pamwe nezvekudya.
Vanoti sesangano, vari kubatsirawo zvakare vakwegura, vakaremara nevana vadiki vari kutungamira dzimhuri, uye vanoti kusvika pari zvino vabatsira mhuri dziri mumisha yeMbare neEpworth.
Muzvare Mashingaidze vanoti sesangano vanotenda zvikuru vose vari kubatsira nenzira dzakasiyanasiyana kuti basa ravo rirambe richienderera mberi.
Vanoti sangano ravo rakatangwa nevagari vakangozvipirawo kuti vabatsire mushure mekuona zviri kuitwa nevari kuzvipira kushanda vachidzivirira vana veZimbabwe kuti vasabatwa nechirwere ichi.
Mapato anopikisa nemasangano akazvimirira ari kushora bato reZanu PF nekurudziro yaro yekuti mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, VaBrian Nichols, vadzingwe munyika uye kukurudzira kwariri kuita kuti vatsigiri varo vaise mitemo mumaoko avo.

VaChinamasa vakakurudzira vatsigiri vavo kuti vazvidzivirire pose pavanenge vachirwiswa, uye vakatiwo Zimbabwe inogona kudzinga VaNichols munyika nekuti vari kupindira mune zvematongerwo enyika.
Mumwe wevari kutungamira hurongwa hwekuratidzira kwemusi weChishanu uhwu, VaRody Takaruza, vaudza Studio7 kuti kuratidzira kwavari kuronga hakunei neAmerica nemumiriri wayo muZimbabwe, VaBrian Nichols, asi kuti veruzhinji havasi kufara nemafambisirwo ari kuitwa zvinhu nehurumende yaVaMnangagwa.
Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatshwayo, avo vati Zanu PF yafanana nababa vanopomera muvakidzani wayo mhosva yekusafambisa zvinhu zvakanaka pamusha payo.

Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaNichols pamwe nemuzinda weAmerica kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi.
Asi muzinda weAmerica uyu wakaburitsa mashoko paTwitter mazuva mashoma adarika uchiti kushevedzera kuratidzira murunyararo kana kuve nechekuita nekuratidzira murunyararo zvinhu zvinokoshesa kodzero dzevanhu sematarirwo adzakaitwa mubumbiro remitemo yenyika.
Muzinda uyu wakabudawo pachena uchiti hauneyi nehurongwa hwekuratidzira kuri kuda kuitwa muZimbabwe, asi ukati Zimbabwe inofanirwa kuremekedza mitemo yayo sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika.

Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kurarama neHIV/AIDS muBotswana zvinoti zviri kudawo kuti zvipihwe pachena mushonga unoderedza hukasha hweHIV/AIDS.
Muongororo yakaitwa neStudio7 mumaguta eFrancistown neGaborone, ayo anogara vanhu vakawanda vekuZimbabwe, inoratidza kuti vanhu vakawanda vari kukumbira rubatsiro kuvakuru vemadhorobha aya.
Meya weguta reGaborone, VaKagiso Thutwe, vanoti ichokwadi kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe nezvimwe zvinobva kune dzimwe nyika, zviri kuda rubatsiro urwu.
Izvi zvinotsigirwa nameya weFrancistown, Amai Sylvia Muzila, avo vanoti vanhu vakawanda vekune dzimwe nyika, kusanganisira Zimbabwe, vari kuuya kwavari vachikumbira kuti vapihwewo mishonga iyi pachena.
Mumwe anorarama nekuita mabasa emaoko muGaborone, VaMoses Chamunorwa, vanoti vanhu vakawanda vari kuuya kuBotswana vaine shuviro yekuwana mishonga, sezvo muZimbabwe muri kuitwa huori pakupa vanhu mishonga iyi.
Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reNational AIDS Council of Zimbabwe panyaya yehuori inonzi iri kuitika pakupihwa kwevanhu mishonga yema Antiretroviral Drugs, ARVs.
Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, Muzvare Celestine Mupandawana, vanoti Botswana inobata zvakanaka chose zvizvarwa zvayo zvinoda mishonga yema ARVs.
Muzvare Mupandawana vanoti izvi ndizvo zviri kupa kuti vekunze vauye kuBotswana kuitira kuti vawane mishonga iyi.
Asi chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chisina kuda kudomwa nezita nokuda kwekuti chinorarama neHIV/AIDS, chinoti dambudziko remari ndiro rinoita kuti vamwe vasakwanise kuenda kumusha kunopihwa mishonga iyi sezvo vanenge vakauya kuBotswana vari pama ARVs kare.
Mumwe mugari, Muzvare Venencia Musavengana, vanoti zvimwe zvizvarwa zvenyika yechipikirwa zvava netsika isina kunaka yokungoda kukumbira zvese zvese pane kuti vanobatsirwe kumusha.
Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano, VaWiston Muzangwa, vanoti kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu kuZimbabwe ndiko kuri kukonzera kuti vamwe vaore moyo mukunotsvaga rubatsiro kumusha.
Bazi re National AIDS Coordinating Agency rinoti pane vanhu vanosvika zviuru zvitanhatu nemazana mashanu vanobva kunze kweBotswana vari pamishonga yema ARVs, zvikamu makumi matanhatu nezviviri kubva muzana, vari vanhu vekuZimbabwe.
Bazi iri rinoti zvizvarwa zveBotswana zvinosvika mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu ezviuru zviri kupihwa mishonga yemaARVs pachena.
Pasi pemitemo yenyika, Botswana inopa chete mishonga iyi kuzvizvarwa zvayo, vanhu vekunze vakaroorwa kana kuroora chizvarwa cheBotswana, uye vanhu vari mumajeri.

Munamato uyu wanzi uchapindwa nevachakokwa chete neve George Bush Presidential Library Foundation. Vaimbove vatungamiriri veAmerica nevamwe vanoremekedzwa, vari kutariswa kunge vari kumunamato uyu.

Bazi iri rakati vanhu vakanga vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi kusvika neMuvhuro vakanga vasvika pazviuru zvitatu nemazana masere ane makumi mana nevasere kana kuti 3 848, izvo zvakasiya vanhu chiuru nemazana matatu nemakumi maviri nevashanu kana kuti 1 325 vari ivo vachine chirwere ichi munyika yose.

Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Va Elliot Mupesi, vanoti munhu akagara kwenguva yakareba vachinwa hwahwa pamwe nekugocha nyama vachidya apo vainwa doro nevamwe vavo.

Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano, Dr Caldwell Munjoma, vanoti ichokwadi kuti kudya munyu wakawandisa, zvimwe zvezvinhu zvinokonzera kuti munhu azoita dambudziko reBP.
Dr Munjoma vanoti vanhu vanoputa fodya pamwe nekunwa doro zvakapfurikidza, ndivo vamwe vevanhu vanobatwa nechirwere cheBP. Vanoti kuputa fodya kuvhiringidza kuzwa munyu izvo zvinozoita kuti vawanze munyu muchikafu chavanodya.

Dr Munjoma vanoti sezvo vanhu vatema vakaonekwa kuti ndivo vanonyanya kubatwa wechirwere ichi, vakazodya chikafu chisina utano, zvinobva zvanyanya kuvhiringidza hutano hwavo.
Dr Munjoma vanoti chirwere cheBP chinonyanyawo kubata zvakare vanhu vane muviri yakakurisa inonzi pachirungu obesity, vasingatwasanudze mitezo yavo kuburikidza nekufamba, kumhanya nekuita mitambo.

Muzvare Gachungi vakati panouraiwa kana kushungurudzwa vatori venhau, kashoma kuti nyaya idzi dziferefetwe zvizere kuitira kuti vanenge vaita izvi varangwe, vachiti maitiro akadai anokanganisa kuchengetedzeka kwevatapi venhau.

Muzvare Gachungi vakabvumirana nemaonero aya vachiti ongororo yesangano reUNESCO inoratidza kuti kushungurudzwa kwevatapi venhau vechikadzi munyika dzemuAfrica kuri kuwedzera.
"Chinhu chinonetsa ndechekuti vemakambani ekutapa nhawu havana mitemo iripo yakajeka inobastira kuchengetedzeka kwevatapi venhau vechikadzi. Vanenge vanofunga kuti kushungurudzwa kana kuti matambudziko anosangana nevatapi venhau vechikadzi akafanana neevatapi venhau vechirume asi izvi hazvisi izvo," vadaro Muzvare Gachungi.
Muzvare Gachungu vakaudza Studio7 kuti ongororo yeUNESCO inoratidza kuti pane nyika makumi maviri neina dzemuAfrica dzave nemutemo wakajeka weAccess to Information unokurudzira kuti hurumende pamwe nemapazi adzo, makambani kana masangano akasiyana siyana, abudise pachena zvaanoita. Muimbi wemuSouth Africa ane mukurumbira zvikuru pasi rose Joseph Shabalala uyo akavamba chikwata cheLadysmith Black Mambazo akashaya nezuro kuPretoria.
Chikwata cheBlack Mambazo chakapihwa mibayiro yepamusoro munyaya dzemimhanzi kana kuti maGrammy Awards kanokwana kuita kashanu.
Kambo kavo, Swing Low Sweet Chariot kakaimbwa pamakwikwi eWorld Cup yemuna 1995 kakasvika pachidanho chegumi neshanu paBritish Chats.
Parizvino, chikwata cheLadysmith Black Mambazo chiri kushanya muAmerica uye chinoti charwadzikana rerufu urwu. Chichinyora padandemutande racho reTwitter, chikwata ichi chati charasikirwa nemudzidzisi, uye baba vaive nemoyo munyoro.
Chatiwo mimhanzi yake ichararama nekusingapere mumoyo yemamiriyoni evanhu pasi rose.
Hurumende yeSouth Africa yatumirawo mashoko enyaradzo kumhuri yaVaShabalala. Shabalala vakaberekwa muna 1941.
Shabalala anoti chido chake chaive chekuva chiremba kana mudzidzisi asi izvi hazvina kuzobudirira sezvo baba vake vakashaya ari mudiki achibva asiira chikoro panzira ave nemakore gumi nemaviri achibva atanga rwendo rwekuimba mumaraini nevamwe vechidiki kusvika azoumba chikwata cheLadysmith Black Mambazo kuma 1950 kuKwaZulu Natal.
Chikwata ichi chinoimba nziyo dzechiZulu uye isithakamiya. Mambazo zvinoreva kuti demo. Chikwata ichi chakabuda paradio muna 1970 zvakapa kuti chibva chatanga kuwana mukana wekutsikisa nziyo muna 1973 apo vakaburitsa dambarefu rinonzi Amabutho.
Asi mbiri pasi rose yakatanga apo chikwata ichi chakaita mushandirapamwe naPaul Simon muimbi wekuAmerica muna 1986 padambarefu rinonzi Graceland pane kambo kanonzi Homeless uye kanonazi Diamonds on the Soles of Her Shoes.”
Muna 1987, Shabalala, Miriam Makeba, Paul Simon naRay Phiri vakaridza muHarare vachitsigira Paul Simon apo aishambadza dambarefu rake Graceland.
Chikwata ichi chakapihwa mukana wekubuda pazvirongwa zvakaita seSesame Street, Broadway uye Tonight Show.
Muna 1993 apo VaNelson Mandela vakapihwa mubayiro weNobel Peace Prize uye pakagadzwa VaMandela kuve mutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa mutema wekutanga muna 1994, chikwara ichi chakapihwa mukana wekuimba.
Ladysmith Black Mambazo yakaimbawo nziyo namuchakabvu Oliver Mtukudzi. Kamwe kambo kavakaimba vose kavandudzwa ndi Neria. VeTuku Music avo vari kuchengetedza nhaka yamuchakabvu Tuku vanoti varwadziwa zvikuru nerufu urwu.
Mtukudzi naShabalala vakatanga kuzivana muna 1978 uye vainge vari vanasahwira vakatsikisawo kamwe kambo vose kanonzi Hello my Baby.
Chikwata ichi chakaimbawo nevamwe vaimbi vane mukurumbira vanosanganisira Stevie Wonder, Dolly Patton nevamwe. VaMandela vakati chikwata ichi chaive vamiriri veSouth Africa munyaya dzetsika dzenyika iyi. Rufu urwu rwauya South Africa ichicherechedza makore makumi matatu VaMandela vaburitswa mujeri.
Nenyaya yekusanzwa zvakanaka Shabalala ange amira zvekuimba asi vana vake vanomwe vari muchikwata ichi.
Muna 2002, mudzimai waShabalala, Nelly aive mufundisi akapfuurwa akafa muna 2002 muDurban. Shabalala akakuvara chimhanyisa Mboneni Mdungwe uyo ainge apfuura mudzimai waka akazotongeerwa kugara mujeri kwehupenyu hwake hwose.

Vachiparura gwaro reongororo yavo yegaore rapera, Amai Chiri vati hurumende yakapfurikidza mari yayaifanira kushandisa nemadhora mabhiriyoni maviri nechidimbu uye kusvika pari zvino, haisati yaenda kuparamende kunogadzirisa nyaya iyi sezvinodiwa nemutemo.
Hurumende yafanira kushandisa mabhiriyoni mana nemazana matanhatu ezviuru zvemadhora asi iyo ikashandisa madhora mamabhiriyoni manomwe nechidimbu isina mvumo yeparamende.
Vatiwo mapazi ehurumende aishandisa mari zvisina mwero kana zvaisina kurongerwa uye mune mamwe mapazi, vakatoshaya humbowo hunoratidza kuti mari yakashandiswei.
Semuenzaniso, Amai Chiri vati pane mamiriyoni maviri nechidimbu chemadhora akashandiswa nemapazi ehurumende kutenga motokari, majenerata nezvimwe asi zvinhu izvi hazvina kuendeswa kumapazi aya.
Vatiwo bazi redzidzo yePrimary neSecondary rakapihwa mamiriyoni matanhatu emadhora eku America kuti rigadzirise nyaya dzekuronga zvidzidzo kana kuti Curriculum Development asi mari iyi yakashandiswa zvimwe.
Vatiwo pazana rezviuru zvemadhora rafanira kupihwa vana sorojena, zviuru makumi matatu nezvisere ndiyo yega yavakapihwa uye imwe yese yakashandiswa nevekumahofisi egurukota rezvevashandi kubhadhara mahotera nekufamba kuenda kumisangano
Amai Chiri vatiwo zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mumakambani ehurumende umo vanhu vari kuita madiro eJojina vachipfachura mari inofanira kubatsira veruzhinji nenyika.
Semuenzaniso vati Grain Marketing Board yakabhadhara miriyoni yemadhora yekutenga chibage gore rapfuura, uye kusvika nanhasi chibage ichi hachisati chauya uye hapana anoziva kuti chichauya here.

Vatiwo zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kumakunzuru uko makanzuru akawanda munyika asiri kufambisa basa zvakanaka pamwe nekushandisa mari zvisina mwero.
Asi vati muhuwori hwese huri kuitika kune mamwe makakanzuru akaita sePfura iyo iri kuita basa rinodadisa.
Vatiwo zvinosuwisa kuti mari dziri kushandiswa zvisina mwero, kubiwa kana kushandiswa zvisina mature, asi vanhu vachitambura munyika.

Paramende yeZimbabwe nhasi yanyora magwaro ekusungisa kambani mukuru wekambani yeFert, Seed, Grain (FSG) nemhosva yekuzvidza dare.
Sachigaro vekomiti iyi, VaTendai Biti veMDC, vati zviri pachena kuti vakuru vekambani iyi vari kuzvidza komiti yavo saka vaita chisungo chekuti mukuru wekambani iyi, VaSteve Morland, vasungwe nenyaya yekuzvidza dare.
Vakuru vekambani iyi vatadza kuuya kuzotsangangura kuti sei yakabhadharwa mamiriyoni mazana mana emadhora ($400 million) nehurumende muna 2017 na2018 zviri kunze kwebhajeti pamwe nekuti mari iyi yakashandiswei.
FSG ndeimwe yemakambani ari kuda kubvunzurudzwa nekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekushandiswa kwemari yehurumende, yePublic Accounts Committee, iyo iri kuongororo kunofungidzirwa kuti kusashandiswa zvakanaka kwemari yehurumende inodarika mabhiriyoni mashanu muna 2017 na 2018.
Kambani iyi yave nenguva ichitadza kumira pamberi pekomiti iyi isingape zvikonzero uye nhasi chaiye yatadza kuuya zvagumbira nhengo dzeparamende dziri mukomiti yezvekufambiswa kwemari.
VaBiti vanoti zvino shamisa kuti kambani yeFSG inoramba kuuya kukomiti yavo asi ichienda kune mamwe makaomiti eparamende. Mwedzi uno VaMorland vakaenda kunomira pamberi pekomiti yezvekurima ina VaJustice Wadyajena vanova nhengo yeZanu-PF sasachigaro.

Zvikwata zvemuAfrica zviri kuWorld Cup kuRussia zviri kutatarika zvakanyanya zvekuti kusvika parizvino patambwa mutambo mumwe chete nenyika dzakawanda.
Nyika dziri kumirira Africa kumakwikwi aya dzinoti, Egypt, Morocco, Nigeria, Senegal neTunisia.

Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanoti vanoshamiswa nevanhu vanoti hurumende ine chekuita nekupambwa pamwe nekushungurudzwa kwevanhu uku ipo pasina humbowo.
VaChirumhanzu vanoti vanhu havafanirwe kumhanyira nyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu vasingataure nezvezvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa nyika neAmerica, vachiti vose vanoti vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanofanirwa kuonekwa nekutungamira mukuratidzira kumuzinda weAmerica vachikurudzira kuti zvirango zvibviswe.
Mudzimai wevaive murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu akatsakatika makore mashanu apfuura, VaItai Dzamara, Amai Sheffra Dzamara nhasi vaendesa tsamba kuhofisi yemutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa yeMunhumutapa Building vachiti hurumende inofanira kutsvaga kune murume wavo.
Amai Dzamara vanoti tsamba yenyunyuto iyi ndeyechipiri yavaendeswa kuna VaMnangagwa kubva zvatsakatika murume wavo muna 2015.
Vanotiwo vakamboendesa tsamba yakadai kuhofisi yevaive mutungamiri wenyika muchakabvu Robert Mugabe.
Amai Dzamara vati hupenyu hwakavaomera zvikuru sezvo vachigarofunga kuti chii chakaitika kune murume wavo uye vati hurumende hapana zvairi kuvaitira parizvino kubatsira kutsvaka murume wavo.
Asi vati havasati varasa tariro yekuti murume wavo anogona kuwanikwa ari mupenyu.
Mutsamba yavo yenyunyuto iyi yaonekwa neStudio 7, Amai Dzamara vati vanoda kunzwa kubva kunaVaMnangagwa kuti chii chakaitika kumurume wavo sezvo vasina chekutaura kune vana vavo vaviri, Nenyasha na Nokutenda.
Vati vave kutoti kunyangwe vachifamba mudhorobha reHarare vakaona chero munhu ari kuzvifambira achipenga vanotombotarisa kuti haasi murume wavo here. Vanotiwo hakuna munhu anongotsakatika uye vati vanoziva kuti muhurumende pane anoziva zvakaitika kune murume wavo.
VaPatson Dzamara, vanova muninina waVaItai Dzamara vati vanotsutsumwa zvakanyanya nekuti hurumende haisi kuvabatsira kutsvaga kuna Itai.
Gweta remhuri yekwaDzamara, VaCharles Kwaramba vatsigirawo kuti hurumende haisi kumboratidza chido chekutsvaka VaDzamara zvisinei nekuti dare repamusoro reHigh Court muna 2015 rakapa chiga chekuti mapurisa aite zvese zvavanogona mukutsvaka VaDzamara .
Patabata mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyatsi kuti tinzwe kuti vave papi nekutsvaka VaDzamara, vati tivafonere mangwana sezvo nhasi vanga vakabatikana. Mutauriri waVaMnangagwa, VaGeorge Charamba vange vasiri kudairwo nharembozha yavo.

Sangano ravana chiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyika, re Zimbabwe Doctors for Human Rights, rinoti Dr. Peter Magombeyi vabuda munyika vachienda kunorapwa ku South Africa.
Dr. Magombeyi vasvika muSouth Africa manheru eChina.
Sangano iri rinoti riri kufara zvikuru kuti Dr. Magombeyi, avo vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri we Zimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, vakwanisa kukwira ndege vachienda ku South Africa kuitira kuti vanorapwa.
Mutauriri wesangano iri, Dr. Fortune Nyamande, vanoti Dr. Magombeyi munhu anoda kurapwa zvechimbi chimbi nenyanzvi sezvo hutano hwavo hwakavhiringwa pavakanga vari muhunhapwa.
Dr. Nyamande vabvumawo kuti ichokwadi kuti Dr. Magombeyi vasvika muSouth Africa, asi havana kuda kutaura zvakawanda pamusoro penzvimbo ichange ichirapirwa Dr. Magombeyi.
Dr Magombeyi vakapambwa musi waGunyana 14 nevanhu vasiri kuzivikanwa kuti ndivanani asi vakazowanikwa musi waGunyana 19 vari kuNyabira.
Dr. Magombeyi vanonzi vakatochwa zvakaipisisa pavaive muhunhapwa, uye izvi zvakabudawo muongororo inonzi yakaitwa navana chiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu pamwe navana chiremba vaimirira hurumende.
Asi mubvunzo mukuru uri kushaya mhinduro ndewekuti Dr. Magombeyi vakatochwa nani?
Mutongi wedare repamusoro, VaHappias Zhou, vakatura mutongo nemusi weChipiri vachiti Dr. Magombeyi vanofanirwa kunorapwa kwavanoda.
Asi mapurisa akarambidza Dr. Magombeyi kubuda muchipatara mavakanga vari.
Mumwe mutongo wakaturwa zvakare naVaGeorge Chiweshe avo vakati mapurisa haafanirwe kudzivisa kana kutadzisa Dr. Magombeyi kubuda munyika vachienda kunorapwa kuSouth Africa.
Tsvagiridzo yaitwa neStudio7 inoratidza kuti Dr. Magombeyi vabuda munyika vachishandisa ndege yeSouth African Airways Flight Number SA029 iyo yasimuka muHarare na 5:10pm kunyange hazvo yanga ichifanirwa kusimuka na 5:06pm.
Ndege iyi, iyo inova yemhando ye Airbus 320-232, yamhara panhandare yemuJohannesburg na 6:39pm mushure mekupedza awa imwe chete nemaminetsi makumi matatu nematatu iri mudenga kunyange hazvo ndege iyi yanga yakatarisirwa kumhara na6:50pm.
Dr. Magombeyi vachange vachirapwa vari muSouth Africa kusvika vava kunzwa zvakanaka.
Hazvisati zvozivikanwa kuti Dr. Magombeyi vachange vachirapirwa pachipatara chipi, uye kuti ndiyani achange ari mukuru wevana chiremba vachange vachirapa Dr. Magombeyi.
Pari zvino vanachiremba vaDr. Magombeyi muZimbabwe vanoti Dr. Magombeyi vanofanirwa kumbosiyiwa vari vega kudzamara vanachiremba vagutsikana kuti vachionekwa neveruzhinji.
Paita kukandirana makobvu nematete pakati peZimbabwe neAmerica panyaya yekodzero dzevanhu zvichiteverewa kuurayiwa kwemumwe murume mutema wekuAmerica, VaGeorge Floyd, pachipomerwa mapurisa mana mhosva yekumuponda.
America yakati Zimbabwe, China neRussia dzave kushandisa rufu urwu senzira yekuita tinhai dzirwe kukurudzira kurwisana kwemarudzi.
Nemusi weChina vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri weZanu-PF, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakashora zvikuru hurumende yeAmerica vachiti inodzvinyirira vatema vachiti mashoko aVaFloyd ekupedzisira ekuti handisi kukwanisa kufema anofanira kushandiswa nevanhu vemuZimbabwe, Iran neCuba semunongedzo wekuti havasi kukwanisawo kufema nezvirango zvavakatemerwa.
Asi America nedzimwe nyika dzakabudirira inoti zvirango izvi zvakatemerwa mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nenyaya yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu.

Vanoti America haisi kuzomira kushora kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu muZimbabwe.
Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti kodzero dzevanhu pasi rose dzinofanira kuchengetedzwa vakatiwo Zanu-PF haifanire kukwira pachuru ichishora vamwe iyo iinewo chitanda muziso.
Asi nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vanoti America inofanira kuita senyika yakabudirira ichiremekedza kodzero dzevanhu sezvainokurudzirawo kune dzimwe nyika.
Vatiwo Zimbabwe haina simba rekuti muAmerica musave nekugadzikana.
Sangano reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe (ARTUZ) raita neMugovera musangano nevadzidzisi muBulawayo pasi pechirongwa che ‘Safe Learning Institutions Initiative’.
Musangano uyu wapindwa nevadzidzisi vanobva kumatunhu eMatabeleland North, Matabeleland South nedunhu reBulawayo.
Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, vaudza Studio7 kuti musangano uyu wabudirira zvikuru uye vese vange vachitarisirwa kuuya vange vari pamusangano uyu.
VaMasaraure vati paitwa zvisungo zvishanu zvinosanganisira kuudza hurumunde kuti isaine gwaro rechirongwa che ‘safe schools’ chakatenderanwa kuOslo kuNorway muna 2015.
Musangano uyu wapindwawo nemasangano eVeritas, Zimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, Student Christian Movement of Zimbabwe nemamwe.
VaMasaraure vanoti masangano aya achange ari kuChinhoyi svondo rinouya uko vachaita musangano nevadzidzisi vechidzimai vachitaura maonero avo uye kuti vape pfungwa dzavo pane zvavanotarisira kuti zviitwe muzvikoro kuitira kuti vaite basa ravo vakasununguka uye vasingatye.
Zimbabwe Republic Police inoti kusvika pari zvino, vanhu makumi maviri nemumwe vafa mutsaona dzemumigwagwa munyika yose pazororo reEaster.
