VaNyathi vatiwo tsaona idzi dziri kuitika munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana.
VaNyathi vati gore rino vane zvikwata zvakawanda zviri kushanda nesangano reTraffic Safety, pamwe nebazi riezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu vachiyambira veruzhinji kuzvibata kana vari mumigwagwa, kuitira kuti vasapinda mutsaona.
Misika yefodya yavhura nhasi mitengo iri pasi izvo zvisina kufadza varimi vakawanda avo vazivisa kuti vave kumbomira kutengesa fodya yavo kudzamara mitengo yasvika pari nani.
Mwaka wekutengesa fodya waparurwa nhasi nemumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika, VaKembo Mohadi pamusika weTobacco Sales Floor, apo mutengo wepamusoro wange uri madhora mana nemasenzi makumi mashanu pakirogiramu mutengo wepasi uri pamasenzi makumi maviri pakirogiramu.
Mitengo iyi haina kufadza varimi vakawanda avo vati kana mitengo iyi ikasawedzera varimi vakawanda vanogona kutadza kurima fodya.
VaCosta Kapudza vekuMvurwi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mitengo yanhasi inoita kuti varege kurima fodya zvachose. VaKapfudza vanoti vambomira kutengesa fodya yavo uye vave kunoitengesa pamukoto.
Vamwewo vasina kufara nemitengo yefodya ndiIshe Musarurwa vekuMashonaland East avo vati vambomirawo kutengesa fodya yavo.
Varimi havasi kufarawo nenyaya yekuti kunyange hazvo fodya yavo ichitengeswa kunze kwenyika ivo havasi kuzoiphwa mari yavo yese ari madhora ekuAmerica.
Pasi pechibvumirano chakaitwa neReserve Bank of Zimbabwe nekambani yeTobacco Industries Marketing Board, varimi vachipihwa zvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana zvemari yavanenge vatengesa ari maRTGS uye zvimwe zvikamu makumi mashanu zviri madhora ekuAmerica.
Asi varimi vakaita saAmai Margret Dhambeni vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanoda mari yavo yese ari madhora ekuAmerica.
Vatiwo vakatenga zvekurimisa vachishandisa mari yekunze uye nekudaro vanoda kubhadharwawo nemari yekunze.
VaKapfudza vati vanotsigira vamwe vavo vari kuti vapihwe mari yavo yese ari madhora ekuAmerica sezvo iri iyo yavakashandisa kutenga zvekurimisa.
Sachigaro weTIMB, Amai Monica Chinamasa, vati mitengo yakaderera sezvo vanotenga fodya kana kuti maTobacco Merchants vari kuchajwa mutero we Intermediated Transaction Tax wezvikamu zviviri kubva muzana apo vanotenga fodya nekubhadhara varimi.
Vati pane nhaurirano dziri kuitwa pakati pavo, nevatongesa fodya nehurumende dzekugadzirisa nyaya iyi uye vanoona sekuti izvi zvinogona kupedza dambudziko remitengo iri pasi iri.
Amai Chinamasa vazivisa kuti mwaka uno wange wakaoma chose sezvo kwakapisa zvakanyanya uyewo vati vamwe varimi kuManicaland vakaparadzirwa fodya yavo nedutumupengo Cyclone Idai.
Vati kusvika parizvino havasati vave kuziva kuti ifodya yakawanda zvakadii yakaparadzwa nedutumupengo Idai.
Zimbabwe inotarisirwa kutengesa mamiriyoni mazana maviri nemakumi mana (240million kgs) emakirogiramu efodya inove fodya shoma pane yakatengeswa mwaka wapfuura.
Gore rapfuura Zimbabwe yakatengesa mamiriyoni mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu nemaviri emakirogiramu (252million) efodya ikawana mari ingangosvika bhiriyoni remadhora ekuAmerica.
Vachivhura misika yefodya zviri pamutemo, VaMohadi vati hurumende yavo inotsigira varimi vefodya uye vati inoda kuti varimi ava vabatwe zvakanaka sezvo fodya ichipinza mari yekunze yakawanda munyika.
Pane misika mitatu yefodya munyika inoti Tobacco Sales Floor, Boka nePremier uye misika yese iyi iri muHarare.
Kunze kwezvicherwa zvakabatanidzwa, fodya ndiyo inopinza mari yekunze yakawanda kudarika zvimwe zvose muZimbabwe.
Ngezi Platinum Stars yayambira Caps United kuti isapemberere kutora mukombe weligi zvechimbichimbi nekuti munhabvu munhu anofanira kutenda maruva adya chakata.
Zvikwata zviviri izvi zviri kusangana muNational Sports Stadium neSvondo mumutambo unogona kupa Caps United mukombe weligi kana kukanganisa zvese zvaitwa nemaGreen Machine gore rese.
Caps United iri kuda kukunda mumutambo uyu ichitarisirawo kuti FC Platinum inorohwa kana kuita mangenge neHighlanders kuti itore mukombe.
Sachigaro weNgezi Platinum Stars VaJeremiah Getiseni vanoti hazvisi kuzove nyore kuti Caps United itorere mukombe pavari vachiti ivo marovero avakaita Highlanders neFC Platinum ndiwo avari kuzoita maGreen Machine.
VaGetiseni vanoti vakagadzirira zvakasimba mutambo nemaGreen Machine vachiwedzera ivo kuti vari kuenderera mberi kugadzirira kusvikira mutambo uyu wapera.
Pari zvino, Caps United ndiyo iri pamusoro soro nemapoinzi makumi mashanu nemanomwe, maviri pamusoro peFC Platinum, uyezve matatu kudarika Highlanders.
Caps United ikakundwa kana kuita mangange, FC Platinum ikakunda Highlanders, Kugona Kunenge Kudada ndiyo inoenda pamusoro uyezve pedyo nemukombe unokosha $1,2 million.

Zvakamira zvakadai, maMighty Warriors neMugovera ari kupinda munhandare yemuYaounde muCameroon kusangana neBanyana Banyaya yekuSouth Africa mumutambo wavo wekutanga mumakwikwi e2016 Africa Women’s Africa Cup of Nations.
Mutambo wekutanga wakakosha zvikuru zvekuti maMighty Warriors anofanira kukunda kunyange hazvo gadziriro yavo yanga isina kumira zvakanaka.
Zvikwata izvi zvakasangana mumutambo wekuedzana masimba masvondo maviri apfuura maMighty Warriors akarohwa 3-0.
Asi murairidzi wechikwata ichi Shadreck Mhlauzi anoti iyi inhoroondo achiti uyu mutambo mutsva uyezve une zvinangwa zvakasiyana.
Kunze kweSouth Africa, maMighty Warriors achatamba zvekare neCameroon pamwe ne Egypt.
Zvikwata zviviri kubva mugungano iri ndizvo zvinoenderera mberi nemakundano.
Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinopinda zana izvo zvanga zviri muhupoteri pamuzinda weDukwi Refugee Camp muBotswana zvinoti hurumende yenyika iyi yaramba kugamuchira chichemo chavo chekuti zvisadzoserwe kumusha zvichiti kukandwa mumukanwa mamupere.
Vapoteri ava vanga vakumbira hurumende yeBotswana kuti vapihwe hugari hwemunyika iyi kana kuti vatsvagirwe dzimwe nyika dzavangaende kunogara kwadziri vachiti kumusha hakuna kumira zvakanaka.
Vakuru wehurumende yeBotswana varamba kudaira mibvunzo yeStudio7 munyaya iyi.
Asi mugwaro raonekwa neStudio7 iro rakanyorerwa mumwe wevanhu vanodarika zana avo vanga vachikumbira kuti vasadzoserwe kumusha, hurumende yeBotswana inoti haioni kuti zvichemo zvavo zvine huremu hwekuti vakaenderera mberi iri vapoteri.
Gwaro iri rinoenderera mberi richiti gurukota rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika iyi, VaKagiso Mmusi havaoni zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe izvo zvanga zviri pamuzinda weDukwi iri vapoteri vakatiza zvematongerwo enyika.
Nokudaro, hurumende yenyika iyi inoti avo vanenge vasina kunyoresa kuti vadzoserwe kumusha pasi pechirongwa chevoluntary repatriation vachaitwa musenga bere nevashandi vebazi rinoona nezvekupinda nekubuda kwevanhu munyika iyi.
Mutauriri wevapoteri paDukwi, VaBhekimpilo Weza vaudza Studio7 kuti Botswana iri mukavhiya katiyo nehurumende yeZimbabwe kuti avo vanga vari muhupoteri vadzoserwe kumusha zvisiri pamutemo.
VaWeza vaenderera mberi vachiti mamiriro ezvematongerwo enyika haasati ashanduka munyika sezvo hurumende yeZANU PF iyo yavakatiza makore gumi nemairi apfuura ndiyo ichiri panyanga uye ichi kuenderera mberi nekupfuvisa avo vanotsigira bato reMDC.
Mukokeri wesangano reHuman Rights Watch kumaodzanyemba eAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti zviri kuitwa nenyika yeBotswana kumbunyikidza kodzero dzevapoteri uye hazvienderani nezvinotarisirwa nesangano reUnited Nations High Commissioner for Refugees.
Senzira yekuzadzikisa chibvumirano chakaitwa nenyika dzepasi rose muna1951, VaMavhinga vanoti Botswana inosungirwa kutsvagira vapoteri veZimbabwe nyika dzikavapa hupoteri pane kuti vadzoserwe kumusha.
Mugore ra2008, vapoteri ava ruzhinji rwavo vachiti vatsigiri weMDC, vakatiza misha yavo mushure mekurohwa zvakaipisisa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri weZANU PF panguva yakaitika sarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika dzedzokororo kana kuti runoff.
Kusawirirana pakati pemapato anopikisa eMDC-T iri kufanotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozane Khupe neMDC Alliance inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa kuri kuramba kuchidzika midzi zvichitevera kudzingwa zvakare kudare reparamende kwedzimwe nhengo pfumbamwe dzeMDC Alliance.
Izvi zvinotevera tsamba yakanyorwa nebato reMDC-T kumutauriri weparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, ichiti nhengo idzi dzidzingwe sezvo dzisiri kutevera bumbiro remitemo reMDC-T.
Kudzingwa kwenhengo pfumbamwe uku kunotevera kudzingwa kwedzimwe nhengo ina dzedMDC Alliance muna Chivabvu, izvo zvasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vadzingwa muparamende hwasvika pagumi nevatatu.
Asi nhengo dzeMDC-Alliance dzinoti danho riri kutorwa neMDC-T iri nderekuda kuparadza bato rinopikisa iri, sezvo bato ravo risineyi nechekuita neMDC-T, iyo yakakwikwidza musarudzo dzemuna 2018 sebato rakazvimirira, ukuwo, MDC Alliance ichikwikwidzawo yakazvimirira semubatanidzwa wemapato manomwe.
Asi MDC-T inoti hakuna bato rinonzi MDC Alliance asi kuti mubatanidzwa, uyo bato reMDC-T raivewo nhengo munguva yesarudzo.
MDC Alliance iri kupomerawo MDC-T mhosva yekushandiswa nebato reZanu PF mune zvese zvairi kuita izvi nechinangwa chekuda kuparadza vanopikisa munyika.
MDC Alliance iri kupomerawo zvakare MDC-T mhosva yekutsigirwa nemapurisa nemauto, sezvinonzi zvakaitika apo MDC-T yakatora muzinda weMorgan Richard Tsvangirai, ichinzi yakabatsirwa nemapurisa nemauto.
Asi veMDC-T vanoti havana kubatsirwa nemapurisa kana nemauto, asi kuti vakashandisa mutemo wenyika kutora chavo chakanga chapambwa neMDC Aliance.
Kunetsana uku kunosiya papi vanhu vakasarudza nhengo dzeparamende idzi kuti dzivamirire kudare reparamende?
Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, VaRejoice Ngwenya vanoti mutemo unofanirwa kuteverwa asi vanhu vane masimba ekuenda kumatare edzimhosva vachipikisa danho rekubvisirwa vamiriri wavo muparamende.
Imwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, VaTendai Reuben Mbofana, vanoti kudzingwa kwenhengo dzeparamende uku kunokanganisa matunhu adzinomirira nekuti dzinenge dzisisina vamiriri.
Panonzi pave nekukandirana nyoka mhenyu pakati pezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvigere munyika nezvimwe zvigere kunze kwenyika pamusoro pekuratidzira kwanga kwakarongwa nebato reMDC, vari munyika, zvikuru veZanu PF, vachiti kuratidzira uku kuri kukuchidzirwa nevari kunze kwenyika.
Izvi zvinouya panguva iyo mapurisa munyika yose ari kurambidza kuratidzira uku kuburikidza nekuzara mumigwagwa pamwe chete nemauto akamirira kuparadza vanenge vaungana vachida kuratidzira.
Imwe nhengo yeZanu PF, VaBelieve Gaule, vanoti vari kunze kwenyika vari kufurira hama dzavo kuti dzipandukire hurumende vachidzityisidzira kuti havazotumira zvakare mari kumusha kana vakasapinda mumigwagwa.
VaGaule vanoti vari kunze kwenyika vanenge vagere zvavo pamutambarakede, vachishandisa vari kumusha ava.
Vamwe ndivo vari kunyora pamadandemutande vachikurudzira vari kunze kwenyika ava kuti vadzoke kumusha munguva dzekuratidzira idzodzo vachibatana navo, kwete kuita vana tinhadzirwe.
Asi mumwe wevari kunze kwenyika, vari sachigaro webato reMDC mudunhu reDC-Maryland-Virginia, VaCharles Mutama, vanoti vanogona kunge vari kunzi vari kufurira vari kumusha asi chavari kuda kugadzirisa zvinhu munyika.
VaMutama, avo vanove zvakare mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Diaspora for Democracy, vanoti nekuda kwaizvozvo, vanokurudzira hama neshamwari dzavo kuti vapinde mumigwagwa vachiratidzira senzira yekugadzirisa zvinhu.

Vamwe vagari wemuWard 12 kuMatobo District vakave nemukana wekusangana nevamwe vevatambi venhabvu vakaita mukurumbira nechikwata cheHighlanders Football Club, pasi pechirongwa cherimwe sangano rinoshanda rakazvimirira rega chekushandisa mitambo mukukurudzira runyararo nebudiriro mudunhu reMatabeleland South.
Pakave nemufaro mukuru nemusi weChitatu paSontala Secondary School kuMatobo District apo vamwe vevatambi vakaita mukurumbira muchikwata cheHighlanders vakashanyira nzvimbo iyi vakatamba mutambo wenhabvu wehushamwari nevamwe vechidiki vemunzvimbo mekare.
Mutambo uyu pakati peHiglanders Legends neSontala Football Club wakarongwa nerimwe sangano rinoshanda rakazvimirira rega reHabbakuk Trust senzira yekuedza kukurudzira runyararo nebudiriro munzvimbo iyi.
Kunyange hazvo vechidiki veSontala Football Club vakakundwa 2-1, vamwe vavo vakaratidza kuti vane zvipo zvinogona kuti vave neramangwana rakajeka mumutambo wenhabvu.
Mumwe wevatambi veSontala Hlanganiso Dube akati akafara zvikuru kuona vatambi vakaita mukurumbira vaaingoziva nemazita chete, uye vaaive asina kumbofungidzira kuti achakwanisa kusangana navo muhupenyu.
“Tafara zvikuru kutamba nevatamabi veHighlanders Legends. Ndinoona sekuti vatisiira zvidzidzo zvakawanda kubva pahunyanzvi hwavo. Tawona zvakawanda tikadzidza zvakawanda uye tichaedzawo kuti tishandise zvatadzidza izvi mukutamba kwedu kuti tigokwanisa kusimudzirawo matambiro edu.”
Mumwezve mutambi weSontala, Zibonele Dube, akatsinhirawo zvimwe chete, akati iye nevamwe vake vakadzidza zvakawanda kubva kuvatambi veHighlanders.
Zibonele akaudza Studio 7 kuti mitambo, kunyanya nhabvu, inosanganisa vanhu vakasiyana-siyana saka inobatsira pakukurudzira runyararo.
“Mitambo inosanganisa vanhu vakasiyana-siyana, vanoita mabasa akasiyana-siyana. Kunyange vanenge vane mafungiro akasiyana mune zvechitendero kana mune zvematongerwo enyika vanogona kuenda vachinoona mitambo yakasiyana-siyana vari pamwe chete izvo zvinobatsira kuti vabatane. Ndinoona sekuti kukurudzira kubatana kana runyararo nekuita zvemitambo chinhu chakanaka zvikuru.”

Kana mukaona tave kukoshiwa nezvevana kana vechidiki, zvinoreva kuti ramangwana ravo richange rakaipa izvo zvinogona kuuraya nyika.”

Izvi zvinotsinhirwa neimwe nyanzvi mune zveupfumi, vachishanda nesangano rinomirira varimi vanochengeta zvipfuyo, reZimbabwe Agricultural Growth, VaNewton Chari, avo vanoti kana mari iri dambudziko kuwana, vanhu vanogona kushandisa nzira dzekubhadhara nadzo dzakaita semakadhi ekumabhanga kana kushandisa nharembozha dzavo kuburikidza ne Eco-Cash.

Nyanzvi mune zvehutano dziri kuyambira kuti hurumende itange hurongwa hwakakura hwekuongorora vanhu vose vari munyika chirwere cheCOVID-19 sezvo paine huwandu huri kukwira hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi asi vasina kana kumbobuda munyika.
NeChina pavanhu gumi nevaviri vakabatwa kuti vane hutachiona hweCoronavirus, vaviri vagari vemunyika vasina kumbobuda huye vasina kumbosangana nemunhu ane chirwere cheCovid-19.
Nemusi weChitatu pavanhu gumi nevana vakawanikwa vane chirwere cheCOVID-19, gumi nevatatu vakabatira chirwere ichi munyika huye gumi neumwe havazikanwi kuti vakawana chirwere ichi sei.
Ukuwo neChipiri pavanhu gumi nevanomwe vakabatwa chirwere ichi, vanhu vatatu vakabatirira chirwere ichi munyika muno uye vaviri havazivikanwi kuti vakawana chirwere ichi sei.
Kukwira kwehuwandu uhwu ndokunonzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano imviro-mviro yekuratidza kuti munyika mune vanhu vane COVID-19 asi vasati vaongororwa.
Munyori mukuru wesangano ravana chiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, Doctor Norman Matara, vati vari kunetsekana nekukwira kuri kuita vanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi vagara vari munyika vachiti kunyanya avo vanenge vasingazivikanwi kuti chirwere ichi vakachibatira sei.
VaMatara vati zvakakosha kuti hurumende ichitanga kuongorora veruzhinji munyika sezvo zvava kuratidza kuti panogona kuva nevane chirwere ichi asi vasingazivi huye vasingazivikanwi nehurumende.
VaMatara vati kuungana kuri kuita vanhu vachitsvaka chauviri zvakadai sepamitsetse yehupfu, pamabanga vachitsvaka mari uye mukutsvaka zvekufambisa inzvimbo dzinoita kuti zvive nyore kuti vanhu vatapurirane chirwere ichi.
Izvi zvatsigirwa nevaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa uye vari munyori wezvehutano mubato guru rinopikisa, reMDC Alliance, Dr Henry Madzorera, avo vati kukwira kwehuwandu uhwu mucherechedzo wekuti chirwere chiri kupararira. VaMadzorera vakurudzira kuti hurumende itore matanho chirwere ichi chisati chaputira nyika yese.
VaMadzorera vatiwo hapana chakaipa kuti hurumende painobudisa huwandu hwevanhu vanenge vabatwa nechirwere ichi itaure nzvimbo dzinenge dzawanikwa vane chirwere ichi vagara vari munyika. Vatiwo vanhu vakaziva kuti chirwere chave munharaunda yavo vanokoshesa zvakanyanya kutora matanho ekuzvidzivirira.
Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vabvumawo kuStudio 7 kuti kuburitsa nzvimbo dzinenge dzichigara avo vanobatwa nechirwere ichi munharaunda dzemunyika kunogona kubatsira kuti vanhu vatore matanho akasimba ekuzvidzivirira kuchirwere ichi.
Pavabvunzwa nezvematanho achatorwa nebazi rezvehutano kudzikisa huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa neCoronavirus vagara vari munyika, VaMujiri vati vanga vachida kumbotsvaka ruzivo nezvazvo kubva kuvashandi vakasiyana-siyana vemubazi iri.
Zimbabwe, sedzimwe nyika pasi rose, iri mubishi rekurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 icho chabata vanhu vanodarika mazana matanhatu negumi nevanomwe, uye pasi rose, chirwere ichi chabata vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nerimwe, uye vanhu vafa pasi rose vadarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nezvishanu, kusanganisira vanomwe vemuZimbabwe.
Hurumende neChipiri yakakomekedza bazi rekwaRegistrar-General kuti riongorore nyaya yekubhadharisa vanhu mari kaviri zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwakaitwa mumwe mushandi muChinhoyi achibhadharisa mumwe munhu akanga achida pasipoti mari yemadhora ekuAmerica pamwe nemabhondi.
Izvi zvakaitika gurukota rezvemukati menyika, VaKazembe Kazembe, vachiona nemaziso avo apo mumwe mudzimai, Muzvare Memory Kasipo, vakanzi vabhadhare mabhondi makumi mashanu nematatu, pamusoro pezvo ndokunzi vabhadhare zvakare madhora mazana matatu ane gumi nesere emadhora ekuAmerica, sezvo vakanga vachida pasipoti yechimbi-chimbi.
VaKazembe vakaonawo kusabatwa zvakanaka kuri kuitwa vanhu nevashandi vekwaRegistrar General, avo vaichenamira vanhu vakange vari mumitsetse vachida kutora magwaro avo.
VaKazembe vakati vaudza vakuru vepamahofisi emuChinhoyi kuti vaferefete zvakaitwa nemushandi uyo akanga achida kubhadharisa Muzvare Kasipo mari zvisiri pamutemo.
VaKazembe vakatiwo zvavakaona zvinopa kuti zvizvarwa zvenyika zvinoshandira kune dzimwe nyika, zvishore zvikuru hurumende nekuita huori.
Muzvare Kasipo vakati vakanzi vatange kubhadhara madhora makumi mashanu nematatu emabhondi kunyange vakaudza mushandi uyu kuti vaida pasipoti yechimbi chimbi iyo inobhadharwa nemadhora ekuAmerica chete.
Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumukuru wepamahofisi epaChinhoyi kuti vachaita seyi nenyaya yakanzi iferefetwe naVaKazembe, sezvo zvakaitwa nemushandi uyu zvisiri pamutemo.
VaKazembe vakazoudza vatori venhau pavakapedza kushanya kwavo kuti havana kufara nehunhu hwavamwe vashandi vekumahofisi a Registrar General.
VaKazembe vakashoropodza kutadza kushanda kwevashandi nekuda kwekushaikwa kwemagetsi vachiti bazi rekwaRegistrar General rinofanirwa kushandisa moto wezuva kana kuti solar.
VaKazembe vakati mutengo wepasipoti hausati wakwira asi pane hurongwa hwekukwidza mari sezvo zvikwanisiro zvakugadzira mapasipoti zviri kuvadhurira.
Hurumende inogadzira mapasipoti zviuru zviviri pazuva ichiti inokwanisa kuwedzera kana ikawana zvikwanisiro zvinotengwa nemari yekuAmerica iyo iri kushaikwa munyika.
VaKazembe vakati pane vanhu vanosvika mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu ezviuru vakamirira mapasipoti avo munyika yose, ukuwo makumi mana ezviuru vari vagari vekuMashonaland West chete.

Madzimai munyika ari kukurudzirwa kuti arambe akangwarira chirwere chegomarara repazamu iro rinogona kubatawo vanhurume.
Mwedzi wapera pasi rose range riri kucherechedza nekudzidzisa vanhu nezvechirwereichi. Sangano reCancer Association of Zimbabwe rinoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vakurumbidze kuwongororwa gomarara nyanya rezamu risati rapararira kuitira kuti munhu awane rubatsiro pachiri nenguva.
Nyanzvi yegomarara Dr Bernadette Ndoro, vanoti madzimai vanofanirwa kuziva miri yavo uye kana vanzwa bundu kana zvimwewo vamhanye kunoongororwa navana chiremba.
"Vazhinji vanozo uya dambudziko iri rapararira asi isu tiri kukurudzira kuti madzimai nevanhu rume vaende kunovhenekwa nguva nenguva kuitira kuti vawane rubatsiro pachine nguva," Dr Ndoro vaudza Studio 7.
Gomarara rezamu rinonzi ndiro gomarara rechipiri riri kuuraya madzimai pamagomarara mazhinji asi rikabatwa pachiri nenguva vanhu vanokwanisa kuwana rubatsiro.
"Tinokurudzira kuti vanhu vaongorore zvavanodya, kuita zvino simbisa muviri wavo, kuregedza kunwa doro zhinji nekurega kudya zvine mafuta senzira dzekuyedza kudzivirira chirwere ichi." Dr Ndoro vaudza Studio 7.
Dr Ndoro vanoti hazvizivikanwe kuti chiyi chinokonzera chirwere ichi asi zvakakosha kuti munhu akoshese hutano hwake nekuongororwa pachine nguva

Rimwe remasangano ari pamusangano uyu ndere Southern Africa HIV/AIDS Information Dissemination Service (SAFAIDS) iro rinoti zvakakosha kuti misangano yakadayi iitwe mukuyedza kurwisa hutachiwona hwe HIV nechirwere che AIDS.
Mukuru weSAFAIDS Amai Lois Chingandu vanoti kunyangwe zvinhu zvakaoma munyika vane tarisiro yekuti hurumende irambe ichitsigira zvirongwa zvekurwisa HIV/AIDS ichishandisa mari inobva muhomwe ye AIDS Levy.
"Tine vimbo yekuti home ye AIDs Levy icharamba ichishandiswa nehurumende mukuita zvirongwa zvekurwisa chirwere ne hutachiwona hwe HIV/AIDS uye tiri kufara kuti hurumende yakamirirwa pamusangano uyu ne gurukota rezvehutano nevadare izvo zvinopa chiremera kumusangano uyu," Amai Chingandu vaudza Studio 7.

Chikwata cheFrance chapinda mufainari ye 2018 World Cup mushure mekurova Belgium 1-0. .
Chibodzwa chakabva kuna Samuel Umtiti zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichangobva kuzororo yemaranjisi chakapinza France mufainari ye 2018 World Cup iyo iriko neSvondo.
France yave kusangana nechikwata chichakunda pane imwe semi fainari iriko nhasi manheru pakati peCroatia neEngland.
Muteveri weHighlanders, VaSifelani Maphosa vanoti kukunda kwakaita France mumutambo mukuru uyu kunoratidza kuti chikwata ichi chakasimba zvekukwanisa kutora mukombe mukuru uyu.
Muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu, VaFarai Kambamura, vanoti hapana aitarisira kuti France ingasvike mufainari vachiwedzera ivo kuti payave apa yave kunotora mukombe.
Asi kunyange hazvo France yakakunda mumutambo uyu, ivo pachavo vanobvuma kuti izvi hazvina kuuya nyore sezvo Belgium yakarwisa semvumba.
Belgium yacho ingadai yakakundawo mumutambo uyu dai yakashandisa mikana yakawandisa yayakawana asi panzvimbo yekurovera mabara mugedhe, yaida kuita bhora rekufamba naro mumambure.
Aka kanga kave kechipiri munhoroondo yeBelgium kusvika muma semi fainari eWorld Cup.
Asi iyi yave nhorooondo sezvo France yave kutarisira fainari uyezve nekutora World Cup yayo yechipiri mushure mekumboita izvi muna 1998.
Mumutambo uriko na 8pm nhasi, weCroatia ne England, Croatia iri kutarisira kuna Luka Modric kuti ikunde England.
Croatia ine vatambi vanotambira zvikwata zvine mukurumbira zvinoti Barcelona, Real Madrid, Atletico Madrid, Liverpool, Juventus, Inter Milan ne AC Milan.
Ukuwo England iri kutarisira kuna Harry Kane kuti ipinde mufainari neSvondo.

Zvakamira zvakadai. Chikwata cheCaps United ndicho chakatora mukombe weCastle Lager Premier Soccer League, mushure mekupedza chiine mapoinzi maviri pamusoro peFC Platinum.
Izvi zvakauya mushure mekunge veCaps United vakatora makore gumi nerimwechete vachitadza kutora mukombe wakakosha uyu.

Chitembwe ndiye akasarudzwa kuve Coach of the Year, mutambi wake Hardlife Zvirekwi akasarudzwa kuve Soccer Star of the Year.

TP Mazembe iyo yakambotora mukombe weCaf Champions League makore maviri akateverana, ndiyo zvekare yakatora mukombe weCaf Confederation Cup muna 2016.

Vamwe vasingaoni vanorarama nekukumbira mari mumabhazi nemumigwagwa kwaRusape vanoti vari panguva yakaoma sezvo hurumende yakambomisa kufamba kwemabhazi aya senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCoronavirus.
Mumwe wevanhu ava, VaTymon Rukuni vekwaRusape, vanoti kubva nemusi weSvondo apo vakapedzisira kupemha mubhazi, ndiwo musi wavakapedzisira kudya rinopisa nevana vavo vatanhatu, sezvo vasingawani kwekupemhera nekuti muguta hamuchina vanhu ukuwo kumabhazi havachadiwiko nekuda kwechirwere che-COVID-19.
"Tine mhuri nine dzinorarama nekupemha asi nekuda kwechirwere cheCoronavirus hapachina kana chichabuda nekuti mumabhazi hakuchina, chikafu hatichina nekuti kumabhazi hatichadiwi kuti tifambe ikoko. Toita seyiwo nhai," vanodaro VaRukuni.
Amai Rejoice Chinembiri vekwaRusape vanoti nekusafamba kwemabhazi panguva ino, hakuna kumwe kwavanotarisira kuwana mari kunze kwekufamba nemabhazi iwaya vachikumbira rubatsiro.
'Tinosipinda mumabhazi tikukumbira, towana tumari totenga tuhupfu tuTsunami nemuriwo todya nevana kumba. Zvino izvezvi mabhazi akamiswa hatina kana pekutangira. Tamboenda kwaMP wedu kuti tibatsirwe tikazoenda kuSocial Welfare asi tangonyorwa mazita hatina kupihwa kana chipunu chehupfu chaicho," Amai Chinembiri vanotsanangura.

"PaLockdown apa patidhisiadhivhandeja nekuti sevanhu vanotsvaga mumabhazi, nekuti hatina chatinacho, zvichireva kuti takapedzisira kupemha Sunday apo pakaguma kufamba mabhazi acho uye pari zvino hatichabvumirwi kukwira mabhazi acho, takapedzisira kudya musi iwoyo weSunday," vadaro VaMakusha
Mumiriri weMakoni Central mudare reparemende, VaDavid Tekeshe, vanoti vari kuedza nepavanogona napo kuti mhuri dzevasingaoni idzi dziwane rubatsiro asi zviri kutora nguva refu.
"Ndatouya nemuriwo izvezvi kwavari ndichiti pamwe vangabatsirikana sezvo vange vakanzi vanokwanisa kubatsirwa kumapurisa asi hapana chabuda ikoko vakanzi vaende kuWelfare asi vangonyorwa mazita chete pasina chabuda. Vanhu ava vanoti vakapedzisira kupemha Sunday apo vakakwanisa kutenga katsaona kekudya musi wacho. Vanhu ava vari pa desperate havana chekudya vanotoda rubatsiro," vanodaro VaTekeshe.

Vakarwa hondo vanotendererawo maguta mazhinji emunyika yose vari pamidhudhudhu vachirangarira vamwe vavo vakafa.
Mamwe makore ose adarika aya veruzhinji vaicherechedza zuva iri vachigocha pamwe nekunwa, asi nekuda kwekuti gore rino kune chirwere cheCovid-19, mhuri zhinji dzanga dzichingozvitandadza dziri mudzimba.
Mumwe wevanhu vatandara semhuri vari pamba pavo ndaVaTakawira Kapikinyu, vanove chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri mudunhu reMaryland, avo vanoti vapedzawo zuvao rose vari pamba vachitandarawo nemhuri yavo.
VaKapikinyu vanotiwo vanoshushikana zvikuru vachienzanisa mabatirwo anoitwa magamba emuAmerica nemagamba ekumusha, vachiti hurumende kumusha inonyanyotungamidza nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika zvekuti magamba anocherechedzwa ndevakarwa vari kumapato eZanu PF neZapu chete.
Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevatengi, reNational Consumer Rights Association, kana kuti NACORA, riri kukumbira hurumende kuti ione kuti hapana mwana wechikoro anodzorerwa kumba pamusaka pekusabhadhara mari yechikoro panovhurwa zvikoro neChipiri.
Mutauriri weNACORA, Muzvare Lindiwe Pilime, vanoti zvikoro zvese kubva kune zvehurumende, zvemakanzuru, zvemakereke pamwe nezvakazvimirira, zvakakwidza mari dzechikoro asi vashandi vasina kuwedzerwa mihoro yavo.
Muzvare Pilime vanoti izvi zvichakonzera vabereki vakawanda kuti vatadze kubhadharira vana vavo mari dzechikoro.
“NACORA iri kuti mari dzevana vechikoro dzanyanya kukwidziswa zvisingaiti. Vabereki havakwanisi kubhadhara school fees. Zvikoro zvizhinji zvinoti mwana anotungamidza bepa rehumbowo kuti mari yechikoro yakabhadharwa asati apinda muchikoro, saka zvichareva kuti vana vakawanda havasi kupinda mavanodzidzira,” Muzvare Pilime vanodaro.
Mugwaro ravabudisa rapiwa vatori venhau, sangano iri rinoti rine zvinhu zvishanu zvarinoda kuti zviitwe nehurumende, zvinosanganisira kupindira kwehurumende kuti vana vechikoro vasadzingirwa mari yechikoro.
Sangano iri rinotizve rinokumbira kuti hurumende nemasangano ekunze anobatsira, vabatsire vana vezvikoro nezvekudya.
Sangano reNACORA rinoti hurumende inofanira kutarisawo nyaya yezvemari yechikoro uye kuti idzike mitemo yekuchengetedza kodzero dzevana kuti vawane dzidzo yavanofanirwa kuwana.
Boka rinoona nezvemhando dzemoto, reZimbabwe Energy Regulatory Authority, ZERA, rakazivisa zvakare kuti mutengo wemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari epeturu nedhiziri wakwira zvakare kutanga nhasi.
Peturu yakwira kubva pamadhora mapfumbamwe ane sendi rimwechete kuenda pamadhora mapfumbamwe ane masendi mapfumbamwe parita, kuchitiwo dhiziri raenda pamadhora mapfumbamwe ane masendi makumi maviri nemanomwe, kubva pamadhora mapfumbamwe ane masendi matanhatu parita.
Kukwira uku kunouya mukati mesvondo rimwe chete mafuta aya akwidzwa zvakare mutengo.
ZERA inoti kukwira kwemitengo uku kwakonzerwa nemiripo inobhadharwa pakutakurwa kwemafuta aya kubva paanosiirwa nevanoatengesa, pamwe nemitero inobhadharwa pakupinza mafuta aya munyika pasi peStatutory Instrument 161 of 2019.
Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachitungamira sangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti chinorwadza ndechekuti kukwidzwa kwemitengo yemafuta kasingaperi uku kuri kuitika svodno rega rega asi vashandi mihoro isiri kufamba.
Doctor Kanyenze vanotiwo chimwe chinorwadza ndechekuti kukwira kwemutengo wemafuta edzimotokari kunokwidzawo mitengo yezvinhu zvose, uye mari dzinobhadharwa nevanokwira mabhazi nemichovha.
Vanyori, vana nyanduri, vaimbi pamwe nehama neshamwari dzemushakabvu, VaChenjeral Hove, kubva mativi mana enyika, dzakasangana muHarare nemusi weMugovera manheru dzichipemberera hupenyu hwavo pamwe nemabasa avo munyaya dzekunyora mabhuku nenhetembo.
Paive nemufaro mukuru kuQueensade Sports Club uye mhuri yaVaHove inoti yakafara zvikuru kuti shamwari dzavo pamwe nevamwe vavaishanda navo vakaronga mutambo wakadai uyo vakati wakabudirira zvikuru.
Mudzimai wamuchakabvu, Amai Tekla Hove, vakatsanangura murume wavo semunhu aive nerudo nemhuri nebasa rake uye vanoti vanotenda chose kuti vakadzisisa vana vavo uye vanokwanisa kurarama pasina dambudziko kunyange baba vavo vasisipo
Amai Hove vakati chimwe chinonyanyovafadza rudo rwakaratidzwa neshamwari dzemurume wavo nevamwe vavaishanda navo uye vati izvi zvinoratidza kuti vakasiya vadyara rudo.
Mmwe mwana VaHove, Tanatswa, akaudza Studio7 kuti baba vake munhu aive nerudo uye izvi zvakaratidzwa nekuuya nehuwandu kwakaita vanhu, vanyori, shamwari dzavo, vaimbi nevanhuwo zvavo kumutambo wekupemberera hupenyu hwavo nekuvarangarira.
Mumwe mwana wavo, Tafadzwa, akatiwo mafariro aita vanhu neMugovera ndozvaigara vachiita nebaba vavo uye zvinorwadzo kuti havasisipo.
Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Human Rights Association, VaOkay Machisa, avo vakaridzawo mimhanzi pamutambo wekurangarira VaHove, vanoti vakaona zvakakodzero kunge varipowo sezvo VaHove vaive mumwe wevanhu vakavamba sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimRights.
VaMichael Mabwe, avo vanoitawo nhetembo dzekukurudziro kodzero dzevanhu, vanoti vanorangarira VaHove nemabasa avo uye mabasa avo ndivo akaitawo kuti vapinde mumabasa ekusimudzira kodzero dzevanhu.
Munyori wesangao rinomirira vanyori reZimbabwe Writers Association, Memory Chirere, akati mutambo wekurangarira VaHove wakafamba zvakanaka uye zvinoratidza kufamba kwavaiita nevamwe vavo.
Vamwe vanyori, vaimbi nananyanduri vakapinda mumutambo weMugovera vanosanganisira, David Mungoshi, Conte Mhlanga, Shimmer Chinodya, Virginia Phiri, Hope Masike nevamwe.
VaHove vaive nemukurumbira uye vakahwina mibairo yakwanda yekunyora mabhuku. Mibayiro iyi inosanganisira we Noma Aaward for Publishing in Africa. Vakashayikira kuNorway munaChinkunguru uko vange vave kugara muhupoteri.

Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu VaDoug Coltart nhasi vapomerwa mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga zvichitevera musangano wavakaita nemusi weChishanu nanezuro unonzi nemapurisa waida kukonzera kusagadzikana munyika.
Asi VaDoug Coltart, mwana wava David Coltart avo vaive gurukota rezvedzidzo munguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa vari nhengo yeMDC vari kuramba mhosva yavari kupomerwa iyi.
Gweta raVaColtart, VaDenford Halimani vati vanzi nemapurisa vadzoke kukamba yemapurisa mangwana mangwanani.
Vari kutungamira hurongwa hwekuratidzira kuri kuda kuitwa munyika musi wa31 Chikunguru, VaJacob Ngarivhume, vanoti hurongwa hwavo huri kuenderera mberi zvisinei nemashoko ehurumende ekuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 huri kuramba huchikwira.
Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare, VaNgarivhume vati havasi kufara nekutekeshera kwavanoti kwaita huori munyika nokudaro havasi kuzoregedza kuratidzira nekuda kwekukwira kuri kuramba kuchiita huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid19 vachiti vachatora matanho ekuti vachiratidzira musi uyu vatevedzere zvakatarwa nehurumende kuti vanhu vange vakataramukana kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi.
VaNgarivhume vati vose vari kuita zvehuori vanofanira kusiya basa uye vati havasi kuzobuda mumigwagwa kudzamara zvavari kuda zvaitika.
VaNgarivhume vati vakazivisa mapurisa nezvehurongwa hwavo hwekuratidzira uhwu.
Asi hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo vati vanga vakabatikana.
Asi mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vati sebato havasi kuzopeta maoko vachisiya VaNgarivhume nevamwe vavo vachiratidzira musi wa31 Chikunguru.
Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaClaris Madhuku, avo vanoshanda nesangano rePlatform for Youth Development in Zimbabwe, vati VaNgarivhume nevamwe vavo vane chikonzero chakadzama chekuratidzira.
Kuratidzira kuri Kuda kuitwa neJuly 31st Movement kunouya panguva iyo huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid19 huri kuita chamurambamhuru uku mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachiti vachatora matanho matsva zvichitevera kufa kuri kuramba kuchiita vanhu nechirwere ichi.
Pakuratidzirwa kwakaitwa gore rapera, pakafa vanhu vakawanda mushure mekupfurwa nemasoja vamwe vakakuvara uye vamwe vakasungwa.
Gurukota rinoona nezvehutano Doctor Obadiah Moyo vanoti Zimbabwe iyo yave kuongorora vanhu vanodarika mazana mashanu nevatanhatu vakabva kunyika dzine chirwere checorona virus inoti iri kufara nedanho rakatorwa neChina rekumbomisa vanhu kungoenda kana kubva kunyika iyi vachienda kunyika dzakaita seZimbabwe.
Chirwere checorona virus chinofungidzirwa kuti chakatangira mudunhu reWuhan kuChina.
Chirwere ichi chauraya vanhu mazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe kusvika parizvino kunyanya kuChina.
Hapana mushonga wekurapa chirwere ichi icho chinoita kunge chirwere chechikosoro asi vamwe vanachiremba vari kuyedza kushandisa mapiritsi anodzikisa hukasha hweHIV/AIDS nemaARV.
KuChina kune vana vekuZimbabwe vakawandawo vari kuchikoro. VaMoyo vanoti Zimbabwe kuburikidza nemuzinda wayo muBeijing iri kuonawo kuti zvizvarwa zvayo zviri munyika iyi hazvisi munjodzi.
Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa, reMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vashanyira dzimwe dzenzvimbo dzakavirwa nedambudziko redutumupengu Cyclone Idai kuChimanimani neChipinge kuti vazvionere vega kuparadzwa kwakaitwa nzvimbo idzi nemvura iyi.
VaChamisa vanoti vatorawo mukana uyu kubata maoko kumhuri dzakarasikirwa nehama neshamwari mutsaona iyi.
Vanoti nekuda kwekuparara kwemigwagwa, vakundikana kusvika kune dzimwe nzvimbo, asi vakwanisa kushanyira Wengezi, Nyanyadzi pamwe nekuendawo kuchipatara vachiona nzvimbo dzakachengeterwa mitumbi yevafi.
Asi vari kuchema nedambudziko rekushaikwa kwemagetsi pachipatara ichi, izvo vanoti zvave kuita kuti mitumbi yevafi itange kuipa.
VaChamisa vanotiwo sebato vabatsirawo nekugovera zvekudya pamwechete nezvekupfeka nemagumbeze kumhuri dzakakanganiswa nedambudziko iri, uye vatendawo vose vari munyika nevari kunze kwenyika vari kubatsira nezvakasiyanasiyana.
Asi vari kukurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti varambe vachibatsira nenzira dzakasiyanasiyana dzavari kuita.
Dynamos yatenga vatambi vatsva senzira yekuti chikwata ichi chisimbe kudarika zvachiri.
Dembare iri kudzoka munhandare neSvondo iine vatambi vatsva apo ichatamba neZPC Kariba sekutaura kwaita gwaro rabva kune vanoronga mitambo muPremier Soccer League, VaElisha Mandireva.
Mutungamiri weDembare, VaSolomon Sanyamandwe, vanoti vateveri veDynamos vanofanira kugadziririra kuona Dynamos yakasimba uyezve yakasiyana zvikuru neyaivepo munharaunda yekutanga iyo yaitatarika zvinotyisa.
VaSanyamandwe vanoti Dembare yakatenga vatambi vatsva vakati wandei kusanganisira Kingstone Nkhata kubva kuSupersport yekuSouth Africa uyo vanotarisira kuti achapedza dambudziko ravanaro rezvibodzwa.
VaSanyamandwe vanoti Nkhata akanyorerana chibvumirano chemwedzi mitanhatu neDembare vachizoona kuti vanokwanisa here kuwedzera nguva yacho.
Nkhata ane nhoroondo yakasimba mumutambo wenhabvu mushure mekutambira Kaiser Chiefs, Free State Stars, Black Leopards neSupersport United muSouth Africa pamwe neBuymore neCaps United mu Zimbabwe.
Nkhata akatambira Zimbabwe kanokwana kagumi akanwisa zvibodzwa zvitatu.
Pamusoro paNkhata, VaSanyamandwe vanoti Dynamos yakatenga zvekare Brett Amidu kubva kuFC Platinum vachiwedzera ivo kuti zviri mumaoko emurairidzi wavo, Lloyd Mutasa, kushandisa kana kuregedza Denver Mukamba uyo akadzoka kubva kuCaps United.
Mukamba ane nhoroondo yemisikanzwa.
Asi Mutasa anoti hapana mutambi ane nzvimbo muchikwata ichi.
Dynamos yaifanira kuve yakadzoka munhandare svondo rapera ichisangana neHighlanders asi mutambo uyu wakamiswa nePSL..
Pari zvino, Dembare iri pachinhanho chegumi nenhatu, mapoinzi mashanu kubva pachikwata chakatarisana nekubuda muPSL cheNichrut icho chine mapoinzi gumi nemanomwe.
Mutasa anoseka avo vari kuti chikwata chake chingangobuda mumakwikwi aya.
Pari zvino, chikwata cheFC Platinum ndicho chiri kutungamira makundano ePSL nemapoinzi makumi mana nemapfumbamwe, mapoinzi maviri pamusoro peNgezi Platinum Stars.
Mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vashanyira musha weGlen View muHarare uko kwapfunya chisero chirwere chekorera.
VaChamisa vakurudzira hurumende kuti itore matanho nekukasika kuitira kuti veruzhinji vasarambe vachirasikirwa nehupenyu.
VaChamisa vati vari kushushikana zvikuru nekufa kuri kuramba kuchiita vanhu mushure mekubatwa nechirwere chekorera icho chinonzi chaurauya vanhu makumi maviri neumwechete muHarare chete.
Vati haisisiri nguva yekuti vanhu vabatwe nezvirwere zvakaita sekorera netyphoid izvo zvinonzi nevehutano zviri kubata vanhu vakawanda muguta kunyanya mumisha yeGlen View, Budiriro pamwe neGlen Norah. Vakurudzirawo masangano ekunze akaita seUnited Nations kuti abatsire Zimbabwe mukurwisana nekorera.
Mukuru anoona nezvehutano munharunda yeHarare mukanzuru yeguta iri, VaGeorge Mutawa, vaudza Studio7 kuti veruzhinji vanofanira kuvirisa mvura yekunwa vasati vainwa uye kugara vakashambidzika pose pavari.
Mukuru anoona nezvekutakurwa kwemarara mukanzuru yeHarare, Amai Patricia Mukudu, vakurudzira kuti veruzhinji vasarasire marara pose pose uye vasachengete marara mudzimba.
Amai Mukudu vatiwo chimwe chiri kukonzera kupararira kwechirwere chekorera ichi ndechekuti vanhu vanorarama nekutengesa vari kutengesera hove munzvimbo dzisina kushambidzika izvo zvave kuita kuti vanenge vadya hove idzi vabatirewo chirwere chekorera.
Mumwe mukoti pachipatara cheGlen View Polyclinic, Muzvare Chido Mbizi, vati vanhu vazhinji vari kurapwa pachipatara chavo vari kupihwa mishonga kunyange hazvo vamwe vevanhu ava vasiri kubvumwa nemishonga.

VaMuzekenyi vati havachaziva zvekuita sezvo vachiti imba yavo pamwe nedzimwe dzakavakomberedza dzakajenga masuweji.
Mumwe mugari wemuGlen View makare, Amai Letwin Nyamayaro, avo vane vana vaviri vanodzidza pane chimwe chikoro chiri muGlen View makare, vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti ivhare zvikoro zvese munzvimbo yavanogara vachiti vave kutyira kuti vana vakawanda vachafa mushure mekutapurirana chirwere chekorera pamwe netyphoid.

ZCTU inoti vanhu vacharamwa mabasa senzira yekuudza hurumende kuti igadzirise zvichemo zvevashandi pamwe nezviri kuomera veruzhinji munyika.
Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurongwa uhu hwave pedyo uye ZCTU ichataura mazuva achaitwa hurongwa hwavo kana vachinge vapedza hurukuro dzavari kuita nemamwe masangano ane zvichemo zvakafanana nezvavo.

Nyanzvi munyaya dzeHIV/AIDS dzinoti kuti Zimbabwe ibudirire mukupedza HIV/AIDS munyika, vechidiki vanofanirwa kupinda muzvirongwa zvekurwisa dambudziko iri pamwe nekudzidziswa kuzvichengetedza kana vachiita zvepabonde.
Mukuedza kurwisa HIV/AIDS mune vechidiki, hurumende yakabatana nemasangano akazvimirira mukuparura chirongwa chekudzidzisa vechidiki nezvedambudziko reHIV/AIDS, kuzvichengetedza panyaya dzepabonde pamwe nekukurudzira vechidiki vane HIV kuramba vachimwa mishonga yavanenge vanzi nana chiremba vanwe nguva dzose.
Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzeHIV/AIDS, VaTrevor Chirimambowa, avo vanoshanda nesangano rinonzi Million Memory Project vanoti chirongwa che Ready Plus chakakosha zvikuru sezvo donzvo racho riri rekubatsira vechidiki kuti vachengetedze hutano hwavo kunyanya munyaya dzepabonde.
Amai Martha Maodzeke vanoshanda nesangano rinoshanda nevechidiki vane HIV/AIDS, reAfricaid /Zvandiri.
Amai Maodzeke vanoti vechidiki vanofanirwa kupinzwa muzvirongwa zvekurwisa kupedza chirwere chemukondombera, uye vachitungamira zvirongwa izvi.
Mukuru weRegional Psychosocial Support Initiatives, rimwe remasangano achange achitungamira chirongwa che Ready Plus, Amai Sibusisiwe Marunda, vanotiwo vachange vachikurudzira vabereki kuti vataure nyaya dzepabonde nevana vavo kuitira kuti vavachenjedze munyaya dzezve chirwere ichi.
Mumwe wevechidiki anoti anoda kudzidziswa pamwe nekukurudzirwa kuti varwise HIV/AIDS, Muzvare Samantha Moyo, anotiwo vechidiki vazhinji havana kusununguka kutaura nyaya dzepabonde kana dzeHIV/AIDS.

VaBloomberg ne nhumwa dzavo vanonzi varikugadzirira kuendesa mapepa ekupinda musarudzo mudunhu reAlabama iro rinoti vanoda kukwikwidza vanofanirwa kuunza mapepa avo musi weChishanu usati wasvika.
Nemusi weChina, VaBloomberg ne zvipangamazano zvavo, vakataura parunhare nevamwe vakuru mubato reDemoctratic Party vachivaudza kuti vari kufunga zvekukwikwidza zvekare.
Muna 2016, vakambogadzirira kukwikwidza vakazorega, zvinova zvavakaita zvekare pakutanga pegore rino.
Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha, ve Devry University ku Ohio, vanoti VaBloomberg vanogona kusangana nezvipingamupini zvizhinji zvinosanganisa hupfumi hwavo uye nemabatiro avakaita vanhu vasiri vechichena mazuva avakange vari meya weguta re New York.
“Vanhu muAmerica vari kunetseka nemutungamiriri uripo, VaDonald Trump, vachiti havana tsitsi nevarombo uye neavo vari kutambura nekuti ivo mupfumi asingazivi nhamo,” Muzvinafundo Masocha vakaudza Studio 7.
Vakati, “VaBloomberg vakapfuma kupinda VaTrump naizvozvo vanhu vanogona kutya kusarudza umwezve mupfumi. Uyezve imwe nyaya inogona kuvanetsa ndeye kuraira mapurisa avo vachiri meya weNew York kuti vamise nekusecha vanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti pane mhosva yavapara, izvo zvakapedzisira zvave kuitwa kuvanhu vatema chete nevamwe vasiri vechichena.”
Kana VaBloomberg vakakwikwidza, vaJoe Biden ndivo vangapinda pakaoma sezvo kuchinzi vanhu vanotsigira vaBiden ndivo vangazoda kutsigira VaBloomberg.

Vakuru vanoti mudzimu wakupa ronda wati nhudzi dzikudye, iyi ndiyo nhamo yoonekwa nevana veZimbabwe vakawanda nekuda kwenzara yapfunya chisero munyika, Vanhu vakawanda havana mabasa zvopa kuti ndangariro dzigare dziri kure vachizoguma varwara,
Mashoko aya anotsinhirwa nemukuru wesangano Community Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike rinova sangano rakazvimirira rinokurudzira hutano hwakanaka kuzvizvarwa zveZimbabwe. VaRusike vanoti pane ongororo iri kuratidza kuti chirwere chekuoma mutezo chavekukomba nenyaya yehurombo.
“Nekuda kwekuoma kwezvehupfumi mumakore angada kuita makumi maviri adarika tiri kuona kuti ruzhinji rwava kutambura nezvirwere zvataive tisina. Zvirwere zvekufunganya, anenge achifunga kuti nhasi tichadyei, mari yechikoro ndichaiwanepi akapedza chikoro basa anoriwanepi munhu otooma mutezo", vanodaro VaRusike.
vanoendererawo mberi vachiti, "Nyika yedu haisikunyatsokwanisa kubatsira vanhu vakadaro. Yarasikirwa navanachiremba navanamukoti vakawanda uye muzvipatara hamuna zvekushandisa zvakakwana.Vanhu varikuramba vachirasikirwa nepfuma yavo vamwe vototengesa mombe kuti vabhadhare kune vanobatsira. Vamwe vakutofamba nzendo dzakareba kuenda kune dzimwe nyika nekuti zveutano zvadzikira kuno. Dai hurumende yagadzirisa nyaya yezvehupfumi kuti vanhu vasanyanyekufunganya.”
Mumwe akawirwa nedambudziko rekuoma mutezo ndiAmai Lydia Takawira. Amai Takawira vanoti varikurarama hupenyu hunorwadza zvikuru mushure mekuoma mutezo huye vanoti nekuda kwenhamo yavari kuona havafungidziri kuti vachavanehutano hwakanaka nekuda kwepfungwa dzinovawandira mumusoro
“Ndakaoma mutezo kupera kwegore. Zvinhu zvandiomera zvakanyanya nekuti ndinoda mari ingatosvika kuzana ramadhora kaviri svondo roga roga. Mari iyi irikundinetsa kuiwana saka dzimwe nguva ndinoguma ndorega kuenda kunotasanurwa mitezo nekutoona kuti handingasiye mumba musina chokudyaMurume nemhuri yangu zvatovaomerawo zvakanyanya. Ndichirikuda rubatsiro nguva dzose."
Vanhu vanooma mitezo vanoda nyanzvi mukutasanudza mutezo huye vanachiremba ava kana vasiri pazvipatara zvehurumende vanodhuura zvakanyanya. Kutasamudzwa kamwe chete kunoda madhora aripakati pe makumi manomwe nezana ramadhora huye zvozoenderana kuti watora nguva yakadi kusvika wazogona kushandisa mitezo woga.”
Dr Andrew Mataruse ndeumwe wevanachiremba vanoshanda nevarwere vekuoma mutezo. VaMataruse vanoti zvichienzaniswa nakare, chirwere chekuoma mutezo ichi chatekeshera.
“Dambudziko rekuoma kwemitezo idambudziko rinokonzereswa kana tsinga dzisingakwanise kuendesa ropa kuuropi. BP ndiyo inonyanyo konzera dambudziko rekuoma kwemitezo. Kune zvimwewo zvirwere zvakadai sesugar neHIV zvavewo kukonzeresawo stroke. Tichitarisa kunana 1990 tinoona kuti dambudziko rakura zvakanyanya parizvino. Patsvakurudzo dzatakaita tinoona kuti ririkutosvika kunana 4 percent pakakura tichienzanisa nedzimwe nyika kana kare."
Dr Mataruse vanotiwo, "Pane maguta vanhu vanotanga kudyawo mari dzichiwanda zvichikonzera zvirwere zvakaita sana obesity. Totarisawo kuti kushayiwawo zvekare kunowanzawo chirwere nekuti mari yekunoongororwa inenge ichishayikwa.”

Chinhu chinoonekwa sechinonyadzisa zvikuru uye chisingawanzoitwa paruzhinji kuti vanhu vataure nezvenyaya yepavanoitira tsvina.
Asi nekuda kuti vanhu vanzwisise kuipa kwakaita kuitira tsvina pose pose, vesangano reHelpAge Zimbabwe vakatombosendeka nyadzi idzi parutivi kuti vanyatsodzidzisa vanhu vakagariswa patsva muBubi District nezvenyaya iyi.
Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reHelpAge Zimbabwe vanoti sangano ravo rakatanga kushanda muBubi mugore ra2013 richiita zvirongwa zvekukurudzira hutsanana pamwe nekubatsira kuti vagari vawane mvura yekunwa yakachena.
“Vagari vemuBubi vakaunganidzwa ndokubva vadzidziswa pamusoro pekukosha kwakaita kuti vashandise zvimbuzi; kana vadzidziswa kudaro zvinobatsira kuchinja mafungiro avo kuti mumwe nemumwe wavo anzwe chinomutuma kuti azvivakire chimbuzi pamba pake.
“Programme iyi yange isingauyi nemari asi kana munhu adzidziswa kushata kwakaita kuitira tsvina pose pose anobva anzwa kuda kugadzirisa nyaya iyi. vamwe vati kurei vaya nevamwe vanotambudzika ndivo vataibatsira nekuvapa cement vobatsirwa nevanhu vemunharaunda kuti vavake zvimbuzi pamisha yavo.
"Muchirongwa chechirongwa chechipiri cheHygiene Promotion tange tichivaka zvimbuzi muzvikoro uye takavaka zvimbuzi zvakati wandei pasi pechirongwa ichi.”
Kusvika pari zvino veHelpAge Zimbabwe vanoti vakwanisa kubatsira vanhu vakwegura nevanotambura kuvaka zvimbuzi zviuru zviviri pamisha yavo uyewo kudzidzisa vanhu vanosvika zviuru zvinomwe nezvekukosha kwekuve nezvimbuzi pamisha.
Vakakwanisawo kuvaka zvimbuzi zvinosvika makumi matanhatu muzvikoro zvakasiyana-siyana muBubi.
Amai Lucy Nyathi vemuWard 23 ndemumwe wevanhu vakakwanisa kuvaka chimbuzi pamusha pavo mushure mekurudziro yeveHelpAge. Amai Nyathi vakaudza Studio 7 kuti kuve nezvimbuzi kwakakosha zvikuru sezvo kuchidzivirira kuti vanhu vasabatwa nezvirwere zvemanyoka zvinokonzerwa nenyaya yekusave nehutsanana.
Bubi District ine maWard makumi maviri nematatu. MaWard gumi nemana ndiwo ane mindamirefu yakagariswa vanhu patsva uye nzvimbo yaimbove mapurazi evaChena .
VaTapiwa Zivovoyi vanove District Adminstrator weBubi vanoti rimwe rematambudziko makuru emunzvimbo iyi kushaya mvura vachitiwo mvura yepasi inonetsawo kuwana sezvo munzvimbo umu musinganaye mvura yakawanda.
“Tine vanhu vanofamba makilometre manomwe kana masere kuti vawane mvura.
“Kunyange zvedu takawana zvibhorani makumi matatu pasi pechirongwa cheRural WASH programme, hazvikwani…tichiri kuda zvimwe zvakawanda.
“Rimwe dambudziko ratinaro nderekuti nzvimbo yacho yatiri kuti ubate mvura kana wachera chibhorani unenge wadzika nemugodhi kusvika kana mametre zana, sezvakafanana nemuWard 10, Ward 22 neWard 23 muno matiri. Ndiro dambudziko ratinaro guru rekushaikwa kwemvura.” Amai Nyathi vanodaro.
VaFaifi vanotsigirawo dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemvura mumindamirefu yemuBubi vachiti ndicho chimwe chechikonzero chakaita kuti sangano reHelpAge Zimbabwe riwone zvakakosha kushanda munzvimbo iyi.
Pasi pechirongwa chekubatsira vanhu kuti vawane mvura yakachena sangano iri rakagadzirisa zvibhorani zana nemakumi mashanu uyewo rikacheresa zvibhorani makumi matatu.
Munguva pfupi yapfuura sangano iri rakapedza kuisa pombi netangi remvura izvo zvichaita kuti vanhu vemuWard 23 vawane mvura. Chirongwa ichi chakaitwa nemari inosvika zviuru gumi nezvitanhatu zvemadhora
Ambuya Kattie Shoko ndemumwe wevanhu vari mumisha makumi mashanu nemashanu iri muWard 23 vachakwanisa kuwana mvura kubva panzvimbo iyi.
Ambuya Shoko, avo vakatanga kugara muBubi mugore ra2007, vanonyatsoziva nezvedambudziko rekushaikwa kwemvura munzvimbo iyi uye vanoti kuwana mvura pedyo kuchavabatsira zvikuru.
VaBhekizulu Sibanda ndivo sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezvekushanda zvakanaka kwepombi netangi zvakaiswa muward mavo.
VaSibanda vakaudza Studio 7 kuti vagari vakaona zvakakosha kuti vakwanise kugadzira pombi kana zvimwe zvinenge zvafa vasingatarisire kuramba vachibatsirwa nevesangano reHelpAge Zimbabwe.
Komiti yaVaSibanda iyi inoona kuti vanhu vaita mudeme mudeme vachibvisa dhora pamhuri yega yega uye mari iyi inochengetwa yozobatsira kana paine chinenge chichida kugadziriswa.
“VeHelpAge vakatidzidzisa kuti tochengetedza sei patakaisirwa mvura yedu pamwe nemidziyo yacho.
“Vakati zvakakosha kuti kunyange ivo vasisipo isusu vagari tikwanise kuramba tichiwana mvura yakachena pasazove nedambudziko rekuti togona kushya mvura nekuda kwekuti pompi yafa.
“Saka takaita komiti ine bumbiro remitemo uye takabvumirana kuti mhuri imwe neimwe ichabvisa dhora pamwedzi wega wega kuitira kuti tikwanise kubhara zvose zvingave zvinodiwa, angave magetsi kana kutenga zvimwe zvinhu zvinodiwa kana pombi ichinge yafa; takaita izvi kuti tisazove nedambudziko rekugara nguva yareba tisina mvura.” VaSibanda vanodaro.

Aka kave kechipiri FC Platinum ichigumira pamitambo yekutanga mumakundano emuAfrica mushure mekubuda munharaunda yekutanga muna 2015 apo vakakwikwidza muCaf Confederation Cup.
FC Platinum yakaunganidza vatambi vakawandisa kusanganisira vaviri kubva kuCameroon neZambia asi izvi hazvina kuuya neshanduko kubva apo vatambotamba nezvimwe zvikwata zvemuAfrica.
Chikwata chemuZimbabwe ichi chaitarisira kusvika kana kudarika mu mini league stage umo makasvikwa neCaps United gore rapera asi izvi zvakona n'anga murapwa achada.
Iko zvino, FC Platium yave kuisa simba rayo rese kumakundano eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League ayo ari kutanga musi wa 10 Kurume iine chinangwa chekutora mukombe uyu zvekare nekudzoka muAfrica gore rinouya.
Makundano eCaf Champions League anotambwa nezvikwata zvinenge zvatora mukombe weligi munyika dzazvo.
Pari zvino, mukombe uyu uri mumaoko eWydad Casablanca yekuMorocco iyo yakarova Al Ahly yekuEgypy mufainari yegore rapera.
Vamwe vanhu vanoti kuwanda kuri kuramba kuchiita nyaya dzevanhu vanonzi vari kubira vanhu, kuponda pamwe nekuita zvemhirizhonga vachishandisa mabhemba, avo vave kuzivikanwa nerekuti “mashurugwi”, kunogona kuita kuti munyika mupedzisire musingachatevedzerwi mutemo zvachose.  Vamwe vataura neStudio 7 vati vave kutyira hupenyu hwavo nekuda kwekuwanda kwenyaya dzevanhu vari kuba kana kuponda vanhu vachishandisa mabhemba ayo anozivikanwa muChirungu kunzi “machetes”.
Zvikwata izvi zvakatanga zvichinyanyowanikwa munzvimbo dzinowanikwa zvicherwa, asi pari zvino zvapararira nenyika yose.
Mazuva mashoma adarika chimwe chikwata chevemabhemba ava chakarwisa vanhu vashanu muChegutu, madzimai maviri akafa, mamwe madzimai matatu akakuwara zvakaipisisa.
Musvondo rapera irori zvakare chimwe chikwata chevanhu vanodarika makumi mashanu chinonzi chakanorwisa Kamba yemapurisa kwaNembudziya kuGokwe chichida kununura mumwe wacho akanga asungwa nemapurisa.
Mukurwisana nemapurisa uku, vaviri vevanhu ava vanonzi vakapfurwa nemapurisa vakakuwara, vamwe makumi mana vakasungwa.
Chimwe chikwata zvakare chemashurugwi chinonzi chakanorwisana nevanochengetedza mugodhi weGoodhope kuKadoma, mumwe wavo akapfurwa akafa.
Ongororo yakaitwa nemapurisa inonzi inoratidza kuti akapfurwa akafa uyu yaive nhengo yechiuto, uye nhumbi dzechiuto dzakawanikwawo mumotokari yavaishandisa. Izvi zvakaitika mazuva mashoma shoma chimwe chikwata chevemabhemba ava chauraya mupurisa kuKadoma kwakare.
Kunyange hazvo pave nenguva nyaya dzakadai dzichiitika, mumazuva mashoma apfuura veruzhinji muguta reGweru vakashamisika zvikuru mushure mekunge chikwata chevanhu vaive nemapanga akadaro chakasvika pachechi yeZAOGA mumusha weMkoba 16 ndokutorera vanhu vaive muchechi umu mafoni nemari.
Studio 7 yaedza kutaura nemurume anochengetedza pachechi iyi kuti tinzwe zvizere asi aramba kutaura nesu achiti haabvumidzwi kutaura nevatori venhau.
Asi mumwe mudzimai anogara pedyo nechechi iyi, uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Amai Moyo, ati nyaya iyi yakavhundutsa vanhu vakawanda zvikuru.
Mumwe mugari wemuGweru, Muzvare Nozipho Rutsate vati maonero avo ndeekuti kuregererwa kwezvikwata zvave nenguva zvichirwisana nenyaya dzegoridhe munzvimbo dzakasiyanasiyana mudunhu reMidlands nekune dzimwewo nzvimbo munyika ndiko kwave kuita kuti dzimwe mbavha dzitevedzerewo hubhinya hwakadai.
Amai Jennifer Chimange vanoti maonero avo ndeekuti vanhu vari kuita hubhinya nemhirizhonga yakadai vari kuregerwa vachiita madiro aJojina nekuti vane vakuru-vakuru vanovatsigira.
Mumazuva mashoma apfuura paramende yakazivisisa kuti ichaita ongororo yekuedza kutsvaga kuti chii chiri kukonzera nyaya dzezvikwata-zvikwata zvevemabhemba izvi.
Veruzhinji vanoti vari kushamisika kuti sei zviri kutorera mapurisa nguva yakareba kuparadza "mashurugwi", izvo zvinonzi zviri kuzoita kuti vafunge kuti pane vari kuvachengetedza.
Mumiriri weGweru mudare reparamende, VaBrian Dube, avo vanovewo gweta vari nhengo yeMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, vanoti zviri kuitika izvi zvinoratidza kuti munyika hamutevedzerwi mutemo sezvinogara zvichitaurwa nevebato ravo.
VaDube vanotsigirawo maonero ekuti vanhu vari kuita izvi havasungwi nekuti vanoshandiswa nevamwe vakuru mubato riri kutonga reZanu PF mukuita mhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika.
Taedza kunzwa divi remutauriri webato reZanu PF mudunhu reMidlands VaCornelius Mpereri vakati tiite zvekunyora mibvunzo yedu pasi asi vange vasati vapindura panguva yekuenda pamhepo.
Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu vanoti zvikwata zvevanhu ava hazvineyi nebato riri kutonga, asi kuti imbavha dziri kungobirawo veruzhinji. Vanoti bato reZanu PF ndiro rine huwandu muparamende zvekuti haringatadzi kumisa vanhu vari kuita zvehubhinya ava.
VaVincent Chakunda mudzidzisi wezvidzidzo zvepamusoro zvekutongwa kwematunhu pamwe nebudiriro uye muongorori wezvehupfumi akazvimirira.
Vanoti nyaya iyi haigoni kupera kana pakasave nekutaura nenzwi rakasimba kwevakuru venyika vachishora nyaya iyi.
VaChirumhanzu vanoti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakatotaura kare nezwi guru pamusoro penyaya iyi, izvo zvave kuita kuti “mashurugwi” asungwe nehuwandu hwavo.
Kunyange hazvo vamwe vevanhu vari kuita humbavha nemhirizhonga yemabhemba vari kusungwa, vamwe vanhu havazi kugutsikana kuti mapurisa ari kuita basa rawo nemazvo panyaya iyi.
nekune rumwe rutivi, mapurisa mumatunhu akati kuti kusanganisira muGweru, akatodzika mutemo unorambidza kutakurwa kwemabhemba aya kanawo mapanga kwemwedzi mitatu.
Kusvika paonekwa nzira yekugadzirisa dambudziko iri risati rakomba, veruzhinji vacharamba vachifamba vakabatira ura mumaoko vachityira hupenyu hwavo kuti vangapondwa nemashurugwi aya.
Nyanzi munyaya dzedzidzo, uye vari vaimbove mukuru wechikoro cheNational University of Science and Technology, NUST, Professor Phineas Makhurane, varadzikwa zvine mutsindo kumusha kwavo munzvimbo yavakaberekerwa yeGungwe kuGwanda mudunhu reMatabeleland South.
VaMakhurane varadzikwa zvine mutsindo pasi pehurongwa hwanga huchibatsirwa nemauto.
Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakanga yavapa ruremekedzo rwegamba renyika kuitira kuti vavigwe kuNational Heroes Acre muHarare muhurongwa hunenge huchitungamirwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, mutumbi waVaMakhurane waradzikwa VaMnangagwa nevatevedzeri vavo vaviri, VaConstantine Chiwenga naVaKembo Mohadi, vasipo.
VaMakhurane, avo vakashayikira ku Mater Dei Hospital neMugovera wapfuura, vanonzi vakati vaida kuvigirwa kumusha kwavo, uye pakuchemwa kwavo, vanonzi vakatiwo havadi kuti vanhu vauye vakapfeka mbatya dzemapato ezvematongerwo enyika.
Vachitaura vakamirira VaMnangagwa, munyori anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, Va Simon Khaya Moyo, vatenda mhuri yekwaMakhurane pamwe nevanhu vemunzvimbo yeGungwe, nekuve nemunhu akaita zvinodadisa munyika.
VaMoyo vati Professor Makhurane munhu akashanda zvakasimba zvikuru mukusimudzira dzidzo munyika, uye vakurudzira vana muzvinafundo kuti vazadzise mabasa anga achiitwa naVaMakhurane.
VaMakhurane vakapinda munhoroondo yenyika kuva mukuru wechikoro chepamusoro soro wekutanga kuitwa gamba renyika pasina kuitwa zvematongerwo enyika.
Kupihwa chiremera chegamba kwakaitwa VaMakhurane kwakakatyamadza vanhu vakawanda munyika.
Mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti kunyange hazvo VaMnangagwa vari panguva yakaoma, vanhu vakawanda vari kufara nedanho rakatorwa naVaMnangagwa rekutambira VaMakhurane regamba renyika.
VaMavhinga vatiwo vaimbove mukuru weUniversity of Zimbabwe, muchakabvu Walter Kamba, pamwe naVaGordon Chavunduka, vaikodzerawo kuitwa magamba enyika pachitariswa mabasa avakaita.
Mutori wenhau ane mukurumbira, Tapfuma Machakaire, vanoti dai VaMugabe vachiri pachiri panyanga, havaiona VaMakhurane vachiitwa gamba renyika.
VaMachakaire vanoti ruremekedzo rwegamba renyika rwunofanirwa kupihwa munhu wese anokodzera pasina kuiswa zvematongerwo enyika mukati.
VaMukharane ndivo munhu mutema wekutanga muZimbabwe kuita zvidzidzo zvePhD munyaya dzesainzi. Vakashandawo kuUniversity of Zimbabwe vari Pro Vice Chancellar, uye kuUniversity of Botswana.
VaMakhurane, avo vakaberekwa muna 1939 munzvimbo yeGungwe kwakare kuGwanda, vasiya mudzimai, Amai Lydia Makhurane, pamwe nevanakomana vatatu, nemwanasikana mumwe chete.
Dzinmwe nhengo dzeANC dzakabatana neZanu-PF dzakaratidzira muPretoria, South Africa dzichikurudzira kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru veZanu-PF zvibviswe.
Vange vachiratidzira ava vaenda pamizinda yeAmerica neEuropean Union munyika iyi.
Vange vachiratidzira ava vange vachishora zvikuru hurumende yeAmerica, nesangano reEU pamwewo nekupa kurudziro yekuti zvirango izvi zvibviswe.
Mutauriri webato reZanuPF VaKennedy Mandaza vaudza Studio 7 kuti vaneta nezviri kuitwa ne America.
VaMandaza vanoti nyika yeZimbabwe yakatemerwa zvirango nekuda kwekuti mhuri yayo yakange yatora ivhu kubva kuvachena. Amai Martha Shumba nhengo yeCoalition Against Sanctions on Zimbabwe vashorawo kutemerwa kwezvirango izvi.
Asi mudzidzisi wepachikoro chepamusoro cheTswane University of Technology, Doctor Ricky Mukonza, vanoti kurudziro yeSADC, inoratidza kuti sangano iri harisi kunzwisisa zviri kuitika muZimbabwe.
Dr Mukonza vaenderera mberi vachitI dambudziko rakatarisana neZimbabwe, harisi kukonzerwa nezvirango asi nematongero ebato reZanuPF.
Mutauriri wesangano reMDC mudunhu reJohannesburg, VaInnocent Nsingo vanoti zvabuda pachena kuti SADC inotsigira bato reZanu-PF.
VaNsingo vanoti Zanu PF, inofanira kutanga yagadzirisa huori huri kuitwa nevatungamiriri vayo, kubva kumusoro kusvika pasi. VaNsingo vakurudzira sangano reSADC kuti risave nedivi rarakarerekera mukugadzira dambudziko rakatarisana neZimbabawe.
Asi mumiririri wemuzinda weZimbabwe muSouth Africa VaDavid Hamadziripi vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe zviri kukanganisa zvikuru kusafamba zvakanaka kwenyika dzayakavakidzana nayo.
VaHamadziripi vanovimba kuti veEU nehurumende yeAmerica, vachateerera kushungurudzika kwenyika dzemuSADC .
Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muNew York, uye vari nyanzvi munyaya dzemari, VaCliff Makanda, vanoti zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vachengetedze mari dzavo zvine hungwaru sezvo remangwana risina kujeka.
VaMakanda, avo vanoshanda pamusika wemari muguta iri, vanoti kunonoka kuvhurwa kuri kuitwa mabhizimisi pasi rose nepamusoro pe Covid-19, kuchaita kuti dzimwe mhuri dzitarisane nematambudziko ekushaya mari sezvo mamwe kambani achapedzisira avharwa.
VaMakanda vanoti vanoshuwira kuti mabasa eavo vanoita zvemari achange aripo pachavhurwa nyika dzese pari rose.
New York ndiro guta remuAmerica rine vanhu vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vakawanda uye kusvina nemusi weChishanu, vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu nezvisere, vainge vabatwa nedenda iri, uye vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi maviri nezvitatu nezana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu vainge vafa neCovid-19.
New York ndiyo ine muzinda weStock Exchange, muzinda weUnited Nations nezvimwe zvinokosha zvakaita semabhanga epasi rose.
VaMakanda vanoti panguva ino yekushandira kumba ndipo paunowona kuti vashandi nemabasa avo vakakosha here kana kuti kwete sezvo vamwe vashandi vacharasikirwa nemabasa kana vasingakosheswe kuburikidza neruzivo rwaburitsa neLockdown.
"Ndakatarisira kuti vemakambani vavhure makambani avo sezvo ndisisina kugadzikana kuti ndichange ndine basa here kana kuti kwete sezvo vazhinji vacharasikirwa nemabasa pachavhurwa nyika zhinji nemabhizimisi zvikuru muguta reNewYork," vadaro VaMakanda.
Chirwere cheCovid-19 chakatanga kuChina gore rapera uye chabata vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mashanu pasi rose, uye kuuraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi matatu nezvipfumbamwe munyika mazana maviri negumi nenhatu pasi rose.
Nyika dzanyanya kuvhiringwa nedambudziko reCovid-19 inyika dzakapfuma dzakaita seAmerica, Brazil, Russia, Spain, United Kingdom, Italy, France, Germany neTurkey.
Mu Africa, nyika dzabatwa zvakanyanya neCovid-19 dzinoti South Africa, Egypt, Morocco, Algeria, Nigeria, neGhana - dzinova nyika dzakapfumawo mudunhu iri.
Masoja nemapurisa vabatana nemapurisa ekanzuru yeHarare vachidzinga vanotengesera mumigwagwa yeguta iri izvo zviri kushorwa nevanorarama nekutengesa mumigwagwa yeguta iri.
Masoja, mapurisa eZRP pamwe neekanzuru anonzi anga achitorera vanotengesa mumigwagwa ava zvinhu zvavo vachizvikanda mumotokari dzavanga vachifamba nadzo.
Mumwe wevatorerwa zvinhu zvavanga vachitengesa, VaNesbert Gumbo, vanoti vasara vasisina chekubata sezvo zvinhu zvese zvavanga vawaridza pavanowanzotengesera mazuva ese zvatorwa nemasoja, mapurisa eZRP pamwe nemapurisa ekanzuru.
Mumwe anorarama nekutengesera mumigwagwa, VaFanwell Tsomondo, vanoti havasi kufara nezvave kuitwa nemasoja kupindira munyaya dzisineyi nekuchengetedza nyika.
VaRueben Mahoka vanoti zvinovarwadza kuti VaMnangagwa vave kukanganwa chazuro nehope vachiti kuti vave pachigaro hakusi kuda kweZanu PF chete asi kuratidzira kwakaitwa neveruzhinji vakabatana nenhengo dzebato riri kutonga ndiko kwakaita kuti vave pachigaro.
Nokudaro, VaMahoka vati VaMnangagwa vanofanira kutora matanho anogadzirisa nyaya dzinobata raramo yevanhu kwete kusweropedzera matombo kuzvidhii-dhii idzo njiva dzichauya.
Zvichakadai, Muzvare Tapiwa Kawadza, avo vanoraramawo nekutengesa vakurudzira hurumende yaVaMnangagwa kuti igadzirise nyaya dzekushayikwa kuri kuitwa mabasa neveruzhinji kuitira kuti vanotengesa mumigwagwa vawanewo zvimwe zvekuita.
Muzvare Kawadza vati kudzinga kwavari kuitwa mumigwagwa kwakafanana nekutongerwa rufu sezvo vachiti kutengesa mumigwagwa ndiko kuri kuita kuti nevana vavo vawane chouviri.
Mutauriri wemasoja, Colonel Overson Mugwisi, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti kanzuru yeHarare ndiyo iri kudzinga vanhu mumigwagwa vachiti ivo semasoja basa ravo chete nderekuona kuti zviri kuitwa izvi zvaitwa murunyararo.
Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri wemapurisa, Amai Charity Charamba, kuti tinzwe divi remapurisa panyaya iyi.
Hatina kukwanisawo kutaura nameya wedhorobha reHarare, VaBernard Manayenyeni, kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi.
Asi mutauriri wekanzuru yavo, VaMichael Chideme, vakaudza nhepfenyuro yeZBC nezuro manheru kuti kanzuru yavo ichatora matanho akasimba kuti vanotengesera mumigwagwa vatengesere munzvimbo dzakatarwa nekanzuru kwete zvekuti vangomera sehohwa vachiita madiro aJojina pakati pedhorobha vasingabhadhare mitero kukanzuru.
Zvichakadai vanotengesera mumigwagwa vanoti vari kutsindirirwa mwena unobuda ishwa sezvo vachiti nzvimbo dzakatarwa nekanzuru dziri kure nevanhu vanotenga zvavanenge vachitengesa uye vanoti zvakare havakwane panzvimbo idzi.
Makwikwi eAfrica Cup of Nations (AFCON) aenderera mberi neChipiri kuEquitorial Guinea apo chikwata cheCote d’Ivoire chaita mangage 1 -1 neGuinea.
Zvikwata zviviri izvi zviri muGroup D uye mutambo wechipiri muGroup rimwe chete uri kutambwa manheru eChipiri pakati peCameroon neMali.
Nemusi weMuvhuro chikwata cheBafana Bafana chekuSouth Africa chakaodza moyo vatsigiri vacho apo chakakundwa 3-1 neAlgeria.
Chakanyatsorwadza vatsigiri vakawanda ndechekuti chikwata ichi chakamwisira Algeria ndokuzotadza kumwisa penalty.
Mumwe mutambo wakatambwa zuva rimwe chete muGroup C, Senegal yakakunda Ghana 2-1.
Nyanzvi inoongorora zvemitambo yenhabvu, VaMuziwethu Hadebe, vanoti mitambo iyi yakakosha nokuti ndipoi pachabuda shasha yenhabvu muAfrica.
Caps United ndiyo yave pamusoro pemakwikwi eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League panguva iyo Dynamos yakaonekana nevatsigiri vavo vakashaya munjodzi yemumugwagwa vachikunda vachiti mutambo uyu wainge wakanangana nekurangarira nekunyevenutsa mweya yevafi.
Makundano eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League ave nemutungamiri mutsva mushure mekunge Caps United nemusi weSvondo yarova Mutare City Rovers 2-0 ndokuenda panhongonya ichisiya ZPC Kariba iri pachidanho chechipiri nenyaya yekuti yakanwisa zvibodzwa zvakawanda.
Zvikwata zviviri izvi zvine maponzi makumi maviri nerimwechete mushure mekunge ZPC Kariba yarova Tsholotsho Pirates 1-0 neMugovera, apo mutambo weCaps United neMutare City Rovers waive usati watambwa.
Asi nyaya irikutaurwa nezvayo munhabvu kwese kwese ndeiyo yakaitika muRufaro Stadium apo chikwata cheDynamos chakadambura Ngezi Platinum Stars 2-0 mumutambo uyo vaiyeuka vatsigiri vavo vasere avo vakashaika munjodzi yemotokari vachienda kunoona chikwata ichi chichitamba neChapungu kuGweru svondo rapera
Zvibodzwa zvakabva kuna Augustine Mbara na Roderick Mutuma zvakasimudza nhandare yese mukupemberera vatsigiri vavo vakashaya avo vaive nemifananidzo yaive yakaiswa pamapepa aive akanamirwa munhandare yese.
Ocean Mushure uyo akatamba semunhu akasvikirwa anoti vakapedza svondo rese vachitaurirana kuti vaifanira kukunda mumutambo uyu kuti vafadze vatsigiri vavo vakavasiiya achiwedzera iye kuti varikutarisira kukunda mumitambo yavo irikutevera kuti vavacheme zvakakwana.
Mumwe mutsigiri wechikwata chinemukurumbira ichi VaZebron Muzvidziwa vanoti varikutosvimha musodzi nekufara nezvakaitwa nechikwata chavo mukuyeuka zvine mutsindo vakavasiya.
Asi mafaro ezuva rese aya anga avekukanganiswa naSteven Alimenda naRoderick Mutuma avo vange vave kuda kukandirana zvibhakera pamberi pemhomho yevanhu vachirwirra kurova mugadzikirwa kana kuti free kick.
Mushure adira mvura nyaya iyi achiti iye ndezvenhabvu sezvo vese vaida kunwisa zvibodzwa musi wanga wakakosha uyu.
Mushure anoti kunyange hazvo vakasiiwa nemapoinzi manomwe nechikwata chirikutungamira, makwikwi achiripo, zvekuti anofunga kuti vakaramba vachitamba matambiro avarikuita aya vanokwanisa kutora mukombe weligi mukupera kwemitambo yemwaka uno.
Mumitambo mina yadarika, Dynamos yanhonga mapoinzi mapfumbamwe mushure mekukunda mumitambo mitatu nekukundwa mumutambo mumwechete.
Mukukundwa kawavakaitwa neDynamos, Ngezi Platinum Stars yadzika pasi zvekuti yave pazvikwata zvina zvakatarisana nenjodzi yekuwira muDivision One mukupera kwegore rino.
Asi mutevedzeri wechikwata ichi Klifton Kadurira haasi kunyanyovhunduka achiti iye mitambo ichiripo zvekuti vanokwanisa kugadzirisa zvinhu zvavo vakakwira kumusoro kwetafura zvekare.
Highlanders iri kuramba yakati kwata nezvikwata zviri kutungamira mushure mekunge zvibodzwa zvakabva kunaBruce Kangwa naSimon Munawa zvakavapa mapoinzi matatu varova How Mine 2-0.
Bosso iri pachinhanho chechitatu, poindi imwechete pasi peCaps United neZPC Kariba asi inokwanisa kuenda pamusoro vakatamba nekukunda mumutambo wavasati vatamba neChicken Inn.
Moses Chunga ari kuenderera mberi nekurura mushure mekunge Harare City yakafamba nzendo refu yakananga kuBulawayo ndokunokunda Bulawayo City 2-0.
Asi Chunga achanyatsoonekwa masimba ake svondo rino apo chikwata chake chirikusangana neDynamos neMugovera.

Vadzidzi gumi vepaUniversity of Zimbabwe vari kuratidza mifananidzo yakasiyana-siyana inoratidza mararamiro ari kuita veruzhinji munyika panguva iyo hupfumi hwenyika huri kuenda kumawere.
Mumwe wevari kuratidza mifananidzo yavo, VaMelvin Gwishiri, vane mifananidzo inoratidza nyonga nyonga. Vati chinangwa chavo ndechekuti zvemitambo munyika zvishandiswewo kuudza vatungamiri venyika zviri kunetsa veruzhinji.
VaJoseph Muzamani vane mifananidzo yevanhukadzi vachiita mabasa akasiyasiyana kuti vawane chouviri. VaMuzamani vati vari kuratidza mifananidzo yemadzimai iyi nepamusana pekuti madzimai ari kuita zvese zvingakwanisika kuti variritire mhuri dzavo.
Mumwe mudzidzi ari kuratidzawo mifananidzo yevatengesi vezvinhu zvakasiya-siyana kusanganisira vasikana vanotengesa miviri yavo, VaArnold Chiringa, vatiwo muZimbabwe, ruzhinji rwuri kurarama nekutengesa.
VaChiringa vati nekuda kwekushaikwa kwemabasa, vanhu vanotengesa vawanda kudarika vatengi, izvo zviri kupa kuti vatengesi vawane mari shomana zvikuru.
Mifananidzo iyi iri kuratidzwa pasi pedingindira rinoti, “Life as we know it.” Kuratidzira uku kwakavhurwa zviri pamutemo neimwe nyanzvi mune zvekuveza matombo, VaDominic Benhura. Kutaridzira uku kunopera neChishanu svondo rinouya.
Sangano ravanachipangamazano, reCato Institute riri mu Washington, D.C, muno muAmerica, neMuvhuro rakazeya nyaya yeZimbabwe, zvikuru matambudziko akatarisana nenyika, uye zvingaitwe mukugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi pamwe nezvematongerwo enyika.
Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi uye vachinyorera bepanhau reWashington Post, VaBarry Woods, avo vakange vari muZimbabwe pakapfurwa vanhu vamwe vakafa mushure mesarudzo dzegore rapera, vakati zvakakosha kuti hurumende ive nehutongo hwejecherere uye iremekedze kodzero dzevanhu kuitira kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa nyika zvibiswe.
VaWoods vakaenderera mberi vachiti nguva haisati yanyatsokwana yekuti nyika dzekunze dzidyidzane neZimbabwe, sezvo pachiri nezvizhinji zvinoda kugadziriswa.
Muzvinafundo Steve Hanke, avo vanodzidzisa paJohn Hopkins University, vakaudza musangano uyu kuti Zimbabwe inokwanisa kubuda mumadhaka mairi kana ikagadzirisa mimwe mitemo inombunyikidza kodzero dzevanhu panyaya yevhu nezviwewo, nekugadzirisa nyaya yehupfumi hwenyika.
Professor Hanke vakaenderera mberi vachiti Zimbabwe inokwanisa kushandisa hwaro sehwakashandiswa nenyika yeSingapore, iyo yakakwanisa kubuda munyatwa yekuwondomoka kwehupfumi hwenyika yayakanga iri yakanga yakadzama kutodarika matambudziko akatarisana neZimbabwe.
Vakashorawo zvirango zvehupfumi zvakatemerwa nyika, vakakurudzira hurumende dzekunze kuti dzibvise zvirango izvi sezvo zvisiri kubatsira kushandura zviri kuitika muZimbabwe.
Chimwe chizvarwa chekuAfrica, VaGyude Moore, vakatsinhirawo zvakataurwa naMuzvinafundo Hanke pamusoro pezvirango zvakatemerwa nyika.
Vachitaurawo pamusangano uyu, gurukota rezve mari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakati hurumende yavo iri mushishi kugadzirisa mimwe mitemo kuti hupfumi hwenyika huvandudzike.
Musangano uyu wakapindwa nenhengo dzemasangano akazvimirira, hurumende yeAmerica nezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara muWashington D.C., kusanganisirawo Muzvare Pearl Matibe, avo vakati vakafadzwa nemafambiro aita musangano uyu.
Asi vamwe vakapindawo mumusangano uyu vakati kana hurumende yeZimbabwe yakatevedzera zvakakurudzirwa nezvipangamazano zvakataura pamusangano uyu, nyika inokwanisa kusimuka zvakare ichimira yoga sezvayaive mumakore ekuma 1980 payakawana kuzvitonga kuzere.
Musangano pakati pevamiriri vehurumende nevamiriri vevashandi vehurumende weNational Joint Negotiating Council, uyo wanga wakatarisirwa nevakawanda kuti uchaburitsa chimuko, unonzi hauna chawaburitsa mushure mekunge vashandi varamba mari yanga yaiswa patafura nehurumende.
Zvinonzi hurumende yanga yati inokwanisa kuwedzera vashandi vayo mihoro nemadhora makumi mapfumbamwe nemanomwe pamunhu iri mari yemaRTGS, iyo inonzi yarambwa nevamiriri vevashandi ava.
Hurumende inonzi yati inokwanisa kuwedzera mari idzi nemari inoita zana nemakumi masere emamiroyoni emari yeRTGS semari ichawedzerwa kubva muna Chikunguru kusvika panopera gore muna Zvita.
Izvi zvinosiya mushandi mumwe chete achiwedzerwa nemaRTGS makumi mapfumbamwe nemanomwe pamwedzi wega wega.
Vashandi vari munhaurirano idzi vanga vachimirira nemasangano avo vanosvika zviuru mazana matatu nezvipfumbamwe, kunynage hazvo mamwe masangano akaita seProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe asina kupinda mumusangano uyu.

Pari zvino mushandi wepasi muhurumende anonzi ari kutambira mari inosvika madhora mazana mana nemakumi matatu yemaRTGS pamwedzi.
Vashandi vari kuchema kuti mari yavo haichatenge chinhu sezvo zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichikwira panguva iyo mihoro yavo isina kwairi kuenda.

Asi VaMliswa vati vakaudza VaGoddard kuti havana rubatsiro rwavaikwanisa kuvapa uye vaifanira kunoona gurukota rezvemutemo, sezvo kambani yeHwange Colliery yaive yave kugurukota iri nekuti yainge yave kuvakiridzwa.

Varamba kuti vakakumbira mari yechioko muhomwe uye vati vakakatyamadzwa kuti VaGoddard vaida kubatsirwa nemunhu akaita saVaTundiya ivo vari munhu anozviitira mabhizimisi ake uye vachizivana nemutungamiriri wenyika.

Asi vese varamba izvi.
Vachipawo humbowo kukomiti iyi, VaChikomba varamba kuti vakakumbira mari kuna VaGoddard.
VaChikomba vati VaTundiya vane chikwereti chavo chemadhora zviuru zviviri nezana remadhora, uye vakaenda kumusangano naVaGoddard sezvo vainge vaudzwa naVaTundiya kuti VaGoddard vainge vauya nemari yekuzovabhadhara.

VaChikomba vabvuma kuti vainge vapa VaGoddard Account yavo nekuti vainge vaudza naVaTundiya kuti ndivo vaizobhadhara chikwereti chavo.

VaNcube vakati hupfumi hwenyika munyaya dzekurima nekucherwa kwezvicherwa huchaderera zvishomanana gore rinouya kuburikidza nekunonoka kunaya kwemvura pamwe nekushayikwa kwemagetsi munyika.
Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti VaNcube vanogona havo kunge vakada kufadza nyika nekuratidza kuti mari haisi kungoshandiswa zvisina musoro, dambudziko riripo nderekuti VaNcube havangazvirovi dunhu vachiti vakachengetedza mari panguva iyo Zimbabwe isina zvikwanisiro munyaya dzekurwisana neCovid-19, vana mukoti navana chiremba vachiti vari kutadza kuita basa ravo nemazvo nepamusana pekushaya mari.

Nyika dzose shanu dzemuAfrica dzange dziri kumakundano eWorld Cup kuRussia dzabuda mumakwikwi aya zvichitevera kukundwa kwakaitwa Senegal 1-0 ne Columbia. Pane mumwe mutambo muGroup iri, Poland yakakunda Japan 1-0.
Makwikwi aya ave kuenderera mberi mangwana muchikamu chechipiri chenyika gumi nenhanhatu dzasara. France iri kutamba neArgentina musi weMugovera na 4 masikati kochizoti na 8 manheru Uruguay ichitamba nePortugal.
Nemusi weSvondo Spain iri kutamba neRussia nenguva dza 4 masikati, Croatia ichitamba neDenmark na8 manheru.
Mumwe mutambo pakati peBrazil neMexico unenge uriko nemusi weMuvhuro na 4 masikati kuchiti na 8 manheru kotamba Belgium nejapan. Nemusi weChipiri na 4 masikati, Sweden ichatamba neSwiterland uku Columbia ichitamba neBritain na 8 masikati.
Kunyangwe vakawanda vave kutarisira kuona achasimudza mukombe, vakawanda muZimbabwe vanoti kukundwa uku kwakasiya maTeranga Lions aine mapoinzi mana vakaenzana neJapan nepazvibodzwa zvekare asi maSenegal yave kudzoka kumba nemhaka yekuti vakawana makadhi akawandisaa kudarika Japan. Senegal yawakinwa iine makadhi matanhatu, maviri kudarika Japan.
Asi mutsigiri weDynamos VaTapiwa Mahwengwa havasi kugutsikana nemutemo mutsva uyu vachiti ivo wanga wakatarisana nekutsikirira Senegal.
Mutsigiri weDynamos VaAlpha Muganiwa vanoti varikurwadzikana zvikuru nekubuda kwaita Senegal mumakwikwi aya vachiti ivo vaedza asi zvaranmba. Senegal yave kubatana naEgypt, Morocco, Nigeria, ne Tunisia kudzoka kumba kuchisara kuWorld Cup kusina kana chikwata chimwechete chemuAfrica.
Asi kune vakawanda vanofunga kuti zvinhu ingadai zvisina kumira zvakadai, dai vabati vepembe vaiita basa ravo vasina divi ravaive vakarerekera. VaAllen Moyana vanotaura maonero avo. Muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu vaFarai Kambamura vanotsinhira.
Asi VaKambamura vanoti Africa haifanire kugara ichingochema asi kuti vawedzera mwando mumatambiro avo kuitita kuti kana pachibirirwa panoshaika chekubirira chacho.

Vatambi ava vavimbiswa madhora zviuru gumi ekugovana kana vakakunda Zambia mumutambo wavo wekutanga uyo uri muUmuganda Stadium muguta reRubavu neChipiri masikati.
Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Football Association, VaPhillip Chiyangwa, vanoti mitambo yese mitatu yekutanga ichange ine zviuru gumi pamutambo wega wega zvichipa vatambi ava zviuru makumi matatu.

Kubvira musi wa 7 Chikumi, 1980, Zambia neZimbabwe dzasangana mumitambo inokwana makumi mana neina.
Pamitambo iyi Zimbabwe yakakunda mumitambo gumi nemishanu, Zambia ikabudirira kanomwe. Mimwe mitambo makumi maviri nemiviri yakapera iri mangange.

Tsaona dzemumigwagwa dzinonzi dziri kuramba dzichiwanda muZimbabwe izvo zviri kutora hupenyu hwevanhu vakwanda, pamwe nekuremadza vamwe.
Vanoona nezvemafambisiro edzimotokari asina njodzi, veTraffic Safety Council, vanoti tsaona zhinji dziri kutora hupenyu hwevanhu dziri kukonzerwa nekukanganisa kwevatyairi kana kusaremekedza kwavo mitemo yepamugwagwa.
Vanotaura vakamirira boka iri, VaTatenda Chinoda, vanoti vatyairi vazhinji vanofunga kuti kufambisa motokari ndizvo chete zvinodikanwa pamugwagwa, vachikanganwa kuti zviripo zvizhinji zvinofanira kuteedzerwa motokari isati yafamba.
VaChinoda vanotizve pane vamwe vanokurudzira vatyairi kuti vamhanyise dzimotokari kana mabhazi, izvo zvinoisa hupenyu hwevamwe vanoshandisawo migwagwa munjodzi.
“Dzicharamba dzichiitika kana vanhu vasingabvumi kuti tsaona dzemumigwagwa dzinokonzerwa nekukanganisa kwavo kana kwemutyairi,” vanodaro VaChinoda.
VaChinoda vanotiwo mukuwongorora kweboka ravo, vanoona kuti kukanganisa kwevanhu kana vatyairi kwakakonzera tsaona dzinoita makumi mapfumbamwe neina kubva muzana mutsaona dzegore rino.
Gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vanoti hurumende ichaenderera mberi nehurukuro nevashandi vayo panyaya yemihoro yavo gore rinouya uye ine zviri mugapu zvairi kufunga kuti zvinogona kuvafadza.
Asi mutungamiri werimwe sangano reZIMTA, VaRichard Gundani, vanoti vashandi vari kutoda kuti nyaya yezororo isendekwe parutivi kuitira kuti vaendere mberi nehurukuro nekuti kudhura kuri kuita zvinhu nekuwedzerwa kwemari dzevana vechikoro kunopa kuti kumira nhaurirano kwezuva rimwe chete chairo kuomesere vashandi.
