Vana chiremba vakatanga kuramwa mabasa musi 3 Gunyana vachiti vanoda kuti hurumende ivabadhare mari dzinovakwanisa.
Hurumende inoti yakawedzera mari dzavana chiremba nezvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana, asi vanachiremba vati yaive shoma.
Gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vati hurumende yashandisa mari shoma pane yavaifungira kuti vachange vashandisa kusvika pari zvino vakati zvinoratidza kuti hurumende ichangoshandisa mari yakatarwa yegore rino pamabasa ayo.
Vachitura ongororo yavo yemashandisirwo emari yehurumende yegore rino inoitwa pakati pegore, VaNcube vati zvisinei nedenda reCOVID-19 riri munyika, pamari yaifanirwa kunge yakashandiswa kusvika muna Chikumu, pakasara mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana masere emadhora emaRTGS.
Va Ncube vazivisawo kuti mari inotambirwa nemushandi ichange ichizobatirwa mutero yakwidzwa kubva pamadhora zviuru zviviri kuenda pamadhora zviuru zvishanu.
Vatiwo pamari yevashandi vehurumende yavari kupiwa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19, ichange isingabatirwi mutero kwegore rese kutanga mwedzi waKubvumbi.
VaNcube vatiwo kunyange hazvo pavakazivisa bhajeti regore rino vaitarisira kuti hupfumi hwenyika hukure nezvikamu zvitatu kubva muzana,vati izvi hazvichagoneki nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 vakati hupfumi huchadzokera shure nezvikamu zvina nechidimbu kubva muzana.
Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi hwenyika dzinoti VaNcube havana kutaura kuti nyika ichapedza sei matambudziko aripo.
Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi musangano re Labour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vati vanoshamiswa kunzwaVaNcube vachiti pane mari yakasara asi munyika muine matambudziko akawanda asina kugadziriswa sekuramwa mabasa kwaana chiremba huye kuwanisa vanhu zvekudya. Vatiwo mari isingabatirwi mutero ichiri shoma zvakanyanya.
Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaOwen Dhliwayo ,vatiwo zvataurwa naVaNcube hazvishanduri hupenyu hweveruzhinji avo vanga vari kutarisira kurerutsirwa munyaya dzehurombo
Mukuru wesangano reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vatiwo VaNcube vanga vaine nhava yanga izere mhepo.
Vati vanga vakatarisira kuti paunzwe hurongwa hwekubatsira vanoita mabasa emaoko avo vakakanganiswa zvakanyanya nechirwere cheCOVID -19.
Vamwewo vatiwo vanga vachitarisira kuvandudzwa kwebhajeti renyika pachinzvimbo chekuudzwa kuti zvirongwa zvehurumende zviri kufamba zvakanaka nemari iripo.
Gurukota rezve mari, Va Mthuli Ncube, havana kuda kutaura nevatori venhau, kana kutorwa mavhidhiyo vachitaura, pamusangano wavakaita muWashington neChitatu manheru.
Musangano uyu wakanga wakarongwa nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muWashington DC zvichida kunzwa kuti zvinhu zviri kufamba seyi kuZimbabwe, pamwe nezvingaitwe mukusimudzira nyika.
Asi vatori venhau vaive pamusangano vakanzi vasatore mavhidhiyo, uye havana kana kuwana mukana wekubvunza VaNcube mibzvunzo.
Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, VaNcube vakati hurumende iri kuedza nepainogona napo kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika.
Asi vakabvuma kuti izvi zvichatora nguva uye zvichida kusunga dzisimbe sezvo zvinhu zvanga zvagara zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyika kwenguva yakareba.
VaNcube, avo vakadomwa gore rapera nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, segurukota risina nzvimbo muparamende, vakati vanhu vanoda kudyara mari dzavo muZimbabwe vanofanirwa kuita izvi izvozvi sezvo paine mukana wakanaka wekutanga mabhizinesi.
VaNcube vakataurawo pamusoro pekunetsa kuri kuita mari, asi vakati hurumende iri kutora matanho ekugadzirisa dambudziko iri.
Vari muWashington, VaNcube vanonzi vakasangana neChipiri nevakuru veInternational Monetary Fund, kusanganisira mukuru wesangano iri, Amai Christine Lagarde, pamwe nevakuru veWorld Bank, vachivapira nezvebudiriro yavanoti iri kuitika munyaya dzezvehupfumi muZimbabwe.
Kushanya kwegurukota rezvemari uku kunouya panguva iyo America neMuvhuro svondo rino yakawedzera zvirango negore rimwe chete ichiti hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa haisi kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu.
Sangano rinomiririra varairidzi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, rinoti raparura padandemutande, kana kuti ‘internet’, chirongwa chekubatsira varairidzi neruzivo uye nekuvaraira kuti vangawana sei mari panguva yekumboramwa basa.
Mutungamiriri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, vaudza Studio 7 kuti nhasi sangano ravo ratangidza kushambadza zvirongwa zvakasiyana siyana padandemutande apo ririkuunza zvidzidziso zvakanangana nevarairidzi kuti vakwanise kuzvibatsira pamwe chete nemhuri dzavo vachiita mabasa avanodzidzisa vana muzvikoro.
Gurukota rinowona nezve mitambo munyika VaMakhosini Hlongwane nemutungamiri we sangano reZIFA VaPhillip Chiyangwa nemusi weChitatu vakasangana nevatambi vechikwata chenhabvu chemaWarriors vakavapa mazwi ekuvashingisa mugadziriro yavo yemutambo weAfrica Nations Cup nemusi weChishanu nechikwata cheSwaziland.
Vanowona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko musangano reZIFA VaXolisani Gwesela vanoti vatambi vese vekunze kwenyika vakadaidzwa nemurairidzi wechikwata ichi vakakwanisa kuuya kusara kwevatambi vatatu vekuBritain avo vanoti vanoda havo kutambira England.
Mutambo uyu urikutambwa panguva iyo vamwe vakuru muZIFA nevamwe vatambi vakatarisana nejere nenyaya yekutengeswa kwemitambo. Asi VaGwesela vanoti izvi hazvisi kuzokanganisa vatambi mumakwikwi avo.

Mamwe masangano anomirira vadzidzisi anoti haasi kutambira zvakabvumiranwa nemusi weChipiri nehurumende nerimwe remasangano anomirira vashandi vehurumende reApex Council munhaurirano dzaiitwa pasi peNational Joint Negotiating Council, kana NJNC.
NeChipiri, hurumende neveApex Council vakubvumirana kuti mushandi wehurumende anotambira mari iri pasi-pasi awedzerwe mari yake yemuhoro nezvikamu 139.23 percent, kubva musi waNdira 1 wegore rino.
Izvi zvinoreva kuti mushandi anga achitambira madhora chiuru chine makumi mana nemashanu ari maRTGS, achazenge ave kutambira maRTGS zviuru zviviri nemazana mashanu, uye mari yakanzi nehurumende ichatanga kubhadharwa mukupera kwemwedzi unouya asi yemwedzi uno ichibhadharwa zviri zvidimu-zvidimu kana.
Munyori mukuru musangano rinomirira vadzidzisi reZimbabwe Teachers Association, kana kuti Zimta, VaTapson Nganunu Sibanda, vaburitsa mashoko ekuti zvakabvumiranwa nehurumende neApex Council ndiwo magumo enhaurirano pakati pehurumende nevashandi vayo pari zvino.
VaSibanda vaudzawo Studio 7 parunhare kuti vari kukurudzira nhengo dzavo kuti kuti dzichitanga kuita basa sezvadzinotarisrwa kuti dzinge dzichiita.
Asi mamwe masangano akaita seAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, kana kuti ARTUZ, pamwe nesangano reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, kana kuti PTUZ, aramba kutambira zvakabvumiranwa nehurumende neApex Council izvi achiti zvakaitwa izvi kuzvidza vashandi.
Mutauriri weARTUZ, VaNation Mudzitirwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti mari yawedzerwa nehurumende iyi yakafanana nemutero wembwa.
Mashoko aVaMudzitirwa atsinhirwa nemutungamiri wePTUZ, VaTakavafira Zhou.
VaMudzitirwa vati chavanoda ndechekuti vapihwe mari yakaringana nemadhora ekuAmerica mazana mashanu inenge iri pamusika wemabhanga kana kuti interbank rate.
VaMudzitirwa vati nhengo dzavo dzicharamba dzisingakwanise kuenda kubasa zvichitevera kushomeka kwemari yawedzerwa nehurumende yavati idonhwe mugungwa.
Izvi zvatsnhirwawo naVaZhou avo vati chinodikanwa ndechekuti hurumende igadzirise gakava riripo pakati payo nevashandi vayo nekukasika kuitira kuti vashandi vehurumende vakwanise kuenda kumabasa.
Gurukota rezvevashandi, VaPaul Mavhima, vati kunyange hazvo vachida kuwedzera vashandi vavo nemari yavari kuda, homwe yehurumende yakabooka zvekuti havakwanise kuita izvi sezvo hupfumi hwenyika husina kumira zvakanaka.
Chikwata chemaWarriors chirikupemberera chakananga kuma 2017 Africa Cup of Nations kwapera makore gumi vachizhamba.
Kunyange hazvo pachiri nemutambo mumwechete wasara, maWarriors abudirira kuenda kuma 2017 Africa Cup of Nations finals mushure mekurakasha Malawi 3-0 izvo zvavasvitsa pamaponzi mapfumbamwe ayo asina chikwata chinovadarika mugungano iri.
Zimbabwe iri kuenda kumakwikwi aya ichibatana neEgypt iyo yakatora mukombe uyu kanokwana kanomwe kudarika nyika dzose, Guinea-Bissau iyo iri kuenda kumakwikwi aya kekutanga, Algeria, Cameroom, Ghana, Mali, Morocco, Senegal neGabon iyo iri kupinda mumakwikwi nenyaya yekuti munyika iyi ndimo muri kuitwa makwikwi aya.
Kwasara zvinzvimbo zvitanhatu chete parizvino, izvi zvinosanganisa vana vanenge vatungamira zvikwata zvavo nedzimwe nyika mbiri dzinenge dzapera dziine mapoinzi akawanda dziri pachidanho chechipiri.
Swaziland iri mugungano rimwe chete neZimbabwe inokwanisa kusvika pamaponzi mapfumbamwe iwaya ikakwanisa kukunda Malawi mumutambo wavo wekugumisira asi varikumashure kweZimbabwe 1-0 mumitambo inotariswa kana zvikwata zvikapedza zvine mapoinzi akaenzana.
Kunyange hazvo vanotungamira nhabvu vasina kuzivisa vatsigiri vemutambo uyu vachiri munhandare kuti Zimbabwe yaive yabudirira kuenda kuGabon, veruzhinji vange vave kuzvizivira vega zvichienderana nemhemberero yakaitika munhandare iyi mutambo uchangopera.
Mutisigiri weDynamos VaSolomom Mundera avo vaingomhanya mhanya nemureza weZimbabwe mutambo uchitambwa vanoti varikutoshaya pekubata nemufaro vachiti ivo chikwata chemaWarriors chakabatana.
VaDesire Mbidzo avo vanoita zveball juggling pese pamotamba zvikwata zvenyika muNational Sports Stadium uyezve vachibva kumhuri inozivikwanwa zvikuru munhabvo iyi yakabika John, Davis, naFarai Mbidzo vanoti izvi ndizvo zvavanga vakamirira vachiti ivo zvinombota kuti vambokanganwa nhamo dzenyika idzo dzkavamomotera.
Cuthbert Malajila uyo akanwisa chibodzwa chekugunosora anoti vakaita zvavakavimbisa vatsigiri vavo.
Zvakamira zvakadai, mutungamiri wevatambi Willard Katsande anoti makore anga awandisa Zimbabwe isati yakwanisa kuenda kumakundano aya achiti iye zvinofadza.
Katsande ndiye mutungamiri wevatambi wechipiri pamakore makumi matatu nematanhatu apfuura kukwanisa kuendesa kumaAfrica Cup of Nations.

Mutungamiri wesangano idzwa rave kutungamira nhabvu munyika reNational Football Association of Zimbabwe VaPhillip Chiyangwa vanoti varikumirira kuti mitambo irikuitwa ikozvino itange yapera kuti vaone kuti hurongwa hwegadziriro vachahufambisa sei. Asi ikozvino, mhemberero irikuenderera mberi.
Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwakakwira neChishanu manheru kusvika pamazana matatu nemakumi mana nevatatu zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwevanhu gumi nemumwe chete vaine chirwere ichi nemusi weChishanu.
Pavanhu vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi neChishanu, vose vaibva kuSouth Africa.
Vanhu vapona kubva kuchirwere ichi vasvika pamakumi mashanu nemumwe, vashaya vachiri vana, izvo zvinosiya huwandu hwevanhu vachiri kurwara ne Covid-19 vari pamazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nevanomwe.
Vanhu vakaongororwa chirwere ichi nemusi weChishanu munyika yose vanosvika mazana masere nemakumi mashanu nevaviri.
Vazhinji vevanhu vari kuwanikwa vaine chirwere ichi ndevaya vakadzoka kumusha kubva kuSouth Africa, vari munzvimbo dziri kuchengeterwa vakabva kunze kwenyika.
Izvi zvave kuita kuti vemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu vakawanda vakurudzire hurumende kuti ione kuti vanhu vari kuiswa munzvimbo idzi vachengetedzwa zvakanaka here, vachiti vamwe vari kuwanikwa vaine chirwere ichi vanogona kunge vari kuchibata, kanawo zvimwe zvirwere, vave munzvimbo idzi.
Sachigaro vesangano rinomirira zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika zviri muSouth Africa, reAfrican Diaspora Forum, Doctor Vusumuzi Sibanda, vanoti nekuda kwekuti vanhu vari kunzvimbo dziri kuchengeterwa vanobva kunze ndivo vari kunyanya kuvhenekwa, zvave kuita sekunge vari kubva kuSouth Africa ndivo chete vari kuwanikwa vaine chirwere ichi.
Doctor Sibanda vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutambanudza chirongwa chayo chekuvheneka vanhu yovhenekawo nevagara vari munyika, nekuti kunogona kunge kuine vakawanda vari kurwara kana kufa nechirwere ichi, asi vasingazive nekuti havasi kuongororwa.
Vanoshorawo huwori hwavanoti vari kunzwa kuti hurkuitwa nedzimwe dzihurumende dzemuAfrica, dzavanoti dziri kushandisa zvisizvo zvikwanisiro nedzimari zvakapiwa nevekunze kuti zvibatsire mukudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19 muAfrica.
Pasi rose huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hunonzi neJohns Hopkins Hospital yekuAmerica hwadarika mamiriyoni manomwe ane mazana mashanu ezviuru, uye vafa vave kudarika zviuru mazana mana nemakumi maviri nezviviri.
America ndiyo ichiri pamusoro pahuwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi, avo vave kudarika mamiriyoni maviri, vafa vachida kusvika zviuru zana negumi nezvina.
Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaparura hurongwa huchatevedzerwa nenyika pakurwisa chirwere cheCoronavirus panguva iyo masangano evadzidzisi ari kukurudzira kuti zvikoro zvose zvivharwe.
Vachiparura hurongwa uhwu kuState House uhwo huri kudaidzwa kuti National Covid-19 Preparedness and Response Plan, VaMnangagwa vati ibasa remunhu wese ari munyika kuti aone kuti paagere pakashambidzika kuitira kuti chirwere che Coronavirus chisarambe chichitapuriranwa kana chichinge chazopinda munyika.
Gurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, vatiwo vari kufara kuti chirwere ichi hachisati chapinda muZimbabwe vachiti izvi hazvifanire kuita kuti Zimbabwe irare nezamu mukanwa.
Mumiriri weWorld Health Organization muZimbabwe, VaAlex Gasasira, vatiwo chirwere che Coronavirus chiri kupararira nekukasika zvekuti chavakutoda mushandira pamwe pakati pehurumende dzepasi rose pamwe neveruzhinji.
Kunyange hazvo VaMnangagwa vakati vanhu vanodarika zana vasaungane seimwe yenzira dzekudzikisa mukana wekuti vanhu vasatapurirane chirwere ichi, mamwe masangano evarairidzi anoti zvikoro zvinofanira kuvharwawo.
Muaturiri wesangano revadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaNation Mudzitirwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti sangano ravo riri kukurudzira kuti zvikoro zvose munyika zvivharwe mangwana chaiye vachiti muzvikoro zvizhinji hamuna mvura zvinowedzera mikana yekuti chirwere che Coronavirus chitapuriranwe.
Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemunyori musangano reZimbabwe Teachers Association, VaTapson Nganunu Sibanda, avo vaudza Studio 7 parunhare vari kuBulawayo kuti vana vechikoro vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vanogona kunotapurira vamwe kudzimba chirwere ichi chopararira.
Mutungamiri wesangano reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaTakavafira Zhou, vati zvikoro zvikasavharwa mangwana vachakurudzira nhengo dzesangano ravo kuti dzisaende kubasa kubva neMuvhuro.
Mumwe mubereki ane vana vaviri vanodzidza pane chimwe chikoro chiri muHarare, Amai Blantina Mukwesha, vati vave kutyirawo hupenyu hwevana vavo izvo zviri kupa kuti vatsigire zviri kutaurwa nemasangano evarairidzi.
Gurukota rezvedzidzo, VaCain Mathema, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti havataure neStudio7 vachiti havadi kubvunzwa zvinhu zvisina musoro.
Asi VaMnangagwa vakaudza vatori venhau kuState House neChipiri svondo rino kuti zvikoro zvicharamba zvakavhurwa sezvo kwangosara mavhiki matatu chete kuti zvivharwe panopera kotoro yekutanga yegore rino.

Vanoti mamwe madzimai anorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanofanirwa kunge vachimira naMuzvare Mubaiwa munyaya dzekuwona kuti kodzero dzavo dzaremekedzwa pasina kutarisa kuti vanotsigira bato ripi.

Kubva pavana vadiki vekireshi kusvika kuvakuru vanenge vari muForm 6, vose ava vachange vachimanikidzwa kuita zvemitambo izvo zvaiswa muhurongwa hwezvidzidzo.
Izvi zvataurwa nemutevedzeri wegurukora rezvedzidzo, VaPaul Mavhima, avo vati hapana mwana achabvumidzwa kusaita zvemitambo.
VaMavhima vanoti kunyange vanenge vari muForm 6, avo vane vamwe vanga vachikudza dzidzo yemabhuku kudarika mitambo, vachange vachimanikidzwa zvekare sezvo mitambo iri iyo yave kubhadhara kudarika mamwe mabasa ese.
VaMavhima vataura izvi pamabiko aitirwa chikwata cheZimbabwe Special Olympics icho chakauya nemenduru gumi nembiri apo chakanokwikwidza kumakwikwi eSpecial Olympics World Championships ayo akaitirwa kuLos Angeles kuAmerica mwedzi wapera.

Vatiwo vakaudzwawo neshamwari dzavo kuti zviri nani kuti vaurayiwe nemasoja pane kuti vahwande, izvo vati zvakavapa zvivindi.
Kunyange hazvo vasisiri kuhwanda, VaSikhala vati mhuri yavo haisi kugara pamba pavo kudzamara zvajeka kuti hapana ari kuvaitira mweya wakaipa.
Hurumende yakadira mauto munzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji zvichitevera kuratidzira kwakaitwa nenhengo dzeMDC Alliance dzichiti hadzisi kufara nemafambisirwo aiitwa zvinhu neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, mukubudisa zvakabuda musarudzo.
Vanhuwo zvavo vatanhatu vakanga vasineyi nekuratidzira uku, vakapfurwa nemasoja vakafa.
Mapurisa anonzi akasunga vanhu makumi maviri nevatatu achivapomera mhosva yekuita mhirizhonga.
Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo dzinoti hurumende yakatyora mitemo nekudira kwayakaita mauto mumigwagwa.
Bumbiro remitemo rinopa chete mutungamiri wenyika masimba ekuti mauto aburitswe mabharaki achipinda muvanhu achibatsira mauto munguva nyika inenge isina kugadzikana.
Izvi zviri muchikamu 213 chebumbiro remitemo yenyika.
Mashoko ari kubuda anoti vakuru vemapurisa vakakumbira kubatsirwa nemauto pasi pemutemo wechikamu 37 chePublic Order and Security Act.
Nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo dzinoti chikamu chakashandiswa kudaidza mauto kuti abatsire mapurisa, hachitaure nezvesimba rine mutungamiri wenyika, nokudaro zvakaitwa zvekuisa mauto muvanhu hazvisi pamutemo.
Nyanzvi idzi dzinotiwo gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika harinawo masimba pasi pebumbiro remitemo yenyikaekuti riburitse mauto mumabharaki achipinda muvanhu kunochengetedza runyararo, sezvo masimba ari mumaoko emutungamiri wenyika.
Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanotiwo mauto haafanirwe kungodirwa muvanhu sezvo akadzidziswa kuuraya, kwete kunyengetedza vanhu kuti vaite runyararo.
Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remauto kana remapurisa.
Asi vachipindura mibvunzo yevatori venhau muHarare neChishanu, VaMnangagwa vakati kana vagadzwa zviri pamutemo semutungamiri wenyika, vachagadza komisheni yekoongorora zvakaitika zvakapa kuti vanhu vatanhatu vafe mushure mekupfurwa nemauto nemusi weChitatu.
Mamwe madzishe mudunhu reMasvingo ari kuchema chema kuti vagari vazhinji mumaruwa vari kutadza kuwana chikafu cherubatsiro kubva kumasangano akazvimirira kana ku hurumende nekuti havana zvitupa kana mamwe magwaro avari kutadza kutora nekuoma kwakaita hupenyu munyika.
Vachitaura pamusangano wekuparura zvakabuda mutsvakirudzo yakaitwa ne komishini yeZimbabwe Human Rights(ZHRC) yekunetsa kuwanika kwemagwaro akaita sezvitupa, magwaro ekuzvarwa nemapasipoti, mamwe madzishe ati vanhu vazhinji mumaruwa vari kunyimwa chikafu cherubatsiro nekuti havana magwaro aya.
Ishe Tsvovani, VaFelix Mundau veku Chiredzi, vanoti nyaya yekushaya magwaro idambudziko guru.
Mashoko aya atsinhirwa naIshe Ndanga, VaRanganai Bwanda, veku Zaka, vati vasina magwaro munzvimbo mavo nekuti havasi kuwana rubatsiro apo nzara iri kuwedzera mvura ichirambira mudenga.
Vanoona nezve kufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reZHRC, VaCliff Mugoti vatiwo muongororo yavakaita zvakabuda pachena kuti vanhu vasina magwaro vari panyanga dzamushore.
Ishe Mazuru, VaMunhikwi Mukandatsama, vekwa Gutu, vatiwo dambudziko iri ririmovo munzvimbo mavo uye vakurudzira hurumende kuti ipinde mumaruwa ichipa vanhu zvitupa nemari yepasi nekuti vazhinji havana mari yekufamba kuenda kuma dhorobha kundotora magwaro aya.
Mukuru mubazi rehurumende rinopa vanhu magwaro muMasvingo, Amai Stembeni Chitsa, havana kukwanisa kuuya pamusangano uyu vachinzi havasi mudhorobha.
Hatina kukwanisa kuvabatawo sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa.
Masangano akazvimirira anga ari pamusangano uyu atiwo ari kusangana ne matambudziko evanhu vasina zvitupa asi havatenderwi nemutemo webasa kuvabatsira nekuti vanofanira kuita zvinyorwa zvine mazita nenhamba dze zvitupa zvevanhu.
Amai Lucia Masekesa, munyori mukuru musangano reNango, mudunhu reMasvingo vatenda kuti nyaya yemagwaro iri kukanganisa vagary vakawanda.
Sangano reWorld Food Programe rinoti vanhu vanosvika mamirioni masere munyika vanoda kubatsiro rwe chikafu apo nyika yakatarisana nedambudziko re nzara raka konzerwa nekushaikwa kwemvura uye mimwe mitemo yehurumende iri kupa kuti pahaye chinobuda kubva kuminda.
Nzara iyi yauraya apozvipfuwo zvakawanda kusanganisira mombe dzino pfuura zviuru gumi mudunhu reMasvingo zvafa nezvirwere uye kushaya mafuro.
Mutengo wehupfu hwakwira zvakanyanya mushure mekunge gurukota rinoona nezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vabvisa mari yange ichibhadharwa nehurumende kuti chibage chinotengeswa kuGrain Marketing Board kana kuti GMB chinge chakaderera mutengo.
VaNcube vakazivisa nezvedanho iri pavakaparura hurongwa hwavo hwekushandiswa kwemari kana kuti bhajeti regore rinouya.
Kunyangwe hazvo vemuzvitoro vange vatowedzera mutengo nemadhora makumi matatu, veGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe GMAZ vanoti vachaita musangano wechimbi chimbi kuti vaone kuti voita sei nenyaya yemutengo.
Mutauriri weGMAZ VaGarikai Chaunza vaudza Studio 7 kuti ivo havatare mitengo yehupfu sezvo ravo basa riri rekugaya chete chibage chavanenge vatenga kuGMB.
Kuwedzerwa kwemutengo hwehupfu kuri kuuya apo nyika yakatarisana nenzara inotyisa yapa kuti masangano anopa rubatsiro aparure hurongwa hwekupa vanhu vemumadhorobha vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri chikafu. Kumaruwa vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mashanu vakatarisanawo nenzara.
Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vakatura mashoko kunyika yavo kechitatu kubva zvavasarudzwa kuve mutungamiri wenyika, pahurongwa hwavo hwe 3rd State of The Union Address.
VaTrump vakatura mashoko avo kunhengo dzedare re Senate pamwe nedzedare repasi dzose dzakaungana muHouse of Representatives muWashington DC neChipiri manheru.
VaTrump vakati vanofara kuti vari kumira pamberi pedare iri vaine mufaro nekuda kwesimukira kweupfumi hwenyika, kwavati kudzoka kune mutsindo kweAmerica, kana kuti “the Great American Comeback.”
Vachichingamidza nhengo dzeparamende pamwe nemaseneta vakanga vari mudare, mudzimai wavo, pamwe nezvizvarwa zveAmerica zvose, VaTrump vakati mukati menguva pfupi vakakwanisa kuparadza maonero ekuti America iri kudzikira uye varamba kudzikisirwa kweremangwana reAmerica.
“Mukati memakore matatu mapfupi, takwanisa kuputsa pfungwa yekuti America iri kudonha uye taramba kuduputswa kwezviitiko zveAmerica mune remangwana. Tiri kuenda mberi nemafambiro akanga asingafungidzirwi munguva pfupi yadarika, uye hatisi kuzodzokera shure,” vakadaro VaTrump.
Mutungamiri weAmerica akatiwo muono wavari kuzoburitsa unoratidza kuti vari kuvaka sei nyika ine budiriro inokunda dzimwe dzose pasi rose uye isina rusarura, yekuti ani nani zvake anokwanisa kupinda mubudiriro yayo isina anoenziswa nayo, uyewo yekuti vanhu vanokwanisa kuve nechekuita mukusimukira kwayo.
“Muono wandiri kuzoburitsa manheru ano unoratidza kuti tiri kuvaka sei nyika ine budiriro inokunda dzimwe dzose pasi rose uye isina rusarura, yekuti ani nani zvake anokwanisa kupinda mubudiriro yeAmerica isina wainoenziswa naye, uyewo yekuti vanhu vanokwanisa kuve nechekuita mukusimukira kwayo,” vakadaro VaTrump.
Panyaya yeupfumi hwenyika, VaTrump vakati kubva pavakapinda pachigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, vakashanda zvakasimba kumutsiridza hupfumi hwenyika yavo.
“Kubva pandakangopinda muhofisi, ndakafamba nekukasika mukumutsiridza hupfumi hweAmerica, kubvisa mitemo ine chitsama inouraya kuwanikwa kwemabasa, kuderedza mitero, uye kurwira kuti pave kutengeserana kwakaenzana kunofadza mativi ose,” VaTrump vakatsanangura.
Vakati mumatemu maviri ehurumende yaivepo vanhu vakawanda vaive vachiri mazera ekushanda vakabuda mabasa.
VaTrump vakatiwo huwandu vatema vemuAmerica pamwe neverudzi rweHispanic vasingashande hwakaderera kekutanga munhoroondo yeAmerica pasi pehutongi hwavo.
“Huwandu hwevatema vemuAmerica, vechiHispanic vemuAmerica pamwe nevechi Asian vemuAmerica hwasvika padanho rakadereresa munhoroond. Vatema vemuAmerica vechidiki vashngashande vaderera zvisati zvamboitika. Hurombo muvatema vemuAmerica hwaderera kusvika pachdanho chisati chambisvikwa,” vakadaro VaTrump.
Vakatiwo huwandu hwemadzimai apinda mabasa hwasvika pazvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana pasi pehutongi havo.
“Mumakore masere ehurumende yaivepo, vanhu vanodarika mazana matatu ezviuru vakanga vachiri mazera ekuve pamabasa vakabuda kubva muvashandi. Mumakore matatu chete ehurumende yangu, vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni matatu nechidimbu vachiri kukwanisa kushanda vakapinda mabasa.”
Vakati zvizvarwa zveAmerica zvinodawo hutano hwakanaka, hwunowanikwa: “Hupenyu hwakanaka kumhuri yeAmerica hunodawo kuti hunge huchiwanikwa nyore, uye huri hwepamusoro mupasi rose.”
Panyaya yekutengeserana neChina, VaTrump vakati mazuva mashoma adarika vakanyorerana chibvumirano chitsva nenyika iyiicho chichachengetedza vashandi vemuAmerica.
“Kwemakore akawanda China yanga ichibatira America, iye zvino tashandura izvozvo asi, panguva imwecheteyo, tave nehukama hwakanaka hwatisati tamboita neChina, kusanganisira mutungamiri wacho VaXi Jingpin,” vakadaro VaTrump
Mutungamiri wenyika uyu akati apo vari kudzosera Hutungamiri hweAmerica pasi rose, vari kusimuka zvakare vachirwira rusunungo mudunhu ravo.
“Ndizvo saka Hutungamiri hwangu hwakabvisa mitemo yaikundikana yehutumende yakanga iripo panyaya yeCuba. Tiri kutsigira tarisiro yevanhu vekuCuba, Nicaragua, uye Venezuela kuitira kudzora hutongo hwejekerere. America iri kutungamira nyika makumi mmashanu nepfumbamwe kurwisana nehurumende yaVaNicolas Maduro ku Venezuela. Hutongo hwaVaMaduro huchaparadzwa. Nhasi manheru ano tine mutungamiri chaiye weVenezuela, VaJuan Guaido,” vakadaro mutungamiri weAmerica wechimakumi mana neshanu.
Vakati VaGuaido vanofanirwa kutakura mashoko aya kudzokera nawo kumusha kwavo, uye varangarire kuti rusununguko rwunobatanidza vanhu.
VaTrump vakatiwo kuchengetedza rusunguko rweAmerica, vakadira mari yakawanda kumauto enyika yavo kuburikidza nekuumba boka remauto idzva rinorwa hondo dzinosanganisira dzezvitundumuseresere.
“Mukuchengetedza rusununguko rweAmerica, takaisa mari yakawandisa inoita madhora 2.2 trillion kumauto eAmerica. Takavhura boka idzva mumauto eAmerica remauto eSpace Force,” vakadaro VaTrump.
VaTrump vakati America inofanirwa kuve nzvimbo inogara zvizvarwa zveAmerica zvinochengetedza mutemo, kwete makororo.
“Hurumende yangu yakatora matanho asati amboitwa ekudzivirira muganhu wedu neMexico uri kuchamhembe. Hurumende yangu iri kutorawo matanho ekuchengetedza nyika zvakasimba.”
Vakati apo vari kudzivirira America, vari kushandawo kupedza hondo dzeAmerica neMiddle East.
“Madzitateguru edu akavaka nyika yakasiyana nedzimwe isati yamboonekwa munhoroondo yehupenyu hwevanhu, uye tiri kuramba tichiita kuti ikoshe kudarika zvayaive.
Seyave tsika yebato rinopikisa reDemocratic Party yekuti rinodoma nhengo dzinenge dzichiri kusimukira kuti dzipindure mashoko aVaTrump, gore rino bato iri rakadoma gavhuna veMichigan, Amai Gretchen Whitmer, avo vati bato reDemnocratic Party rinongoda kuti pave nehutano hwakanaka..
“Zviri nyore. MaDemocrats ari kuedza kuti hutano hwenyu huve nani. maRepublicans muWashington ari kuedza kuhutora.
Amai Whitmer vakatiwo vashandi vemuAmerica vari kurwadzikana.“Vashandi vemuAmerica vari kurwadzikana. Mudunhu rangu ini. Vavakidzanio vedu iWisconsi neOhio nePennsylvania. Nyika yose. Mihoroi yakamira, panguva iyo mihoro yevakuru vemakambani yakakwidzwa zvisati zvamboitika.”
Bato iri rakadomawo Amai Veronica Escobar, vanove mumiriri wedunhu reTexas muparamende, kuti vapindurewo mashoko aVaTrump aya mururimi rweSpanish.
Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachidzidzisa paDevry University kuOhio muno muAmerica, Professor Elliot Masocha, vanoti VaTrump vatura mashoko akanangana nehurongwa hwavo hwekuti America ive nyika yakakosha zvakare, vachiti zvinogona kunge zviri izvo zvaita kuti vasataure nzvenyika dzakaita seAfrica kana Britain.
VaTrump vakapawo mubairo mukuru wenyika wePresidential Medal of Freedom kumushamarari akarerekera kubato reRepublican Party, Rush Limbuagh, uyo ari kurwara negomarara rechiropa.
Mudare iri makamboita kunge maive nepwere apo VaTrump vasina kutambira kukwaziswa kwavakaitwa nemutauriri weHouse of Representatives, Amai Nancy Perosi, ukuwo Amai Perosi vakaonekwawo vachibvarura gwaro raive nemashoko aitaurwa naVaTrump.
Bhanga guru renyika, reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, razivisa kuti richadhinda mari itsva ichange ichishandiswa mumabhanga serimwe rematanho ariri kutora mukugadzirisa nyaya yekushomeka kwemari munyika, pamwe nekugadzirisa zvinhu mumabhanga nemisika yemari munyika.
Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha, vanodzidzisa zvemabhizimusi paDevry University ku Ohio, vanoti vanhu vanoda mari yavanoshandisa, naizvozvo danho ratorwa neReserve Bank of Zimbabwe idanho rakanaka kana hurumende ikatevedzera mitemo nemirairo yezvehupfumi hwenyika inotevedzwa nenyika dzepasi pose, kwete zvokuzoramba ichidhinda mari pavanenge vazvifunga.
Muzvinafundo Masocha vati hurumende inofanirwa kuratidza vanhu kuti inovimbika kwete kudhinda mari nguva dzese zvinozokonzera kuti mari yacho ishaye huremerera.
"Vanhu vanoda kuona mari yavo mumavoko kwete kuudzwa kuti iri mukati mefoni yavanoshandisa, saka kana hurumende ikaunza mari iyi vanhu vangafara nekuti zvema RTGS hazvisi zvinovafadza.
Asi hurumende inosungirwavo kuchengetedza chiremera chemari iyi nekurega zvekuzodhindadhinda mari sezvayaimboita makore apfuura," Professor Masocha vaudza Studio 7.
Vatori venhau vemunyika vanokurudzirwa kuti vave neruzivo rwakakwana pamusoro pemararamiro evakaremara, kuitira kuti vakwanise kunyora nyaya dzine hudzamu dzinobatsira kusandura maonerwo anoitwa vakaremara.
Munyori mukuru wesangano revakaremara reFederation of Organisations of Disabled Persons (FODPIZ), Muzvare Elisa Ravengai, vanoti zvakakosha kuti vatori venhau vanyore nyaya dzinoita kuti vakaremara vasarambe vachisarurwa nekutarisirwa pasi.
Muzvare Ravengai, avo vanoona zvishoma shoma nekuda kwedambudziko rekuzvarwa naro vanoti vatori venhau vanofanira kuzvipa nguva yekunzwisisa kuti chii chinombonzi hurema.
“Ngavagare nevanhu vakaremara kana dai zvaikwanisika vachibvunza nekuona mararamiro avo vafambe vachinoona munzvimbo dzinobatsira vakaremara, atingati ma disability service organisations vachinoona kuti vanhu vakaremara vanorarama sei."
Muzvare Ravengai vanoti vatori venhau vane basa guru rekudzidzisa veruzhinji pamusoro pematambudziko anosangana nemadzimai akaremara.
“Vangava amai, vangave vatete zvigaro zvavanofanira kunge vachi asuma mu family, dzimwe nguva panoroorwa panogona kutorwa tete vasina kuremara iwo woiswa kurutivi vachinyara newe. Saka tinoona kuti mamwe ma roles anoitwa nevamwe, vakadzi vakaremara havamaite nekuti vanosarurwa even kumhuri dzavo.”
Mashoko aya anotsigirwa naVaSadat Sanhehwe vanoshanda vakazvimiririra vachigadzira mafirimu anozoonekwa neruzhinji.
“Hazvibatsire kuti munongosangana nevanhu kuno kuma workshops vane ma disabilities."
Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, "Munoona kuti vanouya kuma workshops, they are privileged, but ivo vane matambudziko chaivo chaivo hamusi kusangana navo.Saka kuti munyatsobata kuti vari kuita matambudziko eyi sometimes hamuzvinzwisise. Saka ndati dai vanhu vamboenda, vaspenda a day vari kuma homes iwayo, vozonyora nyaya dzavo nemunzira kwayo yekuti vanenge vakuziva zviri kuitika.”
VaAbram Mateta, avo vasingaone, inhengo yesangano reLawyers with Disabilities Association Zimbabwe Trust. Vanoti vatori venhau vanofanira kubatsira kutsiura vari mune zvematongerwo enyika apo vanodzikisira pasi vakaremara.
VaTinashe Muchuri mutori wenhau vari zvekare nyanduri. Vanoti vatori venhau vakaremara nevasina vanofanira kushanda pamwechete kugadzira duramazwi remazwi akakodzera kushandisa kana tichitaura nezve hurema.
VaMuchuri vakati, “Unonzwa mumwe munhu achitaura mumwe kuti haaone. Asi unomuona munhu iyeye anonzi haaoni achifamba ega achidimbura mugwagwa achienda kwaanoda kuenda, achizvibikira chikafu chake ega nekuzviitira zvimwe, kana nyangwe kudzidza achinzi haaone.”
Vakaenda mberi vachiti: “Dambudziko randakaona nderekuti vanhu vanofunga kuti munhu wese anonzi anoona anofanira kuona nemeso. Saka izvozvo zvese zvinofanira kuzivikanwa kuti patinoti kune vasingaone tinenge tichinyepa nekuti munhu wese anoona asi maonero anosiyana. Kozouya vamwe vanonzi vasingafambi nekuti anenge achishandisa wheelchair. Asi ukamutarisa anenge achibva pane imwe nzvimbo achienda pane imwe nzvimbo zvichiratidza kuti ari kufamba ega pasina anomubatsira. Tikatarisa kune vamwe vanonzi havatauri, ini ndotarisa ndoti ko imi munoti havatauri neyi? Nekuti imi munogona kutaura nemuromo asi ivo vane matauriro avo avanoita. Vanotaura namaoko.”
VaMuchuri havana kuremara uye vave nemakore mashanu vachishanda pachena nevana vakaremara vepa St. Giles muHarare, panguva dzavanenge vachigadzira zvinhu zvakasiyana siyana zvemaoko zvavanoshambadza. VaMuchuri vanoti kushanda nevakaremara kwavasandura pamaonero avanoita vakaremara.
“Ini kana ndichitarisa munhu handione hurema huri paari. Chandinoona munhu. Pese pandinoona chero ari mu wheel chair ndiri kuona munhu, ari kufamba nemadondoro ndiri kuona munhu, ari kutaura nezviratidzo ndiri kuona munhu handisi kuona zvimwe zvinhu zvese zvisipo paari. Ndinoona munhu ane zvaanogona.”
Sachigaro vesangano revatori venhau vakaremara, reProfessional Media Abilities Network VaPatrick Musira vanoti vari kuedza nepose pavanogona kudzidzisa veruzhinji pamusoro pekukosha kwekodzero dzevakaremara. VaMusira, avo vakaremara gumbo reruboshwe vanoti vakawanda vari kushaya mabasa nekuda kwehurema, zvinova zvinofanira kuburutswa pachena nevatori venhau.
VaMusira vakati, “Kana une urema usingaone, usingagone kufamba, uchishandisa wheel chair, kana zvimwe zvinhu zvakadaro vanhu vanofunga kuti uri murombo, hapana chaunoziva kunyange hazvo iwe wakadzidzira basa racho uchirigona zvemandorokwati." Vanotiwo, "Vanhu vanofunga kuti vakakuona chete uchifamba, kana wakamira une munhu ari kukubatsira vanofunga kuti uri kutotsvaga rubatsiro, hapana chaungaita.”
VaLiberty Lupahla avo vasingaone mushamarari ane mukurumbira anoshandira ari kuBulawayo. Vanoti dambudziko rekuonerwa pasi revakaremara rinogona kupera chete kana vana vakawanda vakaita zvidzidzo zvekutapa nhau nekuti ndivo vanogona kunyatsodongora matambudziko anosanga nevakaremara. Asi VaLupahla vanoti zvikoro zvinodzidzisa vatori venhau zvinofanira kugadziridzwa kuti zvikwanise kutorawo vana vakadai.
VaLupahla vakaudza Studio 7 vachiti, “Saka munhu ane wheel chair anokwira sei ma steps pasina ma ramps? Ma computers emuma libraries enzvimbo dzinotapa nhau haana iya inonzi speech software pachirungu yekuti munhu asingaone kana achida kushandisa computer anongopinda mu library ostrima internet, oshandisa computer sevamwe." VaLupahla vanoti, " Izvozvo zvese iri nyaya yekushayikwa kwehurongwa, iya inonzi pachirungu disability policy inosungira kuti chikoro chega chega chiinclude vanhu vakaremara. Muchaona kuti ma chamber acho kana ma shanks haasi accommodative kumunhu akaremara.”
Munyori mukuru musangano reZimbabwe Union of Journalists, VaFoster Dongozi vanoti zvakakosha kuti vatori venhau vakaremara vashande pamwechete nenhengo dzeparamende kuti pave nemutemo unosungirira venhepfenyuro nemapepanhau kuti vave nezvirongwa zviri pamusoro pevakaremara uye zvichipa munongedzo pamusoro pemazwi anofanira kushandiswa.
“Tinoziva kuti pakutepfenyura nepakunyora vanoshandisa mashoko anonyomba nekushoropodza. Saka sangano iroro rinofanira kubatsira kuti pave nedura remazwi anogamuchirika, asingashungurudzi nekushoropodza vangave vakaremara, kana ivo vatori venhau vakaremara.”
“Zvinhu zvikaramba zvichidai, vatori venhau vachiwana yeuchidzo pamusoro pezvinofanira kuitwa pakucherechedzwa kwekodzero dzevakaremara, remangwana ravo richange rakajeka.”
Vari kumirira bato re Democratic Party musarudzo yemutungamiri we America ichaitwa musi wa 3 Mbudzi gore rino, VaJoe Biden, vadoma munhukadzi wechitema, Sineta Kamala Harris, veku California, kuti vave mutevedzeri wavo.
Vasati vasarudzwa kuve seneta, Amai Harris vakange vari gweta guru mudunhu reCalifornia kubva muna 2011 kusvika 2016 mushure mekunge vamboita gweta guru regita reSan Francisco.
Seneta Harris vakamboedzavo kukwikwidza kuti vapihwe mukana wekuva mumiriri webato reDemocratic Party musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, vachikwikwidzana naVaBiden nevamwe vazhinji vebato iri asi havana kubudirira havo.
Seneta Harris vange vari mumwe wevanhukadzi vazhinji vakange vachiferefetwa kana vachikodzera kushanda semutevedzeri waVaBiden.
Pakambove nechimwe chikwata chakaedza kurwisa kuti Seneta Harris vasatorwa semutevedzeri waVaBiden vachiti vaiomesera zvakanyanya vasungwa pavakange vari gweta guru mudunhu reCalifornia.
Baba vaSeneta Harris vakazvarwa kuJamaica vakauya kuAmerica muna 1961 uko vakazove muzvinafundo mune zvehupfumi pachikoro chepamusoro, cheStanford University.
Amai vaSineta Harris, avo vakange vari muongorori wechirwere chegomarara uye vachirwirwa kodzero dzevanhu, vakauya kuAmerica vachibva kudunhu reTamil Nadu kuIndia muna 1960.
Vanodzidzisa zvematongerwo enyika paWellesley College, mudunhu reMassachusetts, Doctor Chipo Dendere, vanoti zvakange zviri pachena kuti vaviri vaidikanwa zvikuru pachigaro ichi, ndiAmai Kamala Harris naAmai Stacy Abrams, vedunhu reGeorgia.
Seneta Harris vari kutarisirwa kupinda muhurongwa hwekuedzana pfungwa nemutevedzeri waVaDonald Trump, VaMike Pence.
Apo huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nehutachiwana weCoronavirus huri kuramba huchikwira munyika, dzimwe nhengo dzeparamende muHarare dzinoti dzinodawo kuva nechekuita nehurongwa hwehurumende hwekudzivirira chirwere ichi pamwe nekuona kuti rubatsiro rwuri kupihwa nyika pamusoro peCoronavirus rwuri kufambiswa sei.
Nhengo dzeparamende nemakanzura emuHarare dzinoti dzinofanira kuva nechekuita nemabasa ehurumende ekudzivirira chirwere cheCoronavirus.

Asi VaChikombo vati kunyange hazvo paramande yakavharwa, inofanirwa kuvhura sezvakaita paramende yekuAmerica kuitira kuti izeye nyaya dzakakosha dzinobata Covid-19.

Vatiwo vanongonzwa kuti hurumende iri kuwana zvinhu zvekushandisa kudzviririra Coronavirus asi havasi kuona zvinhu izvi munzvimbo yavanomirira.
VaHamauswa vatiwo kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kuti zvikoro zvepamusoro zviri kugadzira mamasiki nemasanitaiza, zvinhu izvi hazvisati zvave kuwanikwa mumisha inogara vazhinji uye zvakakosha kuti hurumende ishande nemadzimai ane makirabhu ekokusona mumisha iyi pakugadzira zvinhu izvi.

Asi mumashoko avo, sachigaro weTaskforce inoona nezvechirwere cheCoronavirus, zvakare vari mumwe wevatevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika, VaKembo Mohadi, vazivisa kuti nyika ichawedzera huwandu hwevanhu vari kuongororwa zvichiteverwa kuvhurwa kweimwe nzvimbo inoita ongororo yechirwere cheCoronavirus kuBulawayo.
Vatiwo pane dzimwe nzvimbo dzekuongorora chirwere ichi dzichavhurwa munguva pfupi iri kutevera.
Asi VaMohadi vati Taskforce yavo yakaita misangano mumatunhu ese munyika ichinzwa pfungwa kubva kunhengo dzeparamende pamwe nevakuru vakuru mumatunhu aya uye ichashandisa zvakabuda mumisangano iyi kusimbaradza chirongwa chayo chekudzivirira kupararira kweCoronavirus.

MaSables akadamburwa zvinonyadzisa 61-15 pamusha neKenya muHarare Sports Club mukupera kwesvondo izvo zvavakanda pasi pasi mugungano rezvikwata zvina zviri kurwira mukombe weAfrica Cup Division 1A.
MaSables aifanira kukunda mumutambo wepamusha uyu kuti vaite mukana wekutora mukombe wemuAfrica uyu pamwe nekuchengetedza chinzvimbo chavo chekutamba mumakundano e2019 World Cup ayo arikutanga pakati pegore rinouya.
Asi kukundwa zvinonyadzisa kwavakaita kwasiya Zimbabwe iri pachinzvimbo chekubuditswa mugungano rakakosha reAfrica Cup Division 1A iri.
Vatarisana zvekare nedambudziko rekutadza kutamba muma 2019 World Cup qualifiers sezvo zvikwata zvinenge zviri muAfrica Cup Division 1A gore rinouya ndizvo zvichatambira mukombe wepasi rese uyu.

VaMudenda vati ongororo yeDFID inoratidza kuti makomiti eparamende anofanira kusimbaradzwa uye ivo vanobvumira nazvo.
Semuenzaniso muongororo yayo, DFID inoti zvimwe zvinofanirwa kuitwa kuona kuti nhengo dzeparamende dzinofanira kuve nhengo dzekomiti imwe chete, kwete kuve nhengo dzemakomiti maviri kana matatu sezviri kuitika pari zvino.

Vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori mukuru weZHDA, Dr. Tawanda Zvakada, vanoti zvakataurwa nemutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaEnergy Mutodi, zvekuti hurumende inogona kuti vana chiremba ava vabhanwe zvekuzotadza kushanda semadhokotera, hazvisi zvinhu zvinovavhundutsa.
Dr. Zvakada vanoti chitsvambe chiri pahurumende nokuti ndiyo inofanirwa kuona kuti yatambirisa vana chiremba mari dzinokodzera.
Dr. Zvakada vanoti ivo nevamwe vavo vanoda zvikuru kuenda kubasa, asi chiripo ndechekuti havana mari dzekuti vaendese kumabasa kwavanoshandira vari.
“Isu hatina mari. Tikapihwa mari nemushandirwi tinodzokera kubasa. Izvi zvekutyityidzira vamwe izvi hakuna kwazvinosvika. Mushandirwi ngaabhadhare vashandi vake mihoro inofakwanira kuitira kuti vakwa,” vadari Dr. Zvakada.
Vachitaura neStudio7 neChishanu, VaMutodi vakati hurumende haisi kufara nekusaremekedza mitongo yematare kuri kuitwa navana chiremba. Vakatiwo vose vana chiremba vari kuzvidza komiti inoranga vatadza pamabasa, vachadzingwa sezvinodiwa nemutemo.
VaMutodi vakatiwo pane vanhu vari kufurira vana chiremba ava kuti vasaende kubasa kuitira kuti vasvibise chimiro chehurumende.
Asi Dr. Zvakada vanoti vana chiremba vanoda zvikuru kudzokera kubasa kuitira kuti vanobatsira varwere. Asi Dr. Zvakada vanoti dambudziko guru riripo nderekuti havana mari dzekuti vaendesa kumabasa avo.
Vana chiremba vakatanga kusaenda kubasa musi wa 3 Gunyana vachiti hurumende inofanirwa kutanga yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo.
Chando chegore rino chinonzi chakarova zvakanyanyisa zvikuru munguva dzemangwanani nemanheru izvo zvakapa kuti vanhu vakawanda varware nezvirwere zvechikosoro, kutemwa nemusoro, mabayo pamwe nekupisa kwemuviri. Zvirwere izvi zvinozivikanwa nerekuti Upper Respiratory Tract Infections.
Mumwe mudzimai anogara kuKuwadzana Extension, Amai Rudo Gutsa, vanoti vakarwara zvinotyisa kwemasvondo maviri pamwe nemwanakomana wavo mudiki nechikosoro.
VaEdson Nzimbe, avo vanogara kuEastlea, vanoti chando chegore rino chakavatonhora zvokuti vaitoita sokunge munhu ane chirwere che malaria. VaNzimbe vanoti vakaenda kuchipatara asi havana kupihwa mushonga wekurapa chirwere chainge chavabata.
Amai Gutsa naVaNzimbe vamwe vevanhu vakawanda zvikuru vakabatwa nezvirwere zvekutadza kufema zvakanaka nekuda kwekutonhorwa zvakanyanya.
Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvehutano huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nezvirwere izvi kusvika pari zvino.
Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano, Dr Josephat Chiripanyanga, vanoti vakaona vanhu vakawanda vaichururuka dzihwa, kuhetsura, kupindwa nechando zvakanyanyisa, izvo zvairatidza kuti zvirwere izvi zvainge zvakakomba.
Dr Chiripanyanga vanoti zvirwere zvekupindwa nechando zvakanyanya zvinotapuriranwa kubva kune vanenge vachikosora nekuhetsura zvakanyanyisa vasingavhare miromo nemhino dzavo.
Vanoti munhu akaramba achirwara asinganorapwi, chirwere ichi chinodzika kumapapu ake, chokonzera mabayo, ayo anogona kumuuraya.
Dr Chiripanyanga vanoti kana munhu akanzwa muviri wake wavakupisisa, anofanirwa kunwa mvura yakawanda, uye kukurumidza kuenda kunoona vana chiremba, kwete kuverengera

VaMasaraure vanoti vashandi havasi kuzofa vakanyarara kana hurumende ichitadza kugadzirisa nyaya dzemihoro yavo, uye vacharamba vachitaura zvinyunyuto zvavo.
VaMasaraure vanoti masangano evashandi haasi kuita zvematongerwo enyika, asi kuti anoburitsa nhunha dzawo kana hupfumi hwenyika huchiiswa mumadhaka nehurumende nokuti mari dzavo dzinobva muhupfumi hwenyika.

Asi VaMasaraure vanoti chavanoziva ndechete vanomirira vashandi vasina bato ravanotsigira, uye varamba kuti vanotsigirwa nehurumende dzekunze.
"Chatinoziva isu ndechekuti hurumende ndiyo inodyidzana zvakanyanya nenyika dzairi kutaura dzekunze idzi. Isu sevashandi tinodyidzanawo nemasangano evashandi vedzimwe nyika," vadaro VaMasaraure.

Zimbabwe ichange ichibhadhara Ballard Partners mazana mashanu ezviuru zvemadhora ($500,000) pagore, mari iyi ichibhadharwa pamwedzi mitatu yega yega iri zana nemakumi mashanu ezviuru zvemadhora ($150,00).
Mari yekutanga yezana nemakumi mashanu ezviuru ($150,000) yakabhadharwa mwedzi wapera panguva iyo hurumende yaitsvaga rubatsiro rwemari yekubatsira vanhu vakawirwa netsaona yemumigodhi yekuKadoma iyo yakasiya vanhu makumi maviri nevatanhatu vafa.
Magwaro ari mumaoko eStudio7 anoratidza kuti chibvumirano cheZimbabwe neBallard chakanyoreswa zviri pamutemo neBallard Partners musi wa Kurume 1, 2019 naVaBallard mbune.
Chibvumirano ichi chakanyoreswa zviri pamutemo pasi pemutemo pasi pemutemo wemuAmerica we Foreign Agents Registration Act.
Muchibvumirano ichi, Ballard inoti ichange ichishanda nebazi remuAmerica rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika paine chinangwa chekuti hukama hweZimbabwe neAmerica hugadzirisike, uye kuti Zimbabwe idzokere pachimiro chakanaka nemasangano anokweretesa mari pasi rose.
Ballard inotiwo ichange ichiudza hurumende yeZimbabwe zvose zvinenge zvichiitika muAmerica zvinobata Zimbabwe, uye kuudza Zimbabwe zvinenge zvichiitika pamitemo yeAmerica inobata Zimbabwe.
Pamusoro pemazana mashanu ezviuru zvemadhora, Zimbabwe ichange ichisungirwa kubhadhara zvakare mari yose ichashandiswa pakufamba nevakuru vakuru veBallard pavanenge vachiita basa vakamirira hurumende yaVaMnangagwa.

Zimbabwe yabatana nedzimwe nyika dzepasi rose mukucherechedza zuva rechirwere cherurindi, kana kuti World TB Day, pahurongwa hwaitirwa kuDzivaresekwa muHarare.
Vachitaura pahurongwa hweWorld TB Day, gurukota rezvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa, vati vanhu vanofanirwa kubatana mukurwisa chirwere cherurindi icho chanetsa munyika.
VaParirenyatwa vati nzvimbo dzakaita seMatabeleland North, Matabeland South neguta reBulawayo ndidzo dzinonyanya kuwirwa nedambudziko rechirwere ichi.
Dr Parirenyatwa vatiwo chirwere ichi chakanyanya mumatunhu aya nokuti ari kumiganhu neSouth Africa, iyo ine vanhu vakawanda vane chirwere ichi.
Vati Zimbabwe iri kurwisa zvakasimba chirwere ichi kuburikidza nekurapa vanhu pasina mubhadharo.
Asi Dr Parirenyatwa vatiwo chirwere ichi chava kuramba kudaira mushonga, zvikuru kuvanhu vasingapedzi kunwa mishonga yavanenge vapihwa apo vanenge vachirapwa chirwere ichi.
Dr Wilbert Bara, avo vanoshanda mubazi rehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, vatiwo chirwere cherurinda chinonyanya kubata varume kudarika vakadzi.
Vatiwo chirwere ichi chakawanda munzvimbo dzakaita seGlenview, Budiriro, Hopley, Caledonia, Mbare nenzvimbo dziri kuHarare South.
Dr Bara vati makiriniki ekanzuru yeHarare ava kushandisa mishina mitsva inokurumidza kubata chirwere cherurindi.
Sangano reunited Nations rinoti vanhu zviuru zvina nemazana mashanu vanofa pazuva rega rega nechirwere cherurindi pasi rose. Dingindira rezuva iri gore rino rinoti “Wanted: Leaders for a TB-Free World."

Vamwe vagari vekwaMutoko vakavhiringwa nemhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nekunyimwa chikafu, mbeu nezvimwe zvekurimisa pazvirongwa zvehurumende, vakaumba sangano iro vanoti richatungamira kuti varipwe pamwe nekuti vasarambe vachishungurudzwa nekuda kwenyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika.
Vagari ava vaudza Studio7 kuti vakaumba sangano rinonzi Zimbabwe Political Victims of Political Persecution zvichitevera musangano wavakaita nekomisheni yehurumende inoona nezverunyararo, runyararo pamwe nekuregererana, yeNational Peace and Healing Commission kana kuti NPRC.
Sachigaro wesangano iri, VaMusekiswa Bhanire, vaudza Studio7 kuti sangano ravo richange richishanda neNPRC mukupedza dambudziko rekushungurudzwa kwevanhu pamwe nekupodza marwadzo eavo vakashungurudzwa.
VaBhanire vaenderera mberi vachiti dambudziko rekushungurudzana nekusarudzana richiri kuenderera mberi uye sangano ravo richange richinyora pasi zvese zviri kuitika pamwe nekuzviendesa kuNPRC kuti izvi zvisarambe zvichiitika.
Imwe nhengo yesangano iri uye vaimbove kanzura weMutoko District Rural Council, VaShame Kativhu, vaudza Studio7 kuti chavanoda chete kuti vakakuvadzwa kana kurasikirwa nezvinhu zvavo varipwe uye kuti pave nekukumbirana ruregerero.
VaKativhu, avo vanove nhengo yeMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, vati vave kuunganidza humbowo hwezvakatika sezvakataurwa neveNPRC uye vane tarisiro yekuti vachakwanisa kugara pasi nevakavatadzira kuti vayanane vachitungamirirwa neveNPRC.
Munyika makaita mhirizhonga inotyisa muna 2008, apo zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvakaparadzirwa misha nezvipfuyo pachishandiswa nyaya dzematongerwo enyika.
Mhirizhonga iyi yakaita kuti vaive mutungamiri weMDC, muchakabvu Morgan Tsvangirai, vabude musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika yakadzokororwa muna 2008, mushure mekunge VaTsvangirai vakunda vaive mutungamiri weZanu PF panguva iyi, muchakabvu Robert Mugabe, musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika yakaitwa muna Kurume.
Hatina kukwanisa kubata veNPRC kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi.
Asi komisheni iyi iri kukurudzira kuumbwa kwemakomiti erunyararo mumatunhu ese munyika nechinangwa chekuti mhirizhonga kana kushungurudzana kusarambe kuchienderera mberi.
Komisheni iyi yakafambawo mumatunhu ese munyika ichinzwa zvichemo zvevanhu pamwe nepfungwa dzavo pamusoro pekuti zvichemo izvi zvingagadziriswe sei kuti vanhu vakwanise kugarisana murunyararo.
Makambani epa dandemutande, kana kuti ‘social media’, eTwitter, Facebook, Instagram, WhattsAp nemamwe, arikupomerwa mhosva yekuti anobudisa nhau dzisiri dzechokwadi uye kuti haasarudzi zvinoiswa pamadandemutande awo.
Masvondo maviri apfuura, VaJoe Biden, avo vari kukwikwidza kuti vawane mukana wekuzokwikwidzana naVaDonald Trump kuve mutungamiriri wenyika gore rinouya, vakaudza muridzi weFacebook, VaMark Zuckerberg, kuti vabvise zvakange zvaiswa paFacebook nerimwe sangano rinotsigira VaDonald Trump, vachiti ndezve manyepo. Mune imwewo nyaya. VeZIFA vamisa basa sachigaro weCaps United VaLewis Uriri avo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekushevedzera musangano wezvikwata zvePSL usina kutenderwa neveZifa.
VaUriri vanonzi vakashevedzera musangano uyu musi wa 29 Gumiguru apo vanonzi vakafurira zvikwata zvenhabvu yepamusoro izvi kuramba chisungo cheZIFA Assembly chekuti muPSL mubude zvikwata zvina.

Makundano eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League ari kusvika kwamvura yacheka makumbo mangwana apo Caps United iri kusangana neFC Platinum uchaona chikwata chinotora mukombe wemakwikwi aya gore rino.
Zvikwata zviviri izvi ndizvo zviri pamusoro petafura, FC iri pamusoro, ichiteverwa neCaps United.
Akaronga mitambo yemwaka uno yeCastle Lager Premier Soccer League haana kumbobvira aziva kuti ari kukanda machikichori emutambo zuva rekupera kwemwaka, mutambo uyo uchasangana zvikwata zviviri zviri kurwira kutora mukombe weligi.
Izvi ndizvo zviri mudariro muNational Sports Stadium mangwana apo FC Platinum, iyo irikutungamira makundano aya nepoindi imwe chete, iri kusangana neCaps United, iyo yakavasona zvinotyisa.
Pari zvino, FC Platinum ine mapoinzi makumi mashanu nemapfumbamwe, Caps United iine mapoinzi makumi mashanu nemasere, zvekuti chikwata chinokunda mumutambo uyu, ndicho chichaenda nemukombe mukuru uyu, mumutambo unoshevedzwa neveruzhinji kunzi winner-takes-all.
Asi zvikwata izvi zvikaita mangange, FC Platinum ndiyo inotora mukombe sezvo inoramba iri pamusoro nepoindi imwechete iyo iri kutungamira nayo.
Aka ndiko kekutanga munhoroondo yenhabvu muZimbabwe kuti zvikwata zvinenge zvakamira zvakadai zvisangane muzuva rekupedzisira remitambo zvekuti shasha kubva mushasha ndiyo ichabuda mumutambo uyu.

Dare repamusoro rarasa chikumbiro chesangano reCommunity Water Alliance chekuti kunetsa kuri kuita mvura muHarare kutorwe sedambudziko guru ratarisana nenyika.
Mutongi wedare repamusoro, VaOwen Tagu, varasa chikumbiro chesangano Community Water Alliance chekuti kanzuru yeHarare pamwe nehurumende vamanikidzwe kupa vagari vemuHarare mvura yakachena uye kuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaise chidhindo chavo chekuti kushayikwa kwemvura yakachena ratove dambudziko guru rakatarisana nenyika, kana kuti national disaster.
Vachitura mutongo wavo, VaTagu vati chikumbiro cheCommunity Water Alliance ichi chasara kumashure kwenguva sezvo hurumende iri kubatsirana nekanzuru yeHarare kuti muHarare munge muine mvura yakachena kubudikidza nemari inonzi yakapihwa kanzuru yeHarare.
Asi mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vaudza Studio7 kuti mari yavakapihwa nehurumende yakanga yakanangana nekugadzirisa pombi dzemvura kwete kutenga mishonga yekuchenesa mvura.
Mutongo waturwa nedare washorwa nemukuru anoona nezvezvirongwa musangano reCommunity Water Alliance, VaHardlife Mudzingwa.
VaMudzingwa vati madhamu anotorwa mvurwa nekanzuru yeHarare ari kupwa zvinoratidza kuti dambudziko remvura muHarare riri kutoramba richikura.
Vatiwo mutongo waturwa nedare unotyora kodzero dzeveruzhinji dzekuti vave vanowana mvura yakachena nguva dzose sezvo pombi dzekanzuru dzichiri kubuda mvura ine tsvina.
VaChideme vakurudzira vagari kuti vabhadhare mabhiri avo emvura kuitira kuti kanzuru igokwanisa kutenga mishonga yekuchenesa mvura.
Asi meya weguta reHarare, VaHerbert Gomba, vakabuda pachena nguva yapfuura kuti kanzuru yavo iri kutadza kutenga mishonga yekuchenesamvura sezvo iri kutadza kuwana mari yekunze inokwana kubva kubhanga guru renyika, reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe.
Zimbabwe yakatarisana nadambudziko rekushayikwa kwemari yekunze izvo zviri kutadzisa nyika kutenga zvinhu zvakawanda zvinoda mari yekunze zvakafanana nemagetsi, mafuta edzimotokari nezvimwe zvakadaro.
Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nagavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, VaJohn Mangudya, kuti tinzwe kuti matanho api avari kutora kuti vawane mari yekunze iri kudiwa nekanzuru yeHarare nehurumende kuti patengwe zviri kudiwa kubva kunze kwenyika.

Zvinhu zvinonzi zviri kuramba zvakaita manyama amire nerongo munyaya dzezvehupfumi munyika, nekuda kwekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu zvakawanda, kushaikwa kwezvimwe uye kushaikwa pamwe nekukwira kwemutengo wemafuta ekufambisa.
Mitengo yezvinhu, zvikuru zvekudya, iri kuramba ichiita chamurambamhuru kubva mwedzi wapera, izvo zvinonzi nevakawanda zvave kuvaisa parumananzombe, sezvo mari dzavari kutambiriswa kumabasa kwavo dzisiri kukwirawo.
Zvinonzi zvakakwira mitengo zvakanyanya mumazuva mashoma adarika zvinosanganisira mafuta ekubikisa, ayo akabva pamadhora manomwe kuenda pamadhora gumi nerimwe iri mari yemaRTGS dollars.
Furawu yekubikisa chingwa ine huremu hwemakirogiramu maviri, yakakwirawo kubva pamadhora mashanu kuenda pamadhora manomwe, pakiti yemupunga inorema makirogiramu maviri, yakakwira mutengo kubva pamadhora mashanu kuenda pamadhora matanhatu ane masendi anoraudzira.

Vachitaura vevatori venhau, gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vati vatora matanho ekuumba Currency Stabilisation Task Force zvichitevera kushaya simba kwemari yemuno zvakanyanya mukati memazuva mashomanana apfuura.
Matanho atorwa anosanganisira kuti mabhanga atengeserane mari yekunze pachena uye kuti musika uve iwo unodzika mutemo wemari iyi.
Komiti iyi ichange ichishanda iri pasi pebazi rezvemari, uye ichange ichipindwa nebhanga guru renyika, nhengo Presidential Advisory Committee pamwe nenhengo dzeMonetary Policy Committee.

Makundano eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League ave nemutungamiri mutsva kwasara mitambo mina kuti makwikwi aya asvike kwambvura yacheka makumbo.
Ngezi Platinum Stars ndiyo yave panhongonya pemumakundano eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League zvichitevera kurova kwayakaita Dynamos 2-0 muBaobab Stadium neMugovera.
Mhondoro-Ngezi yave nemapoinzi makumi matanhatu, yakaenzana neFC Platinum asi Madamburo apinda panyanga nemhaka yekukanda zvibodzwa zvakawandisa kudarika Kugona Kunenge Kudada.

Vanorwira kodzero dzehutano hwevanhukadzi muZimbabwe vanoti vanhukadzi vari parumana nzombe munyaya dzeHIV/AIDS nekuti hapana nzira dzekuti munhukadzi azvidzivirire kubva kuhutachiona pasina kutaurirana nemurume waanenge achisangana naye.
Vanorwira kodzero dzehutano hwevanhukadzi muZimbabwe vanoti vanhukadzi vari parumana nzombe munyaya dzeHIV/AIDS nekuti hapana nzira dzekuti vazvidzivirire kubva kuhutachiona pasina kutaurirana nemurume wavanenge vachisangana naye.
Vanorwira kodzero ava vari kukurudzira kuti kushandiswa kwe"ring" iro rinopfekwa nemunhukadzi rakaiswa mushonga unonzi Dapivirine kuti akwanise kuzvidzivirira kuHIV, rikurumidze kushandiswa munyika.
Kunyange hazvo tsvakiridzo yenzira iyi ichiri kuenderera mberi, zvakabuda mutsvagiridzo iyi muna Kukadzi zvinoratidza kuti nzira iyi inogona kubatsira kudzivirira kuti madzimai asabatirire hutachiona hweHIV nezvikamu makumi matanhatu nechimwe kubva muzana.
Muzvare Amanda Souza vesangano reThe Hub rinodzidzisa vanasikana nezvekuchengetedza miviri yavo vanoti zvinosuwisa kuti pamhando dzese dziripo dzekudzivirira HIV kuvakadzi dzakadai sekushandiswa kwemakondomu pamwe nekuchecheudzwa dzinosiya vakadzi pamhene sezvo nzira idzi dzichiita kuti vakadzi vatange vaita hurukuro nevarume vavo vasati vazvidzivirira.
VaChamu Mashoko vanoshanda nesangano re Global Advocacy for HIV Prevention. VaMashoko vanotsigirawo pfungwa iyi vachiti madzimai anofanirwa kuchipiwa nzira dzakawanda dzekuzvidzivirira pasina chiga chekuti vambotanga vaita hurukuro nevavanenge vachisangana navo pabonde.
VaMashoko vanoti vane tarisiro yekuti panotanga kushandiswa nzira iyi yekudzivirira, hurumemende ichaita kuti zvinoshandiswa panzira iyi zviwanikwe nekukurumidza.
Mumwe mutori wenhau, Muzvare Anna Miti, uyo anorwira kodzero dzehutano hwevanhukadzi anoti tsvagiridzo iyi yakaitwa inovapa chivimbo chekuti mukadzi wese zvake anenge ave nemukana wekuzvidzivirira zvisinei kuti murume anoda here kana kuti kwete zvichaitawo kuti huwandu hwevanhukadzi vanobatira utachiona hweHIV/AIDS hwuderere.
Zvakabuda mutsvagiridzo yekushandisa "ring " zviri kutambirwa nemadzimai mazhinji munyika ayo anoti nekuda kwetsika nemagariro dzevatema, vanhukadzi vange vachibatirira hutachiona nekushaya nzira dzekuti vazvidzivirire chero varume vavo vasingadi.
Kana munhurume asina kuudzwa nezve ring iri, haakwanise kuziva kuti mukadzi waari kuita zvepabonde naye ari kushandisa ring mukuzvidzivirira.
Bhanga guru renyika raudza komiti yeparamende inoona nezvemhando dzemoto kuti riri kuburitsa mari yekunze inokwana kutengera nyika mafuta edzimotokari.
Asi vanotengesa mafuta aya vanoti havasi kuwana mafuta akakwana, izvo zviri kupa kuti mumagaraji muite mitsetse yakareba.
Izvi zvabuda pagara komiti yeparamende inoona nezvemhando dzemoto apo yanga ichida kunzwisisa kuti chii chiri kukonzeresa kushaikwa kwemafuta edzimotokari munyika izvo zviri kupa kuti kuite mitsetse mirefu refu pamagaraji anotengesa peturu nedhiziri.
Vachipa humbowo pamberi pekomiti iyi, gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, vati vanotokatyamadzawo vachiona mitsetse mirefu refu iyi sezvo nyika iri kutenga mafuta anofanirwa kukwanira nyika yose.
VaMangudya vati kushomeka kwemafuta uku kunoratidza kuti pane pari kuitika huori.
VaMangudya vati sezvo dambudziko iri rave nemakore richiitika, hurumende yaona zvakakodzera kuti vedzimotokari vashandise anonzi masmart card pakutenga mafuta vachiti kadhi iri rinenge richiratidza huwandu hwemafuta anenge amwiwa nemotokari yega yega pagaraji rinenge rashandiswa kutenga Mafuta aya.
VaMangudya vati panopera mwedzi uno vanenge vamboedza kushandisa kadhi iri kuona kuti zvinoshanda here.
Asi vemagaraji anotengesa mafuta varamba kuti vari kuita huori. Vati chokwadi chiripo ndechekuti havasi kuwana mafuta akakwana anotengeswa nemari yemuno.
Makambani anotengesa Mafuta anoti Total, Engen, Zuva, Puma neGlow Petroleum ati pari nzvino haana mafuta edzimotokari anotengeswa nemari yemuno.
Kambani yePuma yati iri kuwana zvikamu makumi mashanu nezviri kubva muzana zvemafuta ainoda pamwedzi, ukuwo Zuva ichiti iri kuwana zvikamu zviri pakati pemakumi mana nemakumi mashanu kubva muzana.
Asi sangano reIndegenous Petroleum Association of Zimbabwe, IPAZ, rati kunyange hazvo magaragi makuru akaita sana Total, Zuva, Puma nemamwe ari kuwaniswa Mafuta, nhengo dzaro hadzisi kuwana mafuta anotengwa nerubatsiro rwebhanga guru renyika.
Vachiudza komiti iyi, sachigaro weIPAZ, VaAaron Chinhara, vati vakapedzisira kuwana mafuta aya musi wa 14 Kurume.
VaChinhara vati hapana ruzivo rwuri pachena kuti ndivanani vari kupiwa mafuta aya huye ari kutengwa akawanda zvakadii pamwedzi wega wega
VaChinhara vati kunyange hazvo VaMangudya vati kwakashandiswa mari iri pakati pemamiriyoni makumi masere nemamiriyoni zana emadhora ekuAmerica, nhengo dzavo makumi manomwe nevanomwe hapana chavakawana.
Zimbabwe Regulatory Authority kana kuti ZERA yatiwo mafuta akawanikwa nyore neveruzhinji, huori munyaya dzemafuta edzimotokari hunopera.
Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru weZERA, Engineer Eddington Mazambani, vabvumawo kukomiti iyi kuti huori hwakanyanya mukutengeswa kwemafuta vakati zvinovashamisawo kuti sei nyika yonyanyoda mafuta akawanda zvakanyanya kudai pamwedzi. VaMazambani vabvumawo kuti mari iri
kutengwa mafuta pachishandiswa mari yemuno yakanyanyoderera zvakanyanya asi vakati havakwanisi kukwidza mutengo kuti uenderane nemari yepamusika mutema vachiti izvi zvinokonzera kukwira kwezvinhu kwakanyanya munyika.
Pari zvino peturu iri kufanirwa kutengwa nemadhora makumi maviri nerimwe parita, dhiziri richiitawo madhora makumi maviri memasendi makumi masere nemana parita.
Komiti iyi yatiwo kushaikwa kwemafuta uku kuri kudzorera shure kurwiswa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 sezvo vanhu vari kupedzisira vaungana vakamirira mafuta aya sezvo vari kumira mumitsetse kwenguva yakareba zvakanyanya.
Vatsigiri vakawanda veMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa mudunhu reMarondera vanonzi havana kukwanisa kuenda kuRufaro stadium kumhemberero dzekusvitsa makore makumi maviri kubva pakaumbwa bato iri muna 1999, sezvo vari kuchema kushaya kwemudzimai wameya weMarondera, VaChengetai Murova.
Amai Murova vakashaya nemusi weChishanu mangwanani.
Mutauriri weMDC mudunhu reMarondera Central, VaFarai Nyandoro, avo vaimbove meya weMarondera, vanoti bato ravo rarasikirwa zvikuru neamai vaive nerudo nevana vavo.
VaNyandoro vanoti vatsigiri vebato ravo vari kurwadzikana zvikuru nekushaya kwaAmai Murova, avo vatsanangudza semunhu aifarirwa nemunhu wese, zvikuru vagari vemuDombotombo.
Amai Murova vari kutarisirwa kuradzikwa kumusha kwemurume wavo kuMadziva mudunhu reMashonaland Central.
Vamwe varimi kuMashonaland West vari kupinda mumishandirapamwe nevarimi vachena nenzira yekuedza kusimudzira goho uye kuti vawanewo chouviri sezvo vasina zvikwanisiro.
Vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vaiwanzotaura pamisangano kuti havaida kuti vachena vainge vatorerwa mapurazi vadzoke vachiita mishandirapamwe nevatema vainge vapihwa mapurazi.
Asi VaMugabe vaitenedera hazvo zvimwe zvibvumirano nevachena vakaita saVaBilly Rautenbach veGreenfuel kuChisumbanje uye vamwe vachena uye vamwe vekuChina kuminda yakawanda yeARDA. Vanhu vekuChina vakawanda vari kurima fodya vachishanda nekambani inonzi Tianze.
Asi hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa yakabuda pachena musi wa 28 Chikumi gore rapera kuti yaitsigira kuitwa kwemishandirapamwe iyi.
Varimi vachena vakawanda vari kuita mishandirapamwe munyika sezvakabuda muchiitiko chakaitwa pama purazi maviri anoti reSummer Hill neWamambo kuMhangura neMugovera.
Asi gurukota rinoona nezvedunhu reMashonaland West Amai Mary Mliswa-Chikoka vachitaura pachiitiko ichi vakati zvibvumirano zvekurima nevarungu zvinofanira kunyoreranwa kumahofisi ebazi rezvekurima.

Vanotiwo vamwe varimi vakagariswa patsva vanongotaurisa vasina zvavanorima muminda.
Mukuru wekambani iri kurima nevarimi ava VaBarry Stewart avo vakarima chibage nebhinzi vanoti vari kufara negoho ravo uye kukwanisa kuwanisa vanhu mabasa vanosvika mazana matatu.

Hurumende yakazivisa svondo rino kuti yakanga yaderedza mazuva anoiswa vanhu mu quarantine kubva pamazuva gumi nemana kusvika pamuzuva manomwe.
Asi Muzvare Masarira vanoti kuita kwakadai kuchapa kuti munyika muite dambudziko guru reCoronavirus sezvo vanhu vacharegedzwa vachipinda munyika ivo vatori nechirwere cheCovid-19 asi chisati chabuda.
Hurongwa hwekuchinja mazuva anoiswa vanhu vanenge vachibva kunze kwenyika mu quarantine, hwakaziviswa negurukota rezvehutano, Dr Obadiah Moyo.
Asi Muzvare Masarira vanoti danho rakatorwa iri rinotyora kurudziro yesangano reWorld Health Organization.
Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna VaMoyo sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichinetsa kubata.
Asi mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Doctor Energy Mutodi, vanoti hapana zvakaipa zvakaitwa nehurumende.
VaMutodi vanoti Zimbabwe ichange ichitevera mitemo yese inokurudzirwa neWorld Health Organization apo inenge ichitambira vanhu vanopinda munyika munguva iyo nyika yakavharwa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19, icho chabata vanhu makumi matatu nemumwe chete, uye kuuraya vanhu vana muZimbabwe.

Vachitaura kusangano weUnited Nations General Assembly, VaTrump vati nyika yavo ine kodzero yekubvumidza kana kurambidza vekune dzimwe nyika kupinda muAmerica, zvikurusei avo vanenge vachitsvaga hupoteri.
VaTump vatiwo nyika dzepasi rose dzine kodzero yekuitawo zvadzinoda.
Vayambira vekune dzimwe nyika vane chinangwa chekuuya kuAmerica kuti vazotsvaga hupoteri kuti vasatambise nguva yavo nekuti vachadzoswa ne America kunyika dzavo.
“Musatambisa nguva yenyu nekuuya kuAmerica nekuti tichakudzoserai. Garai kunyika dzenyu,” VaTrump vakaudza musangano uyu nemusi weChiripi.
VaTrump, avo vanozikanwa nekupikisa hurongwa hwekudzyidzana pasi rose, kana kuti globalization, vaudza musangano uyu zvakare kuti hurongwa uhu hwatoparara nekuti america haibvumirane naho.
VaTrump vabatawo nyaya yegakava riri pakati peAmerica neChina panyaya yemitero pakutengeserana vachiti havadzokeri kumashure nenyaya yemitero yavakatemera China kudzamara vawana chibvumirano chichagutsa ruzhinzi rweAmerica.
Mangwana mutungamiri weZimbabwe, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachataurawo pamusangano uyu, uye vari kutarisirwa kushoropodza zvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe neAmerica nedzimwe nyika dzakabudirira.
Vanachiremba vadiki vari pakuramwa mabasa vari pasi pesangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association vanoti havasi kuzotambira kurudziro yehurumende yekuti vamire kuramwa mabasa vadzokere kumabasa zvichemo zvavo zvichigadziriswa.
Izvi zvinotevera musangano wakaitwa neSvondo pakati pevamiriri veHealth Services Board nehutungamiri hwerimwe sangano rinomirira vanachiremba, reZimbabwe Medical Association, ZIMA, apo pakasungwa kuti vanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa ava vadzokere kumabasa.
Munyori mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Doctor Mthabisi Bhebhe vanoti vanachiremba ava vasunga kuti vanozodzokera chete kumabasa kana zvinyunyuto zvavo zvinosanganisira kuwaniswa kwemishonga pamwe negadziriswa kwemichina yavanoshandisa muzvipatara zvazadziswa.
Vanotiwo vanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa ava havanawo mari dzekuti vakwanise kuenda kumabasa kwacho.
Doctor Bhebhe vanoti ivo vane sangano ravo rakazvimirira risineyi nemusangano wakaitwa pakati peboka rezvehutano nerimwe sangano ravana chiremba reZIma uyu.
Vanoti sangano ravo rezimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association riri kutarisirawo kusangana neHealth Services Board neMuvhuro uno, mushure mezvo ndipo pavanozobuda nechisungo chekutora.
Vanachiremba nevamwe vashandi vemuzvipatara zvehurumende vapinda muzuva rechimakumi matatu nerimwe vachiramwa mabasa, izvo zvaita kuti zvinhu zviite manyama amire nerongo muzvipatara zvehurumende.
Hurumende svondo rapera yakazivisa kuti yambomisa vashandi ava mabasa ichiti kuramwa mabasa uku kwive kunze kwemutemo.
Mukupera kwesvondo bazi rezvehutano rakazozivisa kuti rakanga rave kutumira vanachiremba vachangopedza zvidzidzo zvavo muzvipatara kuti vatsive vanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa ava, uye kuti vanachiremba vachangopedza zvidzidzo ava vanenge vave pasi pebazi rezvedzidzo yepamusorosoro, vachidzidzira basa, kana kuti interns.
Asi zvinonzi vanachiremba ava vakarambawo kutambira hurongwa uhwu.
Kuramwa mabasa kuri kuita vanachiremba zvave kukonzera varwere kunotsvaga rubatsiro rwekurapwa kuZambia.
Vamwe varwere vave kuenda kunorapwa pachipatara cheMtendere icho chiri muZambia pedyo nemuganhu weZimbabwe neZambia weChirundu.
Kunyange hazvo vamwe vagari vekuKariba neChirundu vachigaroenda kunorapwa pachipatara chikuru chemishoni ichi, rwendo rwuno zvinonzi vanhu vawanda vari kunorapwa nekuda kwekuramwa mabasa kuri kuitwa nanachiremba pamwe nanamukoti muzvipatara zvose munyika.
Mumwe wevamwe akarwara akanorapwa kuMtendere kuZambia ndiVaErasmus Dzinotyiwei avo vanoti hakushaike mishonga uye hakudhure.
Mumwe mugari wekuKaroi Amai Faustina Gava avo vakasunungukira kuZambia vanoti vanhu vakawanda vave kuenda kuZambia kunorapwa sezvo vachirapwa zvakanaka.
Izvi zvinotsinhirwa nemukuru wepachipatara cheMtendere Sister Sangita avo vanoti zvizvarwa zvekuZimbabwe zviri kurapwa pachipatara ichi.
Sister Sangita vanoti varwere vari kubva kunzvimbo dziri kure seHarare, uye vanoti huwandu hwevanhu vari kurapwa vachibva kuZimbabwe hwakangofanana nevarwere vemuZambia vavanorapa. Vanotiwo zvizvarwa zvemuZimbabwe zviri kuwanikwa mumawadhi ose.

Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr. Emmanuel Sadza vanoti hazvishamise kuti zvizvarwa zvemunyika zviri kutsvaka kurapwa kuZambia sezvo vakuru-vakuru munyika vachirapwawo kunze kwenyika.

Chinx aradzikwa kumarinda eGlen Forest uko kwanga kuine vanhu vakawanda vauya kuzowonekana nemufi vachiimba dzimbo dzezvematongerwo enyika.

Munyori musangano revakarwa muhondo yerusununguko, reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association, VaVictor Matemadanda, vati kunyange hazvo Chinx asina kupihwa ruremekedzo rwakafanira, mapfupa aChinx achamuka.
VaMatemadanda, avo vatsanangura mushakabvu segamba guru kudarika mamwe magamba akavigwa pamarinda anovigwa magamba enyika paHeroes Acre, vati mitemo inoda kuvandudzwa kuitira kuti vanosarudza vanhu kuti vave magamba enyika vave vanhu vanenge vachiziva zvinotarisirwa.
VaMatemadanda vati kunyimwa kwakaitwa ruremekedzo rwekuva gamba renyika kunoratidza kupatsanuka kwakaita hutungamiri hwenyika neveruzhinji.

Chinx uyo aizivikanwa nekuimba nziyo dzeChimurenga uye achitsigira bato reZanu PF anga aita svondo asina kuvigwa vari muZanu PF vachikweshana nenyaya yokuti oitwa gamba renyika here kana kuti kwete.

Mapurisa nezuro akazivisa kuti ainge amisa kuratudzira uku pasi pemutemo wePublic Order and Security Act.
Kunyangwe hazvo bato reMDC range rapikisa mutongo uyu mangwanani, mutongi wedare ramejastiriti VaTinashe Tashaya vazopa mutongo wavo manheru ano vachitenderena nemapurisa kuti kuratidzira uku kusaitwe pachityirwa kuti panogona kuzoita mhirizhonga.
Murongi wemabasa mubato reMDC VaAmos Chibaya vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanoshushikana zvikuru nekwavati kumbunyikidzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu.
Asi vati ivo sebato rinotevedzera mutemo vacharamba vachienda kumatare panenge pakakodzera
Asi nhengo yeZanu-PF uye vaimbova nhengo yedare reparamende vaimbomirira Pelandaba Mpopoma VaJoseph Tshuma vaudza Studio 7 kuti danho ratorwa remapurisa rakanaka chose.
Kunyagwe hazvo zvitoro nemabhanga zvange zvakavhurwa, vanhu vange vari vashoma zvikuru mudhorobha.
Pamisika nema flea market ari muzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana panosigara paine mhomho yevanhu pange pasinawo vanhu.
Mapurisa aswera achitenderera mudhorobha uye ange akachengetedzawo nzvimbo dzakadai sepadare ramejastiriti.
Vanhu vataura neStudio 7 vapa maonero akasiyana siyana pamusoro penyaya yekutatidzira.
Mumwe mugari asina kuda kudomwa nezita ati kurambidza vanhu kuratidzira uye kuzara kwange kwakaita mapurisa muguta ndezvimwe zvezvinhu zvinogona kukonzera mhirizhonga.
Mumwewo mugari uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti James ati maonero ake ndeekuti kuratidzira hakuna zvakunobatsira.
Vanhu vakawanda muBulawayo havasi kufara nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi.
Zvichakadaro, sachigaro weMDC Muzvare Thabitha Khumalo nedzimwe nhengo dzebato iri nhanhatu vabhadhariswa mari yechibatiso yemadhora mazana maviri pamunhu mumwe chete.
Vanomwe ava vakasungwa nemusi weMugovera vachipomerwa mhosva yekushambadza mashoko anogona kukonzera mhirizhonga.
Masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu anoti ari kushushikana nekusachengetedzeka kwevanhu zvichitevera kupambwa kunonzi kwakaitwa vanhu vatanhatu pamberi pekuratidzira kuri kuda kuitwa neMDC nemusi weChishanu.
Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare, sachigaro wemubatanidzwa wemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu weZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, Muzvare Jestina Mukoko, vati havasi kufara nekutyorwa kuri kuitwa kodzero dzeavanhu nevanofungidzirwa kuti vari muhurumende avo vavati vakapamba vanhu vatanhatu kusvika pari zvino pamberi pekuratidzira kuri kuda kuitwa neMDC neChishanu.
Muzvare Mukoko vati mapurisa nemauto vanofanira kuchengetedza zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe pazvinenge zvichiratidzira.
Vati semasangano anoshanda asina kwaakarerekera vanoda kuti kodzero dzekuratidzira dziri mubumbiro remitemo dzichengetedzwe uye vanenge vachida kuratidzira, vaite izvi murunyararo.
Muzvare Mukoko vakurudzira kuti masangano ekunze akaita seSadc, African Union, pamwe neUnited Nations kuti aise maziso awo muZimbabwe.
Muzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe waburitsawo mashoko ekutsoropodza kupambwa kunonzi kuri kuitwa varwiri vekodzero dzevanhu pamwe nenhengo dzeMDC pamberi pekuratidzira.
America yakurudzira hurumende kuti iferefete zvakakwana kupambwa kunonzi kuri kuitwa vanhu uku.
Mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vaburitsa mashoko ekuti vari kuferefeta nyaya yekupambwa kwevanhu iyi uye vanoti semapurisa vawanawo matombo nerhekeni pakati pedhorobha reHarare zvavanoti zviri kufungidzirwa kuti zvakaunzwa mudhorobha nenhengo dzeMDC kuti dzizokonzera mhirizhonga.
Vati mapurisa achabuda nehuwandu hwawo mangwana kuti achengetedze runyararo, veruzhinji pamwe nezvivakwa zvehurumende.
Nhasi mapurisa anga akapakatira zvombo aswera achitenderera pakati pedhorobha muHarare ane zvinoshandiswa pakudeedzera achikurudzira veruzhinji kuti vasapinde mumigwagwa vachiratidzira mangwana asi kuti vaite mabasa avo murunyararo.
Murongi wemisangano muMDC, VaAmos Chibaya, vakurudzira vatsigiri vavo kuti varatidzirewo murunyararo vachiti basa remapurisa nderekuchengetedza runyararo kwete kushungurudza vanenge vachiratidzira.

Vanhu vakawanda pasi rino vari kubatana mukucherechedza zuva revanhu vane chirwere chegomararara kana kuti World Tuberculosis Day.
Gore rega rega musi wa 24 Kurume ndipo panocherechedzwa zuva iri. Pazuva roga roga, vanhu zviuru zvina vanofa nechirwere cheTB ichi kunyangwe chichikwanisa kurapika kana chikakurumidza kubatwa.
Zuva iri rinoshandiswa mukudzidzisa vanhu nezvechirwere chiri kuuraya vanhu vakawanda pasi rino ichi.
Dr Farai Ethel Chipendo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinoshandira kuAlegria vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vanzwisise nezvechirwere ichi.
“Vanhu vashoma vanonzwisisa kuipa kwakaita chirwere ichi nekuti vanongofunga kuti chinorapika. Asi chikayera chakomba mumuviri kuchirapa kunonetsa.”
Munhu anokwanisa kubata TB kubva mumweya wekufema. Kazhinji chirwere ichi chinobata kunyanya varombo vari mumaguta vanogara munzvimbo dzakamanikidzana.
Mamwe madzimai anorarama neHIV/AIDS anoti ari kunetsekana zvikuru nekushaya chikafu zvichitevera kuputswa kwakaitwa misika yavaitengesera miriwo munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana muguta reHarare.

Mumwe mudzimai anogara kuGlen Norah uye achidzidzisa muMbare, Amai Mary Chimashu, vanoti vakadzi vakawanda, zvikuru vemumusha weMbare, vari kuremerwa nehupenyu izvo zvava kupa kuti vagare vakasuwa nekushushikana kuti vachararamisa seyi mhuri dzavo sezvo misika yaivawanisa mari, yakaputswa.
Amai Chimashu vanoti vakadzi vari kunyanya kushushikana nenyaya yekupazwa kwemisika iyi ichembere dzisina mabasa, uye dzichichengeta vazukuru vadzo nherera.
Chembere idzi dzinorwarawo nematenda eshuga nehigh blood pressure zvinova zvirwere zvinodheererwa nechirwere cheCovid 19 kana munhu achibata.
Amai Chimashu vanoti sekutaura kwenyanzvi munyaya dzehutano, vakweguri vagara vaine zvirwere nechekare, ndivo vanodheererwa zvikuru nechirwere cheCovid-19.
Amai Chimashu vanoti vakadzi vanorarama nehutachiwana hweHIV ava havana zvokupfeka zvinovadzivirira kutapurirwa Covid 19 nokuti zvinodhura kuzvitenga.
Amai Chimashu vanoti sezvo nyika yakavharwa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid 19, madzimai aya haana kwekuungana achiudzana zvinoanetsa izvo zviri kupawo kuti pfungwa dzawo dzisagadzikane.
Mumwe mukadzi anorarama neHIV, Amai Joana Kasirori, vanotiwo vari kushushikanawo nekutyira kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 sezvo vane zvimwe zvirwere zvakaita seshuga, high blood pressure nechirwere cherurinda.
Nyanzvi yezvehutano hwepfungwa musangno reZimbabwe National Association for Mental Health, Dr Ignatius Murambidzi, vanoti kushungurudzikana mupfungwa hakuna kunaka sezvo kuchikonzera chirwere chepfungwa, kana kuti Depression.
Dr Murambidzi vanoti huwandu hwevanhu vari kurwara nepfungwa hwakakwira kubva pakatanga kuvharwa kwemaindasitiri nemisika. Asi vanoti chirwere ichi chinorapika kana chikakurumidzirwa.
Mutevedzeri wemukuru anoona nezvehutano hwepfunga munyika, Dr Sacrifice Chirisa, vanoti hurumende ine hurongwa hwekupinda muvanhu ichavadzidzisa nyaya dzehutano, asi chirongwa ichi chakambomisa nemitemo inobata Covid-19.
Gurukota remagariro evanhu akanaka, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavhima, vanoti hakuna munhu anofanira kushaya chikafu nokuti hurumende ine chirongwa chekubatsira vanoshaya.
VaMavhima vanoti kune vanhu vanodarika mazana maviri ezviuru, vakatonyoresa kuti vawane rubatsiro zvokuti vamwe vakatotanga kutambira mari munharembozha dzavo kubva mwedzi wapfuura.
Asi vanhu vakaita saAmai Kasirori nevamwe vakawanda munyika vanoti havasati vawana rubatsiro rwuri kutaurwa nehurumende, izvo zvicharamba zvichikonzera kuti vanhu vakawanda varambe vachivhiringwa nezvirwere zvepfungwa, sezvo vanenge vasina pekutangira.
Dare reSenate riri kuenderera mberi richinzwa mhosva dziri kupomerwa mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica, VaDonald Trump, dzekushandisa masimba avo zviri kunze kwemutemo uye kuda kuvhiringidza dare reCongress kuferefeta nyaya iyi.
Vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuda kushandisa mari yainge yanzi nedare reHouse of Representatives iende kuUkraine kunotenga zvombo kuti vamanikidze nyika iyi kuti itange yaongorora huori hunonzi hwakaitwa naHunter Biden, mwanakomana wevaive mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica, VaJoe Biden.
VaBiden vari kutarisirwa kukwikwidzana naVaTrump musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika gore rino, ndokana vakunda musarudzo yekutsvaga achamirira bato reDemocratic Party musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika..
VaTrump vari kupomerwa imwe mhosva yekuda kukanganisa dare reHouse of Representatives mukuongorora nyaya dzavari kupomerwa nekurambidza vanhu kuti vasape huchapupu uye kuviga magwaro akakosha panyaya iyi.
Kubva neChipiri kusvika mangwanani emusi weChitatu, maDemocrats akapedza maawa gumi nematatu achiyedza kuti vedare reSenate ridaidze zvapupu uye kukumbira magwaro avanoti anobatsira mukuburitsa pachena kuti VaTrump vakatyora mutemo.
Asi vebato reRepublican Party vakaramba kutambira izvi uye zvido zvavo ndizvo zvakatambirwa sezvo vaine nhengo makumi mashanu nenhatu uku maDemocrats vaine nhengo makumi mana nenomwe chete.
Kutanga Chitatu kusvika musi weChishanu, vari kuchuchisa nyaya iyi vakamirira maDemocrats vachange vachipa zvikonzero zvavo zvekuti sei VaTrump vachifanira kusiya basa nemhosva dzavari kuvapomera dzekutyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika.
Magweta aVaTrump ari kutarisirwa kutanga kupawo divi ravo kutanga nemusi weMugovera.
Mutevedzeri wasachigaro weMDC muAmerica, VaZvidzai Ruzvidzo, vanoti semaonero avo zvakakosha kuti dare reSenate ripihwe humbowo nezvapupu kuti ritonge nyaya zvakanaka.
VaTrump vari kutarisirwa kudzoka munyika vachibva kumusangano weWorld Economic Forum kuDavos uye vanoti padandemutande ravo reTwitter maDemocrats ari kuda kuvazodza mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya.
Munhoroondo yeAmerica, vatungamiri vaviri chete ndivo vakapomerwa mhosva yekutyora mutemo vakaendeswa kudare reSenate sezviri kuitwa VaTrump. Vaviri ava ndi VaAndrew Johnson muna 1868 uye VaBill Clinton muna 1998.
VaJohnson naVaClinton vakazochenurwa nedare reSenate asi mapato avo akaenda kunokundwa musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika yakatevera mushure menyaya dzavaipomerwa.

Mutemo weFreedom of Information Act uyu ndemimwe yemitemo iri kudzikwa nehurumende kushandura mutemo weAccess to Information and Protection of Privacy Act kana kuti AIPPA, uyo unonzi nevamwe vaimbunyikidza maburitsirwo emashoko nenhau, uye mashandiro evatori venhau.
