Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvekufambiswa kwemashoko dzinoti kunyange hazvo mutemo mutsva uyu wakati siyaneyi nemutemo waivepo weAIPPA, une zvakawanda zvinofanirwa kuvandudzwa kuti ufambirane neshanduko iri kutarisirwa mukufambiswa kwemashoko pari zvino.

Huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika huri kuramba huchikwira mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu vaviri vashaya vari muzvipatara kuBulawayo.
Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino vasvika zviuru makumi matanhatu nevapfumbabwe kana kuti 69.
Nemusi weMugovera kwakaita huwandu hunotyisa hwevanhu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi apo vanhu mazana mana nemakumi mapfumbamwe kana kuti 490 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi mushure mekunge vavhenekwa.
Pavanhu vose ava kunze kwevashanu chete, vamwe vose vakabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Brighton Chireka vanoti zviri pachena kuti chirwere chadzika midzi munyika.
Vanhu vavhenekwa chirwere ichi munyika vadarika zviuru zana nemakumi matatu nevaviri kana kuti 132, 000. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vasvika zviuru zvitatu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 3,659.
Pavanhu vashaya, Harare ndiyo ine vakawandisa vanosvka makumi matatu nemumwe ichiteverwa neBulawayo ine makumi maviri. Pamatunhu ose emunyika, Masvingo chete ndiro dunhu risina kana munhu mumwe chete ashaya.
Tichiri panyaya iyi, kunyangwe hazvo zvinhu zvasvika pakaipisisa panyaya yerkupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus, kuramwa mabasa kwevashandi vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba kwave mumwedzi weChipiri kuri kuenderera mberi.

Saka tinenge tichida kuti vana ava vawanirwe zvekuita vachiri vadiki kudai,” vadaro Amai Mnangagwa
Vatiwo kana vana vakawanirwa mukana wekuita mabasa emaoko havazoyauri kana vabva zera sezvo vanenge vaine pekutangira.

“Vana ivava kana vakawana zvekuita sekukoma koma, kana kusona, kana kufuraya mafetikuku, nemabanzi vanozowana chinovabatsira pamberi apo. Nekuti hatifanirwi kuti mwna wese angochovherwa mutown nekuti hamuna chinobudamo futi zvakare.”

Vanoti nyaya yekuMali inyaya yemauto akabvisa mutungamiri pachigaro isina vanhu mukati uye paramende yeMali haina kugara kuti itorere matanho mutungamiri wenyika, VaKeita kuti vadzingwe kana kuti varegedze basa sezvakaitika muZimbabwe.

Vanotiwo VaMugabe havana kumbobvira vasungwa nemauto sezvakaitika kuMali uko VaKeita vakaiswa muhusungwa nemauto.

Mutemo uyu uri kutsiwa mutemo wePublic Order and Security Act, POSA, uyo wanga uchishandiswa munyika mushure mekudzikwa muna 2002.
Vakawanda vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu pamwe nevanopikisa hurumende vari kushoropodza mutemo weMOPA uyu vachiufananidza nemutemo waishandiswa munguva yeRhodesia, weLaw and Order Maintenance Act, LOMA, uyo unonzi nevakawanda waidzvanyirira vatema vairwira kodzero dzavo.

Gurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, avo vashanyira nzvimbo iyi, vazivisawo kuti hurumende inofunga kuti yakwanisa kuburitsa vanhu vose makumi matatu nevaviri vapenyu nevakafa, vaive mumugodhi weJongwe Cooperative Mine, vachitiwo panofungidzirwa kuti mune mumwe mugodhi weCricket Number 3 Mine munogona kunge muine vanhu vana vangadai vakavharirwa.
Izvi zvinouya panguva iyo sangano remakereke, reZimbabwe Council of Churches, ZCC, raita munamato muKadoma wekurangarira vakashaya mutsaona iyi pamwe nekunyaradzana nehama neshamwari dzevakasha ava nevakapona mutsaona iyi.
Vanoona nezvezvirongwa musangano reZCC, VaFambai Ngirande, vanoti sangano ravo ranga richibatsirana nemamwe mapoka anosanganisira mapurisa, nevanonunura vanhu munjodzi vari kuita basa rekutsvaga vanhu pasi pemigodhi iyi kubva paitika tsaona iyi.
Pahuwandu hwevanhu vangadai vakanga vari pasi panguva yakaitika tsaona iyi, VaNgirande vanoti zvinonetsa kuti vanhu vatambire kuti migodhi miviri iyi ingadai yaingove nevanhu makumi matatu nevatanhatu chete panguva iyi.
Mutungamiri weNational Constitutional Assembly, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku, avo vari mugungano rePolitical Actors Dialoge kana kuti POLAD, vari kushora zvikuru hurumende nedanho rekuda kuvandudza bumbiro remitemo vachiti izvi zvinofanira kutanga zvabva kuvanhu.
VaMadhuku vanoti bumbiro remitemo harifanirwe kuchinjwa nehurumende inenge ichitonga sezvo zvichiratidza pachena kuti hurumende iyi inenge yava kuda kuita zvido zvayo pabumbiro rakabva muvanhu.
Asi gurukota rinoona nezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vanoti hapana chakaipa pane zviri kuitwa nehurumende zvekuvandudza zvikamu zvine chekuita nekudomwa kwevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, kuwedzerwa kwemakore evatongi vanenge vasvika makore ekuenda pamudyandigere, uye kuda kuvandudzwa kudomwa kwevachuchusi vakuru vehurumende.
Vanopikisa hurumende vanoti zviri kuda kuitwa izvi zvakanangana nekuda kupa masimba akawanda kumutungamiri wenyika.
Nhasi, America iri kupemberera kuwana kwayo kuzvitonga.
America iri kurangarira zuva remugore ra 1776, apo vamiriri venzvimbo gumi nenhatu, idzo dzaive pasi peGreat Britain, vakanyorerana chibvumirano chekuzvitonga, kubva muhutongi hweGreat Britain.
Apa ndipo pakatanga zviri pamutemo hondo yemakore manomwe America ichirwira kuzvitonga. Asi chimwe chiitiko chakakosha mugakava raivepo, chakaitika musi wa Kubvumbi 18, 1775 apo pakatanga kurwisana mauto ekuBritain nemauto emuAmerica mudunhu reMassachusetts.
Pfuti yakatanga kuridzwa musi uyu, yakazozivikanwa sepfuti yakarira ikanzwikwa nepasi rose, sezvo yakaratidza shanduko yaizobva mukubudirira kweAmerica kubva muhutongi hwenyika yainge yakasimba zvikuru pasi rose.
Mushure meshanduko iyi, kufunga kwevanhu vakasununguka, kwakava tsika nemagariro evanhu vemuAmerica.
Izvi zvinosanganisira kuvambwa kwekereke yeAnglican, kusununguka kwemunhu wese, ukwo kwakatambirwa nekukurumidza nematunhu aimbove pasi peBritain.
Zvakakosha zvakaitika, hwaive hukama hwehurumende nevanhu vainotonga, uhwo hwakachinja zvikuru mumatunhu emuAmnerica.
Hutongi hwaibva pamusoro hwuchienda pasi, hwakabviswa, pakava nehutongi hwemumatunhu hwaisarudzwa neveruzhinji.
Veruzhinji vakatanga kuva nechekuita mumashandiro edzihurumende dzematunhu avo, uye vanhu vakawanda vakatanga kuwana kodzero dzekuvhota, uye kupinda zvakanyanya mune zvematongerwo enyika.
Nyika dzemuEurope dzakazvionawo.
Nyika dzaive pasi pemadzimambo nemadzimambokadzi dzaishuvira kukundikana kweAmerica – vaipikisa hutongo hwemadzimambo nemadzimambokadzi vakaonawo kuti shanduko yakaitika muAmerica yaikwanisa kubvisa dzihurumende pazvigaro, uye kuti munhuwo zvake, aikwanisa kupinda munyaya dzekutongwa kwenyika yake.
Mugwaro rekutara kuzvitonga kweAmerica, VaThomas Jefferson vakanyora kuti “vanhu vose vakasikwa zvakafanana.”
Mashoko aya akaita kuti vanhu vatsigire kuzvitonga nekurwira rusununguko munyika dzinoti Netherlands, Belgium, Ireland, Poland ne Haiti, uye nepasi rose.
Mashoko aVaJefferson akashandiswa mugwaro rekuzvitonga rekaitwa muFrance.
Mashoko aya akafadzawo vatungamiri vakaita sa Simon Bolivar, izvo zvakaita kuti vadzanyiriri vapikiswe nenzira dzakabudirira munyika dzemu Latin America.
Makore mazana maviri apfuura, Marquis de Lafayette, rimwe remagamba eshanduko muAmerica, akati “Hunhu hwakunda hondo. Nyika yasununguka zvino.”
Zvinoreva shanduko yemuAmerica, zvakabata pasi rose, uye zvinoramba zvichiyemurwa muzuva ranhasi.
Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe change chichidzidza muAmerica kuAndrews University kuMichagan, Muzvare Mellisa Jacquiline Mukutiri, vakashaya neMuvhuro mushure mekubatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus kana kuti Covid-19.
Muzvare Mukutiri vange vave nemakore gumi nemapfumbamwe.
Hanzvadzi yavo, VaTafadzwa Mandaza, avo vari kuZimbabwe, vanoti mhuri yavo yarasikirwa zvikuru.
Vatiwo amai vaMuzvare Mukutiri vanogara kuMichigan, vakadzimirwa nerufu urwu zvekuti vari kutadza kana kutaura izvo zvaita kuti vati Studio7 itaure naivo Va Mandaza.
Muzvare Mukutiri vanonzi vange vane chirwere che asima asi vakazobatwa neCoronavirus iyo yazotora hupfenyu hwavo.
Hurongwa hwekuradzikwa kwaMuzvare Mukutiri hausati hwaziviswa.
"Tiri kudzamirwa semhuri uye baba vamuzvare Mukutiri vakashaya vakasiya amai vake vari chirikadzi. Vakauya kuAmerica semhuri uye muzvare vaigona zvikurusa muchikoro vachifarira kuvenga mabhuku avo, mhuri yedu yarasikirwa zvikuru," VaMandaza vaudza Marvellous Mhlanga-Nyahuye weStudio7.
Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rechikoro chepamusoro paidzidza Muzvare Mukutiri sezvo nhare dzepachikoro ichi dzange dzisiri kudairwa sezvo zvikoro zvizhinji zvakavharwa muAmerica pari zvino nepamusoro pedambudziko rechirwere cheCoronaviru.
Muzvare Mukutiri vanonzi vakatanga kurwara vari kuchikoro ndokuzoendeswa kuchipatara uko vakazoshaya vari.
Muzvare Mukutiri ava munhu wechipiri ari chizvarwa cheZimbabwe kushaya nechirwere cheCoronavirus zvichitevera kushaya kwemutori wenhau, Zororo Makamba, mwanakomana wamuzvnabhizinesi James Makamba.
Zororo aradzikwa neChipiri muHarare pachitevedzwa zviri kukurudzorwa kuti munhu avigwe mukati memaawa makumi maviri nemana mushure mekufa neCovid-19.
America iri kutatarikawo kurwisa chirwere ichi. Dunhu reMichigan, uko kwanga kuchidzidza Muzvare Mukutira, rave nevanhu nemazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemumwe chete vabatwa nechirwere ichi, ukuwo vanhu makumi maviri nevana vachinzi vafa nechirwere ichi.
America yose yava nevanhu vanodarika makumi mashanu ezviuru vabatwa neCoronavirus, uye vanhu mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe vafa nechirwere ich kusvika pari zvino.

Vanachiremba vakuru vabatana navanachiremba vadiki mukuratidzira vachizivisa hurumende kuti havasi kuzoshanda kuzvipatara zvehurumende pamwe nekumasejari kwavo kusvika mumwe chiremba anonzi akapambwa neMugovera awanikwa.
Doctor Peter Magombeyi, avo vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiriri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, vanonzi vakapedzisira kuonekwa neMugovera vasati vapambwa kubva pamba pavo kuBudiriro muHarare.
Vana Chiremba varatidzira vachifamba kubva pachipatara cheParirenyatwa kusvika pedyo nemahofisi emutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa uko vamiriri vavo vazonosvitsa tsamba yenyunyuto mushure mekunge mapurisa arambidza mhomho yese yaana chiremba kuti isvike kumahofisi emutungamiriri wenyika.
Vachitaura neStudio 7, mumwe chiremba anove nyanzvi muzvirwere zvevana, Doctor Bothwell Mbuvayesango, vanotsidza kuti hapana munhu wavari kuzorapa kana Doctor Magombeyi vasina kuwanikwa. Doctor Mbuvayesango vanoti izvi ndizvo zviri mutsamba yenyunyuto yanosiiwa kumahofisi emutungamiriri wenyika.
Doctor Mbuvayesango vanotiwo zvinokatyamadza kuti munhu angatorwa zvinechisimba nekuda kwekungotaura kuti mari iri kutambirwa nanachiremba haisi kukwana.
Mumwe zvekare chiremba mukuru, Doctor Felicity Gumbo vanoti vanga vari pakuratidzira apa senzira yekuratidza hurumende kuti vanachiremba vakuru vari kutsigira vanachiremba vadiki mune zvavari kunyunyuta nazvo, kusanganisira kutsakatika kwaDoctor Magombeyi pamwe nemari shoma dziri kutambirwa navanachiremba.
Imwe nhengo zvakare yesangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Doctor Tapiwa Mungofa, avo vanoshanda paHarare Central Hospital apo paishandawo Dr Magombeyi, vanoti vasiya tsamba yenyunyuto kumahofisi emutungamiriri wenyika uye vachange vachizoendesa tsamba yenyunyuto iyi kune mamwe mapazi ehurumende. Vanotiwo kana Doctor Magombeyi vasina kuwanikwa hapana basa richabatwa navanachiremba.
Doctor Norman Matara veZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights vakurudzira hurumende yaVaMnangagwa kuti izadzikise zvainotaura zvekuti inoremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. Vanoti hurumende ikasakurumidza kugadzirisa nyaya yekutsakatika kwaDoctor Magombeyi zvichaunza kusagadzikana munyika.

Chirongwa ichi chichafambiswa nemasangano maviri aya, mukuchengetedza raramo yevanoda rubatsiro, zvikuru madzimai nevana vadiki, kuburiukidza nekupindira panguva yavanengte vachida rubatsiro.
Gwaro raburitswa nemasangano maviri aya pamwe nemuzinda weJapan muZimbabwe rinoti chirongwa ichi chinotarisirwa kubatsira vanhu vanoita zana nemakumi maviri nepfumbamwe rezviuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi masere nemumwe, (129, 581).
Mumatunhu anoti Tsholotsho, Mutoko, Centenary, Mbire neMt. Darwin, chirongwa ichi chichabatsira munyaya dzemvura, pekugara pamwe nehutsanana uye kudya kunovaka muviri.
Pamusoro pezvo, kudya kunovaka muviri kuchapiwawo kumadzimai akazvitakura kuTsholotsho, Bubi, Umguza, Lupane, Hwange, Binga neNkayi.
Nyanzvi munyaya dzekuderedzwa kwenjodzi, uye vachidzidzisa paInstitute of development Studies iri pasi peNational University of Science and Technology, VaEverson Ndlovu, vanoti danho rekubatsira ratorwa neJapan iri rakakosha zvikuru, pachitariswa kutambura kunoita vanhu, zvikuru madzimai akazvitakura, uye vari kumatunhu asina kunaya mvura zvakanaka pamwe nemafashamu.

Mauto eZimbabwe National Army anonzi akaungana muChinhoyi pakamba yemapurisa yeChinhoyi Central Police Station, uye pajeri reMurehwa Prisons, paine fungidziro yekuti igadziriro yekuparadza kuratidzira kunonzi kwakarongwa nebato rinopikisa reMDC mumatunhu eMashonaland East neMashonaland West.
Mauto anonziwo ave kuwanikwa pama road block ari kuiswa memapurisa mumigwagwa yemunyika.
Bato reMDC rinonzi riri kuronga kuratidzira nyika yose richida kuti hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa igadzirise zviri kunetsa munyika.
Asi mapurisa anonzi akatorambidza kuratidzira kwakanga kwakarongwa neMDC kuChinhoyi nekuMagunje kuMashonaland West.
Murongi wemisangano muMDC, VaAmos Chibaya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vacharatidzira vachitevera bumbiro remitemo yenyika.
Studio7 yabata Mutauriri wemauto, Colonel Alphios Makotore, kuti tinzwe divi remauto panyaya iyi, asi vati tiite zvekuvatumira mibvunzo netsambambozha, vachiti vanozotipindura nemusi weChishanu sezvo vanga vari kuNyanga.
Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, uye vari mukuru wesangano reCenter for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti zvave kuitwa nehurumende zvekungoisa mauto pese pese zvinoratidza kuti pane zvairi kutya.
Ukuwo vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari nhengo yevechidiki muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vanoti manyepo kuti mauto aiswa mumatunhu ari kuda kuratidzirwa neMDC sezvo bato iri risina rutsigiro kumaruwa kwacho zvekuti hapana vanobuda kunoratidzira.
Mumwe wevanhu vakatanga hurongwa hwekutsvaga mari yekubatsira mudambudziko reCyclone Idai, VaFreeman Chari, vanoti mari yavakwanisa kuunganidza pari zvino yave kudarika zviuru makumi masere nezvina zvemadhora.
VaChari vanoti vakatanga hurongwa hwe GoFundMe vaine chinangwa chekuunganidza zviuru zana zvemadhora.
VaChari, avo vanogara muAmerica, vanoti vari kushanda nemasangano akazvimirira, pamwe nevanhu vemumatunhu akatarisana nedutumupengo iri.
VaChari vanotiwo pane vana chiremba makumi maviri vaendeswa kumatunhu aya kuitira kuti vanobatsira vanhu vanoda rubatsiro zvichitevera kukuvara kwavakaita mutsaona yemvuramupengo.
"Tiri kushanda nevanhu vari mumatunhu akabatwa nedambudziko iri. Chishuwo chedu ndechekuti vanhu vawane rubatsiro nechimbi chimbi pasina zvekumbomirira kuwana mvumo kumamwe mahofisi. Pari zvino tinofara nevatiri kushanda navo nekuti zvese zvatiri kuita zviri kuitwa pajekerere," VaChari vaudza Studio7.
VaChari vanoti rutsigiro rwavari kuwana kubva kunezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri pasi rose rwunodadisa nekuti dambudziko iri neremunhu wese. Vanoti vakatanga chirongwa ichi mazuva apfuura uye vanoshuwira kuti vanhu varambe vachibatsira nepavanokwanisa sezvo dambudziko iri richiri rakakomba.
VaChari vanoti kune dzimwe dzvimbo rubatsiro harusati rwasvika sezvo kusiri kufambika asi varikushanda nemasangano akawanikwa vachiwunza zvikopokoko munzvimbo iyi kuti vatakurewo chikafu nemishonga zvichieswa kune avo vakatarisana nedambudziko iri.
Gurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, Va July Moyo, vakaumba komiti yekuti iferefete kanzuru yeguta reGweru.
Komiti iyi yakadomwa mwedzi wapera, uye ine vanhu vanomwe, sachigaro wayo ari mumwe mukuru mubazi rekutongwa kwematunhu, vangonzi VaJ. Chinyengetere.
VaMoyo vakagadzawo mumwe mushandi mubazi ravo, Amai J. Nyamutenha, semunhu achange achinyora zvose zvichange zvichiitwa nechikwata ichi.
Vamwe vari muchikwata ichi ndiMuzvare E. E. Veremu, VaC. Mudavanhu, VaC. Mpengesi, VaA. Nhamo naVaE. Gundumura.
Izvi zvakaitwa mazuva mashoma mushure mekunge kanzuru yeGweru yambomisa basa munyori weguta, Amai Elizabeth Gwatipedza, ichivapomera mhosva yekuita huori pamwe nekutadza kuita basa ravo sezvinotarisirwa.
Studio7 yaedza kufonera Va Moyo kuti tinzwe divi ravo, asi vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo.
Hatinawo kukwanisa kunzwa divi ra Amai Gwatipedza, sezvo vanga vasiri kubatika panharembozha yavo.
Mugwaro ravo ravakatumira kuchikwata chiri kuferefeta kanzuru yeGweru musi wa 22 Gumiguru 2019, VaMoyo vanoti komiti iyo ichaferefeta kanzuru yeGweru, ichabatata nyaya dzakawanda, kusanganisirawo zvakaitika kusvika pakuti Amai Gwatipedza vambomiswa basa.
Meya weGweru, Va Josiah Makombe, vanoti ichokwadi kuti pane chikwata chakadomwa naVaMoyo kuti chiferefete zviri kuitika mukanzuru yavo.
VaMakombe vanoti vakaziviswa naVaMoyo nezvechikwata ichi uye vanotambira zvakaitwa naVaMoyo sezvo vakatevedza mutemo.
Asi vanoti komiti yakadomwa iyi inofanirwa kuita basa rayo ichitevedza mitemo yenyika pasina nyaya dzekupumhana huroyi.
pakombomiswa basa kwakaitwa Amai Gwatipedza, VaMakombe vanoti kanzuru yavo yakaita ongororo zviri pamutemo pakaonekwa kuti munyori weguta aikundikana kuita basa rake sezvinotarisirwa.
Chimwe chiri kukushushikana naVaMakombe inyaya yekuti chikwata chakadomwa naVaMoyo chiri kuita basa racho panguva iyo kanzuru yavo iri kuferefetawo zvakapa kuti Amai Gwatipedza vaombomiswa basa, izvo vanoti zvinogona kuvhiringwa nechikwata chiri kuferefetawo kanzuru yavo.
"Kana kanzura achidiwa nekomiti yaVaMoyo, ukuwo achidiwa kuti ape humbowo kukomiti yekanzuru yedu panoitwa seyi? Zvinoreva kuti zviri kuitwa nekanzuru zvinotombomiswa kuitira kuti munhu uyu amire pamberi pechikwata ichi. Zvinodzosera shure basa redu," vadaro VaMakombe.
Mubatanidzwa wenyika dzemu Africa, African Union, neSvondo wakaparura chibvumirano chezvekutengeserana kwenyika dzemu Africa chinonzi African Continental Free Trade Area (ACfTA).
Chibvumirano ichi chakasainwa nenyika makumi mashanu neina pakaumbwa musika wekutengeserana unonzi mukuru kupfuura imwe yese pasi pose.
Chibvumirano ichi chakatora makore gumi nemanomwe ehurukuro.
Dzimwe nyanzvi munezvehupfumi dzinoti kana chibvumirano ichi chikabudirira chichasimudzira hupfumi hwenyika idzi nezvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana, kana kuti 60%.
Asi nyanzvi idzi dzinobvumavo kuti Africa inezvipingamupini zvakawanda zvinogona kukanganisa mashandiro emusika uyu.
Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti zvimwe zvingakanganisa ACfTA zvinosanganisira kushaikwa kwenjanji nemigwagwa uye migwagwa isingavimbike, kurwisana uye huori munyika idzi.
Asi vanodzidzisa zvehupfumi pa Oxford Spires Academy kuOxfordshire, ku United Kingdom, Muzvare Eunice Chipachini, vaudza Studio 7 kuti ACfTA iyi chinhu chikuru muAfrica vachiti vanovimba kuti chichabatwa zvakanaka kuti nyika dzese dzive nezvadzinowana pasi pechibvumirano ichi.
Vati zvimwe zvinofanirwa kuchenjererwa ndezvekuti nyika dzagara dziine hupfumi kupfuura dzimwe, dzakaita se Nigeria ne South Africa, nedzimwe, handidzo dzega dzichabatsirwa nechibvumirano ichi.
Vanhu vari kutadza kuita vana munyika vave kukwanisa kuzoitawo vana zvichetevera kumutsiridzwa kwechirongwa chekubatsira vanhu ava nekutora mazai amai nekuasanganisa nembeu dzababa muLaboratory pasi pehurongwa hunonzi In Vitro Fertilisation, IVR.
Hurongwa hweIVR hwakambomiswa mumakore ekuma 1990 uye chiremba vakabatsira kumutsiridza hurongwa uhu, Doctor Tinovimba Mhlanga, vanoti vakaona zvakakodzera nekuti pane vanhu vakawanda vari kunetsekana kuita vana munyika.
Hapana humbowo muZimbabwe hunoratidza kuti vanhu vakawanda zvakadii vane dambudziko rekuita vana, asi pasi rese, zvikamu gumi kubva muzana zvevanhu zvakatarisana nedambudziko iri.
Doctor Mhlanga vanoti zvinogona kuita kuti makuriro akaita dambudziko iri pasi rose, ndiwo mawandirowo arakaita munyika.
Doctor Mhlanga vanoti pari zvino vari kubatsira kuuchika vachishandisa humhizva hwechizvino zvino vanhu vakaroorana chete uye kutaura kuno pane mwana akazvarwa nenzira iyi muna Kubvumbi ari kurarama zvakanaka chose.
Vanotiwo pane vanhu vanodarika gumi munyika vane pamuviri pari zvino mushure mekushandisa nzira iyi.
Doctor Mhlanga vanoti munhu anotanga aongororwa kuti chii chiri kumutadzisa kuita mwana asati apihwa mushonga wekuti aiite mazai akawanda.
Vanoti kana izvi zvaitika munhu anozoongororwa zvekare uye vanobva vakohwa mazai acho vosanganisa nembeu yababa.
Vanoti kana nhumbu yabata zai radzorerwa muchibereko chaamai, vanoramba vachiongorora munhu kusvika abatsirwa.
Asi vanotiwo vanowana vanhu kubva kune vamwe vana chiremba uye vanodzesera vanhu ava kunana chiremba vavo pavanongobata pamuviri.
Vanoti kazhinji chinowanzo kukanganisa vanhukadzi kubata pamuviri inyaya yekuti machubhu echibereko chavo enenge akavharika kana kutadza kugadzira mazai akawanda kozitiwo nguva zhinji mbeu yababa inenge isina kusimba kana kuti yakasviba.
Nyanzvi dzehutano dzinoti kutadza kusangana zvakanaka kwaamai nababa kunotadzisawo vanhu kuita vana.
Dr Mhlanga vanoti mbeu yababa inotanga yacheneswa isati yasanganiswa nemazai amai uye zvinongona kuti mmbeu iyi ichenurwe kubva kuhutachiwana hwakaita seHIV izvo zvinoita kuti pazvarwe mwana asina chirwere.
Doctor Mhlanga vanoti pane vanhu vakawanda vemarudzi ese vari kuenda kwavari kunobatsirwa.
Doctor Mhlanga vanoti nzira idzi dzinodaidzira mari yakawanda chose zvekuti inogona kusvika kuzviuru zvitatu nemazana mashanu emadhora.
Vanotiwo kunyange hazvo madzimai ariwo anopomerwa mhosva panotadza kubata nhumbu, varume vanoonekwawo vaine dambudziko guru uye nzira yeIVF inobatsira zvese amai kana baba vachinge vaine dambudziko rakadai.
Vanotiwo IVF Zimbabwe iri kuronga kuumba bhanga rekuchengetera mazai amai kubatsira vaye vati chemberei vanenge vachida kuita vana.
Vanotiwo sezvo IVF ichikwanisa kuitwa chete pazvipatara zvepamusoro zvine malabarotories, vari kuronga kusangana nevebazi rezvehutano kuti vafambe munyika vachikohwa mazai ana amai nembeu dzana baba vachizozvisanganisa kuHarare.
Studio7 haina kukwanisa kutaura nevebazi rezvehutano kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi.
Hatinawo kukwanisa kutaura nevabereki vemwana akazvarwa pachishandiswa nzira yeIVF asi Doctor Mhlanga vanoti mhuri iyi haisi kuda kuzikanzwa zita rayo, uye mwana wacho ari kuita zvakanaka chose.
Muimbi asingaoni ane mukurumbira muguta reGweru, VaJohn Madubeko, vanoti vafara zvikuru zvekubata denga mushure mekutambidzwa zvekuridzisa mimhanzi kubva kune mumwe mudzimai anove muzvinabhizimusi wemuguta reHarare asina kuda kudomwa nezita.
VaMadubeko, avo vanonyanyoridzira mumigwagwa yeGweru neKwekwe vaine mwanasikana wavo anemakore mashanu, Kholiwe, vanoti hupenyu hwavo hwashandurwa zvakanyanya nerubatsiro urwu.
Rubatsiro urwu rwauya zvichitevera imwe nyaya pamusoro paVaMadubeko nemwanasikana wavo yakaburitswa neStudio 7 mazuva mashoma apfuura, pamwe nevhidhiyo yavo vaine mwanasikana wavo yakatorwa naVaSam Ngoni Zaranyika mushure mekuvaona vachiridza muGweru, iyo inowanikwawo pamadandemutande eStudio7.
VaMadubeko, avo vane makore makumi mana nemasere ekuberekwa, vanoti vakaberekwa vachiona asi vakazorasikirwa nemeso avo vatokura. Asi vanoti mudzimai wavo akaberekwa asingaoni.
Muimbi uyu anoti anoridza misambo yerhumba nembaqanga, uye anoti nerubatsiro urwu ave kutsvaga zvimwe zvishoma zvasara zvakaita semagatare neamplifier kuitira kuti achibva mumigwagwa aridzirewo munzvimbo dzakasununguka, uye kuumba chikwata chekushanda nacho.
Dhora reRTGS radzikira huremu zvekare kechipiri kubva zvakatarwa huremu uyu nagavhuna weRBZ Doctor John Mangudya apo vakaparura hurongwa hwekufambswa kwemari.
VaMangudya vainge vati dhora iri ritengeswe ne 2.5 (1:2.5) padhora rekuAmerica mumabhanga asi nemusi weChina range rakwira kusvika pa2.7.
Pamukoto dhora rekuAmerica riri kutengeswa ne 3.6 kusvika ku3.8. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi VaTendai Biti vanoti izvi hazvifashamise uye vayambira kuti zvinhu zvakasagadziriswa munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dhora richaramba richishaya simba.
Asi muzvinabhizmisi vari nhengo yeZanu-PF VaGilbert Muponda vanoti zvchatora nguva kuti RTGS rinyatsogadzikane asi vati hurumende iri mugwara.
Vanachiremba, avo vakanga vachiramwa mabasa mwedzi wapera, vanoti zvinhu zviri kugadzikana muzvipatara kubva pavakawirirana nehurumende vakazobvuma kudzokera kumabasa kutanga nemusi weMugovera.
Mutungamiri wesangano ravanachiremba vemuzvipatara zvehurumende, reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Doctor Amos Tsopo, vanoti zvipatara zvehurumende zvikuru zvinoti Harare Central neParirenyatwa muHarare, zvatanga kutambira varwere, uye vanotarisirawo kuti zvipatara zvose zvemunyika zvinenge zvave kushanda kubva Chipiri, sezvo vanachiremba vose vachange vadzokera pamabasa.
Doctor Tsopo vanoti vanachiremba vakazobvuma kudzokera kumabasa mushure mekuwirirana nehurumende pamari dzekubatsirikana kana vachinge vashanda usiku, kana kuti on-call allowance, dzavaiti vanoda kuwedzerwa, pamwe nezvimwe zvakaita sekuti muzvipatara muwanikwe mishonga.
Chikwata chemaWarriors chasimuka chakananga kuLesotho chiine vatambi vana vakaberekerwa nekukurira kuEngland avo vakamboramba kutambira chikwata ichi.
Tendai Darikwa weNottingham Forest, Kudzai Benyu weCeltic, Macauley Bonne weLeyton Orient, naAdmiral Muskwe weLeicester, avo vakaberekerwa nekukurira kuEngland, vasimuka nechikwata chemaWarriors vakananga kuMaseru kumutambo wekuedzana masimba neLesotho uyo uriko neChitatu manheru.
Aka ndiko kekutanga vatambi ava vachibvuma kutambira chikwata chenyika ichi mushure mekumboramba vachiti ivo nhabvu munyika yaive isina kurongeka zvekukodzera kuti vatambire maWarriors mumakundano eAfrica Cup of Nations kana eWorld Cup.
Asi Darikwa anoti iye azvipira kutambira maWarriors sezvo kunyange akaberekerwa nekukurira kuEngland, midzi yake iri muZimbabwe.
Bonne anoti ari kufara kuuya kuZimbabwe achiwedzera iye kuti achaita nepese paanogona kuti Zimbabwe ibudirire mumutambo wenhabvu.
Murairidzi wemaWarriors, Wilson Mutekede, akadaidza vatambi ava nevamwe vanotambira zvikwata zvemuno kuti aone kuti vanokodzera here kutambira chikwata chake mumitambo ye 2019 Africa Cup of Nations nemimwe ichatevera.
Maneja wemaWarriors, VaWellington Mpandare, vanoti vane chivimbo nevatambi vari mukamba kuti vachamirira nyika zvine mutsindo kwete mumitambo miviri iyi chete asi nemimwe ichatevera.
Darikwa, Bonne, Muskwe naBenyu vachange vari mukamba nemaWarriors kwesvondo rese sezvo chikwata ichi chiine mumwe mutambo wekuedzana masimba neNamibia muWindhoek neMugovera.
Asi Zimbabwe ichange isina Knowledge Musona weKV Ostende kuBelgium naGeorge Chigova vePolokwane City kuSouth Africa, avo vakakuvara mumitambo yezvikwata zvavo mukupera kwesvondo.
Asi vamwe vatambi vese kusanganisira Marvelous Nakamba weClub Brugge kuBelgium, Kuda Mahachi weGolden Arrows kuSouth Africa, naTendai Ndoro weAl Faisaly kuSaudi Arabia, vari kupinda munhandare mumitambo yekuedzana masimba iyi.

Kunyange hazvo vanhu vakanga vanyoresa kuti vadzokserwe kumusha pachishandiswa mabhazi emuBotswana, vanhu ava vava kudududza pazvibvumirano zvavakanga vaita.
Vazhinji vavo vanoti kuZimbabwe hakuna kumira zvakanaka, nokudaro zviri nani kuti varambe zvavo vari muBotswana vachishupika vari munyika iyi.
Muzvare Excellent Mombeshora, avo vakanga vanyoresa zita ravo kuti vadzoserwe kumusha, vanoti vashandura mafungiro avo mushure mekuona kuti zviri nani kutambudzika vari muBotswana pane kuendeswa kuZimbabwe.
Chimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinogara mudhorobha reFrancistown, VaOscar Tendende, vanoti hurumende yeBotswana iri kutora matanho akasimba mukudzivirira kupararira kweCOVID-19 munyika iyi kana zvichienzaniswa nezviri kuitika munyika, izvo vanoti vanoona hupentyu hwavo hwakachengetedzeka zvakanaka muBotswana pane kuti vaendeswe kuZimbabwe.
Asi Muzvare Paidamoyo Zenda, avo vakadzoserwa kumusha kuburikidza nechirongwa chakaparurwa nevemuzinda weZimbabwe muBotswana vakabatana nehurumende yeBotswana, vanoti vakarongedza twavo mushure mekutemwa nemusoro usinganzwisisike.
Mugwaro ravakanyorera hurumende svondo rakapera, mumiriri weZimbabwe muBotswana, VaBatiraishe Mukonoweshuro, vakazivisa kuti kune zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe mazana mashanu zvanga zvakatarisirwa kudzoserwa kumusha kuburikidza nerubatsiro rwemabhazi kubva kuhurumende yeBotswana.

Mukuru weZimbabwe Stock Exchange VaJustin Bgoni vakanyora tsamba kune vanotenga nekutengesa paZSE kuti vambomisa kushanda vakamirira kunzwa kuhurumende kuti remangwana ravo rakamira sei.

Mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vati gore rino richave gore rekuratidzira zvakasimba munyika uye vapomera mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, yekukonzera kuti pasave nenhaurirano pakati peZanu PF nebato ravo reMDC.
VaChamisa vataura mashoko aya pakuparura kwavaita hurongwa hwebato ravo hwegore rino muHarare nhasi.
Vachitaura pamberi pevatsigiri vavo mumusha weMbare muHarare pavanga vachiparura hurongwa hwebato ravo hwegore rino, VaChamisa vati ruzhinji rweZimbabwe rwanyanya kutambudzika nekusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi hwenyika uye havasi kufara nekubirirwa kwavanoti kwakaitwa sarudzo dzemuna 2018.
Vatiwo kushandurwa kuri kuda kuitwa bumbiro remitemo yenyika neZanu PF pamwe nekusachengetedzeka kweveruzhinji kuburikidza nevanhu vari kufamba vachitema vanhu nemabhemba avo vari kudaidzwa kuti maShurugwi, zvimwe zvezvinhu zviri kushungurudza veruzhinji.
VaChamisa vati gore rino richave gore rekuratidzira kwakakomba munyika vachiti veruzhinji havangarambe vachinhonga svosve nemuromo, VaMnangagwa nebato ravo vasina matanho avari kutora kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika. Vati kuratidzira uku kuchaitwa murunyararo.
Kunyange hazvo tisina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMnangagwa pamusoro pezvataurwa naVaChamisa nhasi, VaMnangagwa vakaudza musangano wepagore webato ravo wakaitirwa kuGoromonzi muna Zvita kuti kuratidzira kweveruzhinji sekwakaitwa gore rapera hakusi kuzofa kwakabvumidzwa kuitwa.
Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vari mutungamiri weMedia Centre, VaEarnest Mudzengi, vati MDC inogona kuratidzira asi hurumende inogona kushandisa chisimba kutadzisa kurataidzira uku
VaChamisa vapomerawo VaMnangagwa mhosva yekutadzisa kuti pave nenhaurirano pakati peMDC neZanu PF.
Vati havasi kuzopinda munhaurirano dziri kuitwa pasi pechirongwa chePolitical Actors Dialogue, kana kuti Polad, vachiti nhaurirano dziri pasi pechirongwa ichi idambavanana.
Vatiwo vanoda kuti vari muchiuto, avo vanozivikanwa nekupindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika zvakazokonzeresa kuti vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiye basa, vange varimowo mukati menhaurirano idzi.
VaChamisa vati vakatuma vaimbova mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaThabo Mbeki, nezvanoda kuti zvitaurwe panhaurirano asi nanhasi VaMnangagwa vakangoti mwii.
Asi VaMudzengi vati semaonero avo chiri kudiwa neZanu PF inhaurirano dziri pasi pePolad chete.
Vamwe vanga vari pamusangano uyu vakaita saAmai Ethrida Chidavaenzi avo vati vabva kuChitungwiza kuti vazonzwa VaChamisa vachivapakurira hurongwa hwavo hwegore rino, vati mashoko aVaChamisa ekuratidzira nenhaurirano ndiwo avanga vakatarisira kunzwa.
Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri weZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, kuti tinzwe pamire bato ravo pane zvataurwa naVaChamisa sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo.
Asi VaMnangagwa vakambotaura kuti vakazvipira kuti mapato ese apinde munhaurirano pasi pechirongwa chePolad.
Zvichakadai, VaChamisa vakumbirawo nyika dzekunze kuti dzibatsire Zimbabwe nezvekudya sezvo veruzhinji vakatarisana nenzara inotyisa.
Vatiwo nhengo dzavo dziri mumakanzuru nemuparamende dziri kuita huori dzichabviswa pazvigaro uye vakurudzira hurumende yeZanu PF kuti imire pachokwadi panyaya yekurwisa huori munyika.
Gavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, nhasi vaudza komiti yeparamende kuti hapana chavakatadza apo vakashandisa mari inodarika mabhiriyoni matatu kutenga zvinhu pazvirongwa zvakaita sePresidential Input, Command nezvimwe muna 2017 na2018 vachiti zvese izvi zvakaitwa paine mvumo kubva kuhurumende.
Sachigaro wekomiti iyi ndiVaTendai Biti vanova mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weMDC.
Komiti iyi yange yakoka VaMangudya kuti vazotsanangura kuti sei RBZ yakashandisa mari inodarika mabhiriyoni matatu emadhora muna 2017 na 2018 zvisina mvumo yeparamende.
VaBiti vaudza VaMangudya kuti komiti yavo yaita izvi mushure mekunge hofisi yaAuditor General yaburitsa magwaro anoratidza kuti RBZ yainge yashandisa mari isiri mubhajeti uye pasina mvumo yedare reparamende sezviri mubumbiro remutemo.
VaBiti vabvunza VaMangudya kuti chii chakaita kuti vatyore mutemo wenyika.
Asi VaMangudya vaudza komiti iyi kuti hapana mutemo wavakatyora vachiti vakatumwa nehurumende kuita zvese zvavakaita.
Vati kana paka kanganiswa mutemo, gurukota rezvemari ndiro rinofanira kubvunzwa nekuti ndiro rakavapa mvumo yekubhadhara zvinhu zvakawanda zvakaita sezvinhu zvaishandiswa pazvirongwa zvakaita sePresidential Input Scheme, Command Agriculture pamwe nekubhadhara makambani akaita seZESA, ZISCOSTEEL nemamwe.
Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube sezvo vari kuRussia kumusangano weRussia Africa Summit.
Asi VaBiti nevamwe vavo vati komiti yavo yakabvunzurudza vamwe vakuru vakuru mubazi rezvemari nerekurima avo vakataura kuti vainge vasingazive kuti mari dzainge dzabhadharwa neRBZ dzaive dzei.
Asi VaMangudya vati zviri pachena kuti vakuru vakuru ava vanogona kunge vakanyepera komiti iyi kana kuti vainge vasingazive zveshuwa asi vakati bhanga ravo rine matsamba ese akabva kugurukota rezvemari richivaudza kuti vabhadhare makambani kana kutenga zvinhu zvakatenga.
Imwe nyaya isina kufadza komiti iyi ndeyekuti maTreasury Bills akaburitswa neRBZ nebazi rezvemari ainge asina zvese zvinodiwa pamaTreasury Bills. VaMangudya vabvuma kuti apa vakati vachagadzirisa izvi mune remangwana.
Pamusangano wanhasi pamboita kukandira makobvu nematete pakati paVaMangudya naVaBiti izvo zvisina kufadza dzimwe nhengo dzekomiti iyi.
Mumwe asina kufara nekuita kwaVaMangudya naVaBiti ndiAmai Barbara Rwodzi avo vaudza vaviriri ava kuti varekemekedze dzimwe nhengo dzekomiti iyi kuti ikwanise kuita basa ravo zvakanaka.
Komiti yaVaBiti iri kushushikana kuti mari dzehurumende dzakashandiswa zviri kunze kwemutemo zvikuru sei pazvirongwa zvakaita sePresidential Input Scheme neCommand Agriculture uye nemusi weMuvhuro unouya ichabvunzurudza zvakare vakuru vakuru mubazi rezvemari pamusoro penyaya iyi.
Nhasi komiti iyi yange yakatarisirwa kutura gwaro rayo rekutanga pamusoro pemashandire eRBZ.
Komisheni inorwisana nehuwori, yeZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission, ZACC, inoti vaimbove mumwe wevatewedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika munguva yehurumende yaVaRobert Mugabe, VaPhelekezela Mphoko, vari kutiza kusungwa nemapurisa ayo vachipomerwa mhosva yekushandisa hofisi yavo zvisiri pamutemo.
VaMphoko vari kupomerwa mhosva yekushandisa masimba avozvisizvo mushure mekuburitsa muhusungwa vamwe vakuru vekambani yeZINARA vakanga vari mumaoko emapurisa pakamba yeAvondale.
Mutauriri weZACC, uye vari komishina, VaJohn Makamure, vanoti mapurisa avo anga chida kubvunzisisa VaMphoko pamusoro pemhosva yavari kupomerwa iyi, nekudaro vanga vawirirana kuti vasangane padare redzimhosva muBulawayo.
Asi vanoti VaMphoko nemagweta avo vazochinja vachiti vainge vakasununguka kuti vasangane pakamba yemapurisa, sakapavada kuti vaende kumapurisa ndipo pabva pangotiza VaMphoko.
VaMakamure vanoti komisheni yavo yatozivisa vashandi vose vepamiganhu yose yenyika kuti vasavarega vachibuda munyika, sezvo vari kudiwa nemutemo.
Asi gweta raVaMphoko, VaZibusiso Ncube, varamba mashoko ekuti vaive mutewedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika ava vari kutiza kusungwa.
VaNcube vati VaMphoko vari kutya kuti vakaiswa kuchitokisi vanozobaiwa jekiseni rekuvaita kafira mberi, izvo zvarambwa neZACC ichiti ndezemugotsi matsuro.
MuHarare hamusi kudaidzwa anonzwa nemufaro sezvo vanhu vari kufarira kukunda kwakaita Dynamos chikwata cheBuffaloes 3-0 mumutambo wavo wekutanga mumakundano ePremier Soccer League egore rino.
Chikwata ichi chinozivikanwa zvikuru nekusatanga zvakanaka mumakundano aya zvekuti vanotevera De Mbare vari kupemberera zvakaitika mukurakasha Buffaloes 3-0 vachiti ivo izvi zviri kuratidza kuti Dynamos haisi kuita zvekutamba gore rino.
Makore apfuura Dynamos yanga ichinetseka zvikuru mumitambo yekutanga zvekuti yanga ichitanga isiri pazvikwata zvinenge zviri pamusoro soro asi ichizopedzisira yatora mukombe.
Sezvanga zvichingoitika makore apfuura, mumwe mutsigiri wechikwata ichi, VaEddison Mangwende, vanoti vanga vasingatarisire kuti Dynamos inokunda mumutambo wekutanga vachiti zvakaitika izvi zvinofadza zvikuru.
Kunyange hazvo Dynamos isiri iyo iri pamuroro soro, kupemberera kwevatsigiri veDembare kuri kuenderera mberi mumwe wacho, VaAndrew Rwodzi, vachiti kukunda 3-0 kuri kuratidza mutsindo une chikwata chavo.
Zvichitevera mitambo yekutanga, chikwata cheTriangle ndicho chiri pamusoro soro chichiteverwa neDynamos. Zvikwata izvi zvine mapoinzi matatu zvimwe chete neZPC Kariba, Caps United, Chicken Inn pamwe neTsholotsho
Chikwata chakabuditsa mazimari mazhinji chichitenga vatambi vatsva cheHarare City chiri pachinhanho chegumi nenhatu mushure mekurohwa 1-0 neTsholotsho.
Asi mumwe mutsigiri wenhabvu, VaTapera Mugoni, vanoti izvi hazvireve kuti Harare City haikwanise kutora mukombe uyu sezvo makundano achangotanga.
Chikwata cheBuffaloes ndicho chiri pasi pasi, chichiteverwa neHwange pamwe neHighlanders, izvo zvakazvamburwawo mumitambo yekutanga mukupera kwesvondo.
Kwakwana makore maviri mauto azivisa nyika kuti ainge opindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika achivimbisa kuti aida kubvisa matsotsi aaiti akange akakomberedza vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe.
Asi mumakore maviri aya, bato rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, pamwe nevanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, vanoti hapana chati chachinja munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, hupfumi pamwe nekuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu.
Nhasi kwakwana makore maviri mauto atora nhepfenyuro yeZBC achizivisa kuti ainge opindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika kubudikidza naVaSibusiso Moyo avo vakazivisa veruzhinji paterevhizheni kuti vakange vachida kubvisa matsotsi avaiti akanga akakomberedza VaMugabe izvo zvavanoti zvaiita kuti zvinhu zvisafambe munyika munyaya dzezvehupfumi sezvo vaiti huori hwainge hwatekeshera munyika.
Makore maviri chiziviso ichi chaitwa, nhengo yeZanu PF, uye vari mumiriri weHarare South muparamende, VaTongai Mnangagwa, vanoti hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa iri kushanda zvakasimba kupedza huori munyika zvavanoti zvichaita kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire.
Asi rimwe gweta remuHarare, VaKudzayi Kadzere, vanoti hurumende iri kupedzera zvipikiri padehwe retsindi ichirega kusunga vakuru-vakuru muhurumende vavanoti vari kuita huori hwakakomba sezvo chinangwa chakapindira mauto muna Mbudzi 2017, chaive chekubvisa vanhu vaiita zvehuroyi.
Pari zvino, hurumende yaVaMnangagwa yasunga vaimbova gurukota raiona nezvekushanyirwa kwenyika, Amai Prisca Mupfumira, ichivapomera mhosva dzehuori uye nyaya iyi ichiri mumatare.
Nekune rumwe rutivi, komisheni inorwisa huori, yeZimbabwe Anti Corruption Commission, inoti iri kuferefeta gurukota rinoshanda riri muhofisi maVaMnangagwa, VaJoram Gumbo, panyaya yekutengwa kwakaitwa ndege dzekambani yeZimbabwe Airways pavaiva gurukota raiona nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu panguva yehutongi hwaVaMugabe.
Vaimbove gurukota, VaSamuel Undenge, vari mujeri mushure mekuwanikwa vaine mhosva yekuita zvehuuro. Vamwe vanonzi vari kuferefetwa ndiVaSavior Kasukuwere, VaJonathan Moyo – asi vaviri ava vari kunze kwenyika.
Asi VaKadzere vanoti zviri kuitwa nehurumende yaVaMnangagwa izvi kupedzera matombo kuzvidhiidhii idzo njiva dzichauya.
Munyori anoona nezvesarudzo muMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaJacob Mafume, vanotiwo hapana chachinja munyika kubva zvapinda VaMnangagwa muhutongi zvikurusei pamafambisirwo esarudzo munyika idzo MDC inogara ichichemachema kuti dzinobirirwa neZanu PF.
Kunyange hazvo VaChamisa vachiti vakabiririrwa musarudzo dzegore rapera, VaMnangagwa vanoti vakahwinha zviri pachena sezvakataurwa nekomisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission izvo zvakatsinhirwa nedare repamusorosoro munyika reConstitutional Court.
Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vari gweta rinoshanda nesangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti kunyange hazvo hurumende yaVaMnangagwa ichigarochema kuti zvirango ndizvo zviri kukanganisa hupfumi hwenyika, kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kuri kuramba kuchiitwa nehurumende ndiko kuri kukonzera kuti Zimbabwe itadze kudyidzana nedzimwe nyika munyaya dzezvehupfumi.
VaMavhinga vnoati hupfumi hwenyika hucharamba huchiwira pasi kana hurumende ikaramba ichiita chandagwinyira.
VaTongai Mnangagwa vanotiwo kunyange hazvo veruzhinji vari kutarisira kuti zvinhu zvichinje munyikamunyaya dzehupfumi, kuvandudzwa kwehupfumi kuchatora nguva kwete zuva rimwe chete vachiti zviripo zvinobatika zvaitwa nehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa zvinoratidza kuti kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi hwenyika kwave kuzogadzirika.
Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti hupfumi hwenyika huchasimukira chete kana hurumende ikasimbaradza nyaya dzekurima, kumutsiridzwa kwemaindasitiri pamwe nekutengeserana nedzimwe nyika uye kuona kuti huori hwaparadzwa zvachose mumapazi ose ehurumende.
Nekune rumwe rutivi, dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinotiwo zvinhu zvinogona kumira zvakanaka chete kana VaMnangagwa vakaita nhaurirano naVaChamisa, avo vakavhoterwa nevanhu vakawanda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika.
Sangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights rinoti danho rekuwedzera kana kusawedzera mazuva ekuti nyika irambe yakavharwa, richanetsa kutora sezvo vanhu vazhinji munyika vasina kuongororwa kuti vane chirwere cheCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete.
Izvi zvinoitika apo hurumende ichiti yave kutora matanho matsva ekuti vanhu vakawanda vaongororwe, zvikuru vari munzvimbo dzine vanhu vakabatwa neCovid-19.
MuZimbabwe mava nevanhu makumi maviri nevatatu vabatwa nechirwere ichi, uye vanhu vatatu vafa nacho, asi pasi rose riine vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvinomwe vafa neCovid-19 kubva zvayakatanga kuChina gore rapera.
Munyori musangano iri, Doctor Norman Matara, vaudza Studio7 ruzhinji rwevanhu munyika harwuna kuongororwa kuti rwune chirwere cheCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete panguva iyo nyika yakavharwa kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe akatarwa nemutungamiri wenyika zvichaita kuti hurumende itemeseke musoro kuti nyika yoramba yakavharwa here kana kuti kwete pachapera nguva yakatarwa naVaEmmerson Mnangagwa.
Pari zvino, bazi rezvehutano rinoti raongorora vanhu mazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevashanu chetekuti vane chirwere ichi here kana kuti Havana munyika ine vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nematanhatu.
Nekuda kweizvi, VaMatara vati zvinonetsa kuti hurumende itore danho rine hudzamu isina humbowo hwakati tsvikiti hwekuti zvinhu zvakamira sei munyika pamusoro pechirwere ichi.
Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vanoti huwandu hwevanhu vaongororwa kusvika pari zvino hunoratidza kuti kuvharwa kwakaitwa nyika hakuna chakwabatsira.
Mutauriri wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vakurudzirawo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti vambomira kufamba-famba kwavari kuita.
Asi VaMnangagwa vanoti vari pakati pahurongwa hwekutenderera nenyika yose vachiona mamiriro akaita zvinhu pamusoro pechirwere cheCovid-19 ichi uye kuona kuti veruzhinji vari kutevedzera here kurudziro yavo yekuti veruzhinji vagare kudzimba senzira yekuderedza kuapararira kwechirwere ichi.
VaMnangagwa vakazivisa kutivachazoongorora pakupera kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe avakatara kuti veruzhinji vange vari kudzimba senzira yekuderedza mikana yekupararira kwechirwere ichi kuti zvinokodzera here kuti veruzhinji varambe vari mudzimba kana kuti kwete.
Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo.
Asi munyori mubazi ravo, Doctor Agnes Mahomva, vaburitsa mashoko ekuti komiti yakaumbwa nemutungamiri wenyika kuti itungamire nyaya dzekurwisa chirwere che Coronavirus yeInter-Ministerial Taskforce on Covid-19 inotungamirwa nemumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, VaKembo Mohadi, yakabvumirana kuti patorwe matanho akasimba ekuti vanhu vazhinji munyika vaongororwe kuti havana chirwere cheCvoid-19 here.
Gwaro raburitswa naDoctor Mahomva iri rinoti vanhu vese vanga vachienda kumabasa panguva iyo nyika yanga yakavharwa, kunyanya vashandi vehurumende, vachaongororwa kuti havana kutapukirwa nechirwere ichi here.
Doctor Mahomva vati munhu wese anofungidzirwa kuti ane chirwere ichi anosungirwa kuongororwa, uye vose vari kupinda munyika vachibva kunyika dzine chirwere ichi pamwe nevane zvirwere zvedzihwa vanofanira kuongororwa zvakare.
Doctor Mahomva vatiwo vanhu vakwegura vane makore makumi matanhatu zvichikwira vari muzvipatara vane zvirwere zvakaita se asthma, shuga, BP, nezvirwere zvemoyo vanofanirawo kuongororwa zvakare.
Vati zvose izvi zvichaitwa kuti hurumende inyatsoziva kuti nyika yakamira papi chaizvo pachirwere cheCovid-19.
Pari zvino, chirwere cheCovid-19, icho chakatangira kuChina, chinonzi nehurumende chauraya vanhu vatatu munyika, uye kubata vanhu gumi nevasere, ukuwo pasi rose, vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni maviri vabatwa neCovid-19, uye vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvonomwe, vafa nechirwere ichi pasi rose.

Vati vanga vave nemwedzi inokwana miviri vachishaya mari kubhanga ravo.
VaPaul Malunga, avo vanga vari pamutsetse pane rimwe banga vakamirira kutora mari yavo, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo vanga vave pedyo nekutora mari, vanga vamira kweawa imwe chete.
Asi VaMalunga vatiwo vachazonyatsopembera kana vakakwanisa kuwana mari yavo mazuva ese avenge vachiida kwete zvemusi mumwechete.
Ongororo yaitwawo neStudio7 yaratidza kuti vanotengesa mari mumigwagwa vanga vatove nemari iyi mangwanani.
Mumwe anotengesa mari mumigwagwa angoda kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti Riggo, audza Studio7 kuti anga awana mari iyi mangwanani, asi aramba kutaura kuti aiwana kupi.
Mumwe zvekare anotenga nekutengesa mari mumigwagwa asina kuda kudomwa nezita, ati nhasi anga angowana ma$2 emari yemabond iri yemusvo pamwechete ne$2 yebepa.
Asi ati anga asati awana mari yebepa ye$5.
Kunyange hazvo mabhanga anga achipa madhora zana, bhanga guru renyika rinobvumidza kuti munhu atore madhora mazana matatu pasvondo roga roga.
Vamwewo vataura neStudio7 vati vanoshuvira kuti bhanga guru rikwidze mari inotorwa pasvondo chero kusvika pamadhora zviuru zviviri vachiti mari yavari kuwana pazuva haina zvainotenga.
Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinotiwo zvingarerutsa hupenyu hweveruzhinji kana vanhu vakawana mari pasina kutanga vabhadhara muripo.
Kunyange hazvo tisina kukwanisa kubata gavhuna veReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, VaJohn Mangudya, nezvekushaikwa kwemari yebepa ye$5 , VaMangudya vakaudza Studio7 nezuro kuti vachange vachiisa mari iyi zvishoma nezvishoma mumabhanga.
Bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muZimbabwe hwasvika pazana nemakumi manomwe nevasere kana kuti 178, vafa vachiri vana uye vapora vari makumi maviri nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 29.
Vanhu vari kubva kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa, Botswana neBritain kunyanya ndivo vari kunzi vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi.
Kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi munzvimbo dzavari kuchengeterwa idzi kana kuti quarantine centres, ndiko kwapa kuti rimwe sangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, rakabatana nesangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, riendese hurumende kumatare richiti iri kuisa hupenyu hwevanhu vari munzvimbo idzi panjodzi.
Sachigaro vesangano iri, Doctor Fortune Nyamande, vanoti sangano ravo ratora danho iri mushure mekuona kuti vanhu vari kubatwa vaine chirwere cheCovid-19 vanhu vari munzvimbo dzi, zvinoreva kuti vari kutapurirana chirwere ichi munzvimbo dzavagere idzi.
Doctor Nyamande vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuwanisa vanhu ava zvikwanisiro zvakakwana, sezvo vanhu ava vari kunzi havana mvura yakakwana uye vari kugara vakamanikidzana, vasiri kupana mukaha sezvinokurudzirwa kuti vanhu vasatapurirana chirwere ichi.
Nzvimbo dziri kuchengeterwa vanhu vari kubva kunze kwenyika idzi dzinonzi hadzina hutano hwakakodzera zvoita kuti dzityise munguva ino yekukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi.
Vamwe vanonzi vari kutiza kubva munzvimbo idzi nekuda kwemagariro avari kumanikidzwa kuti vaite.
Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa kuStudio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi mana nezviviri kana kuti 142, 000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muAfrica.
Vashaya vanonzi vadarika zviuru zvina, kana kuti 4,000. Vaporawo vanonzi vanodarika zviuru makumi mashanu nezvipfumbamwe, kana kuti , 59,000.
Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni matanhatu, kana kuti 6 million.
Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica, iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose, inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa necoronavirus.
Vanhu vafa pasi rose vanodarika zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe, kana kuti 370, 000 uye vapora vave kudarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 2,6 million.

Vagari ava vatakura mvura ine tsvina kuenda nayo kumusangano uyu iyo yavaratidza kuna meya weguta reHarare VaBenard Manyenyeni.
Mumwe mugari wemuHarare uye vari mumwe wevanorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyika, Mufundisi Evan Mawarire vaudza VaManyenyeni kuti havasi kufara nemvura iri kubuda mudzipombi iine ruvara rwakasviba.
Mumwe mugari zvakare, VaSharon Mumbula, vanoti vakuru-vakuru vekanzuru yeHarare kusanganisira meya, vanofanira kusiya basa vachiti vanhu ava vaisa hupenyu heve veruzhinji panjodzi.
Zvichakadai, VaManyenyeni vaudza musangano uyu kuti kanzuru yavo haina mari yekunze yekutenga mishonga yekuchenesa mvura vakayambira veruzhinji kuti vashandise mvura yekanzuru vakangwarira.
VaManyenyeni vatiwo vanhu vawandisa mudhorobha reHarare zvavekupa kuti kanzuru ikundikane kuwanisa vagari vese mvura yakachena.
VaManyenyeni vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti iisewo mari mubhajeti rekanzuru yavo kuti ikwanise kuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena vachiti kanzuru yavo ndiyo yoga munyika iri kurarama nemari dzemitero inobviswa nevagari.
Vatiwo chimwe chinoda kuitwa kuona kuti kanzuru yakwanisa kutora mvura kubva kune mamwe madhamu akaita seKunzvi Dam kuitira kuti mvura ikwanire vagari avo vavanoti vawandisa muHarare kudarika vakanga vakatarwa kuti vagare muguta iri.
Pari zvino kanzuru yeHarare iri kuwana mvura kubva kudhamhu reChivero, asi Meya Manyenyeni vanoti kanzuru yavo yawandirwa sezvo yakanga yakagadzirirwa kuwanisa vanhu vanoita mazana matatu ezviuru mvura, asi pari zvino yave kumanikidzwa kupa vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mana.
Kanzuru yeHarare inowaniwaso mvura kuvagari veChitungwiza, Norton, neRuwa.
Mukuru mubazi rezvehutano anoona nezvemamiriro enharaunda uye nzvimbo dziri kuchengeterwa vanhu vari kubva kunze kwenyika kana kuti maqurantine centres VaVictor Nyamandi vanoti kushaya ruzivo rwakakwana ndiko kwopa kuti vanhu vakawanda vatapurirane chirwere checoronavirus munzvimbo idzi.
Vanoti vari kushushikanawo zvikuru nekutiza kuri kuita vanhu munzvimbo idzi mushure mekunge mapurisa azivisa kuti vanhu zana nemakumi masere nevana vainge vatiza.
Pavanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nevashanu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika, mazana mana nemakumi mana nemasere vakabva kunze kwenyika, makumi manomwe nemanomwe vachitapurirwa chirwere ichi munyika.
Dare repamusoro rakatombopa mutongo wekuti hurumende igadzirise zvinhu kunzvimbo dzinochengeterwa vanhu idzi mushure mekunge sangano ravanachiremba reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights rakwidza nyaya kumatare richiti hakuna hutsanana.
Kanzuru yepamusoro soro yesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, yasangana muHarare neMugovera ichizeya mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika, zvikuru nyaya dzinobata vashandi.
Musangano weZCTU General Council waitwa zvichitevera kunetsana kuri kuitika pakati pehurumende nesangano revashandi iri, iro riri kuti hurumende haisi kuzadzisa zvinhu zvinenge zvatenderanwa kumusangano weTripartite Negotiating Forum, TNF.
Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti musangano wavo wabuda nezvisungo zvekuti vatore uye kuzadzisa mukurwira kodzero dzemushandi.
VaMoyo vati sezvo hurumende iri kuratidza kusavimbika, vashandi vachashandisa kodzero dzavo dzekuramwa mabasa kana zvichemo zvavo zvisina kugadziriswa.
Asi VaMoyo vati vacharamba vachipinda mumisangano yeTNF sezvo hurongwa hwenhaurirano idzi huchitsigirwa nemutemo.
Asi vati havasi kuzosiya kodzero dzavo dzichidzvanyirirwa sezvo paine mitemo inochengetedza kodzero dzemushandi wese iyo vachashandisa mukuita zvinodiwa nekodzero dzevashandi.
VaMoyo vati hurumende ine mari inokwanisa kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika, asi mari idzi hadzisi kushandiswa nenzira kwayo.
Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvevashandi nemabasa, Amai Sekai Nzenza, sezvo nharembozha dzanga dzichinetsa kubatika.
Asi muhurukuro yavakaita neStudio7 svondo rapera, Amai Nzenza vakati vacharamba vachiita nhaurirano nevashandi kudzamara pawanikwa wirirano.
Zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika zvichitevera kuparara kwaita hupfumi hwenyika izvo zvasiya makambani akawanda avharwa.
Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti vanhu vasina mabasa muZimbabwe vava kusvika pazvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana.
Zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichikwira mitengo yazvo, magetsi achiwanikwa kwenguva shoma munguva dzemanheru.

Musangano wepagore wakatanga nezuro uyu uri kutarisirwa kupetwa nhasi.
Mutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa ndivo vakatora chigaro chekuva sachigaro weAfrican Union. Vamwe vanyarikani vari kumusangano uyu vanosanganisira munyori mukuru weUnited Nations VaAntonio Guterres uye mutungamiri wehurumende yeCanada VaJustin Trudeau.
Zvichakadaro, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakaisa ruoko rwavo pachibvumirano chekuti vapote vachiongororwa nevamwe vatungamiri panyaya yematongero avo kana kuti African Peer Review Mechanism chakaparurwa muna 2003. Izvi zvinoitwa pasina kusungirwa neAU.
VaMnangagwa vati kuisa ruoko rwavo munongedzo wekuti vakazvipira kuvandudza nyaya yehutongo hwejekere.
Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vaTamuka Chirimambowa vanoti kuna VaMnangagwa muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi.
Nyanzvi mune zvehutano dzinoti hadzikurudzire kuti vanhu vazivikanwe kuti vanga vaine chirwere cheCOVID-19 mushure mekunge munhu afa sezviri kuitika munyika.
Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti izvi zvinodziviririka chete kana hurumende ikaongorora vanhu vakawanda kusanganisira vese vanenge varwara.
Magwaro anobudiswa nebazi rezvehutano pamusoro pechirwere cheCOVID-19 anoratidza kuti kune vanhu vanozozivikanwa kuti vanga vaine hutachiona hwechirwere ichi ivo vanhu vacho vatoshaya.
Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano panguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr. Henry Madzorera, vati kufa kwevanhu vasati vazivikanwa kuti vari kunetsekana neyi zvinhu zvinoisa vashandi vezvehutano panjodzi.
Mutungamiri wesangano rinomiririra vakoti, reZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vaudza Studio7 kuti sesangano vanogarokurudzira hurumende kuti iise zvikwanisiro muzvipatara zvayo zvinoita kuti vezvehutano vaongorore munhu wese zvake anotsvaka rubatsiro munyaya yezvehutano zvisinei nekuti anoratidza kuti ane chirwere cheCOVID-19 here kana kwete.
VaDongo vanoti sevashandi vezvehutano vanonetsekanawo nevanhu vanozobatwa chirwere ichi ivo vatoshaya.
VaDongo vanoti kusavapo kwezvinoshandiswa kuti vana mukoti vazvidzivirire kuri kuisa nhengo dzavo dzakawanda panjodzi.
Vatiwo sangano ravo riri kushushikana kuti vakoti vari kubatwa nehutachiona vari pabasa vari kuwanda.
Nyanzvi idzi dzinotiwo kuongorora vanhu vakawanda kuti vane chirwere here kana kuti kwete ndiyo chete yekuti hurumende idzivirire kufa kwevanhu vakawanda pamwe nekupararira kwehutachiona hweCoronavirusm uhwo hunokonzera chirwere cheCovid-19.
Asi mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, VaJohn Mangwiro, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanhu ava vanenge vaongororwa vachiri vapenyu asi vanofa vasati vaziva zvinenge zvabuda muongororo dzinenge dzaitwa.

Vachibvunzwa kuti izvi hazviisi here hutano hwevashandi vehutano panjodzi, VaMangwiro vati vashandi ava vari kutora varwere vese vanouya kuzvipatara sevanhu vane COVID-19 kusvika zvinenge zvabuda muongororo zvazivikanwa nekudaro vanenge vakapfeka zvekudzivirira.
Kunyange hazvo hurumende ichiti vashandi vanenge vakapfeka zvekuzvidzivirira, vashandi vezvehutano, kusanganisira VaDongo, vanoti izvi hazvisi izvo zviri kuitika muzvipatara zvehurumende sezvo zvikwanisiro zvinodiwa izvi zviri zvishoma zvakanyanya.

Kunyange hazvo muzvipatara zvehurumende musina vana mukoti navananyamukuta vakakwana, hurumende iri kuramba yakamisa kupa vamwe vevanhu ava mabasa nekuda kwekuti haina mari yekuvabhadhara, izvo zviri kuwedzera matambudziko mune zvehutano munyika.
Asi izvi hazvina kumisa mufaro mukuru wevamwe vevachangobva kupedza zvidzidzo zvavo zvekuve vana mukoti nekuve vananyamukuta pachipatara cheMpilo muBulawayo.
Kosi yemakore matatu yekuve mukoti nekosi yegore rimwe yekuve nyamukuta dzinonzi dzakaoma zvikuru zvekuti dzinoziikanwa nezita remadunhurirwa rekuti “misodzi, dikita neropa”, saka nekudaro, hazvishamise kuti vanobudirira muzvidzidzo zvavo vanofara zvikuru.
Muzvare Patience Ncube ndemumwe weavo vachangopedza zvidzidzo zvavo zvekuve mukoti.
Muzvare Ncube vakawana mibairo ine chitsama kusanganisira kuve mudzidzi akakunda vamwe vose pazvidzidzo zvekuve mukoti kana kuti “best academic performance throughout training”.
Muzvare Ncube vanoti chinangwa chavo chaive chekuti vabudirire muzvidzidzo zvavo, vachiti mufaro wavo unowedzerwa nekukwanisa kubudiriro zvepamusoro-soro nekuwana mibairo kwavakaita.
Asi zvisinei nekubudirira kwavakaita muzvidzidzo zvavo, Muzvare Ncube ndemumwe wevamwe vakoti vakawanda munyika vasati vawana basa.
Muzvare Ncube vanoti zvinhu zvinovarwadza zvikuru kuti havasati vawana basa uye vanoshushikana nekusaziva kuti ramangwana ravo richange rakamira sei.
“Chinhu chakaoma kuita kosi yehu-nurse kwemakore matatu; munhu unotomboita mamwe mazuva aunorara wakasvinura nekuda kwekuoma kwezvidzidzo zvacho,” vanodaro Muzvare Ncube. “Kana wapedza zvidzidzo zvakadai unenge uchitarisirawo kuti uchawana basa. Asi pari zvino ndakangogara kumba kunge pasina zvandakaita muhupenyu. Apa handizive kuti ndichawana basa here, uye kuti ndichariwana riinhi. Zvinhu zvinorwadza chaizvo.”
Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano VaAldrin Musiiwa vanoti bazi ravo rinoziva matambudziko ari muchikamu chezvehutano munyika kusanganisira nyaya yekuti kune vana mukoti vasina mabasa.
VaMusiiwa vanoti bazi ravo riri mushishi mukutaura nehurumende kuti riwedzerwe mari rigokwanisa kupa mabasa kune vamwe vana mukoti.
VaPaul Dube vakapedzawo zvidzidzo zvavo zvekuve mukoti pamwe namuzvare ncube, uyewo havasati vawana basa. Asi VaDube vanoti vari kuramba vane tariro yekuti vachawana basa nekukasika.
“Ndakagara hangu kumba ndakatarisira kuti ndichawana basa nekukasika,” vanodaro VaDube. “Tiri kufungira kuti government ichagadzirisa zvinhu sezvambotaurwa na deputy minister.”
Kunze kwedambudziko rekuti vashandi vehurumende vanoonekwa sevakawandisa, rimwe dambudziko ndere kuti kune vashandi vanozivikanwa kunzi ma“ghost workers” avo vanotambira mari ivo vasingashande.
Hurumende iri pakati pekuita ongororo yevashandi vayo vose senzira yekuedza kugadzirisa dambudziko iri.
Asi mumwe mukoti uyo asina kuda kubuda pamhepo sezvo asingabvumirwe kutaura nevatori venhau anoti hurumende inogona kupa mabasa kune vamwe vakoti nevamwe vadzidzisi kana ikave nehanya nekushandisa mari yainowana pane zvinhu zvakanyanyokosha sehutano nedzidzo, kwete kushandisa mari kuwedzera makurukota ehurumende nekuvatengera motokari itsva nguva nenguva.
Kunyange hazvo vachibvuma kuti zano rehurumende rekuda kuendesa vamwe vashandi vasina mabasa kune dzimwe nyika rinogona kubatsira, VaButler Tambo avo vanove chipangamazano musangano rePublic Policy Research Institute of Zimbabwe vanoti hurongwa uhu haunyanyobatsira kwenguva yakareba.
VaTambo vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuwedzera vashandi mumapazi ehutano nedzidzo yobvisa vamwe vashandi vari kumapazi asina kunyanyokosha.
“Ndinoona zviri nani zviri zvekuti dai taganhura kune zvimwe zvinhanho kwatiri kuwedzera vanhu, tichiramba tichitora vanhu mwedzi nemwedzi,” vanodaro VaTambo. “Tikatarisa isusu kana tichida kutaura chokwadi mapurisa atava nawo munyika ava mazhinjisa; zvakare avowo vanochengeta vasungwa tiri kuona vachingoramba vachiwedzerwa zvakadaro. Nyika haibudirire nekuva nemapurisa mazhinji , zvakare haibudirire nekuva nemasoja kana kuve nevanochengeta vasungwa vazhinji.”
Kusvikira hurumende yagadzirisa kusamira zvakanaka kwezvehupfumi uko kuri kuita kuti inetseke kuwana mari yekubhadhara vashandi, vana mukoti vakaita saMuzvare Ncube naVaDube vanogona zvavo kuramba vakagarira guyo sembwa, vakamirira kuwana mabasa.
Vashandi vehurumende vari pasi pesangano reApex Council vakazivisa nezuro kuti vachange vachipinda mumigwagwa neChitatu chinouya vachiratidza kusafara kwavo nekwavanoti kushaya han’ya kwehurumende pakugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo.
Mutevedzeri wasachigaro weApex Council, VaThomas Muzondo, vanoti vashandi vaneta nekuvimbiswa zvisingazobuda, izvo zvaita kuti vatore danho iri.
Vanoti vashandi vachaungana pamahofisi ePublic Service Commission vachizofora vachienda kumahofisi egurukota rezveupfumi, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, uko vachanosiya magwaro enyunyuto.
Danho revashandi vehurumende iri riri kuuya panguva iyo vanachiremba vavekupinda mumazuva makumi matanhatu vachiramwa mabasa vachida kuti vawedzerwe mihoro yavo.
Varairidzi vari pasi pePTUZ neAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, vari pakuramwawo mabasa, nhengo dzePTUZ dzichingoshanda mazuva maviri chete pasvondo.
Bato reMDC raburitsawo mashoko ekuti riri kutsigira danho revashandi vehurumende rekuramwa mabasa iri, richiti ikodzero yevashandi yekuratidza kusafara kwavo nemihoro yavo murunyararo.
Mutewedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaEnergy Mutodi, vanoti hurumende ichashandisa mutemo mukuranga vashandi vayo vanenge vasiri kuenda kumabasa.
VaMutodi vanoti hapana chikonzero chingaite kuti vashandi vehurumende varatidzire kana kuramwa mabasa, sezvo gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli ncube, vakatozivisa kare kuti vari kugadzirisa mihoro yevashandi vehurumende.
Panyaya yavanachiremba vari kuramba kumira pamberi pekomiti inoranga vashandi, VaMutodi vanoti hurumende yavo ichatevedzera mutemo wemabasa nevashandi zvakare, weLabour Law, uyo unovabvumidza kuti mushandi atongwe kunyangwe asipo.
Vanoti vanachiremba ava vanofanirwa kudzingwa mabasa kana vasiri kutevera mhiko dzavakatora pavakapinda mabasa.
Hurumende yasainirana chibvumirano nevarimi vachena vakatorerwa mapurazi avo chekubhadhara vachena ava mabhiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana mashanu zvemadhora ekuAmerica, kana kuti $3.5 billion.
Chibvumirano ichi chaisainwa negurukota rezvemari, VaMthlui Ncube, vakafanobata chinzvimbo chegurukota rezvekurima, Amai Oppa Muchinguri Kashiri vakamirira hurumende pamwe nemutungamiri wesangano reCommercial Farmers Union, VaAndrew Pascoe.
Vachitaura pakusainwa kwechibvumirano ichi, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vati varimi ava vachabhadharwa chete zvivakwa zvaive pamapurazi avo paakatorwa zvakatararwa mubumbiro remitemo yenyika, kwete ivhu rakatorwa.
VaMnangagwa vati vanovimba kuti chiitiko ichi chichaita kuti nyika ikwanise kusimudzira mabasa ekurima pamwe nekuona kuti nyika yawana chikafu chakakwana pamwe nemari kubva mukurima.

Meya weguta reMasvingo, VaCollen Maboke vati dambudziko iri riri kuvashungurudza asi vari pakati pekukumbira hurumende kuti ipe vemakanzuru dhiziri kubva kukambani yenyika ye NOCZIM kuti vasamirire zviteshi zvemafuta izvo zviri kunetsekawo.
VaMaboke vatiwo magaraji ane mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari ari kuatengesa nechikero chemari yepamukoto uye kanzuru haibvumidzwe kutenga kumagaraji aya. Vaenderera mberi vachiti magaraji avanotenderwa nemutemo kutenga mafuta aya ave nemavhiki akawanda asina.
Vatiwo vachayedza kusimudza nyaya iyi kugungano remakanzura reUrban Councils of Zimbabwe kuti vaone kuti vangaite sei sezvo makanzuru ose asangana nedambudziko iri.
Gurukota rinona nezvematunhu munyika, VaJuly Moyo, vati vange vari mumusangano pavabatwa kuti vatipe pfungwa dzavo padambudziko riri kusangana nemaguta akawanda munyika iri.
Hurumende, kuburikidza nebazi rezvekurima, yadzika mutemo unorambidza kutengeswa kwechibage kune mimwe misika isiri Grain Marketing Board, GMB.
Mutemo weStatutory Instrument 145 unorambidzawo kutengeswa kwechibage kuGMB nemumwe munhu asiri murimi, uye unopa masimba kuGMB ekuramba kutambira chibage chinenge chichitengeswa nemunhu asiri murimi.
Zvimwe zviri kusungwa nemutemo uyu kufambiswa kwechibage chinopfuura matsaga mashanu ane huremu hwemakirogiramu makumi mashanu patsaga roga roga, kubva mune rimwe dunhu kuenda kune rimwe dunhu pasina mvumo.
Mapurisa ari kupiwawo masimba ekupinda mudzimba vachisecha kana vakafungidzira kuti munhu ari kuchengeta chibage zviri kunze kwemutemo.
Vamwe vanoti mutemo uyu hauna kunaka sezvo uchipa masimba ose kuG-M-B.

Panguva iyo veruzhinji vari kuomerwa nehupenyu nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kwezvehupfumi munyika, chimwe chirongwa chiri kuitwa nerimwe sangano rinoshanda rakazvimirira rega, chinodzidzisa madzimai kugadzira zvinhu zvakadai sesipo yekuwachisa, mafuta ekuzora, makandyera nezvimwe, chiri kubatsira kuti madzimai aya akwanise kuriritira mhuri dzavo.
Asi dzimwe nyanzvi dzinoti kusave nemitemo yakajeka uye kushaikwa kwemagetsi nemvura munyika ndizvo zvezvimwe zviri kukonzera kuti hupfumi hwenyika husasimukira.  Chiso chaAmai Jenity Chinokoro chinoratidza mufaro apo vanoratidza zvibhodhoro zvemafuta ekuzora nesipo yekuwachisa zvavanogadzira pamba pavo.
Amai Chinokoro vane makore makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe ekuberekwa. Vane vana vatatu uye vanogara mumusha unogara veruzhinji weMkoba 6 muguta reGweru.
Vanoti vakatanga kuita zvekugadzira mafuta nesipo pakutanga kwegore mushure medzidziso yavakawana kuburikidza nechikamu chemudunhu reMidlands chesangano reWomen’s Coalition of Zimbabwe, WCoZ, rinove sangano rakazvimirira rega rinoshanda mukubatsira kusimudzira madzimai.
"Ndokwandakawana kubetserwa kuti munhukadzi ave anokwanisa kuzvimirira anokwanisa kuita mabasa emawoko. Ndopandakadzidzira kugadzira sipo, petroleum jelly ma dishwashing liquid nema drink."
Amai Chinokoro vanoti vanokwanisa kugadzira tani rimwe chete resipo pamwedzi nemafuta ekuzora izvo zvavanotengesa kune vezvitoro uye kuvanhuwo zvavo.   Havana kuda kubuda pachena kuti vanowana marii pamwedzi nebasa ravo iri, asi Amai Chinokoro vanotaura pachena kuti vaimbonetsana zvikuru nemurume wavo nekuda kwekusawana mari yakakwana.
Vanoti hupenyu hwavo hwashanduka chose uye vave kukwanisa kuwana mari yekubatsira murume wavo kuriritira mhuri.
"Ndave munhu anokwanisa kuzvishandira; chero Baba vachishanda asi tinokwanisa kubatanidza mari yedu pamwe chete totokwanisa kuita zvinhu zvine musoro. Kutaura kudai takatokwanisa kutenga stand yedu uye property yemumba tiri kuwedzera tichiwedzera. Kumusha tave kutokwanisa kutumira mari kuvabereki."
Asi Amai Chinokoro vanochema-chema nerekuti kusavepo kwemagetsi nemvura zvakakwana kunovhiringidza basa ravo.
Muzvare Moleen Mutobwa vane makore makumi matatu ekuberekwa uye ndemumwe wevanhu vanoshanda nesangano reWCoZ mukudzidzisa madzimai kugadzira zvinhu zvakasiyana siyana.   Muzvare Mutobwa vakadzidzira zvekugadzira sipo nezvimwe zvakasiyana-siyana mushure mekuona chimwe chikwata chevaidzisa vanhu kuita izvi paWhatsApp, uye mumwe munhu wavanoziva ndiye akazovaudza nezvesangano reWCoZ nechirongwa charo chekudzidzisa vanhukadzi nezvemubato wemaoko.
Vanoti nemari yavanowana kubva mukudzidzisa vamwe, ivo vave kukwanisawo kugadzira zvimwe zvinhu zvakawanda. Vanotsinhirawo kuti kushomeka kwemagetsi nemvura kunokanganisa basa ravo, asi vanotiwo vanofara kuti vanoverengwa pakati pevanhu vari kukwanisa kuriritira mhuri dzavo zvisinei nekuwoma kwaita zvinhu munyika

Asi vanoti vakaona kuti kungoita izvi chete pasina kubatsira madzimai kuti vakwanise kuriritira mhuri dzavo, hakuna zvakawanda zvakunobatsira.
VaVincent Chakunda mudzidzisi wezvidzidzo zvepamusoro zvekutongwa kwematunhu nebudiriro uye, muongorori wezvematongerwo enyika akazvimirira. Vanoti hazvishamisi kuti veruzhinji vave kurarama nemabasa akasiyana-siyana ekuzviitira nekuti maindasitiri nemakambani akawanda akavharwa nekuda kwekuwondomoka kwehupfumi.
VaDidmus Dewa vanodzidzisawo zvidzidzo zvepamusoro zvebudiriro uye, muongorori wezvehupfumi akazvimirira. Vanoti mabasa ekuzviitira pamwe nemabhizimisi madiki zvinogona kusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika kana hurumende ikazvikoshesa.

Hurumende yatara chirwere cheCoronavirus sedambudziko guru rabata nyika yose, kana kuti National Disaster, uye ndokukanzura zvirongwa zvakawanda zvinosangana vanhu vakawanda senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi.
Vachitaura nevatori venhau kuState House, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vati vaona zvakakodzera kutora matanho aya nekuti nyika inogona kuwirwa nedambudziko reCoronavirus sezvo ratove munyika dzakavakidzana nayo dzakaita seSouth Africa.

Panyaya yezvikoro, VaMnangagwa vati sezvo pasina kana mumwe chete abatwa nechirwere ichi, zvikoro zvicharamba zvakavhurwa sezvo zvave pedyo nekuvhara asi vakati hurumende ichaongorora danho iri kana pane zvinenge zvaitika.
Vatiwo mahofisi ese ehurumende anofanira kuchitanga kuongorora kuti vanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vane hutachiwana hweCoronavirus.
Vati kunyange vatora matanho aya nzvimbo dzese dzekupinda nadzo munyika dzicharamba dzakavhurwa asi vakati vachasimbaradza nzira dzekuongorora vanhu vanobva kune dzimwe nyika zvikuru sei kunyika dzine hutachiwana uhwu.
Vati vanhu vanofanira kuchinja maitiro nekuregedza kuita zvimwe zvinhu senzira yekuzvidzivirira kubva kuCoronavirus.
